Line: uh... [reading]"does she have to plan her wedding on office time? couldn't she do that at home?" [pam looks angela an angry look] who else? why don't we just warm up first? warm up emotionally, all right?

Name: pam
Line: i have this kind of big secret about angela. and i've been really nice to her... and i haven't told anyone. and what the hell?!

Name: michael
Line: here is a kelly complaint: "ryan never returns my calls." ugh, join the club.

Name: ryan
Line: my voicemail's really spotty... sometimes...

Name: kelly
Line: i didn't file a complaint. i was just talking.

Name: toby
Line: to your hr representative.

Name: kelly
Line: to my friend, i thought. i want that withdrawn.

Name: toby
Line: fine, i'll take your name off. [looks at michael] so no one will know.

Name: michael
Line: [crumbles up the complaint paper] makin' progress. [jim raises his hand] yes?

Name: jim
Line: dwight tried to kiss me.

Name: michael
Line: what?!

Name: jim
Line: and i didn't tell anyone because i'm not really sure how i feel about it.

Name: dwight
Line: that is not true. redact it. redact it!

Name: jim
Line: well, i'm not actually making a formal complaint. i just really think we should talk about it.

Name: dwight
Line: okay, question. [looks at toby] when a name is withdrawn, does that also apply to the permanent misbehavior file in new york?

Name: toby
Line: sure.

Name: michael
Line: stanley. [off camera]

Name: pam
Line: [gets up and walks over to angela, whispering to her] hey. thanks for ratting me out!

Name: michael
Line: [still of camera] you got a lot of anger under there buddy. come on start us out. unleash it.

Name: anglea
Line: i didn't do it! [michael and stanley continue to talk off camera, but it's inaudible]

Name: pam
Line: i find that hard to believe... considering you have problems with every single person in this entire office except bobblehead joe.

Name: michael
Line: someone complained that the men's room is "whites only". stanley, you know that's not true.

Name: stanley
Line: i didn't say that.

Name: creed
Line: then why is there a picture of a white man on the door? [michael, along with the camera, look at the standard stick man on the bathroom door.]

Name: michael
Line: okay, phyllis. you complained that angela's giving you dirty looks. and you tried to get off the party planning committee.

Name: phyllis
Line: no, i never said any such thing. angela and i are close.

Name: michael
Line: and... also, phyllis, stanley says that you cry too much, and that bugs him.

Name: phyllis
Line: stanley and i are close, too.

Name: stanley
Line: we sit close.

Name: michael
Line: oh... ok.

Name: toby
Line: [sits down for his id picture] just take it. [flashes goes off, while he is standing back up again]

Name: pam
Line: i can't believe angela. i went against my better judgment, and i gave her a save the date. and now it turns out she complained about me to toby.

Name: jim
Line: well, it was redacted. look, if she wants an invite, maybe she's just trying to be friends.

Name: pam
Line: don't take her side.

Name: jim
Line: [sighs] well, what does roy think about everything?

Name: pam
Line: i don't know. i try not to bother him about this kind of stuff.

Name: jim
Line: you mean your thoughts and feelings?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: yeah...

Name: phyllis
Line: i know you keep saying it's your space, even though there's no assigned parking, but i keep forgetting.

Name: angela
Line: yes, that's the problem.

Name: phyllis
Line: i guess so...

Name: michael
Line: okay, well... all settled, then.

Name: phyllis
Line: [whispering to angela] i don't like you.

Name: michael
Line: ok, ryan.  you told toby that creed has a distinct old man smell?

Name: creed
Line: i know exactly what he's talking about. i sprout mung beans on a damp paper towel in my desk drawer. very nutritious. but they smell like death.

Name: michael
Line: all right, kevin. you are accused of making sexually suggestive remarks to angela that made her feel uncomfortable. solution:  angela, you are to make sexually suggestive remarks to kevin that will make him uncomfortable.

Name: kevin
Line: i accept your decision!

Name: jim
Line: hey... you know what, dwight? maybe we should get our photo i.d. taken together.

Name: dwight
Line: that doesn't make any sense.

Name: jim
Line: well, it saves time, you know. 'cause we could just meet in the parking lot every morning. walk in together. perfect.

Name: photographer
Line: [to dwight, who is sitting in front of the camera] smile.

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Name: dwight
Line: i never smile if i can help it. showing one's teeth is a submission signal in primates. when someone smiles at me, all i see is a chimpanzee begging for its life.

Name: jim
Line: this came out really well. [picks up dwight's i.d. from the laminating machine and hands it to dwight] there you go.

Name: dwight
Line: this is humongous. i am not a security threat...

Name: jim
Line: oh.

Name: dwight
Line: and my middle name is 'kurt', not 'fart'.

Name: jim
Line: what did i write?

Name: dwight
Line: i have another complaint for jim's permanent file.

Name: toby
Line: talk to michael. i gave him the box.

Name: dwight
Line: what box?!

Name: phyllis
Line: but i didn't report your snoring-

Name: stanley
Line: wednesdays, tearful. tuesdays... [dwight walks in and rummages through his complaint box]

Name: michael
Line: uh. dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: ah... agh... dgh... ahh! no, no! four years of malfeasance unreported. this cannot stand.

Name: michael
Line: okay! calm down.

Name: dwight
Line: no! you calm down! who's side is toby on? who's side are you on?

Name: michael
Line: hey, hey!

Name: dwight
Line: him or me?

Name: michael
Line: stop.

Name: dwight
Line: him or me? i cannot work with jim anymore.

Name: michael
Line: okay...

Name: dwight
Line: either he goes, or i go.

Name: michael
Line: dwight...

Name: dwight
Line: you choose!

Name: michael
Line: stop...

Name: dwight
Line: one of us is out of here by the end of today! [runs out]

Name: michael
Line: oh... kay...

Name: dwight
Line: i am not bluffing!

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: dwight
Line: okay?

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: dwight
Line: do the right thing here, michael. okay, i have served you loyally for years.

Name: michael
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: dwight
Line: i deserve this. you know i do!

Name: michael
Line: [picks up dwight's i.d. and snickers] you know your i.d. says you're a security threat?

Name: dwight
Line: you have till five.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, look, jim. there's a sales manager position open in stamford. want me to call jan and tell her you're interested? i could put in a good word for you, 'cause i'll still be working here. transfer! transfer! everybody! transfer! transfer! transfer! transfer!

Name: michael
Line: okay... you two, in the conference room with me. nobody leaves until we work this out. cage match!

Name: michael
Line: cage matches? yeah, they work. how could they not work? if they didn't work, everybody would still be in the cage.

Name: michael
Line: okay, so dwight, in your own words - [reads from complaint paper] "someone replaced all my pens and pencils with crayons. i suspect jim halpert." [flips to another paper] "everyone has called me 'dwayne' all day. i think jim halpert paid them to."

Name: jim
Line: [laughs] yes! five bucks each. and it was totally worth it.

Name: michael
Line: [reading] "this morning, i found a bloody glove in my desk drawer and jim halpert tried to convince me i committed murder. i think he may be the real murderer." [flips to another paper] "jim halpert said there was an abandoned infant in the woman's room. when i went to save the child, i saw meredith on the can."  gah. "this morning, i knocked myself in the head with the phone."

Name: jim
Line: that actually took a while. i had to put, uh, more and more nickels into his handset, till he got used to the weight, and then i just... took 'em all out.

Name: michael
Line: [reading] "every time i typed my name, it said 'diapers'."

Name: jim
Line: just a simple macro. you know, these actually don't sound that funny one after another. but he does deserve it, though.

Name: michael
Line: "by the end of the day, my desk was about two feet closer to the copier."

Name: jim
Line: yeah, i just moved it an inch every time he went to the bathroom. and that's how i spent my entire day that day.

Name: michael
Line: the japanese have this thing called shiatsu massage, where they dig into your body, very hard. and it is very painful. and apparently, some people throw up. but the next day they feel great. i've never had one. they sound awful.

Name: jim
Line: maybe stanford would be cool.

Name: dwight
Line: it's a good market. higher volume.

Name: jim
Line: yeah. maybe we should both go.

Name: dwight
Line: i have a girlfriend...

Name: jim
Line: sure you do, dwight. sure.

Name: michael
Line: hey, there's like, 300 more of these. let's get to them later.

Name: dwight
Line: so, you going to transfer jim or not?

Name: michael
Line: maybe, i haven't decided yet. let's get to work.

Name: dwight
Line: i want an answer by tomorrow.

Name: michael
Line: okay. oh... actually, tomorrow's not good. how about later in the week?

Name: dwight
Line: fine.

Name: michael
Line: good. okay.

Name: michael
Line: hey! wait. how about a group picture while you're here?

Name: photographer
Line: i can't. i only get reimbursed for the i.d. photos.

Name: michael
Line: well... that's... what, a computer camera, right?

Name: photographer
Line: you mean digital?

Name: michael
Line: it'll take like two seconds.

Name: photographer
Line: 20 bucks.

Name: michael
Line: ugh... all right. everybody, [looks around at the employees] come on. group photo for the newsletter.

Name: stanley
Line: you gotta be kiddin' me.

Name: michael
Line: come on, everybody.

Name: dwight
Line: come on, let's go. creed, kevin, oscar... andale! let's go.

Name: photographer
Line: one, two, three... smile. [camera flashes, but no one smiles] try to smile.

Name: michael
Line: we resolved a lot today, everybody. think happy thoughts.

Name: photographer
Line: alright, i'm just gonna take it on three...  whether you smile or not. one, two, three. [camera flashes]

Name: michael
Line: good, let's check that out. [looks at preview screen] ew, okay, all right. one more. we'll take one more.

Name: photographer
Line: that'll be another 20.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: pam
Line: angela, i want to talk to you about something.

Name: michael
Line: [off camera] you just press the button.

Name: angela
Line: what?

Name: jim
Line: no, pam.

Name: pam
Line: [looks at to jim] i am. [looks at angela] it's about the save the date.

Name: jim
Line: pam, it wasn't her.

Name: pam
Line: what?!

Name: jim
Line: i'm the one who complained about you.

Name: jim
Line: i... i didn't know that toby was gonna write it down. [the camera flashes] i was just venting.

Name: michael
Line: [off camera] okay, good. check that out.

Name: jim
Line: you know, it was one day.

Name: michael
Line: [off camera] that's terrible.

Name: jim
Line: and i took it right back. it was like...

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, dear.

Name: michael
Line: [off camera] let's pay mr. price gouger. [rejoins the group, on camera] okay... we can do this. come on, everybody. all right. here we go. [flash goes off before he sits down]

Name: michael
Line: it was really hard getting a good picture of fifteen people. he would not give me a good discount. and eight tries added up.

Name: michael
Line: [flashback the photo being taken] one, two..[flash goes off] didn't say three, did i?

Name: michael
Line: but, i'm sort of an expert at photoshop, so it turned out fine in the end. when people work together, there is going to be conflict. you can't outrun your problems.

Name: jim
Line: [on pam's answering machine] hey, pam... it's jim. um, i have a doctor's appointment in the city. so i probably won't be in till the late afternoon. just thought i'd let you know. okay, bye. [camera shows jim sitting on a waiting coach in another dunder mifflin office]

Name: female worker
Line: okay, jan will see you now.

Name: jim
Line: oh, thanks.

Name: michael
Line: and that is why the idea of a cage match is so universally appealing. but here's the thing about cage matches: sometimes you have to open the cage. and that is something toby will never understand.

Name: dwight
Line: [elevator bell dings] what is this? what happened here?

Name: jim
Line: i don't know.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, this does not look good. did anyone see what happened around my desk area this morning?

Name: jim
Line: dwight, i really think someone's probably just playing a prank on you, so just go right through it.

Name: dwight
Line: a prank, huh? this is official police line tape, okay? it's not a prank.

Name: jim
Line: probably is.

Name: dwight
Line: damn it, people! someone must have seen something! [jim's cell phone beeping] oh, you people are useless. jesus.

Name: pam
Line: [telephone ringing] dunder mifflin. this is pam. hold, please. dwight, it's the sheriff. he said that it's really important. it's regarding your desk. i'll transfer.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, no, no, don't! i can't... [groans] [telephone ringing]

Name: jim
Line: just cut through it, man, it's no big deal.

Name: dwight
Line: this is why i'm a volunteer sheriff's deputy and you're not.

Name: jim
Line: that is not why. wow, man, he really wants to get in touch with you. maybe it's a murder.

Name: dwight
Line: no, there's no blood.

Name: jim
Line: maybe poison?

Name: dwight
Line: possibly.

Name: jim
Line: my god!

Name: dwight
Line: [exclaiming in fear] no, jim, no! [jim knocks dwight's phone off its cradle] [yelling toward the phone] sheriff, this is volunteer sheriff's deputy dwight schrute. press the pound key! what's your 20?

Name: michael
Line: nothing much is happening today. we are having our photo ids taken. whoop-de-doo. can't always be like the apprentice.

Name: ryan
Line: i know.

Name: michael
Line: on big brother, something important happens every day. but real life is not like that.

Name: photographer
Line: [dwight slurping] okay, here we go. one, two...

Name: dwight
Line: he sometimes wears glasses, write that down. also, that may not be his real hair.

Name: michael
Line: i hate it when people don't tell each other why they're angry. my dad was like that. i would say, "what's wrong, dad? what's wrong, dad? what's wrong, dad? what's wrong, dad? what's wrong, dad? what's wrong, dad?" over and over and over. and he would just look at me like i was an idiot.

Name: dwight
Line: i'm the one who petitioned the office board to have these id badges taken.

Name: photographer
Line: so there were no death threats?

Name: dwight
Line: let me see your id.

Name: michael
Line: there is this old story about two women who each think they are the mother of this baby. and they can't decide, so they bring the baby to a wise man. just like a manager in those days. and the wise man says, "i will adopt this baby and raise it as a hindu." see? they didn't expect that. and that fixed it. because i think he was the dad anyway.

Name: michael
Line: there are dozens of old complaints in here. cold cases, like the show. [imitating gonging] and toby is a lazy detective who has decided that these armed robberies and rapes and murder/suicides are not important enough to solve. well, you know what? i have a problem with that. and i'm going to open up these cases before toby can kill or rape another person.

Name: photographer
Line: all right.

Name: pam
Line: that's not bad. hey, do you do weddings?

Name: photographer
Line: would you seriously want your wedding photos to look like that?

Name: jim
Line: not bad.

Name: dwight
Line: i gave her a higher clearance than you.

Name: jim
Line: what does level red mean?

Name: dwight
Line: i'd tell you, but then i'd have to kill you. [laughing maniacally]

Name: meredith
Line: wait. [puts eye drops in] [photographer takes the shot and her eyes are  closed]

Name: kevin
Line: no, wait. [put on a hat] yeah.

Name: phyllis
Line: you must have misdialed. this is phyllis. no, i'm not sure what his extension is. [glares at stanley as he glares right back]

Name: michael
Line: wow! i never thought dwight would go postal. it's always the person you least expect and i always thought dwight would go postal.

Name: phyllis
Line: come on, dwight, i think it's actually healthy to get it off your chest.

Name: dwight
Line: i'm done talking. i am a schrute. we don't back down.

Name: phyllis
Line: you're arrogant and pompous, and i don't like you.

Name: michael
Line: "cage match"? i don't know if it was in the packet from corporate, because i barely read any of it. so if you're asking if i stole their idea, the answer is no.

Name: hank the security guard
Line: excuse me, sir! dwight schrute, is that your real name?

Name: dwight
Line: yes, sir.

Name: kevin
Line: morning.

Name: hank the security guard
Line: good morning. okay, go ahead.

Name: dwight
Line: thank you. [elevator door closes] no, come on... god!

Name: michael
Line: tonight the scranton business park is having casino night and we are converting our warehouse into a full-blown gambling hall. and i know it's illegal in pennsylvania, but it's for charity. and i consider myself a great philanderer. it's just... it's nice to know at the end of the day, i can look in the mirror and say, "michael, because of you, some little kid in the congo has a belly full of rice this evening." makes you feel good.

Name: jim
Line: excuse me. how long is the wait for a table for two?

Name: dwight
Line: i would never, ever serve you. not in a million, billion years.

Name: pam
Line: it's a nice tux.

Name: dwight
Line: i know. it belonged to my grandfather. he was buried in it, so family heirloom.

Name: roy
Line: so, what's the deal? we gotta pay for our own drinks? that's lame.

Name: pam
Line: come on, it'll be fun, and besides, i'm a roulette expert.

Name: dwight
Line: impossible. roulette is not a game of skill, it is a game of chance.

Name: jim
Line: i can always kind of win at roulette.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, really? mmm-hmm.

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: how would you do that?

Name: jim
Line: mind control.

Name: dwight
Line: [laughs] you can't be serious. are you serious?

Name: jim
Line: ever since i was a little kid, like, eight or nine, i could sort of control things with my mind.

Name: dwight
Line: i don't believe you. continue.

Name: jim
Line: it was just little thing, you know, like i could make something shake or i could make a marble fall off the counter. you know, just little things.

Name: dwight
Line: [scoffs] that's ridiculous. you know what? uh... why don't you move that coat rack? excuse me, everyone! attention in the office, please. jim is about to prove his telekinetic powers and he needs absolute silence. go ahead.

Name: jim
Line: okay, i'll try. [the coat rack wobbles] [pam holds up an umbrella handle to the camera in another scene]

Name: dwight
Line: oh, my god.

Name: michael
Line: i try not to think of it as lagging behind. it's more of a david-and-goliath thing.

Name: jan
Line: [on phone] yeah, but... well, the fact of the matter is that your branch is currently number four of the five branches that i oversee.

Name: michael
Line: top 80 percent!

Name: jan
Line: michael?

Name: michael
Line: yeah?

Name: jan
Line: you know that i'm very serious here.

Name: michael
Line: jan, listen, i promise that i will kick it up a notch. bam!

Name: jan
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: emeril. oh, actually, while i have you, not that i have you or have ever had you, but we're having our casino night tonight and i think everyone would love to see their fearless leader here.

Name: jan
Line: i thought that you were their fearless leader.

Name: michael
Line: i am, but you are the eva peron to my cesar chavez.

Name: jan
Line: [laughs] i think you can handle it.

Name: michael
Line: oh, come on. come on.

Name: jan
Line: i think so, michael...

Name: michael
Line: you know, it'd be fun. i can hear it in your voice. you need a break.

Name: jan
Line: goodbye, michael.

Name: michael
Line: jan and i understand each other. the romance thing is sort of on hold for the time being, but we've remained good friends. good friends with privileges. not now, some day.

Name: michael
Line: okay, everybody. tonight's event is to benefit the boy scouts of america.

Name: oscar
Line: again? we do that every year.

Name: michael
Line: well, they need our money. they don't have cookies like the girl scouts.

Name: oscar
Line: it'd be nice to do something for people who are actually suffering.

Name: michael
Line: well, oscar, if you don't like it, then you should concentrate on winning. because the person at the end of the evening with the highest chip count will receive $500 to donate to the charity of their choice. and they will get a mini-fridge compliments of vance refrigeration.

Name: dwight
Line: yes!

Name: michael
Line: so get your charities in to pam. i, for example, am playing for comic relief.

Name: jim
Line: that doesn't exist anymore.

Name: michael
Line: comedy is very much alive, as are homeless people.

Name: pam
Line: no, they stopped making that show.

Name: michael
Line: well, then, they need our money more than ever.

Name: angela
Line: you have to pick an approved, non-profit organization.

Name: creed
Line: there's a great soup kitchen in downtown scranton. delicious pea soup on thursdays. i'll probably give the money to them.

Name: kevin
Line: something with animals. or people.

Name: kelly
Line: kobe bryant has a foundation, and he is so hot. and he gave his wife the biggest diamond ring. i know he didn't do it. ...maybe he did it.

Name: angela
Line: we are giving money that has been gambled. why don't we just deal drugs or prostitute ourselves,  and donate that money to charity?

Name: michael
Line: oh, and another fun thing. we, at the end of the night, are going to give the check to an actual group of boy scouts. right, toby? we're gonna...

Name: toby
Line: actually, i didn't think it was appropriate to invite children since it's... you know, there's gambling and alcohol, and it's in our dangerous warehouse and it's a school night... and, you know, hooters is catering. you know, is that enough? should i keep going?

Name: michael
Line: why are you the way that you are? honestly, every time i try to do something fun or exciting, you make it not... that way. i hate so much about the things that you choose to be. okay, you know what? i will not donate my winnings to comic relief, since apparently it doesn't exist. i am going to donate to afghanistanis with aids.

Name: jim
Line: i think you mean the aid to afghanistan.

Name: michael
Line: no, i mean afghanistanis with aids.

Name: phyllis
Line: afghani.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: phyllis
Line: afghani.

Name: michael
Line: that's a dog.

Name: pam
Line: no, that's afghan.

Name: michael
Line: that's a shawl.

Name: dwight
Line: wait, canine aids?

Name: michael
Line: no. humans with aids.

Name: creed
Line: who has aids?

Name: jim
Line: guys, the afghanistananies.

Name: michael
Line: okay, you know what? no. no. aids is not funny. believe me, i have tried.

Name: michael
Line: there are certain topics that are off-limits to comedians, jfk, aids, the holocaust. the lincoln assassination just recently became funny. "i need to see this play like i need a hole in the head." [laughs] and i hope to someday live in a world where a person could tell a hilarious aids joke. it's one of my dreams.

Name: jim
Line: what are you doing?

Name: pam
Line: oh, nothing.

Name: jim
Line: "till death do us rock."

Name: pam
Line: they're wedding bands.

Name: jim
Line: oh.

Name: pam
Line: roy was supposed to pick the band, but he's concentrating more on the bachelor party now.

Name: jim
Line: wait, wait, where you going? i mean, even if you don't hire a band, you still have to watch the bands. pam, these are people who have never given up on their dreams. i have great respect for that. and, yes, they're all probably very bad and that will make me feel better about not having dreams.

Name: pam
Line: there's a kiss cover band in here.

Name: jim
Line: let's do it.

Name: pam
Line: i'm pretty happy these days. i'm getting married soon and i'm getting along with everybody at work.

Name: jim
Line: why did i talk to jan about transferring? well, you know... i have no future here.

Name: michael
Line: i have already put down the deposit. do you understand how a deposit works?

Name: darryl
Line: mike, i am not having fire-eaters in a paper warehouse.

Name: michael
Line: it's casino night like las vegas. there are fire-eaters all over the place.

Name: darryl
Line: except my warehouse.

Name: michael
Line: well, actually, it's my warehouse.

Name: dwight
Line: actually, it's owned by beakman properties, and dunder mifflin is four years into a seven-year lease.

Name: michael
Line: why are you here?

Name: dwight
Line: when darryl was coming, you said you wanted me here for protection.

Name: michael
Line: not. i said, not that.

Name: darryl
Line: we just have a lot of stuff down there that could be stolen.

Name: michael
Line: that's ironic.

Name: darryl
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: that you are afraid.

Name: darryl
Line: why? 'cause i'm from the hood?

Name: michael
Line: dinkin' flicka.

Name: darryl

Line: oh yeah?

Line: oh, tell him i say hi.

Name: michael
Line: i will call him later with that message.

Name: jim

Name: michael

Name: jim
Line: oh, no, it was... you know, a good opportunity for me, a promotion. i got a chance to...

Name: michael
Line: opportunity, promotion, blah, blah. you know, jim, those are just words. have you taken into account other factors, vis-a-vis bosses? is josh funnier than i am? does he even have a girlfriend? because i have two, basically.

Name: jim
Line: michael, it's really not a competition.

Line: you're welcome.

Name: dwight

Name: jan

Name: michael
Line: the party i'm having tonight in 308. obviously, you are invited.

Name: jan
Line: michael, um... jim and josh are in meetings all day. and i am in and out of meetings. i can't stay on top of you 24/7.

Name: phyllis
Line: you should order the most expensive thing on the menu, so he knows you're worth it.

Line: if you do that, you're going to have to put out.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, yeah. you'll have to put out.

Line: hey hey, fellers.

Line: michael.

Line: hey, michael.

Name: michael
Line: hey, check this out. how about that? a little friendly competition. stamford versus scranton.

Name: josh
Line: i don't think so.

Name: michael
Line: oh, jim. looks like you picked a bad time to defect, my friend.

Name: josh
Line: fine! all right.

Name: michael
Line: okay! excellent. oh...

Name: dwight
Line: keep the wing flaps.

Name: michael
Line: shut it. [answering phone] hey, pam, what's up? yep, yech... no. tell him i will give him general specifics tomorrow, okay? yes. [to others] say hi to pam!

Name: jim, josh, and dwight
Line: hi, pam.

Name: michael
Line: yes. that is josh and dwight and jim. [to others] pam says hi. [into phone] have fun on your date! very good, talk to you later. bye.

Name: michael
Line: you first.

Name: dwight
Line: come on. nice try, josh!

Name: michael
Line: not. it hit the rim. okay, and... okay. double or nothing.

Name: josh
Line: or what?  we didn't bet anything, michael.

Name: michael
Line: well, let's...

Name: josh
Line: yeah, we should go.

Name: michael
Line: come on!

Name: josh
Line: we gotta go.

Name: michael
Line: come on!

Name: josh
Line: uh... we'll do it later.

Name: evan
Line: say, while i have you here, could i talk to you about some new and exciting advances to our product line?

Name: michael
Line: fine.

Name: michael
Line: jim and i have different definitions of friendship. i think it's talking and being friends, and jim thinks it's moving to connecticut and being best friends with josh. well, phooey on that. i, uh, i'm done. i am not going to be speaking with him anymore. whatevs. long-distance relationships never work.

Name: evan
Line: that is so true. ready?

Name: michael
Line: okay, let me tell you what we're looking for.

Name: evan
Line: great.

Line: sorry, my meeting ran late.

Line: yes, jan, really. with a rep from hammermill.

Name: josh
Line: they're exclusive with staples.

Name: michael
Line: used to be. evan will call you in the morning to work out the details. we can now sell hammermill products.

Name: dwight
Line: yes! ha!

Name: jan
Line: well, michael, i underestimated you.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, well, maybe next time you will estimate me.

Name: jim
Line: dwight's room key. and... dwight's room. what can i say? old habits die hard.

Name: angela
Line: d?

Name: jim
Line: oh my god. dwight got a hooker! oh my god, i gotta call... well, i gotta call somebody, i don't even know who to call. dwight got a hooker!

Line: oh, great.

Line: i don't want ketchup.

Line: you love ketchup! he loves ketchup.

Line: so how do you come up with your cartoons?

Line: you dream in cartoons? how fun!

Name: michael
Line: hey, first guest! you are going to have some tequila, my friend.

Line: i thought there was a party in here.

Name: michael
Line: this is the party.

Name: guy
Line: this is room 308?

Name: michael
Line: party central! so, what can i do you for? [guy leaves] all right.

Name: alan
Line: see, this one is great, because it can work on a couple of different levels.

Name: pam
Line: huh.

Name: alan
Line: [french accent] freedom fries for the table.

Name: pam
Line: freedom fries. yeah.

Name: alan
Line: yeah. i mean, people always say, like, "don't be edgy." but i don't know any other way. yeah, you get it.

Name: pam
Line: well, it was, uh, it was really nice meeting you, alan.

Name: alan
Line: yeah. next time bring some of your illustrations, i'll let you pick my brain.

Name: pam
Line: more freedom fries.

Name: alan
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: that's great.

Name: alan
Line: okay.

Name: pam
Line: i went on a date. it wasn't a love connection, um... i think when i like someone again, i'll just kinda know.

Name: jim
Line: michael. am i the first to arrive?

Name: michael
Line: people have been filtering in and out.

Name: jim
Line: can i get a drink?

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: jim
Line: can i get a drink?

Name: michael
Line: sure. you like cosmos?

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: sure, sounds good. so why are you here? is josh busy?

Name: jim
Line: michael...

Name: michael
Line: i get it! no, no, i totally get it. he made a better paper airplane, stamford is better in sales... i get it. we had some fun. we had some laughs. and that's just...

Name: jim
Line: wait, wait. i didn't transfer because of you. you're a good boss. you're a great boss.

Name: michael
Line: i'm not better than josh.

Name: jim
Line: michael, it's not about... i transferred because of pam.

Name: michael
Line: oh my god. you don't even know. she's single now.

Name: jim
Line: no, i just... i heard something about that. it's just, i kind of put it all on the line. twice, actually. and she said no. twice.

Name: michael
Line: i'm sorry, man. i'm sorry. hey, you know what? i will talk to her.

Name: jim
Line: nope, that's okay.

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: that's all right.

Name: michael
Line: i will. i'll talk to her. you should at least talk to roy. i mean, he knows exactly how you're feeling.

Name: jim
Line: yeah. okay, maybe.

Name: evan
Line: are we early?

Name: michael
Line: hey! no, you know, people have been filtering in and out.

Name: jim
Line: hey.

Name: michael
Line: evan, this is jim.

Name: jim
Line: how are you?

Line: hey, uh... arnie reisman. michael, jim.

Name: michael
Line: hey, ernie, how ya doing?

Name: evan
Line: do you guys work together?

Line: no, we used to. now we're friends.

Name: michael
Line: best friends.

Name: michael
Line: some people need dozens of friends to say, "hey, look at me, i'm popular." but not me. i'm very picky. i need three, maybe two. when you meet that someone special, you'll just know. because a real relationship, it... it can't be forced. it should just come about effortlessly.

Name: michael
Line: now, would you do the pleasure of hitting the lights, sir? [lights go out, leaving michael's black light on] ha, ha, ha.

Name: dwight
Line: ha, ha, ha, ha.

Name: michael
Line: whoa. what are those stains?

Name: dwight
Line: blood, urine, or semen.

Name: michael
Line: oh, god, i hope it's urine.

Name: michael
Line: today i'm headed to philadelphia for the annual northeastern office supply convention. [makes horns gesture and heavy metal scream] wooo-yaaaaah! oh, these things tend to be kind of crazy.

Name: michael
Line: [angela enters michael's office] ah.

Name: angela
Line: sign.

Name: michael
Line: per-diem. [singing as he signs] perrrr-diiiiieeeemmmm! [shows off $100 bill to ryan] you know, ryan, it's all about the benjamins.

Line: [reading checklist] fun jeans.

Line: [points to door] right there.

Line: will do.

Name: ryan
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: gonna be fun! change your mind we can get you a cot.

Name: ryan
Line: [shakes his head]

Name: michael
Line: a couple of years ago, i went to one in hartford. "connecticut." and todd packer and i went to this bar and met a girl. and [laugh] packer decides to make out with her. turns out that her boyfriend is the bouncer at the bar. [laugh] i love this. the bouncer chases us out to packer's vette, jump in the vette, he peels out, and i [laugh] i don't make it to the car. [turns serious] um, and the other bouncers caught up with me and really did a number on me... it was in the paper... [brightens] but to answer your question, yeah, i'm really excited about this weekend.

Name: michael
Line: see that factory?

Name: dwight
Line: mm-hm.

Name: michael
Line: i almost worked there.

Name: dwight
Line: no!

Name: michael
Line: yup. yeah, i applied for a job there.

Name: dwight
Line: what would you have done? been manager?

Name: michael
Line: i was going to be a bottle capper.

Name: dwight
Line: you? a bottle capper?! [laughs in disbelief]

Name: michael
Line: i know, i know. crazy world. crazy, crazy world.

Name: josh
Line: yes, i'm aware of jan and michael's... history. um, i don't really like to talk about it 'cause it's unprofessional. kind of gross.

Name: michael
Line: josh reminds me of a guy i went to high school with. big football star, girls loved him. whatever. guess what he's doing now. he's a tv announcer for the eagles. up in the... [laughs] he doesn't even get to play in the game, i mean.

Name: dwight
Line: so, you ever been convicted of a felony?

Name: josh
Line: what? uh, no. [to jim] uh, i want you to make sure you call karen and get her to fax that vendor list over.

Name: dwight
Line: misdemeanor?

Name: josh
Line: um... when i was in the coast guard, a couple of us broke into the women's barracks and we got arrested for trespassing.

Name: dwight
Line: coast guard? so you know how to fight underwater?

Name: josh
Line: [stunned]

Name: jan
Line: [jim, josh, and jan walk in the hotel lobby] josh, um... [jim continues walking ahead] why don't you come up to my room for a couple of minutes and we can just go over the schedule for tomorrow together.

Name: josh
Line: can we do it over breakfast? it'll be...

Name: jan
Line: a quick drink?

Name: josh
Line: thanks, but maybe another time.

Name: jan
Line: [putting on a good face] great! [walks off]

Name: michael
Line: [waiting on pam to be done with the microwave] ahhhhhhhhh. [whispering loudly] i'm hungry.

Name: michael
Line: movie monday!  the only cure i know for the monday blues is... varsity blues!

Name: michael
Line: let's gooooo! let's go, let's go, let's go!

Name: dwight
Line: [directing people to their assigned seats] take a seat down there.  second from the end.

Name: michael
Line: alright, everybody here?  yes.

Name: pam
Line: [walking in with a tray of six popcorn bags] popcorn anyone?

Name: michael
Line: yes pleeeeease!  thank yooouuu!

Name: pam
Line: [with five popcorn bags left] anyone else?  nooo.

Name: pam
Line: movie monday started with training videos, but we went through those pretty fast.  then we watched a medical video.  since then, it's been half hour installments of various movies, with the exception of an episode of entourage, which michael made us watch six times.

Name: michael
Line: entourage!

Name: michael
Line: kevin, would you like to do the scenes from last week?

Name: kevin
Line: yes!

Name: dwight
Line: why him?

Name: michael
Line: don't whine.  get the window. [dwight exhales]

Name: michael
Line: previously on varsity blues...

Name: kevin
Line: ok.  billy-bob, got a head injury, but coach made him play.  so then lance, he gets sacked, he's out for the year...

Name: jan
Line: [walking into an empty office because everyone is watching varsity blues] hello?

Name: dwight
Line: not everyone approves of movie monday.  i won't say who.

Name: angela
Line: i don't approve.  i don't.

Name: jan
Line: hello? [angela coughs and points to the conference room]

Name: michael
Line: [jan walks in on movie monday] hi jan!  hope you brought the milk duds!

Name: jan
Line: how would a movie increase productivity michael?  how on earth would it do that?

Name: michael
Line: people work faster after...

Name: jan
Line: magically?

Name: michael
Line: no... they have to... to make up for the time they lost watching the movie.

Name: jan
Line: no.

Name: angela
Line: [walking past dwight's desk] kitchen.

Name: angela
Line: michael is going to get us all fired.  you sat back and let him play that dumb movie, and now jan is peeved off and we're all going to lose our jobs.

Name: dwight
Line: that's not going to happen.

Name: angela
Line: you know she has it out for him now.

Name: dwight
Line: that's not his fault!  he had to follow his heart!

Name: dwight
Line: ever since michael dumped jan for carol, jan's been bitching out on him.  reject a woman and she will never let it go.  one of the many defects of their kind.  also weak arms.

Name: angela
Line: dwight, you should be running this office.

Name: dwight
Line: michael would never let me...

Name: angela
Line: it's not up to michael, it's jan's call. talk to her.

Name: dwight
Line: i could never do that!

Name: angela
Line: fine!  sit back and do nothing and let us all get fired!

Name: angela
Line: i know that patience and loyalty are good, and virtuous traits.  but sometimes i just think you need to grow a pair.

Name: jim
Line: at the stamford branch, they all play this world war ii video game called call of duty, and they're all really into it.  i'm told it started as a team building exercise.  unfortunately i really suck at it.  we didn't play many video games in scranton.  instead we'd do stuff like, uh, pam and i would sometimes hum the same high pitched note, and try to get dwight to make an appointment with an ear doctor.  and uh, pam called it... pretendenitus.

Name: pam
Line: [on the phone] hey kelly, my stuff just got here. [kelly screams with excitement into the phone and pam has to take it away from her ear]

Name: pam
Line: kelly really likes to online shop.  soooo, i felt like i wanted some new clothes.  i mean, i just, i wanted to, it just, i felt like it was time, to maybe um... just get new clothes.

Name: pam
Line: [pulling her new shirt out of a box] ok.

Name: kelly
Line: [gasps] i love it!

Name: pam
Line: really?  i don't know.

Name: kelly
Line: you haven't even tried it on yet, try it on.

Name: pam
Line: not at work, i'll try it on---

Name: kelly
Line: fashion show!  fashion show!  fashion show at lunch!

Name: pam
Line: ...noooo

Name: kelly
Line: [clapping her hands in unison] fashion show!  fashion show!  fashion show at lunch!  fashion show!  fashion show!  fashion show at lunch!

Name: andy
Line: why did you do that?!

Name: jim
Line: i'm just killing germans, any way i can.

Name: andy
Line: we're on the german team.  shoot the brittish.

Name: jim
Line: [turning around to karen] wait, are we playing teams?

Name: karen
Line: [laughing] yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: [outside in the parking lot, pacing back and forth] wah!  gah!  [breathing heavily]

Name: jan
Line: [answering the phone] hello?

Name: dwight
Line: is this jan?

Name: jan
Line: who is this?

Name: dwight
Line: this is dwight schrute.  i am calling about an extremely sensitive matter.

Name: jan
Line: you should talk to michael, and he'll talk to me, and that way we don't have to speak to each other.

Name: dwight
Line: it's about michael.

Name: jan
Line: what about him?

Name: dwight
Line: [exhales] i can't talk here.  it's too sensitive.

Name: jan
Line: it's not about a surprise party is it?

Name: dwight
Line: no, but we should discuss that another time.

Name: jan
Line: look, i am already an hour outside of scranton, dwight, i'm not coming back.

Name: dwight
Line: pull over at exit 40.  there is a liz claiborne outlet.  i know you like that store.  go inside and shop, until i can meet you.

Name: jan
Line: how do you know i like that store?

Name: dwight
Line: many of your blouses are claiborne's.

Name: jan
Line: how do you know that?

Name: dwight
Line: part of my job.

Name: jan
Line: no it's not.  it's officially not.

Name: dwight
Line: ...noted.

Name: dwight
Line: [walking into michael's office] i'm going... to the dentist.

Name: michael
Line: ok.

Name: dwight
Line: i have to have an emergency crown put in.

Name: michael
Line: ouchy.

Name: dwight
Line: yes.  it's a new dentist.  he's far.  i might be gone... three hours.

Name: michael
Line: three hours, wow.  have fun.  [dwight walks away staring through the blinds at michael]

Name: dwight
Line: did you get anything good?

Name: jan
Line: yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: new blouse?  halter top?  camisole?  teddy?

Name: dwight
Line: i can save the branch.

Name: jan
Line: really?

Name: dwight
Line: if you let me run it.

Name: jan
Line: ok.

Name: dwight
Line: [excitedly] "ok" i can run it?

Name: jan
Line: what would you do differently?

Name: dwight
Line: mostly get rid of waste.  which is half the people there.  and clean house.  [to waitress in diner]  right here.  it's all for me.  thank you.

Name: jan
Line: dwight, you must feel strongly, to speak with me this way, behind michael's back, and turn on so many of your co-workers.

Name: dwight
Line: the decision to turn on michael was difficult.  [pouring way too much syrup on his food] but once i did it, i didn't look back.  and mostly i feel that michael would approve.  it's really what's best for the branch.  and i could care less about my co-workers.  so [cutting his food, giving jan a "so there" look], here we are.  it's all, on the table.  i want... the branch.  and i await your decision.

Name: dwight
Line: [shoveling waffles into his mouth] oh, by the way.  there's a new ann taylor outlet store near here.  i know you like their earrings.

Name: jan
Line: [thinks for a second] where is it?

Name: jan
Line: [on speakerphone with michael] michael.

Name: michael
Line: hi.

Name: jan
Line: i just had a very interesting conversation with one of your employees.

Name: michael
Line: oh.  that's nice.

Name: jan
Line: no, it wasn't.  dwight just told me that he thinks he can run the branch better than you.

Name: michael
Line: ...what?

Name: jan
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: michael
Line: ...you were at the dentist?

Name: jan
Line: you can't have people undermining you.  get control of your branch immediately.

Name: michael
Line: ok.

Name: michael
Line: what was dwight thinking?  that he could turn jan against me?  she's my ex-lover!  ...ish.

Name: phyllis
Line: [pam walks out of the bathroom wearing her new red shirt] woooooow.

Name: kelly
Line: it's so sexy.  you look so hot.

Name: phyllis
Line: it's really something.

Name: pam
Line: [smiling] it's too much.

Name: kelly
Line: what?

Name: pam
Line: i'm gonna return it.

Name: kelly
Line: no, you have to keep it today, just see how you feel.

Name: roy
Line: [walking into the break room] hey.

Name: pam
Line: hi.

Name: roy
Line: you look nice.

Name: pam
Line: thanks.

Name: kelly
Line: isn't that like your third soda today?

Name: jim
Line: yeah i think we can be a big help to your company.  [someone dims the lights, signifying that it's game time]  ok, see you next week.  bye.  [to karen] again?

Name: karen
Line: scared?

Name: karen
Line: [with her hands making the rocker sign] call of duty!

Name: josh
Line: [sounding upset] andy, jim, can i see you in the conference room for a minute?

Name: andy
Line: now?

Name: josh
Line: yes now.

Name: andy
Line: put the game on hold everyone.

Name: josh
Line: this is not working, ok?  we are getting slaughtered out there.

Name: andy
Line: it's the new guy. [looks at jim]

Name: jim
Line: oh, i'm sorry i don't know... what we're talking about...

Name: andy
Line: see what i mean?

Name: josh
Line: we just need a strategy, ok?  we're going to set up a trap in the gun room.  all right jim, are you using the mp-40 or the 44?

Name: jim
Line: um, sniper rifle?

Name: josh
Line: snipe--

Name: andy
Line: what?

Name: josh
Line: jim!

Name: andy
Line: are you playing for the other team?!

Name: josh
Line: you don't snipe in carrington, ok?

Name: andy
Line: saboteur!

Name: josh
Line: andy, it's not---

Name: andy
Line: saboteur!  i'm going to kill you for real.  this game--- the game is over.  i'm really going to shoot you.

Name: michael
Line: hey dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: hey.

Name: michael
Line: do you want an m&m?

Name: dwight
Line: no thanks i'm stuffed.

Name: michael
Line: no seriously.  you should have an m&m, they're really good.

Name: dwight
Line: ...ok. [takes and eats several m&m's]

Name: michael
Line: they're good, huh?

Name: dwight
Line: ...so good.

Name: michael
Line: hey.  i thought you weren't supposed to eat anything for a couple hours after you've had a crown put in.

Name: dwight
Line: they have this new kind of quick drying bonding, so...

Name: michael
Line: sounds like a good dentist.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, yeah.

Name: michael
Line: what's his name?

Name: dwight
Line: [long pause] crentist.

Name: michael
Line: your dentist's name is crentist.

Name: dwight
Line: yep.

Name: michael
Line: huh.  sounds a lot like dentist.

Name: dwight
Line: maybe that's why he became a dentist.

Name: michael
Line: let me see your teeth.  let me see 'em.  let me see 'em.

Name: dwight
Line: [reluctantly opens his mouth and michael peers inside]  ahh.  aaaah.

Name: michael
Line: you should... floss.

Name: dwight
Line: i know...

Name: michael
Line: [exhales] well then... i am glad you're ok.

Name: michael
Line: business is like a jungle.  and i... am like a tiger.  and dwight, is like a monkey, that stabs the tiger in the back with a stick.  does the tiger fire the monkey?  does the tiger transfer the monkey to another branch?  [smiling] pun.  there is no way of knowing what goes on inside the tiger's head.  we don't have the technology.

Name: michael
Line: dwight, can i talk to you for a second?

Name: michael
Line: [in michael's office] wow, this is tough.

Name: dwight
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: ohhhh.  arrrgggh!

Name: dwight
Line: what is it?

Name: michael
Line: well, i just got off the phone with jan.  and um... she demoted me.

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: yeah. you know what the craziest part of this is? she demoted me to your job!

Name: dwight
Line: gahh!

Name: michael
Line: and she said that you should be expecting a call later from corporate, and that um, i guess that means that you are going to be acting manager of dunder mifflin, scranton.

Name: dwight
Line: i can't believe this news.  that--- wow.

Name: michael
Line: i know.  i told her i didn't know whether you'd wanna do it... because you've always been so loyal to me.  you've been my most trusted ally.

Name: dwight
Line: you said that?

Name: michael
Line: yep, i did.  i did.  but i think... you should do it.

Name: dwight
Line: well... gosh, if you think i should.  then i will.

Name: michael
Line: [exhales] perfect, well, we're settled.

Name: dwight
Line: all right.

Name: michael
Line: all right.  well then, you are now acting manager of dunder mifflin scranton branch, and i... am assistant regional manager.

Name: dwight
Line: assistant to the regional manager.  thank you michael, for staying on.   i really appreciate it.

Name: michael
Line: ohh..

Name: dwight
Line: hey... i can't imagine this place without you.

Name: michael
Line: [muttering] can't you?  that's so nice.

Name: michael
Line: well... i guess we should go tell the troops.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah, when i'm ready, mike. [dwight exhales, michael looks at the camera] ok let's do it.

Name: michael
Line: hey, hi, hello.  everybody, i have some good news, and i have some bad news.  i... am being replaced, as your leader, by dwight.

Name: phyllis
Line: you're kidding...

Name: michael
Line: you might think that i am kidding, and i understand that.

Name: angela
Line: congratulations dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: thank you angela.

Name: stanley
Line: but... why dwight?

Name: michael
Line: because, dwight... never lies.

Name: stanley
Line: how does that qualify him to run a branch?

Name: michael
Line: because that's all it takes.

Name: michael
Line: ok, dwight, would you like to say a few words to everybody... about loyalty?

Name: dwight
Line: thank you michael.  i just want to say, to the few of you who will remain under my employ, that i intend to lead you into the black!  with ferocity!

Name: phyllis
Line: michael, what will you do?

Name: michael
Line: oh, i'll be fine.

Name: kevin
Line: do you have any savings?

Name: michael
Line: no, no, i don't, but---

Name: kevin
Line: michael, you might lose your condo.

Name: michael
Line: i... won't.   i won't.

Name: pam
Line: i have this little vacuum cleaner that's broken.  if dwight doesn't work out, maybe that could be manager.

Name: phyllis
Line: maybe i'll quit.

Name: angela
Line: it's really happening!

Name: dwight
Line: yes.

Name: angela
Line: we can make a difference here.

Name: dwight
Line: i, will, make a difference here.

Name: angela
Line: you alone?  because i thought together we could---

Name: dwight
Line: oh please, don't be naive.  but you can be in charge of the women.

Name: karen
Line: [whispering] look how cute he is!  he's trying to shoot with a smoke grenade.

Name: jim
Line: i'm sorry what are you whispering about?

Name: karen
Line: i'm sorry nothing, just concentrate on turning around.

Name: jim
Line: i'm trying---

Name: karen
Line: just tap s then d.

Name: jim
Line: oh.

Name: karen
Line: [her players gun is pointed directly at jim's player's head] any... last words?  no?

Name: jim
Line: what? [karen's player shoots jim's player, "you killed jim halpert" appears on the screen, karen giggles]

Name: jim
Line: wow. psychopath.  [karen grins widely at jim]

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: creed
Line: i'm just looking.

Name: pam
Line: please go back to your desk.

Name: creed
Line: in a minute.

Name: pam
Line: well, i remember why i dress the way i do at work.  but i'm gonna keep the clothes.  i mean, it'll be cool to just have some after work clothes that aren't pajamas.

Name: michael
Line: well, i guess it's time, that i turn over the keys, to the famous sebring.

Name: dwight
Line: [smiling] no thank you.

Name: michael
Line: it's a corporate lease dwight, you've earned it.

Name: dwight
Line: no thanks.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: dwight
Line: not my style.

Name: michael
Line: but you said you liked it.  you've always admired it.

Name: dwight
Line: well that was before.  i'm thinking about getting something german, something with decent gas mileage.  plus, that convertible, it's a ridiculous choice for this climate.

Name: michael
Line: [michael finally breaks] take it back.

Name: dwight
Line: [confused] no.

Name: michael
Line: that's my car.

Name: dwight
Line: what did you---

Name: michael
Line: that's my car.

Name: dwight
Line: yes.

Name: michael
Line: i know, dwight.  i know.  i know.  i know.

Name: dwight
Line: you know what?

Name: michael
Line: jan called me about your little meeting!

Name: dwight
Line: no!

Name: michael
Line: i know, what you did.  i made the whole thing up, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: i think the sebring's cool.  it's cool.  the seabring's cool.  it has a cassette and it has a cd.

Name: michael
Line: oh do you?  do you like the sebring--- how dare you?!  how dare you, dwight?

Name: dwight
Line: [dwight gets on his knees and puts his face down on the ground] don't fire me.  please.

Name: michael
Line: give me one good reason why i should fire you right here on the spot?!

Name: dwight
Line: [terrified] i have excellent sales numbers!

Name: michael
Line: not.  good.  enough!

Name: dwight
Line: [sobbing] i'll do anything!  anything!  i'll do your laundry for a month!  for a year!

Name: michael
Line: i have a laundry machine!

Name: dwight
Line: i'm sorry!  i'll do anything, i swear. [squeaking, crying]

Name: michael
Line: i don't know if i can trust you anymore.

Name: dwight
Line: you can't.  you can't.  but i promise i'll never betray you again.  what can i do, michael.  what can i do?  [michael exhales]  what can i do?  [dwight has his face to the ground but his butt raised high in the air] what can i do?  what can i do?

Name: michael
Line: you can get up.  get up. [dwight gets up with spit hanging from his lips] and you can hug it out, bitch.  [dwight and michael have a firm embrace]

Name: michael
Line: hug it out, bitch.  that is what men say to each other, after a fight.  they hug it out, and doing so, the just... let it go.  and walk away.  and they're done.  not a good idea to say that to a woman however.  i have found.  it doesn't translate.

Name: jim
Line: [leaving his desk for the day, pretends pull the pen out of a pretend grenade, and tosses it to karen]

Name: karen
Line: [throws some desk material in the air to signify debris from the grenade explosion, grins as jim walks away]

Name: michael
Line: yep.  yeah, we hugged it out.  but, it turns out, i was still a little angry.  so, i felt i needed to punish him, just a little bit more, [cut to dwight standing on a box with "liar" written on a piece of paper hung around his neck, dwight's head hung in shame] and i'm making him do my laundry for a year.

Name: michael
Line: okay. [jan leaves michael's office; dwight enters]

Name: dwight
Line: hey. [shuts door] is everything okay?

Name: michael
Line: it is not your business, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: if the branch is in trouble, there are things you can do.

Name: michael
Line: what do you know about management, dwight?

Name: dwight
Line: i know that we need to cut costs.  we could fire meredith. that's a big cost.

Name: michael
Line: i'm not firing anyone.

Name: dwight
Line: creed might be living here, we could charge him rent.

Name: michael
Line: ... what?

Name: creed
Line: four nights a week, i sleep under my desk, and then three nights i stay at my place in toronto. they don't know about this job up there. it's a welfare state. beautiful countries, both of 'em.

Name: michael
Line: okay. here we go. everybody, you know what? it dawned on me we were all in there watching a movie together before we were so rudely interrupted, let's get back in there. [no takers] come on. movie monday! come on, stanley let's go.

Name: stanley
Line: [standing at the supply shelf] i'm on the phone.

Name: michael
Line: ryan?

Name: ryan
Line: i'm pretty sure jan said that we're not supposed to.

Name: michael
Line: okay, well, we had scheduled this time to watch a movie together, so i guess i will just go play some online scrabble.

Name: dwight
Line: [looks to angela]

Name: angela
Line: [shakes her head disapprovingly]

Name: dwight
Line: the schrutes are a very loyal breed. but i also have mannheim blood from my german grandmother. and the mannheims knew when to cut and run. no sense going down with a losing regime. but the schrute blood... it's amazing that when these two bloods mix, the whole thing didn't explode.

Name: michael
Line: so, she sleeps with him, but she is still in love with the head surgeon, um, the mcdreamy guy, and she starts crying, but the dorky doctor, he's in love with her... [phone rings]

Name: pam
Line: dunder mifflin, this is pam. ... uh, sure, i'll get him for you. [to michael] it's jan for you.

Name: michael
Line: really?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: i may have a few weeks ago faked a call from jan in order to get out of a synopsis of, i think it was, navy: ncis. since then, michael's been suspicious.

Name: kevin
Line: nnnnice. wow!

Name: jim
Line: [playing call of duty] oh? someone's left out in the open, taking a little siesta. not smart. [shoots] yes! finally killed you... [karen's desk is empty]

Name: jan
Line: hey, jim?

Name: jim
Line: hey, jan.

Name: jan
Line: how's work going?

Name: jim
Line: [nervously] pretty good.

Name: jan
Line: [kills jim's character, giggles] oh, you know what, i gotta see josh right now, but remind me to tell you what dwight said to me earlier, okay? you'll get a big kick out of it. [leaves]

Name: jim
Line: [baffled expression]

Name: jim
Line: things are a little bit... different here in stamford. [shrug] it's not bad.

Name: michael
Line: hey ryan, can i get you a pencil from the warehouse?

Name: ryan
Line: uh, no thanks, i'm good.

Name: michael
Line: oh, it's okay, i'm going down.

Name: ryan
Line: um...  yeah, absolutely.

Name: michael
Line: all right, i'll be right back. [goes down pretend stairs]

Name: dwight
Line: [laughs uproariously and applauds] whoo!

Name: michael
Line: [hands ryan pencil]  there you go.

Name: dwight
Line: awesome!

Name: ryan
Line: thank you.

Name: michael
Line: you're welcome.

Name: dwight
Line: michael, can you get me a pen from down in the warehouse?

Name: michael
Line: don't mind if i do.  see you in a minute.  [goes back down pretend stairs and grabs pen from stanley's desk]

Name: dwight
Line: okay. [continues to laugh] whoo!

Name: michael
Line: there you go, fresh from the warehouse.

Name: pam
Line: hey michael, would you get me some coffee from the warehouse?

Name: michael
Line: there's coffee in the kitchen, pam.

Name: pam
Line: but the warehouse coffee tastes so much better.

Name: ryan and others
Line: yeah.  yes, it's better.  it's great.

Name: michael
Line: [breathless] all right.  okay. [goes back down pretend stairs, crawls on belly to the kitchen for the coffee]

Name: michael
Line: i am like bette midler in for the boys.  gotta keep the troops entertained.

Name: pam
Line: [after michael returns with coffee] with cream and sugar?

Name: michael
Line: [sighs] all right.

Name: jan
Line: [on speakerphone] so, i wanted to let you know that we lost ed truck.

Name: michael
Line: oookay.  let me see if i have his cell.  is this the only reason you are calling, jan?  or does somebody miss me?

Name: jan
Line: michael, ed died over the weekend.

Name: michael
Line: oh, wow.

Name: michael
Line: attention, everybody.  i just received a call from corporate with some news they felt that i should know first.  my old boss ed truck has died.

Name: kelly
Line: oh, michael, that's such terrible news!  you must feel so sad.

Name: michael
Line: yes, i am.  it's very sad.  because he was my boss.

Name: phyllis
Line: that's a shame.  ed was a good guy.

Name: michael
Line: that's right, you worked with him.  so did creed.  well, i'll be in my office in case anybody wants to drop by.  cheer me up.

Name: michael
Line: so did you hear the news?

Name: pam
Line: the news that you just announced?  that ed died?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: is there anything i can do?

Name: michael
Line: oh, gosh, what can anybody do, really?  it's... pssssh... .  he was almost 70.  circle of life.

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: [holds out arms to pam]

Name: pam
Line: oh.  okay.

Name: michael
Line: yeah.  mmmmmm.

Name: pam
Line: [extricating herself] okay.

Name: josh
Line: what's going on with fairfield county schools?  karen, did you generate that price list?

Name: karen
Line: um, shoot.  uh, i will.  sorry.

Name: josh
Line: okay, just get it done.  jim, will you make sure?

Name: jim
Line: oh yeah, definitely.

Name: andy
Line: [coughing out his words] suck up!  josh, did you hear what i said?

Name: josh
Line: thank you, everyone.

Name: karen
Line: [at vending machine] dammit.

Name: jim
Line: what's up?

Name: karen
Line: uh, nothing.  they're just out of herr's chips.

Name: jim
Line: oh.

Name: karen
Line: but don't worry about it.  my snack food doesn't fall under the umbrella of your authority.

Name: jim
Line: mmm, that's where you're wrong.  i'm your project supervisor today, and i have just decided that we're not doing anything until you get the chips that you require.  so, i think we should go get some.  now, please.

Name: creed
Line: it's a real shame about ed, huh?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.  must really have you thinkin'.

Name: creed
Line: about what?

Name: michael
Line: the older you get, the bigger the chance is you're gonna die.  you knew that.

Name: creed
Line: ed was decapitated.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: dwight
Line: really?

Name: creed
Line: he was drunk as a skunk, he was flying down route 6.  he slides under an 18 wheeler.  pop.  it snaps right off.

Name: michael
Line: oh my god.

Name: dwight
Line: that is the way to go.  instant death.  very smart.

Name: creed
Line: you know a human can go on living for several hours after being decapitated.

Name: dwight
Line: you're thinking of a chicken.

Name: creed
Line: what did i say?

Name: michael
Line: that is just not the way a dunder mifflin manager should go, i'm sorry.  alone, out of the blue, and not even have his own head to comfort him.

Name: michael
Line: [clears throat] so, i'm not exactly sure how to say this...

Name: dwight
Line: ed was decapitated.

Name: michael
Line: what are you doing?

Name: dwight
Line: you said you didn't know how to say it.

Name: michael
Line: i didn't... he was driving on the road and he went under a truck.  and that's when his head was separated from the rest of him.  and i will let you know more as soon as i find out.

Name: dwight
Line: hey.

Name: angela
Line: hi.

Name: dwight
Line: if my head ever comes off, i would like you to put it on ice.

Name: angela
Line: i do not wanna talk about this.

Name: dwight
Line: when i die, i wanna be frozen. and if they have to freeze me in pieces, so be it.  i will wake up stronger than ever because i will have used that time to figure out exactly why i died and what moves i could have used to defend myself better now that i know what hold he had me in.

Name: michael
Line: i don't understand. we have a day honoring martin luther king, but he didn't even work here.

Name: jan
Line: [on speakerphone] i understand how you feel, michael.  i really do.  so, would it be helpful to give everyone the day off?

Name: michael
Line: you really don't get it, do you?  you don't understand these people.  that is the last thing that they would want is a day off.

Name: jan
Line: well, what would you suggest?

Name: michael
Line: [thoughtfully] a statue.

Name: jan
Line: of ed?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: jan
Line: [scoffs] i'm not sure that's realistic.

Name: michael
Line: well, i think it would be very realistic, it would look just like him.

Name: jan
Line: no, that's not---

Name: michael
Line: we could have his eyes light up, we could have his arms move...

Name: dwight
Line: that is not a statue, that is a robot.

Name: michael
Line: i think that is a great way to honor ed.

Name: dwight
Line: and how big do you want this robot?

Name: michael
Line: life-size.

Name: dwight
Line: mm, no.  better make it two-thirds.  easier to stop if it turns on us.

Name: jan
Line: what the hell are you two talking about?

Name: michael
Line: well, we are talking about how to properly honor a man who gave his life as regional manager of this company, jan.

Name: jan
Line: you know what, michael?  i've really tried with you today...

Name: michael
Line: mm hm.

Name: jan
Line: ...and i have to get back to work.

Name: michael
Line: oh do you?  you know who wished they could get back to work is ed truck.

Name: jan
Line: so call me when you feel like having a real conversation.

Name: michael
Line: but ed truck can't because he is---

Name: jan
Line: goodbye. [hangs up]

Name: michael
Line: dead.

Name: dwight
Line: look [holding up sketch] i gave him a six foot extension cord so he can't chase us.

Name: michael
Line: that's perfect.

Name: jim
Line: okay, that is a "no" on the on the west side market.

Name: karen
Line: okay, great.  i think that's enough.  can i get back to work now?

Name: jim
Line: wow.  never pegged you for a quitter.

Name: karen
Line: i am not a quitter.  i will do this all day if you want.

Name: jim
Line: really?

Name: karen
Line: yeah, all day.

Name: andy
Line: hey.  what are we doing?   what's the game?  i want in.

Name: jim
Line: oh, there's no game.  we're just trying to get these chips for karen.

Name: andy
Line: did you check the vending machine?

Name: karen
Line: oh, the vending machines!  how did we miss that?

Name: jim
Line: i have no idea.  we went right for the copier.

Name: karen
Line: mm.

Name: jim
Line: and then we checked the fax machine.

Name: karen
Line: yeah, nothing there.

Name: andy
Line: did you check your... butt?

Name: michael
Line: oohh... can you imagine how much blood there was?  if it happened right here, it would reach all the way to reception.  probably get on pam.

Name: phyllis
Line: okay that's enough.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: stanley
Line: we do not wanna hear about this.

Name: michael
Line: well, you know what?  i didn't wanna hear about it either, stanley, but i did and now i can't stop picturing it.  he leaves work, he's on his way home... wham!  his cappa is detated from his head!

Name: stanley
Line: you have just spit on my face.

Name: michael
Line: well, you know what?  there's something wrong with you.  there is something wrong with everybody in here.  because we have lost a member of our family and you don't wanna talk about it, you don't wanna think about it, you just wanna get back to work!

Name: michael
Line: there are five stages to grief, which are [glancing at computer screen] denial, anger, bargaining, depression, and acceptance.  and right now, out there, they're all denying the fact that they're sad.  and that's   hard.  and it's making them all angry.  and it is my job to try to get them all the way through to acceptance.  and if not acceptance, then just depression.  if i can get them depressed, then i'll have done my job.

Name: michael
Line: i am going to throw you this ball.  when you catch the ball, i want you to say the name of a person very important to you, somebody really special who died, and then i want you to say how they died, and you may cry if you like, that is encouraged.  let me just start.  let me show you how this works.   i catch the ball.  i lost ed truck.  and... it feels like somebody took my heart and dropped it into a bucket of boiling tears... and at the same time, somebody else is hitting my soul in the crotch with a frozen sledgehammer... and then a third guy walks in and starts punching me in the grief bone... and i'm crying, and nobody can hear me, because i am terribly, terribly... terribly alone.

Name: roy
Line: excuse me, i'm sorry to interrupt, uh, i need to see pam.  there seems to be, like, something wrong with the radiator in her car.

Name: michael
Line: okay, fine.  hurry back.

Name: roy
Line: [as they leave] there's nothing wrong with your car.  i just thought you might like a break from the "grief counseling" session.

Name: pam
Line: oh.  i would like a break.

Name: roy
Line: how are you likin' the new car?

Name: pam
Line: great.

Name: roy
Line: yeah?  sure is small.  got airbags?

Name: pam
Line: i think so.  i don't know, i was mainly focused on the cup holders.

Name: roy
Line: [laughs]  well, you're not still driving so fast, are you?   yeah.

Name: jim
Line: [on phone]  hi, yeah.  this is mike from the west side market.  well, we get a shipment of herr's salt and vinegar chips, and we ordered that about three weeks ago and haven't ... . yeah.  you have 'em in the warehouse.  great.  what is my store number... six.  wait, no.  i'll call you back. [quickly hangs up] shut up [to karen].

Name: karen
Line: [laughing] six?

Name: michael
Line: [as pam returns to conference room] okay, we can start.  um...

Name: pam
Line: you waited for me?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.  pam, you're a member of this family.  so we will wait for our family members. phyllis, you wanna give it a shot?

Name: dwight
Line: [grabbing ball] i got it.  when my mother was pregnant with me, they did an ultrasound and found she was having twins.  when they did another ultrasound a few weeks later, they discovered, that i had resorbed the other fetus.  do i regret this?  no.  i believe his tissue has made me stronger.  i now have the strength of a grown man and a little baby.

Name: michael
Line: okay, why don't you throw the ball to somebody else.

Name: stanley
Line: [throwing ball back] nope.

Name: michael
Line: [returning ball to stanley] oh, yes stanley.  come on.  your turn, you have to go.

Name: stanley
Line: i will not. [throws ball back]

Name: michael
Line: okay... i'm going to toss the ball to pam.

Name: pam
Line: let's see.  i had an aunt that i was really close to.  she was this amazing female boxer.  um, anyway, she was injured in a fight, and she was paralyzed.  so, you can imagine how upset i was when i found out that she asked her manager to remove her breathing tube so she could die.

Name: michael
Line: wow.  if you wanna cry, that's okay.

Name: ryan
Line: [catching ball]  thanks.  um, a few years ago, my family was on a safari in africa and, um, my cousin, mufasa was um, he was trampled to death by a pack of wildebeests and, um, we all... took it really hard.  all of us kind of in the audience of what happened.

Name: michael
Line: do you want to talk about it anymore?

Name: ryan
Line: oh, it would probably take me like an hour and a half to tell that whole story.

Name: kevin
Line: me, me, me, me, me me. [catches ball]  yes.  okay, um.  i was trying to throw this party once.  and everyone was over for the weekend.  and then my uncle bernie died, and so me and my best friend, we had  to pretend like he was alive, so...

Name: michael
Line: wait a second.  that's weekend at bernie's. [upset] do you think that this is a game?

Name: phyllis
Line: well, there is a ball.

Name: michael
Line: all right, we're starting over.

Name: stanley
Line: no, i'm done.

Name: michael
Line: you are not leaving.  no!  we are not done.

Name: angela
Line: we really have a lot of work to do right now.

Name: michael
Line: yeah.  well, you know what?  the guy who had my job has died.  and nobody cares!  and he sat at my desk. [breaking down]

Name: toby
Line: michael, look.  i know this is hard for you, but death's just a part of life.  i mean, just this morning i saw a little bird fly into the glass doors downstairs and die.  and i had to keep going.

Name: michael
Line: how do you know?

Name: toby
Line: what?
