Line: i am greatly concerned about having a convict in the office. and i do not care if that convict is white, black, asian, german, or some kind of halfsy. i do not like criminals.

Name: andy
Line: all... righty, let's get started. what is she into?

Name: jim
Line: i know pam pretty well. i know the things that she likes, and, just as important, i know the things that she hates. so, one of the things that she likes is pranks. and, the things that she hates...

Name: jim
Line: frisbee-based competitions...

Name: andy
Line: are you kidding?

Name: jim
Line: she...

Name: andy
Line: i started the main frisbee golf club at cornell. where i went to college. i live to frolf.

Name: jim
Line: lead off with that. she loves hunting. she also loves those ads for six flags, with the old guy. [andy hums six flag ad] got it. also... do you speak pig latin?

Name: michael
Line: hey martin, how's it going?

Name: martin
Line: good. getting settled, you know?

Name: michael
Line: ah. good good. good. just a second. everybody? may i have your attention please? i realize that a lot of you have already heard that martin here has had some trouble with the law, but i just want to declare publicly that i... trust... him, completely, and that anybody who doesn't is an ignorant, dumb... person. okay? as a matter of fact, you show me a white man you trust and i will show you a black man that i trust even more. pam. tell me a white person you trust.

Name: pam
Line: my dad.

Name: michael
Line: ...danny glover. [jim raises hand] yeah.

Name: jim
Line: jonas salk.

Name: michael
Line: who?

Name: jim
Line: justin timberlake?

Name: michael
Line: oh. please. colin powell.

Name: karen
Line: hey i got one.

Name: michael
Line: yup.

Name: karen
Line: jesus.

Name: michael
Line: apollo creed.

Name: michael
Line: close your eyes. picture a convict. what's he wearing? nothing special, baseball cap on backwards, baggy pants... he says something ordinary like... 'yo, thats shizzle.' okay. now slowly open your eyes again. who are you picturing? a black man? wrong. that was a white woman. surprised? well, shame on you.

Name: martin
Line: so... you all wanna know what i was in for?

Name: michael
Line: no. that's not cool. you don't have to tell them.

Name: martin
Line: um, i really don't mind. it was a stupid mistake. i was working in finance and, i... got involved in some insider trading. so, i spent a little time in the clink.

Name: michael
Line: [laughs] that is awesome.

Name: kevin
Line: i had martin explain to me three times what he got arrested for, because... it sounds an awful lot like what i do here every day.

Name: pam
Line: what was prison like?

Name: martin
Line: not terrible. boring. we do the same thing every day. but... at least we got outdoors time.

Name: kevin
Line: you got outdoors time?

Name: martin
Line: two hours, every day. sometimes we'd play pickup football games...

Name: kevin
Line: michael, why don't we get outdoors time?

Name: pam
Line: yeah, some days i never go outside.

Name: michael
Line: well, we are running a business, so.

Name: meredith
Line: what was your cell like?

Name: martin
Line: not good. uh... a little bit bigger than michael's office... but, you know, i really only slept there. you know, during the day, there-our time's our own. they had uh, classes, i took some... watercolor classes.

Name: pam
Line: they have art classes?

Name: martin
Line: yeap. yeah.

Name: ryan
Line: they have business classes there?

Name: martin
Line: they did, taught by some uh, harvard business school guys--a lot of the guys also, that were in the class, the inmates, a lot of them have gone on to do extraordinary things in business.

Name: pam
Line: kinda sounds like... prison's... better than dunder-mifflin.

Name: michael
Line: ah. well. that's not true.

Name: kevin
Line: i would so rather be in prison.

Name: ryan
Line: prison sounds great.

Name: michael
Line: no you would not.

Name: michael
Line: this place is not prison. it's... way better than prison.

Name: creed
Line: [singsong voice] baby. hello baby. here you want to play with this?

Name: karen
Line: you can't give paperclips to a baby. he could swallow.

Name: creed
Line: oh, it's okay. i've got tons of them. you like that? goo-goo-goo-goo?

Name: andy
Line: pam-a-lama-ding-dong. listen, you're cute. there is no gettin' around it. so... i don't know if you like country music, but i was thinking maybe one of these days we could drive out to a field, crank up some tunes, smoke a few macanudos... maybe even toss a disk around.  utway ooday ooyay inkthay, ampay?

Name: pam
Line: wow... i--

Name: andy
Line: shh. think about it. i'll hit you back.

Name: pam
Line: wow. that was... wow.

Name: michael
Line: okay! listen up everybody! um, you guys said that prison was better than this place, and i heard ya, loud and clear, so, i am instituting some changes to make this more like prison. we are going to start with an hour of outdoor time. so let's go!

Name: pam
Line: michael, it's freezing out.

Name: phyllis
Line: i can't feel my toes.

Name: michael
Line: why don't we... pump some iron? anyone wanna... pump up?

Name: jim
Line: what is that, like... five pounds?

Name: michael
Line: it's uh... two and a half. i'm not going for bulk, i'm going for tone.

Name: stanley
Line: i'm going back inside.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, it's... freaking cold out here. anybody wants to stay out, you've got about... twenty-seven minutes of rec time.

Name: michael
Line: oh heyyy. martiiin. you have tv in the joint?

Name: martin
Line: yeah, in the rec room.

Name: michael
Line: ah. a ten inch black and white?

Name: martin
Line: actually, our tv was bigger than that one.

Name: michael
Line: these people don't realize how lucky they are. this office is the american dream. and they would rather be in the hole.

Name: jim
Line: oh. andy. i thought of one last tact you can take with pam.

Name: andy
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: quick question - do you play the guitar?

Name: andy
Line: i play the banjo.

Name: jim
Line: hold on, let me think about that, yes, that'll work. but can you sing in a sexy high falsetto voice?

Name: andy
Line: [singing] you know i can, my man.

Name: jim
Line: yup. that's perfect.

Name: karen
Line: hey.

Name: jim
Line: hey.

Name: andy
Line: i'm gonna go get my banjo out of my car.

Name: jim
Line: perfect.

Name: karen
Line: what is going on?

Name: jim
Line: ...i'm messing with andy. i'm sending him to all the women in the office with... just... terrible information on how to get them to go out with him.

Name: karen
Line: i love it. i want in. who's the target?

Name: jim
Line: ...oh, you know what? ... it was... gonna be pam, but...

Name: karen
Line: perfect. what do i do? just give me an assignment.

Name: jim
Line: uh, you know what though? i feel like i already sicked him on pam... we'll give her a break. let's think of someone else.

Name: michael
Line: all right everybody, there has been a lot of name calling against our office today. corporate maligning, slurring, much of it coming from one of you, who claims that prison is better... than... here. and none of can say "boo" because none of us have ever been to prison. well, there's somebody i'd like you to meet. somebody else who has been to prison, who can tell you what it is really like [puts on bandanna]. i'm prison mike! you know why they call me prison mike?!

Name: angela
Line: do you really expect us to believe you're somebody else?

Name: michael
Line: do you really expect me to not push you up against the wall, beeyotch?! [employees protest] all right, hey, hey, hey, hey, that's just the way we talk in the clink. been a lot of fun talk about prison today, but i am here to scare you straight. i am here to scare you straiiight!! in prison you are somebody's bitch. oh, and you. [points to ryan] you, my friend, would be da belle of da ball. don't drop the soap! don't drop the soap!

Name: ryan
Line: michael, please. [michael makes kissing noises]

Name: jim
Line: where... did you learn all of this?

Name: michael
Line: internet.

Name: jim
Line: so, not prison.

Name: michael
Line: and prison. eh, fifty-fifty, both. look, prison stinks, is what i'm saying. it's not like you can go home, and, recharge your batteries, and come back in the morning and, be with your friends, having fun in the office.

Name: jim
Line: what'd you do, prison mike?

Name: michael
Line: i stole. ... and i robbed. and i kidnapped... the... president's son. and held him for ransom.

Name: jim
Line: that is... quite the rap sheet, prison mike.

Name: michael
Line: and i nevah got caught, neither.

Name: jim
Line: well, you're... in... prison, but, mmhmm.

Name: pam
Line: prison mike? what was the food like in prison?

Name: michael
Line: gruel. sandwiches. gruel omelettes. nothing but gruel. plus, you can eat your own hair.

Name: andy
Line: wow. prison sounds horrible.

Name: michael
Line: yeah. yeah. well, thank you, andy. tanks.

Name: dwight
Line: prison mike. what's the very very worst thing about prison?

Name: angela
Line: don't encourage him, dwight.

Name: michael
Line: the worst thing about prison was the... was the dementors. they... were flying all over the place, and they were scary. and they'd come down, and they'd suck the soul out of your body, and it hurt!

Name: karen
Line: demen-dementors like in harry potter?

Name: michael
Line: no, not harry potter. ... there are no movies in prison. this is my point! you guys got it soft, and cushy! this place is freaking awesome! the people are awesome! your boss is nice! everyone seems to get along! people are tolerant! people who... have jumped to conclusions can redeem themselves! nobody is nobody's bitch. i hope that this scared you. and from me, prison mike, to you, i just wanna thank you for listening to me. letting me be a part of your life today. 'cause you got a good life! you got a good life. a good life. [turns around, takes bandanna off] so. what do you think? it doesn't sound so great, does it?

Name: pam
Line: wow. thank you. um, that must have been hard for you to relive that. both of you.

Name: martin
Line: yeah, that... wasn't really... at all my experience. there were certain elements of what you performed, i've seen on television. but it didn't remind me of my time in prison.

Name: michael
Line: okay. okay, fine. you guys think prison is so great? all right. well, here you go. [locks employees in conference room]

Name: jim
Line: okay, michael. come on. let us out.

Name: michael
Line: no! if you think is prison is so wonderful, then, enjoy prison! they are such babies. i am going to leave them in there until they can appreciate what it's like to have freedom. and if this doesn't bother them, then i am out of ideas.

Name: kevin
Line: [knocking on door] hey! let us out of here! hey! i have--

Name: hannah
Line: shh!

Name: toby
Line: [answering phone] this is toby. hey pam. where are you calling from?

Name: toby
Line: michael. why's everyone locked in the conference room?

Name: michael
Line: they were very disrespectful to me, and to the office. and martin has had a bad influence, to think that i gave him the benefit of the doubt.

Name: toby
Line: well, you're going to have to let 'em out. or... or i will.

Name: michael
Line: okay. you know what toby? i am teaching them a lesson, so.

Name: toby
Line: you know they're teasing you. i mean... obviously, this is... a much nicer place than an actual prison. we get paid to be here. we go home afterwards and have social lives. we have... we have parties here. they're teasing you. to be funny.

Name: michael
Line: [unlocks door] okay nutcases, get out of there! good work. long day. really long. why don't you guys head home. early. time off for good behavior! heh. good job. enjoy your freedoms!

Name: michael
Line: martin went from being a new guy from stamford... to a convict, to... my friend. back to a convict. then to... a kind of a nuisance, actually, to be completely honest. and finally, to... a quitter. and i will not miss him. and that is not because he is black.

Name: andy
Line: [singing] so we've been told, and some choose to believe it, i know they're wrong, wait and see, 'cause one day we'll find it, the ainbowray onnectionkay, the lovers, the dreamers, and meeee...

Name: dwight
Line: merry christmas! [holds up dead goose and puts it on pam's desk]

Name: pam
Line: merry christ--[looks up] no! why... why did you bring that here?

Name: dwight
Line: don't worry, she's dead. oh wait. he's dead.

Name: pam
Line: dwight, what uh...

Name: dwight
Line: i accidentally ran over it. it's a christmas miracle!

Name: pam
Line: well, get it out of here.

Name: dwight
Line: relax, ok. and because this is christmas, i am going to roast this goose and prepare it with a wild rice dressing. do we have any cayenne pepper in the kitchen?

Name: jim
Line: merry christmas dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: jim.

Name: jim
Line: wow. what have we got here?

Name: dwight
Line: what does it look like?

Name: jim
Line: dead goose.

Name: dwight
Line: and circle gets the square.

Name: jim
Line: all right.

Name: dwight
Line: [to pam] so can you watch this? i'm gonna get my carving knife out of the trunk.

Name: toby
Line: oh, dwight, we talked about this.

Name: dwight
Line: no, toby, this is different. he's already dead.

Name: dwight
Line: once i brought in a duck. to prepare for lunch. and people got upset. apparently, they got attached to the duck and didn't want to see it killed.

Name: dwight
Line: he was already dead. and we schrutes use every part of the goose. the meat has a delicious, smoky, rich flavor. plus you can use the molten goose grease and save it in the refrigerator, thus saving you a trip to the store for a can of expensive goose grease.

Name: jim
Line: wow. win-win.

Name: dwight
Line: exactly. thank you, jim.

Name: phyllis
Line: i like goose. if it's already dead is it so crazy we eat it?

Name: creed
Line: that's crazy. it's crazy.

Name: toby
Line: dwight, you cannot keep that here.

Name: dwight
Line: ok, that is ridiculous. and totally against the spirit of christmas.

Name: toby
Line: come on dwight. we went over this, like for a half an hour.

Name: dwight
Line: it's christmas toby.

Name: toby
Line: it's a dead animal in an office. you can't...

Name: dwight
Line: toby...

Name: toby
Line: i'm sorry.

Name: dwight
Line: [sighs] please? please?

Name: toby
Line: clean it in your car.

Name: pam
Line: i would like it off my desk.

Name: dwight
Line: oh pam. take a chill pill.

Name: michael
Line: [riding a bicycle down the hallway and singing] deck the halls with boughs of holly. fa la la la la la la la la. [struggling to stay on] 'tis the ... ack. [expletive] hey! [to pam] i would like a nice slice of christmas pam. side of candied pams. and perhaps, some pam-chops, with mint...

Name: pam
Line: can i help you, michael?

Name: michael
Line: i'm looking for the toy drive box.

Name: pam
Line: it's behind you.

Name: michael
Line: ok...  well, i need to put this bike in there. i hope it'll fit, with all these little knickknacks.

Name: jim
Line: wow. what kind of bike is that?

Name: michael
Line: umm... i don't know? average kind?

Name: kevin
Line: the tires look pretty worn.

Name: michael
Line: well, that is probably from the test drive.

Name: jim
Line: but the paint's chipping. is that your old bike, michael?

Name: michael
Line: no.

Name: andy
Line: yo, michael, sweet ride mike.

Name: michael
Line: oh, thanks. [michael and andy do a fist bump and explosion.]

Name: pam
Line: michael?

Name: michael
Line: yes? [pam holds up a bag] oh pam, that is so sweet. you didn't have to do that.

Name: pam
Line: [hands over bag] i didn't, it's from corporate.

Name: michael
Line: ok. did everybody get one of these?

Name: pam
Line: yup.

Name: michael
Line: terrific. good.

Name: michael
Line: this is going to be the best christmas ever. my girlfriend carol is coming to our party tonight, and i have a little surprise for her. [singing] i've got two tickets to paradise! pack your bags, we're leaving the day-after-tomorrow! um,  taking her to sandals, jamaica, all-inclusive. all-inclusive. you know what that means? right? yeah.

Name: jim
Line: [creed takes toy from toy drive box.] oh, i think you're supposed to put a toy in the box, creed.

Name: creed
Line: and a happy holiday to you.

Name: jim
Line: [carol walks through door looking upset] [waves] carol.

Name: carol
Line: hi, is michael around here?

Name: michael
Line: there she is. a christmas carol. hello [kisses carol] you're about five hours early to the party. you're such a blonde. [laughs]

Name: carol
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: hey, everybody. i don't know who you haven't met yet, but i think this is one of them. this is my girlfriend - carol. this is just the front of her. show 'em, show 'em the other side.

Name: carol
Line: [whispers] what?

Name: michael
Line: turn around, turn around. come on. [making a body turning gesture]

Name: carol
Line: get outta here.

Name: michael
Line: no, you get outta here.

Name: andy
Line: michael

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: andy
Line: if i may say. she's even prettier that you described her.

Name: dwight
Line: [standing up] oh, ouch. michael, i don't think there is anything wrong with the way you described her.

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: carol
Line: i really need a moment alone with you. [carol heads towards michael's office.]

Name: michael
Line: not as much as i need a moment alone with you. [puts finger on her back and reaches for her butt] berp.

Name: carol
Line: what is this? [holds up a christmas photo]

Name: michael
Line: that is my christmas card. it's a picture of you and me and your kids on a ski trip, having a blast. ski-sons greetings.

Name: carol
Line: no. see, we never went on a ski trip.

Name: michael
Line: i know.

Name: carol
Line: i went on a ski trip.

Name: michael
Line: right.

Name: carol
Line: two years ago with my kids and my ex-husband.

Name: michael
Line: yes, but what you didn't realize at the time was that i was with you in a sense. i was in your heart...

Name: carol
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: and next to your kids. what?

Name: carol
Line: this is so weird.

Name: michael
Line: i don't understand?

Name: jim
Line: it's a bold move, to photoshop yourself into a picture with your girlfriend and her kids on a ski trip with their real father. but then again, michael's a bold guy. [towards unseen cameraman] is bold the right word?

Name: carol
Line: i think you're a really sweet guy.

Name: michael
Line: ok

Name: carol
Line: but, um, i don't know how to deal with, with this thing [waves christmas card]. and, and the proposal. and i don't think things are going to work out with us.

Name: michael
Line: no, no no no ok, ok, you know what, you're not thinking straight. you know what you need? you need to think this through in [making drum noise] jamaica's largest fresh water pool.

Name: carol
Line: what are you talking about?

Name: michael
Line: i got us tickets to sandals, jamaica, we leave day after tomorrow. [carol shakes head in disappointment]. you better find the skimpiest bikini there is.

Name: carol
Line: oh, no. michael.

Name: michael
Line: and it's all inclusive.

Name: carol
Line: michael...

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: carol
Line: i'm sorry.

Name: michael
Line: no, carol. you walk out that door and it is over.

Name: carol
Line: i know. [closes door.]

Name: pam
Line: psst. jim. [jim turns around. pam nods head towards her for him to come over] um, hey. i need to give you your christmas gift now because, well, i'll just tell you.

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: pam
Line: for the past few months i've been sending dwight letters from the cia. [hands a folder to jim]

Name: jim
Line: are you serious?

Name: pam
Line: they're considering him for a top secret mission. there's his application. oh, and this is where i made him list every secret he promised he'd never ever tell.

Name: jim
Line: [opens folder and reads from dwight's file] last year, my boss, michael scott, took a day off because he said he had pneumonia, but really, he was leaving early to go to magic camp. wow.

Name: pam
Line: so... here's the gift. you get to decide what his top secret mission is. [jim smiles] sorry i didn't wrap it.

Name: jim
Line: [closes folder] you know what? uh, i really don't think i should be doing this stuff anymore, you know?

Name: pam
Line: oh.

Name: jim
Line: no, because of the promotion.

Name: pam
Line: oh yeah.

Name: jim
Line: it just feels a little bit, like...

Name: pam
Line: no, i get it, of course. ok. [holds out hand for folder. jim gives pam back the folder.]

Name: jim
Line: i feel like there's a chance for me to start over. and if i fall back into the same kind of things i used to do., then ... what am i doing?

Name: michael
Line: i'd like everybody's attention. christmas is canceled.

Name: stanley
Line: you can't cancel a holiday.

Name: michael
Line: keep it up stanley and you will lose new year's.

Name: stanley
Line: what does that mean?

Name: michael
Line: jim, take new year's away from stanley.

Name: pam
Line: michael, what's going on?

Name: michael
Line: carol and i split up. amicably. and i just don't think it would be appropriate to celebrate under the circumstances.

Name: jim
Line: will they still air 'rudolph?'

Name: kevin
Line: that's not fair.

Name: dwight
Line: [over everybody else's talking] are we gonna cancel hanukah as well?

Name: michael
Line: fine! [everybody stops talking] have your party. just no guests.

Name: phyllis
Line: but we invited guests.

Name: michael
Line: well, you know what phyllis? all of your guests would have probably canceled at the last minute anyway, leaving your life a stupid rotten mess.

Name: michael
Line: oh, oh, oh, oh, it hurts.

Name: pam
Line: i know.

Name: michael
Line: it hurts my heart. it hurts my stomach. it hurts my arms.

Name: pam
Line: ok, well, why are you laying like that?

Name: michael
Line: [moves a little] thanks. how did you push away the bad thoughts?

Name: pam
Line: like what?

Name: michael
Line: like maybe, the real reason they left was because there were things they wanted you to do in bed, that were, foreign, and scary?

Name: pam
Line: well.. um i, i don't...

Name: michael
Line: and not that you didn't want to try them. some wine may have helped. do you know what i'm referring to?

Name: pam
Line: i don't need to know.

Name: dwight
Line: michael. sorry to interrupt. uh, it appears we're one bathrobe short.

Name: michael
Line: take it from toby.

Name: dwight
Line: copy.

Name: michael
Line: hey, would you like to go to sandals, jamaica with me?

Name: pam
Line: no, thank you.

Name: michael
Line: it's all... [pam walks away.] ok.

Name: toby
Line: hey dwight. pretty nice robe- [dwight grabs bag with robe in it and walks away.] why?

Name: angela
Line: phyllis, i need you to pick up green streamers at lunch.

Name: phyllis
Line: i thought you said green was whorish.

Name: angela
Line: no, orange is whorish.

Name: karen
Line: uh, so i had a couple of ideas to make the stamford people feel more at home. each year we have a christmas raffle ... [phyllis and pam nod their heads in agreement].

Name: angela
Line: it would never work here.

Name: karen
Line: ok ... um, another idea was karaoke ...

Name: angela
Line: no.

Name: karen
Line: a christmas drinking game ...

Name: meredith
Line: yes.

Name: angela
Line: god help you.

Name: karen
Line: what?

Name: angela
Line: these are all terrible ideas and none of them are on the theme of "a nutcracker christmas." i think you should leave.

Name: karen
Line: you're kidding.

Name: angela
Line: you tried this out, and it's clearly not for you. it's time to go. come on. [angela gets up from seat] please. [karen gets up and leaves] thank you. ok, thank you very much. [angela closes door]

Name: michael
Line: what are you doing? ["goodbye my lover" by james blunt plays]

Name: dwight
Line: [putting things into a box] we are getting rid of everything that reminds you of carol.

Name: andy
Line: hey, what's the haps? [dwight shuts door in his face.]

Name: michael
Line: carol?

Name: dwight
Line: oh, look at this. [looks through papers] your old condo closing papers. it's riddled with carol's name. i wish i could throw this in the box. [michael hits repeat to "goodbye my lover" on computer]

Name: dwight
Line: why don't you just buy the whole song?

Name: michael
Line: i don't have to buy it. i just want to taste it. i just... i just want a little taste of it.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, look at this, she saved you two thousand dollars 'cause they failed to report a mold problem. [continues to sift through papers] but wouldn't that affect the final... how did she? oh, oh, i see what she did. that is good. wow. carol is one smart cookie.

Name: michael
Line: [singing] goodbye my lover. goodbye my friend. [hits repeat again]

Name: michael
Line: this is an old adage, but they say when you find true love, you know within the first 24 hours. with carol, i knew within the first 24 minutes of the second day i met her.

Name: pam
Line: i feel like i've been kinda cold to karen and there's no real reason for it. i mean it's not like she's ever done anything to me. so, i think i probably shouldn't be cold to her.

Name: pam
Line: hey, karen. sorry about that meeting today, that was really crazy.

Name: karen
Line: yeah, right? i'm so glad you said that. because, i don't know how those meetings usually go.

Name: pam
Line: um, usually like that.

Name: karen
Line: does anyone ever stand up to angela or..?

Name: pam
Line: i think one of her cats did once. she came in with scratches all over her face. [both laugh]

Name: karen
Line: right.

Name: pam
Line: um, i really liked your karaoke idea.

Name: karen
Line: oh cool, yeah.

Name: pam
Line: that could really be fun.

Name: karen
Line: oh, thank you.

Name: pam
Line: you guys do a raffle?

Name: karen
Line: yeah, we do a raffle...

Name: toby
Line: hey kev.

Name: kevin
Line: hey. [toby puts hand on kevin's back, who is wearing the robe and feels it a little bit.]

Name: angela
Line: this should've been up yesterday. [refers to party flyer]

Name: phyllis
Line: it'll be all right.

Name: angela
Line: [pam puts up another flyer] what is that? [reads flyer] the "committee to plan parties invites you to a margarita-karaoke christmas?" there's no such thing as the "committee to plan parties."

Name: pam
Line: there is now. we just started it.

Name: angela
Line: well, you just can't start a committee. you have to have funding.

Name: karen
Line: what's your funding?

Name: angela
Line: two hundred dollars.

Name: pam
Line: what's ours again?

Name: karen
Line: umm, two hundred and one dollars.

Name: pam
Line: oh right.

Name: kelly
Line: [pointing] hey, a margarita-karaoke christmas party, that sounds like fun.

Name: angela
Line: no, that is not a party. there's only one party and it's hosted by the party planning committee and it starts at three o'clock.

Name: kevin
Line: then why are there two flyers?

Name: karen
Line: oh, i understand that this is confusing for everyone, let me explain. there's a party that starts at three.

Name: kevin
Line: right.

Name: karen
Line: and then there's a way more fun party that starts at two forty-five.

Name: pam
Line: right, and if you're interested in the way more fun party, all the info can be found here on our more brightly colored flyer. [angela rips down brightly colored flyer and walks away. karen rips down angela's flyer.]

Name: kevin
Line: i didn't see where it was.

Name: jim
Line: yup, looks like the scranton people and the stamford people are finally coming together. and that's what you want, right?

Name: karen
Line: i think that's a really good option...

Name: dwight
Line: pam and karen. i am ordering you to cease and desist all party planning. immediately.

Name: pam
Line: you can't do that.

Name: dwight
Line: as ranking number three in this office, i am order -

Name: andy
Line: umm... i'm number three.

Name: dwight
Line: you're number four.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, but i'm number three.

Name: dwight
Line: ah, no. [to pam and karen] you must turn over to me all christmas decorations and party paraphernalia immediately that will be returned to you on january fourth.

Name: jim
Line: ok, i think i can help here.

Name: dwight
Line: ok, good

Name: jim
Line: as ranking number two, i am starting a committee to determine the validity of the two committees and i am the sole member. the committee will act on this now.

Name: dwight
Line: ok, this is stupid.

Name: jim
Line: could you please keep it down? [interrupted dwight] i'm in session. i've determined that this committee is valid. [pam and karen cheer.]

Name: dwight
Line: no no, no, wait, wait, wait [raises hand] permission to join the validity committee.

Name: jim
Line: permission denied.

Name: dwight
Line: damn it!

Name: andy
Line: hey. i can't concentrate when i know you're in pain, man. let me take you to lunch. [michael sighs.] c'mon, my treat.

Name: michael
Line: all right. nothing here to distract myself with anyway.

Name: andy
Line: that's my boy. i know the perfect place, too.

Name: michael
Line: hooters?

Name: andy
Line: no. benihana. much classier. but don't worry, the babes are totally hot, too. [do a fist bump and explosion]

Name: michael
Line: ah, i need my entourage [both exit michael's office] jim. dwight. ryan. c'mon, we're going to asian hooters.

Name: ryan
Line: ah man, i can't.

Name: michael
Line: why not?

Name: ryan
Line: i'm not feeling so well. i've got a ton of work to do here. msg allergy, peanut allergy, i just ate there last night. [michael feels ryan's forehead]

Name: michael
Line: ok, feel better.

Name: ryan
Line: thanks.

Name: michael
Line: c'mon jim, let's go.

Name: jim
Line: ok. [to ryan] wow, thanks for taking all the excuses, dude.

Name: ryan
Line: doctor appointment, car trouble, plantar warts, granddad fought in world war ii. use your head, man. i keep mine in here. [holds up blackberry.] look alive, halpert. welcome back.

Name: michael
Line: bros before hos. why? because your bros are always there for you. they have got your back after your ho rips your heart out for no good reason. and you were nothing but great to your ho and you told her she was the only ho for you. and that she was better than all the other hos in the world. and then ... and then suddenly she's not yo' ho no mo'.

Name: andy
Line: so she looks really hot, so i said, "you look hotter than usual today." [to waitress] thank you. michael [gesturing to sit down.] head of the table.

Name: dwight
Line: get out jim. [dwight tries to sit between andy and jim] actually, um... [to two other people at the table] sir, i'm going to need take this chair.

Name: michael
Line: dwight, just, just leave them alone please. they're on a date. they look very happy.

Name: andy
Line: so she looks at me right, and she goes, "i'm sorry, don't i even know you?" after a year, a year of buying lattes from her, do you believe that?

Name: jim
Line: yes.

Name: dwight
Line: i can't... i can't here what you're saying.

Name: michael
Line: carol used to drink lattes.

Name: dwight
Line: [off screen at other end of table] what're you talking about?

Name: michael
Line: she would get this little foam mustache...

Name: dwight
Line: [still off screen] carol had a mustache?

Name: michael
Line: and i used to say "hey, got latte?" and she'd say, that's not funny.

Name: dwight
Line: [off screen] what are you guys talking about?

Name: michael
Line: she totally got me. she understood that we didn't have to laugh to enjoy ---

Name: dwight
Line: michael! repeat what you said louder!

Name: dwight
Line: it is my job to be there for michael. how can i be there for michael if i'm here for michael? [food is thrown at dwight's face]

Name: michael
Line: i'm already starting to forget what color eyes she had. i can't, ok, i'm gonna call her. i am gonna call and find out...

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: dwight
Line: who are you calling?

Name: michael
Line: i'm just gonna call her.

Name: andy
Line: put that away. put that away. s.o.s. we... i... may day. haha. man down over here, [to waitress] we need your help.

Name: waitress
Line: what can i get for 'ya?

Name: andy
Line: i think we'll start with a round of noga-sakes. [waitress gives confused look]

Name: andy
Line: one part eggnog, three parts sake. some places won't make it for you though, because eggnog is seasonal.

Name: phyllis
Line: you should, you should put out salt for the rims [referring to margaritas]

Name: pam
Line: that's a great idea.

Name: angela
Line: phyllis?

Name: phyllis
Line: i was just getting a snack.

Name: pam
Line: you can have your snack in here.

Name: angela
Line: pam, don't tell her what to do! phyllis.

Name: phyllis
Line: ok.

Name: kevin
Line: i think i'll go to angela's party, because that's the party i know.

Name: ryan
Line: i miss the days when there was only one party i didn't want to go to.

Name: roy
Line: so i only use three?

Name: pam
Line: if you're using more than three pieces of tape to wrap a present, you're doing it wrong.

Name: roy
Line: ok. and where to do you get all those cool bows?

Name: pam
Line: oh, i just get those at any party supply place.

Name: roy
Line: ok. are you sure i can't use like, the cartoons from the newspaper?

Name: pam
Line: oh yeah, your mom would love that.

Name: roy
Line: [karen walks in] hey. all right, i'll see you guys later. [leaves room]

Name: pam
Line: bye.

Name: karen
Line: he's cute. you should date him.

Name: pam
Line: oh, yeah... maybe.

Name: dwight
Line: looks like you've got a little nakiri knife action going there.

Name: chef
Line: no, it's usuba.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah, i bet you wish you had a nakiri, though.

Name: chef
Line: actually, the usuba's the better knife when you're working with this quantity.

Name: dwight
Line: nah, i don't know... still think nakiri's better.

Name: woman at bar
Line: i think he'd know. [dwight and her stare at each other]

Name: michael
Line: nothing he's doing is cheering me up.

Name: andy
Line: wait for the onion. trust me. hey cindy, he just had his heart broken, you wouldn't do that to him, would you?

Name: cindy
Line: i don't know.

Name: michael
Line: oh, sure you would. look at you, i bet you break up with a guy every hour. [cindy laughs and walks away]

Name: andy
Line: you made her laugh. yes! she totally digs us. [referring to what chef is doing] watch, watch, watch, watch. [onions smoke up] heh, heh? what did i tell 'ya?

Name: michael
Line: you're right. that's good.

Name: pam
Line: hello everyone. we would just like to announce that our party is starting now in the break room. so... you can come by... .

Name: angela
Line: i have a very important announcement to make... about... your paychecks. umm... your paychecks will be arriving as scheduled on friday. and they will be in the correct amount that they are normally in... please stand by for a very important announcement... refer..[starts to leave office] for further regarding your paycheck! [runs outside]

Name: angela
Line: [on cell phone to dwight] i need to know if i can start the party?

Name: dwight
Line: michael! hey! over here, michael! [waves down michael with a napkin and whistles to get attention]

Name: andy
Line: this drink... [in audible conversation with michael]

Name: michael
Line: i don't know. no one can hear me. you know what? start the party.

Name: angela
Line: did michael give you permission to do this?

Name: dwight
Line: [with conviction] start the party.

Name: angela
Line: [angela slams phone shut and runs back to office.] also, i would like to inform you that, um, as a special treat, my party will be starting early. in fact, it will be starting right now [opens door to conference room.]

Name: pam
Line: our party is also starting now [opens door to break room.]

Name: karen
Line: yup.

Name: karen
Line: [stanley gets up and walks towards the break room.] all right stanley. woo.

Name: pam
Line: good choice. [kelly drags ryan to the break room.]

Name: angela

Name: hannah
Line: why would i be disappointed?

Name: angela

Line: meredith, if you don't come to my party, you will be very, very sorry.

Name: meredith
Line: is that a threat?

Name: angela
Line: no, it's an invitation.

Name: pam
Line: we have vodka!

Name: karen
Line: lots of it! [meredith leaves to break room party.]

Name: kevin
Line: i hear angela's party will have double-fudge brownies. it will also have angela. double fudge... angela... double fudge... angela [puts out hands to weigh his options] hmmm...

Name: angela
Line: brownies. cupcakes. [kevin walks toward conference room]

Name: kevin
Line: don't push it.

Name: karen
Line: are we taking this too far? you know what, i don't think we're taking this far enough. [pam and karen look at each other] what?

Name: pam
Line: i got goose bumps.

Name: angela
Line: i don't back down. my sister and i used to be best friends, and we haven't talked in 16 years. over some disagreement, i don't even remember. so... yeah. i'm pretty good.

Name: michael
Line: ahh, damn this chicken is good. my compliments to the chef. [points to chef] which is you! right? hahahaha. awesome! i need some meat. i want some steak. [leans over to neighboring man's plate] i see steak.

Name: man
Line: excuse me.

Name: michael
Line: excuse me [tries to take away meat with chopsticks] ah, un guard. [fights with chopsticks and laughs] family style.

Name: jim
Line: no, it's not.

Name: andy
Line: cindy, cindy.

Name: michael
Line: i don't think... i love it!

Name: andy
Line: i want you to close your eyes and imagine your dream house. [cindy laughs] c'mon, do it for michael. he's had a really long day.

Name: michael
Line: [laughing] i don't know what he's doing.

Name: andy
Line: this is great.

Name: dwight
Line: jim! jim! what... what's happening?

Name: jim
Line: oh, [points to cindy] she's asleep.

Name: dwight
Line: oh... narcolepsy.

Name: jim
Line: probably.

Name: andy
Line: now open your eyes and describe it to me.

Name: cindy
Line: i... don't know, it has four bed rooms and a loft...

Name: dwight
Line: oh my gosh, now she's up.

Name: jim
Line: and she's trying to correctly butcher a goose, but she's having trouble coming up with it.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, ok. cindy! yo, cindy! cindy! hold its neck back and insert the knife below the jaw. bring it all the way around, there's going to be a good amount of blood. [cindy looks confused. woman next to dwight is disgusted] don't let it bother you. have a bucket there, for the blood... and the innards... and the feathers.

Name: jim
Line: oh no, this is different. the cia thing, that was a prank on dwight. this is more like a umm... ok, it's pretty much the same thing.

Name: kelly
Line: what d'ya think? [to stanley about his drink]

Name: kelly
Line: see, i told you. you want one meredith?

Name: meredith
Line: no thanks. they're too sweet.

Name: karen
Line: hey, so what's the status.

Name: ryan

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: karen
Line: oh, you're kidding me?

Name: ryan
Line: no.

Name: karen
Line: oh, you guys, guys, um... i'm sorry, but there's a problem with the karaoke machine. [everyone sighs]

Name: kelly
Line: well that blows.

Name: darryl

Name: everybody

Name: phyllis
Line: hi.

Name: darryl
Line: hey. hey, look, when you get done with your... [looks inside conference room] meeting, you should, uh, come to the break room. we're having a party.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, ok.

Name: darryl
Line: all right. se you later...

Name: hannah
Line: [tries to break nut on a nutcracker doll] these nuts are really hard to crack.

Name: angela
Line: try harder then. [hannah smashes nutcracker on top of nut. sees kevin take another brownie] uh uh. no one has seconds until everyone's had some.

Name: kevin
Line: you've got to be kidding!

Name: angela
Line: you've got to be kidding. {kevin takes bite of brownie]

Name: phyllis
Line: cold, huh?

Name: ryan
Line: huh? [puts on jacket]

Name: phyllis
Line: maybe that'll help. is it cold in there?

Line: [referring to waitresses] they have been checking us out, all night! i am not kidding!

Name: michael
Line: you know what we should do?

Name: andy
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: we should invite them to the christmas party.

Name: andy
Line: now, you are thinking. yes. and you know what? because you have had such a rough day, you get cindy.

Name: michael
Line: oh, you are such mench my friend. [they stand up and do fist bump and explosion]

Name: michael
Line: ok, where is everybody? i would like them to meet my new girlfriend. [guys walk in with two different waitresses from benihana's]

Name: jim
Line: i'm sure they'll want to meet her, too.

Name: michael
Line: the least i could do was give some poor sick kid a bike.

Name: second cindy
Line: that rocks.

Name: michael
Line: nah, you rock. tell you what, if you want it, it's yours.

Line: thanks! i, i wanna give you something.

Name: michael

Name: michael
Line: hello? i would like everybody to meet my new girlfriend.

Name: andy
Line: my new girlfriend.

Name: angela
Line: where's dwight?

Name: second cindy
Line: is he the hot one or the giant baby?

Name: michael
Line: [whispers] the giant baby. wow, i am so sorry, i had no idea this party would be so lame.

Name: phyllis
Line: [under her breath] there's another party in the break room.

Name: michael
Line: oh, party in the break room! let's go, let's go! thank god! let's go to the break room.

Name: angela
Line: hey, excuse me! waitress lady! hey, where do you think you're going with that? [refers to toy she just took from table]

Name: second cindy
Line: i thought i could have it.

Name: angela
Line: you can't have it [takes back toy] i don't walk into your house and steal your hello kitty backpack.

Name: michael
Line: shhh... shut it! c'mon! party.

Name: dwight
Line: hey! it's angela! [angela slams door shut, but not before kevin sneaks out] hey!

Name: michael
Line: we're going to ...

Name: kevin
Line: [singing] i want you to know. that i'm happy for you. i wish nothing but...

Name: michael
Line: i just think there are two, two specific kinds of people in the world. people who own houses and people who own condos. [turns to reach for pretzel while second cindy turns other direction] and... my question to you [points and pulls away other waitress] is do you agree?

Name: other waitress
Line: do i agree about what?

Name: michael
Line: do you agree about what? [laughs] wow. you're  lucky you're so darn cute.

Name: other waitress
Line: what're you talking about?

Name: michael
Line: what're you talking about?

Name: kevin
Line: [singing] and i'm here to remind you of the mess you left when you went away. it's not fair, to deny me of the cross i bear that you give to me. you, you, you, you, you, you, you oughta know ta know.

Name: jim
Line: all right [high fives kevin]

Name: angela
Line: did you have fun at benihana's?

Name: dwight
Line: no. it was awful. i couldn't hear anything. [cheers from other party]

Name: angela
Line: i've had the worse day here [turns up nutcracker music on the stereo. [sighs. dwight reaches for and holds angela's hand]

Name: karen
Line: [karen and pam enter] dwight, you won the raffle! [holds out gift]

Name: dwight
Line: no... way! yeah!

Name: karen
Line: open it! open it ! open it! [dwight rips open present. angela is upset and pam notices]

Name: dwight
Line: oh.

Name: karen
Line: do you like it?

Name: dwight
Line: walkie-talkies.

Name: pam
Line: can i talk to you a second?

Name: dwight
Line: yes!

Name: karen
Line: well the committee to plan parties has served its purpose. we're gonna disband. in the name of christmas.

Name: pam
Line: [holds up rice krispie shaped like a star] in the name of nutcracker christmas.

Name: karen
Line: angela, we've been hearing really great thing about uh... your brownies and we were hoping you'd consider merging into two parties.

Name: angela
Line: i'm not sure. does your karaoke machine have christmas songs?

Name: pam
Line: yeah, but we don't have a power cord.

Name: angela
Line: oh, i may have seen it somewhere. [goes to plant and picks up power cord] is it this one?

Name: pam
Line: mmm. hmm.

Name: karen
Line: yeah, thanks.

Name: pam
Line: we'll go tell everyone.

Name: karen
Line: ok.

Name: andy and michael
Line: [singing] and if you want love, we'll make it. swim in a big sea of blankets. take all your big plans and break 'em. this is bound to take awhile. your body is a wonderland. [michael notices cindy ride up to him on the bike and looks confused] your body is a wonderland.

Name: andy
Line: your hands.

Name: both
Line: your body is a wonderland.

Name: andy
Line: i'll use my hands on it.

Name: both
Line: something 'bout the way your hair falls in your face...

Name: kelly
Line: [singing] whatever we deny or embrace. for worse or for better. we belong, we belong, we belong together... ryan...

Name: michael
Line: when you know, you just know.

Name: kevin
Line: right.

Name: michael
Line: check her out. my little gal over there. babe-alectable.

Name: roy
Line: which one is she? [michael stares at both waitresses]

Name: michael
Line: it's... it's one of those two. [points at both]

Name: roy
Line: you don't know?

Name: kevin
Line: dude, you should know.

Name: michael
Line: yeah... well, it's been hard, they're wearing the exact same uniform. and i've been drinking. and you know how all waitresses look alike.

Name: michael
Line: i honestly don't see what the big deal is. stevie wonder is married. are you going to tell me that stevie wonder doesn't love his wife just because he's not sure what she looks like?

Name: michael
Line: hey. where's my girl? is she in the fridge? where is she hiding? i don't know where she is. 'cause i'm drunk, i can't even find her.

Name: second cindy
Line: you know where i am.

Name: michael
Line: haha, i do! i just haven't hugged you in awhile [marks cindy's arm with a black marker]

Name: second cindy
Line: oh.

Name: michael
Line: oh, good. that felt good. let's go. party.

Name: creed
Line: [singing] spinnin' n reelin with love. give it the time, i might come back down. but it feels so good. my feet don't touch the ground. wha..wha..wild. wha..wha..wild. well everybody knows, i'm crazy about 'ya...

Name: dwight
Line: [into walkie-talkie] monkey, this is possum. do you copy?

Name: angela
Line: [into another walkie-talkie] copy, possum. what's your twenty?

Name: karen
Line: no way. [both hold up bridget jones' diary movie dvd]

Name: jim
Line: what a horrible, horrible movie that was.

Name: karen
Line: and now we get to remember it forever.

Name: jim
Line: thank you.

Name: karen
Line: thank you. [both hug]

Name: second cindy
Line: hey.

Name: michael
Line: hey, hey, you. how are ya?

Line: hey. this party blows, so we're gonna leave.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no. hey, you should stay because we are having fun and...

Name: second cindy
Line: cool...

Name: michael
Line: where do you wanna go?

Name: second cindy
Line: i... we're just gonna take off.

Name: michael
Line: i... you know what? i, ok, listen. i like you. i really like you. so much in fact, that i would like you to accompany me on a trip to sandals, jamaica.

Name: second cindy
Line: no... i have school. [leaves with other waitress and bicycle]

Name: michael
Line: you want help? ok... merry christmas.

Name: second cindy
Line: merry christmas.

Name: dwight
Line: [singing] lady, from the moment i saw you standing all alone. you gave all the love that i needed...

Name: michael
Line: that waitress was the one.

Name: jim
Line: no. she wasn't.

Name: michael
Line: how can you be sure?

Name: jim
Line: well, for starters, i've known you as a couple since the beginning of the relationship, which was approximately [looks a watch] three hours ago.

Name: michael
Line: don't make fun... you're making fun of me.

Name: jim
Line: sorry.

Name: michael
Line: i guess, i didn't know her very well. i marked her arm.

Name: jim
Line: you what?

Name: michael
Line: i, i put a mark on her arm. [both are laughing] so i could tell them apart. i don't... i know, i know. i can't believe i gave her my bike!

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: oh, why do i feel like crap?

Name: jim
Line: you just had a rebound.

Name: michael
Line: i had rebound? yeah.

Name: jim
Line: yeah. which, don't get me wrong, can be a really fun distraction, but, when it's over, you're left thinking about the girl you really like, the one that broke your heart.

Name: michael
Line: i totally rebounded. someone else shoots and i take the ball and i score. well, i guess i didn't score and i'm not sure who's actually shooting, but, whatever. doesn't matter. it's all good. or as my ex might say. domo arigato, mr. scott-o.

Name: angela
Line: [singing, with dwight holding up microphone] little baby, parum pum pum pum. i am a poor boy too, parum pum pum pum. i have no gift to bring, parum pum pum pum. that's fit to give our king, parum pum pum pum..

Name: michael
Line: [on phone] yes, i just wanted to see if, uh you would like to come to jamaica with me. there's this resort called sandals. really? ok. all right. i promise you won't be disappointed. umm, it's all-inclusive...

Name: angela
Line: [singing] ... shall i play for you, parum pum pum pum [oscar and gil walk through door]

Name: oscar
Line: too soon. [both turn back around and walk out]

Name: angela
Line: [singing] i played my drum for him, parum pum pum pum. i played my best for him, parum pum pum pum, rum pum pum pum, rum pum pum pum.

Name: dwight
Line: [singing along] pum pum pum pum pum pum pum

Name: dwight
Line: bye pam.

Name: pam
Line: night.

Name: jim
Line: [to pam] oh, you know what? sorry, forgot to tell you. i intercepted a transmission earlier and it seems that the cia is gonna need dwight down at their headquarters in langley for training and an ice cream social with the other agents.

Name: pam
Line: we should get him a bus ticket. [types on computer] to make his trip easier.

Name: jim
Line: oh no, that would be great.

Name: pam
Line: it costs seventy five dollars.

Name: jim
Line: hmm... well, maybe the cia can send a helicopter?

Name: pam
Line: ohh... [laughs]

Name: dwight
Line: [cell phone beeps] what the? [reading text message] "you have been compromised. abort mission. destroy phone." destroy phone? [dwight throws phone off of the roof and walks away]

Name: michael
Line: william randolph shakespeare once wrote in one of his plays, and i'm paraphrasing here, "love doth be poison." brilliant. and a lot of people don't give shakespeare enough credit. they think it was somebody else. a-holes.

Name: angela
Line: when michael suggested canceling christmas, i was outraged, not on my behalf, but on behalf of baby jesus. i mean, would he cancel christmas because he got dumped or he was two weeks behind on his party planning, on top of the fact that his cats were ill? i think not. i think baby jesus would suck it up and plan his party.

Name: karen
Line: we didn't have a party planning committee in stamford. somebody would just volunteer to run out to carvel and pick up an ice cream cake. so the fact that they have a committee here, fascinating.

Name: angela
Line: this is ridiculous. i... i've spent so much time, like i always do. and for that little trollop to come in here and throw her own party... are you even listening to me?

Name: toby
Line: angela, what do you want me to do?

Name: angela
Line: i want you to tell her to stop, toby. am i being clear?

Name: toby
Line: [sighing] look, it's a free country. if she wants to throw a party...

Name: angela
Line: what are you...?

Name: toby
Line: ...using her own money...

Name: angela
Line: and what...

Name: toby
Line: ...then she should be allowed to.

Name: angela
Line: no she shouldn't.

Name: toby
Line: the more the merrier.

Name: angela
Line: [angela slaps toby on the face.] stop it.

Name: toby
Line: oww.

Name: angela
Line: i'm sorry. it wasn't my intention to hurt you, but i want to wake you up to the injustice that's going on right in front of your face.

Name: toby
Line: that really hurt. i'm writing you up. [angela makes an angry face] hey, you are not allowed to touch other employees. am i being clear?

Name: angela
Line: michael was so right about you. you are pathetic.

Name: creed
Line: i don't care which party i go to. once you've danced naked at a hash bonfire with the spirits of the dead, all parties seem pretty much the same.

Name: kevin
Line: i think i'll go to angela's party, because that's the party i know.

Name: phyllis
Line: where would you like the rice krispy treat stars?

Name: angela
Line: they're sugarplum fairy wands.

Name: phyllis
Line: sugarplum fairy wands.

Name: angela
Line: it's like you weren't even at the meeting.

Name: stanley
Line: i'm going to the party in the break room, because they have more chairs in there. if i have to stand around a long time, i get real unpleasant to be around.

Name: angela
Line: [phyllis puts down phone] hmm hmm. [phyllis gets up and goes to angela's party]

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no, no. you know what, i better hold off. i wanna make sure i don't dial carol before i get drunk.

Name: jim
Line: so, really, you're just calling her?

Name: michael
Line: yeah. you know what? i am. i'm gonna call her. that's a good idea.

Name: dwight
Line: [from across the table] where's michael going? michael? is he sick? is he choking?

Name: michael
Line: [on [phone] no, i don't think i'm asking too much. i think it's only fair that you tell me exactly what i did wrong. okay. uh huh. well that... yeah. uh huh. all right. well, could you tell me something that i did right?

Name: ryan
Line: [knocks on office wall] hey.

Name: kelly
Line: hello, ryan.

Name: ryan
Line: merry christmas. [hands over a gift]

Name: kelly
Line: oh, thank you. do you always get presents for your ex-girlfriends?

Name: ryan
Line: okay, we're never technically... um is there.. is there a problem?

Name: kelly
Line: well, i didn't get you anything, because you have treated me inconsiderately, and i'm not gonna stand for that anymore.

Name: ryan
Line: um that's... that's fair. i'm sorry. merry christmas. [ryan starts walking away.]

Name: kelly
Line: [runnning after him] wait, ryan, you're not mean. you're adorable. i'm so sorry. i got you a present, too. but then when i got to work, i didn't see anything on my desk from you, so i threw it away. and then asuncion took the trash out, that's why i think it's in the dumpster. i'm so sorry. i'm the worst. [kelly hugs ryan]

Name: angela
Line: there's no fizz in this punch. phyllis!

Name: phyllis
Line: i'll just go get a ginger ale.

Name: angela
Line: no, i've got it, phyllis. stay. have fun. eat your wand.

Name: ryan
Line: [talking to kelly in dumpster] hey, kelly, you know what? throw my gift away, too.

Name: kelly
Line: [from inside dumpster] no, you paid money for that cd.

Name: ryan
Line: i'm serious. it'll show that we don't care about material things.

Name: kelly
Line: i don't understand.

Name: ryan
Line: kelly, i'm so cold!

Name: kelly
Line: [starts to cry] you don't have to scream at me.

Name: ryan
Line: are you having fun in this relationship?

Name: kelly
Line: sometimes.

Name: ryan
Line: i don't know kelly, sometimes i look at us and i think...

Name: kelly
Line: [crying] don't dump me while i'm in the dumpster. just go back inside if you're so cold. i'll just stay in the dumpster. [ryan smirks]

Name: ryan
Line: [both inside dumpster] did you look over here?

Name: kelly
Line: who's eating all these apples?

Name: ryan
Line: kelly.

Name: kelly
Line: and what are these? are... why are there egg yolks in here? aren't you supposed to eat the yolks?

Name: ryan
Line: michael was on an egg-yolk diet. he's so weird.

Name: kelly
Line: do you think i should diet?

Name: ryan
Line: no, you're perfect. [kelly gasps] what? did you find it?

Name: kelly
Line: no, i'm scared.

Name: ryan
Line: all of a sudden?

Name: kelly
Line: uh huh. hold me.

Name: michael
Line: oh, honey, here's stanley.

Name: second cindy
Line: hi.

Name: michael
Line: he is also in an interracial relationship, so, you know, if you have any problems, you can always call him.

Name: stanley
Line: oh, you're gonna face far greater problems than i can possibly help you with.

Name: michael
Line: sounds good. okay, let's go.

Name: jim
Line: all right, let's get started. umm... oh, first off, we're supposed to be pushing cardstock this week. so... let's push cardstock this week. uh, also... [to dwight] what is this?

Name: dwight
Line: tape recorder.

Name: jim
Line: for what?

Name: dwight

Name: jim
Line: ok. uh, karen, any news from that law firm?

Name: karen
Line: yeah, the deal closed yesterday, it's the six month commitment.

Name: jim
Line: oh my god, dwight, what're you doing?

Name: dwight
Line: what?

Name: jim
Line: you're not allowed to take off your pants in the middle of the office.

Name: dwight
Line: i'm not.

Name: jim
Line: dwight, you know what, just back up, okay, that's making me uncomfortable. this is sexual harassment, by the way. oh my god! he's got a knife!

Name: dwight
Line: i do not have a knife!

Name: jim
Line: no, let the record show that dwight k. schrute is now completely nude and is holding a plastic knife to stanley's neck?!

Name: dwight
Line: [leans into tape recorder] let the record show that jim halpert is a liar!

Name: jim
Line: [picks up tape recorder and speaks into it] dwight schrute is now wearing a baby's bonnet.

Name: dwight
Line: give me it. i am not.

Name: dwight
Line: jim carrey did not just walk in, ok.

Name: karen

Name: jim
Line: oh my god, karen, you're right, that is animal from the muppet babies.

Name: dwight
Line: you can't see... you can't see my stomach.

Name: michael
Line: hey, mon!

Name: pam
Line: hey. you have a bunch of messages and... [sees michael shaking head with beads in hair] that's nice. hannah quit while you were gone. i guess she memo-ed to file some complaints she had about being a working mother? and so you might also have to be deposed.

Name: michael
Line: blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah. relax.

Name: pam
Line: ok.

Name: michael
Line: just relax, ok? i'll get to all of it later.

Name: pam
Line: it's kind of serious.

Name: michael
Line: aren't you going to ask me how jamaica was? say it. ask me.

Name: pam
Line: how was jamaica?

Name: michael
Line: it was so good. oh, hey mon! at sandals, jamaica, when somebody says "hey mon," everybody says "hey mon" back.

Name: stanley
Line: oh, michael, i'm glad you're here.

Name: michael
Line: stanley. you know what? it is really good to see you, too.

Name: stanley
Line: my bonus check was a hundred dollars less than you promised.

Name: michael
Line: ok, well payroll is in charge of all that.

Name: stanley
Line: they said i should talk to you.

Name: michael
Line: well, i am just getting settled in. so, i'm gonna...

Name: stanley
Line: i am not doing a lick more work until i get my full bonus check.

Name: michael
Line: you are not as much fun as your jamaican brothers... mon.

Name: jim
Line: you want to talk about it?

Name: karen
Line: nope.

Name: karen
Line: i still haven't found an apartment yet. i'm living in a hotel. yesterday, i saw a "for rent" sign down the street from jim and he said he didn't think it'd be such a good idea. he said it would be like we were living together. in different houses. two blocks away.

Name: michael
Line: feelin' hot, hot, hot! [playing conch shell] feelin' hot, hot, hot! feelin' hot, hot, hot! feelin' hot, hot, hot! that's all i know so far, but i'm gonna keep practicing.

Name: pam
Line: that's good. [michael continues to play conch shell]

Name: michael
Line: you know, i had never been out of the country before now?

Name: pam
Line: huh.

Name: michael
Line: got to see how jamaicans live. it is great, you know. they just relax, they party all the time.

Name: pam
Line: it's kind of an impoverished country.

Name: michael
Line: yeah... gosh. great. you know what, pam? make a note. i want us all to start having pina coladas every day at three.

Name: pam
Line: but you can't today, we're doing inventory.

Name: michael
Line: inventory's at the end of december.

Name: pam
Line: we couldn't do it without you, so we postponed.

Name: michael
Line: i specifically went on vacation so i would miss it.

Name: michael
Line: inventory is boring. in the islands, they don't make you do stuff like take inventory. why do you think so many businesses move to the caymans?

Name: michael
Line: tonight, we are going to have an inventory luau. i want to bring back a little slice of paradise to the dunder mifflin warehouse inventory. so, party planning committee, get on it.

Name: angela
Line: by the end of the day? that's impossible.

Name: michael
Line: the jamaicans don't have a word for "impossible."

Name: jim
Line: yep, it's english, it's "impossible."

Name: angela
Line: michael, there's no way we can do it in time.

Name: michael
Line: how hard is a luau? all you need are some grass skirts, pineapple, poi, tiki torches, suckling pig, some fire dancers. that's all you need.

Name: michael
Line: come on in. settle in. settling. settling... and settled. good, there is something i would like to show everybody. see this sign? [points to a tv monitor of a picture from jamaica and reads] "no shirt, no shoes, no problem." this is an attitude i would like all of you to have right here. so what, if we have to stay late to do inventory? no problem.

Name: pam
Line: oh my god. is that jan? [points to same monitor]

Name: everybody
Line: what? where?

Name: pam
Line: on the left.

Name: everybody
Line: oh yeah, oh my god.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no. no, that's a german woman named urkel grue.

Name: michael
Line: jan told me to play it cool and not tell anybody because it can get us both in trouble. so officially, i did not see her. but i did see jan there. in our room. at night. and in the morning. that's all i'm gonna say. sex. we had sex. i had sex with her. i had sex with jan.

Name: michael

Line: oh no?

Name: packer
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: ok. well, check this out. i am sending you some email. you got it?

Name: darryl
Line: uh huh.

Name: darryl
Line: yup.

Line: hey.

Name: pam

Line: yeah.

Line: ok, forget it.

Name: dwight
Line: ok, i accept it.

Name: jim
Line: so, i dunno, i just feel likes we've been dating a month, right? same street. i think that might be a little close. a little much.

Name: pam
Line: hmm.

Name: jim
Line: hmm, what?

Name: pam
Line: how far away does she live now, like ten minutes?

Name: jim
Line: yeah, i guess.

Name: pam
Line: honestly, i think you should go easy on her.

Name: pam
Line: no, i didn't mind helping jim with his problem. that's what friends do. i help phyllis all the time. just yesterday, i untangled a piece of tape from her hair. so, yeah.

Name: jim
Line: hey, thanks a lot.

Name: pam
Line: oh, don't worry about it. i mean, it's better than listening to michael play a conch shell... which is what i was doing. oh, also, michael went to jamaica with jan!

Name: jim
Line: oh, yeah, how have we not talked about this already? i mean what happened there? kidnapping? [both start laughing]

Name: michael

Name: toby

Name: michael

Name: michael
Line: that photo is my personal property and if you are telling me you went on my computer and stole that photo, then i am going to call the cops.

Name: toby
Line: michael, nine different people emailed me that photo, including my ex-wife... we don't talk now.

Name: michael
Line: this is probably the icebreaker you need.

Name: toby
Line: you know, for your own protection, you should disclose the relationship to hr.

Name: michael

Name: toby

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no. i am not dating jan. she was very clear about that. just two like souls having a romantic time in the most romantic place on earth. got enough, weirdo?

Name: toby
Line: all right, thanks michael.

Name: michael
Line: ok.

Line: ok, we only have three hours people to plan a whole luau, and you're not helping.

Name: pam
Line: he'll call you back. ok, great.

Name: michael
Line: she bought it? [pam nods] ok. ok.

Name: michael
Line: oh. god. no, no, no, no, no.

Name: kevin
Line: jan.

Name: michael

Name: jim
Line: urkel grue.

Name: michael
Line: my point is that, if you get it, i would ask that you just delete it. sight unseen. let's be professional, all right?

Name: michael
Line: feelin'... feelin' hot, hot, hot! [plays conch shell]

Name: pam
Line: hey.

Name: michael
Line: hey.

Name: pam
Line: what are you doing out here?

Name: pam

Name: jim
Line: definitely.

Name: michael
Line: all right.

Name: karen
Line: i think i owe you one.

Name: pam
Line: sorry?

Name: karen
Line: for talking sense into halpert. the day's inn room 228 was starting to get really depressing.

Name: pam
Line: oh, yeah, no. don't worry about it. i mean, he was being ridiculous.

Name: karen
Line: yeah, but... thanks. seriously.

Name: pam
Line: sure.

Name: darryl
Line: oh, yes! yes! what'd i tell you? i knew he'd turn up [holds up an ipod inside speakers] you see that? this is the greatest night of my life.

Name: dwight
Line: who did this to you? [refers to pam crying] where is he?

Name: pam
Line: what? no, it's not... it's nothing.

Name: dwight
Line: [takes off coat to tie around waist] it's hot in here.

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: [dwight hands out handkerchief] thanks. you don't need to stay here.

Name: dwight
Line: i know. [puts arm around pam who continues to cry] so you're pmsing pretty bad, huh?

Name: jan
Line: hello everyone. hello michael.

Name: michael
Line: guh.

Name: kevin
Line: hi jan, you look... tan.

Name: jan
Line: i was in scottsdale visiting my sister.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah. how was it?

Name: jan
Line: very sunny. family's important. michael, i would like to speak with you, in your office.

Name: michael
Line: ok, yup.

Name: jan
Line: why am i here, michael?

Name: jan
Line: in the last year, i've gone through a divorce, an identity theft, a husband who would not... communicate. this is nether here or there. my psychiatrist thinks that i have some self-destructive tendencies and that for once, i should indulge them. you following me?

Name: michael
Line: i... i... yes.

Name: jan
Line: i think i owe it to myself to find some kind of happiness, you know? i mean, even, even if it means... lowering my expectations or, or redefining the word, itself.

Name: michael
Line: ok, yeah.

Name: jan
Line: this is the kind of thing, you know? i am... attracted to you. i, i don't know why, i... but, i am. and, i need to follow my instincts. at least that's what dr. perry thinks.

Name: michael
Line: who is dr. perry? i...

Name: jan
Line: this is the point, ok? you're wrong for me. in... in... every way. but i still find myself wanting to... be with you.

Name: michael
Line: and i, to you, in addition, feel the same feelings that you are as well.

Name: jan
Line: good, good.

Name: michael
Line: so, umm... thanks for coming by. so, i, uh...

Name: jan
Line: well, good, ok. thank you... for taking the time...

Name: michael
Line: well thanks for coming over, i appreciate - [jan leans over and kisses michael passionately]

Name: jan
Line: wait 15 minutes, find an excuse, and meet me at your condo.

Name: michael
Line: jan, you... complete... me.

Name: jan
Line: oh, god.

Name: roy
Line: hey, remember when we were planning our honeymoon and you wanted to go to hawaii and i wanted to go to mexico?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: roy
Line: i was definitely right. [both laugh] oh, brother.

Name: kevin
Line: what am i going to do? [refers to large pictures of jan and michael] i'm gonna hang it up at home. i don't have a lot of art. [smirks]

Name: michael
Line: i just had the best, most romantic week of my life in sandals, jamaica. went with a lady, and we laid on the beach and drank fruity drinks for free, because it was all-inclusive. and then i flew back to scranton, and then they lost one of my bags.

Name: michael
Line: hey, mister tally man, tally me banana, six hand, seven hand, eight hand, brunch! [snickers] so delicious. dinner, too. and every morning i would watch the sunrise and i would eat a mango. that is how i want to feel all the time. it's called island living. you know, how they say take a chill pill? in jamaica, i took one. guy on the beach sold it to me for $40. and after i finished vomiting, i was more relaxed than i ever have been. lost six pounds, too. that's how i want every day to be.

Name: pam

Name: michael
Line: dwight betrayed me once before. so this is his strike two. you know what they say? fool me once, strike one. but fool me twice, strike three.

Name: dwight
Line: stay out of this, you!

Name: michael
Line: i know that you went to corporate this morning, and i know that you lied about it. and given our history, i need you tell me this instant exactly what you were doing.

Name: dwight
Line: michael, i cannot tell you what i was doing there. but you have to trust me, i would never do anything to hurt you or this company.

Name: michael
Line: ok, you know what? i want you to think about your future in this company. i want you to think about it long and hard.

Name: dwight
Line: that's what she said.

Name: michael
Line: don't. don't you dare. i want to know what you were doing this morning by the end of the day.

Name: dwight
Line: it's going to be ok.

Line: how is going to be ok, dwight? everyone will know our business.

Name: dwight
Line: that's not the worst thing in the world. i'll just stand up in front of the office and reveal our true love. it won't be that bad. look at kelly and ryan.

Name: angela
Line: i hate those two people more than anything in the entire world.

Name: dwight
Line: well, i don't have a lot of choices.

Name: karen
Line: so, let me ask you a question.

Name: jim
Line: ok.

Name: karen
Line: did you ever have a thing for pam?

Name: jim
Line: pam? did i ever have a 'thing' for her? no, why? did she say something?

Name: karen
Line: i moved here from connecticut...

Name: jim
Line: yeah. ok, here's the ... i had a crush on her before i left. and i told her about it and she didn't feel the same way. so, it didn't amount to anything, and i left. i'm really glad you're here. 'kay?

Name: karen
Line: 'kay.

Name: dwight
Line: ahem-hem-hem. may i have your attention please? this will only take a moment of your time. although i love this company more than almost anything in the world, i have decided to step down from my post and spend more time with my family. i do not fear the unknown and i will meet my new challenges head-on and i will succeed. and i will laugh in the faces of those who doubt me. it has been a pleasure working with some of you and i will not forget those of you soon but remember, while today it is me, we all shall fall. in other words, i am quitting. so... .

Name: andy
Line: oompa-loompa doompity-dawesome, dwight is now gone which is totally awesome.  why was he gone, he was such a nice guy?  no, he was not.  he was a total douche.  doompity-doomp.

Name: dwight
Line: i would like to give the rest of my belongings to michael scott. just take them. except this.

Name: michael
Line: good luck.

Name: ryan
Line: dwight will be missed. not by me so much, but, he will be missed.

Name: angela
Line: dwight, from sales, was one of the most honorable and efficient employees this company has ever had.

Name: dwight
Line: one of my life goals was to die right here in my desk chair. and today, that dream was shattered.

Name: jim
Line: hey man. [dwight hugs jim and leaves]

Name: karen
Line: what happened on your sales call?

Name: andy
Line: um, am i happy the way things turned out? oh, well, happy's such an ugly word. but, um, i saw what needed to be done and i did it and now i'm thrilled. so, it's pretty... [camera had focused in on angela watching] hello? pretty good.

Name: dwight
Line: i have left dunder-mifflin after many record-breaking years and am officially on the job market. and it's very exciting.

Name: dwight
Line: for your convenience, i've broken it down into three parts: professional resume, athletic and special skills resume, and dwight schrute trivia.

Name: dwight
Line: i am ready to face any challenges that might be foolish enough to face me.

Name: dwight
Line: how would i describe myself? three words. hard-working, alpha male, jackhammer, merciless, insatiable.

Name: dwight
Line: there is nothing on my horizon except everything. everything is on my horizon.

Name: dwight
Line: [in staples uniform] i got this job to make some money while i continue my employment search. and uh, it's fine for the time being. oops. break's over.

Line: yikes.

Name: andy

Name: jim
Line: thank you.

Name: andy

Name: jim

Line: bathroom.

Line: love that andy, right? solid fellow. seems smart enough. likes me a lot. a lot. too much. like a crazy person. a little. not super crazy... just... there's something about him that creeps me out. i can't really explain it. he's always up in my bidness. which is ebonics for "being in my face and annoying the bejesus out of me." i don't understand how someone could have so little self-awareness.

Line: why would dwight do that for you? i think i know why. because dwight loves this company.

Line: fine. i'll just sit at my desk and be quiet. sorry i annoyed you with my friendship. [andy's phone rings] excuse me. and i'm also sorry that a lot of people here for some reason think it's funny to steal someone's personal property and hide it from them. here's a little newsflash! it's not funny! in fact, it's pretty freakin' unfunny!  oh, my god. [punches a hole in the wall] that... was an overreaction. gonna hit the break room. does anybody want anything? pam, you good?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: andy
Line: sure? okay.

Name: dwight
Line: [to customer] well, that question is meaningless. just go with the copy paper. it's your funeral. see how that works out for you.

Line: oh my god, she told you?

Name: dwight
Line: oh, man. [kevin starts to put a blindfold on] no, no, no. i don't need it. get out! [beats up pinata]

Name: michael
Line: it takes a big man to admit his mistake and that's what i did. the important thing is i learned something. i don't want somebody sucking up to me because they think i'm going to help their career. i want them sucking up to me because they genuinely love me. hmm.

Name: andy
Line: so michael had a little chat with corporate and they decided to send me to management training. anger management, technically, but still. management material. [gets out of his car] this whole thing supposed to take ten weeks, but i can be done in five. how? name repetition, personality mirroring, and positive reinforcement through nods and smiles. so, don't worry about old andy bernard. i'll be back. just like rambo, so.

Line: oh, hi. you must be andy.

Line: oh, hi! yes. i am and you must be... marcy!

Line: yeah.

Line: how do you know it's going to be a boy?

Name: michael
Line: yesterday i was scraping some gunk off my wall sockets with a metal fork and i gave myself the nastiest shock.  and when i came to, i had an epiphery.  life is precious.  and if i die i want my son to know the dealio.  the dealio of life.

Line: here are some things that i want to teach you that your mother won't be able to.

Name: michael

Line: [shakes head]

Line: ow.

[applause] so get your suits to the dry cleaner and get your hair did.  and karen, um, you might want to invest in a dress or a skirt of some kind if you don't already have one.  this may be phyllis' only wedding ever.  it is my job to ensure that none of you look like ragamuffins.  so i am instituting prima nocta.

Line: i'm trying to get everyone excited about phyllis' wedding because i want her to get people excited about my wedding when the time comes.  which won't be hard, because it's going to be awesome.  a lot better than hers, that's for sure.  it'll probably be on a boat.

Line: i guess jim and i have had a little bit of a rough patch for the past couple weeks but we had some really good talks and actually now i think that we're better than ever.

[turns and looks directly at jim] jim, i called off my wedding because of you. and now we're not even friends.  and things are just like weird between us, and that sucks. and i miss you. you were my best friend before you went to stamford, and i really miss you. i shouldn't have been with roy. and there were a lot of reasons to call off my wedding. but the truth is, i didn't care about any of those reasons until i met you.  and now you're with someone else. and that's... fine. it's... whatever. that's not what... i'm not... okay, my feet really hurt. the thing that i'm just trying to say to you, jim... and to everyone else in this circle i guess, is that i miss having fun with you. just you, not everyone in the circle. okay, i am going to go walk in the water now. yeah. it's a good day.

Line: white, because it contains all other colors.

Name: dwight
Line: wrong.  black.  it is the most dominant.  how do you make a table?

Name: andy
Line: you make a chair, but you don't sit on it.

Name: dwight
Line: what is the capital of maine?

Name: andy
Line: the capital of maine is montpelier, vermont, which is near ithaca, new york, where i went to cornell.

Name: dwight
Line: okay, also, moratorium on cornell talk.  don't wanna hear about it.  forget your personal history, and learn the history of this company.

Name: andy
Line: should not be a problem. i minored in history in the ivy league school which i attended.

Name: dwight
Line: you're not off to a very good start, bernard.

Name: andy
Line: i agree. but in another way, i am off to a very good start, wouldn't you say?

Name: andy
Line: i am a great interviewee. why? because i have something no one else has: my brain. which i use to my advantage, when advantageous.

Name: dwight
Line: [andy and dwight arm-wrestle, andy is about to win] time! no, you failed.

Name: andy
Line: damn it!

Name: dwight
Line: this interview is over. i'll let you know.

Line: [driving to new york] hey, thank you so much for driving me down for my interview.

Name: jim
Line: totally, no problem.  what are you interviewing for, by the way, my assistant? or...

Name: karen
