Name: jim
Line: oh wow, that sounds like fun. is your friend named karen too?  what did she accomplish?

Name: karen
Line: no, i'm sorry i should have been clearer. it's for me.

Name: jim
Line: oh...

Name: karen
Line: 'cause i'm going to get the job.

Name: michael
Line: [holding jan's breasts] remarkable.

Name: jan
Line: thanks.

Name: michael
Line: wait, wait. check one more time.

Name: jan
Line: oh, okay.

Name: michael
Line: very good [jan nods]

Name: jan
Line: well, i um, i have to get back, but i will see you in new york tomorrow, right?

Name: michael
Line: yes, indeed.

Name: jan
Line: good luck with your interview. [whispers] bye.

Name: michael
Line: so, i guess we're getting back together.

Name: pam
Line: what happened?

Name: michael
Line: your advice was good, but jan's was bigger.

Name: michael
Line: here's the sitch. two weeks ago, i was in the worst relationship of my life.  she treated me poorly.  we didn't connect, i was miserable. now, i'm in the best relationship of my life with the same woman.  love is a mystery.

Name: karen
Line: so we have all night.  where do you want to go first?

Name: jim
Line: oh, i dunno, how about the u.n.?

Name: karen
Line: how often do you come here?

Name: jim
Line: um, everytime my sixth grade class has a field trip.

Name: karen
Line: i think you'll really enjoy this, adult jim.

Name: michael
Line: hey, everybody.  the next time you see me, i'll be working for corporate. starting tomorrow, dwight schrute will be running the branch. so without further ado,  [clicks on small tape player] i would like to start saying my goodbyes [song: thank you, by natalie merchant plays in background] okay. goodnight, and good luck.

Name: dwight
Line: [dwight clicks off tape player] who's ready to work?

Name: jim
Line: [karen punches buttons on an atm] yeah, we went to the spotted pig for dinner. it's in the village. uh, karen knew it. and then we second acted spamalot. that's when you sneak in at intermission with all the smokers. and then we went to a bar that used to be a church. oh and at this one bar, i swear i saw lorne michaels.

Name: karen
Line: that wasn't him. [jim nods, mouths, yes, it was]

Name: karen
Line: so what's going to happen to us when i get this job?

Name: jim
Line: oh do you mean when i get the job?

Name: karen
Line: well, if you get the job then i'd move here with you. would you move with me?  i'm not stupid. i was at the beach.  we won't have a future in scranton. there's one too many people there.

Name: jim
Line: you mean kevin?

Name: karen
Line: exactly.  but you get it, right? can't stay there.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, i do. c'mon. [they hold hands and cross street]

Name: michael
Line: [exhales] how are you guys doing?  need anything?

Name: karen
Line: uh, no, we're good.  thanks.

Name: michael
Line: i have been here a bunch of times, so i know where everything is, know everybody's names.  if you need to know somebody's name, just ask me.

Name: jim
Line: [points at bearded man] who's that?

Name: michael
Line: that is beardy.

Name: jim
Line: beardy?

Name: michael
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: jim
Line: i'm gonna introduce myself.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no, just... that's not his real name.  that's just what i call him, so...

Name: michael
Line: i am by far the most qualified person they're interviewing.  jim and karen are here, which is cute.  they're like, kid actors tagging along with daddy, on the big audition, hoping to be discovered.  except daddy... is the best actor around.  daddy is meryl streep.

Name: dwight
Line: michael is gone.

Name: andy
Line: hail to the chief!

Name: dwight
Line: my first order of business: make andrew bernard my number two.

Name: andy

Name: dwight

Name: andy
Line: three months ago, i was nowhere.  i was just a cornell grad, in anger management.  look where i am now.  not bad. [washing out michael's mug]

Name: michael
Line: hey!  hunter!  wha's up my brutha?  this is hunter, secretary extraordinaire.

Line: uh, administrative assistant.

Name: michael
Line: jan in yet?

Name: hunter
Line: i think she's comin' in... later.

Name: hunter
Line: sure.

Name: michael
Line: just say, "i want to squeeze them."  it's code.  she'll know what it means.

Name: hunter
Line: okay.

Name: michael
Line: oh, and hunter?  could you tell her, [michael shakes his head and makes the "motorboat" noise] "brbrbrbrbr!" also?

Name: dwight
Line: you showed great leadership potential at the coal walk.  even if you did follow it with that embarrassing personal confession.

Name: pam
Line: thank you.

Name: dwight
Line: i had to make andy my number two.  it's political, complicated, you wouldn't understand.  i want you... to be assistant regional manager.

Name: pam
Line: really?

Name: dwight
Line: well, in a sense.  although, publicly i am going to retain the assistant regional manager position.

Name: pam
Line: you will be your own assistant.

Name: dwight
Line: correct, i need someone i can trust.  but i would also like the title... to be secretly applied to you.  just stripped of its pomp and frills.

Name: pam
Line: okay.  so... you would be the regional manager, and the assistant regional manager.  andy is your number two.  i would be the secret assistant regional manager.

Name: dwight
Line: mmmmmm, let's call it secret assistant to the regional manager.

Name: pam
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: dwight
Line: do you accept?

Name: pam
Line: absolutely, i do.

Name: pam
Line: i learned from jim, if dwight ever asks you to accept something secret... you reply, "absolutely, i do."

Name: michael
Line: [knocks on door] hello, hello!

Name: david
Line: michael, good to see you!

Name: michael
Line: good to see you.  here are the post-merger performance stats that you asked for.

Name: david
Line: oh, great.  i've been meaning to thank you by the way.  you didn't lose a single customer during the merger, and you still managed to trim the budget?  that is nice work. [michael smiles] so, let me ask you a question right off the bat.  what do you think are your greatest strengths as a manager?

Name: michael
Line: why don't i tell you what my greatest weaknesses are?  i work too hard.  i care too much.  and sometimes i can be too invested in my job.

Name: david
Line: okay.  and your strengths?

Name: michael
Line: well, my weaknesses are actually... strengths.

Name: david
Line: oh.  yes.  very good.

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: david
Line: very good.

Line: dwight is our new boss.

Line: oh, michael's not going anywhere.

Name: pam

Name: kevin
Line: karen.  she looks corporate.  those little pants suits.

Name: phyllis
Line: i think it's gonna be michael.

Line: do you really think he's qualified for that job?

Name: phyllis
Line: no, but he wasn't qualified for the job he has now, and he got that one.

Name: oscar
Line: [laughs] mm.  yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: listen up!  come to the center of the room, please.  this... [holds up paper that resemles a sheet sized dollar bill with dwight's face in the middle] is a schrute buck.  when you have done something good, you will receive one schrute buck.  one thousand schrute bucks... equals an extra five minutes for lunch.

Name: pam
Line: [raises hand] what is the cash value of a schrute buck?

Name: dwight
Line: excellent question, pam.  1/100th of a cent.

Name: oscar
Line: so ten thousand of your dollars is worth one real dollar?

Name: dwight
Line: just... zip your lid!  another announcement.  michael wasted an enormous amount of the group's time and patience with non-work related ethnic celebrations and parades of soft-minded dogoodedness.  no longer.  no more meetings!

Name: stanley
Line: amen.

Name: dwight
Line: instead, today i will begin my first lecture in a long series of lectures designed to increase your knowledge on the world of paper.

Name: kevin
Line: [raises hand] do we have to?

Name: dwight
Line: yes!  michael is gone.  there's a new sheriff here in these offices, and his name is "me."  conference room!  ten seconds!  all of you!

Name: pam
Line: i literally cannot wait to see what dwight has planned.  and i wish jim were here.

Name: david
Line: what do you think we could be doing better?

Name: michael
Line: i've never been a big fan of the name dunder mifflin.  i was thinking we could name the company something like, "paper great.  where great paper is our passion.  we're grrrrrrrrrreat!"  i don't know, could be good.  or, uh, "super duper paper.  it's super duper."  i don't know, something like that.

Name: david
Line: okay!

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: david
Line: thanks for comin' in, michael.

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: david
Line: it is always a treat when our paths cross.

Name: michael
Line: it is always a treat when our paths cross.  so, oh!  before i forget, i wanted to let you know, if you hadn't already heard, uh, jan and i are back together.  so... i may need to fill out one of those love documents again.

Name: david
Line: you're back together.

Name: michael
Line: yes.  and i am very excited about the prospect of working under her... or on top of her. [laughs] mm, that's not sexual, just... we're all professionals.

Line: okay, uh.  well, i thought it was clear in the description, the position... the job you're applying for... is jan's job.

Line: no, we're letting jan go.

Line: trees!  and where do trees grow?

Name: kevin
Line: [at the same time as dwight] forest.

Name: dwight
Line: soil. right.  we have, in front of you here, seven different types of pennsylvania top soil.  now, what would you say... is the most important element in the production of above ground leafy growth?  probably phosphorus, right? [angela smiles, shakes her head "no"]  wrong!  it's nitrogen!  absorb this information.  good!  now, let us discuss precipitation.  stanley!  when rainfall occurs, does it usually fall in a liquid, solid, or gaseous... state?

Name: dwight
Line: very good!  you have earned one schrute buck.

Name: stanley
Line: i don't want it.

Name: dwight

Name: stanley
Line: make it 100.

Line: no.  in fact, i'll give you a billion stanley nickels if you never talk to me again.

Name: dwight

Name: dwight
Line: okay---

Name: andy
Line: that's it!

Name: dwight
Line: what---

Line: no wait, what are you doing?!

Name: jan
Line: what's... what's the matter?  what... what happened in there?

Line: jan, this isn't the time, we're in an interview---

Name: jan

Line: erratic?

Name: david
Line: recently, you don't even show an interest in your work!  you smoke constantly in your office.  you spend most of the day online shopping.  you disappear for hours at a time, sometimes days.  always saying you're visiting your sister in scottsdale.  you go to scranton far more often than you used to---

Name: jan
Line: [opens up her overcoat] is it because of these?

Line: wuuuoooh, hey, whoa, jan---

Name: david
Line: it's not.

Name: jan
Line: no?

Name: david
Line: it's not.

Name: jan

Name: david

Line: hey!  you're  unstable!

Line: yeah!

Line: no--- we're all unstable.

Name: dwight
Line: it's like outerspace without the stars, it's so black. [laughs]

Name: andy
Line: this is gonna look so awesome!

Line: it's so intimidating!  anyone who comes in here... is gonna have to take me seriously.  abandon all hope, ye who enter here!

Line: i do.

Name: michael
Line: good.  very good.  i'm glad we are finally on the same page.  still have my job in scranton, though.

Name: david
Line: yes.

Line: wow.  that was some serious... hardcore... self destruction.

Name: karen
Line: don't!  she's nuts! [they laugh]

Name: karen
Line: okay, good!  because, um, a bunch of my friends are meeting downtown for lunch.  and, i was gonna meet them, so...

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Line: sure.

Name: karen
Line: good luck, halpert.

Name: jim
Line: thank you.

Name: jan

Name: michael
Line: i know.  i know, i'm sorry about that.  that was terrible.

Name: jan
Line: oh, just... no, actually i think it's good, you know?  it's fine, actually, i do.  i really think it's great that it happened.  because, you know, my work has always been the thing that has gotten in the way of my happiness, so... [laughs]

Name: michael
Line: well, it's... [jan starts crying, high pitched whining] no, don't cry, it's gonna be ok.

Name: jan
Line: [sobbing] oh, i know, i know.  it's just... i'm sorry.  it's just these painkillers that i started taking since the surgery.  ohhh!  they make my moods totally unpredictable!  wow!  what am i gonna do?

Name: michael
Line: [whispers] i don't know.  [normal volume] well i guess... you could come and stay at my condo.  i think i could back out of the sale. [jan exhales] probably get some negative feedback on my ebay profile.

Name: jan
Line: live together.  actually, wait a minute!  this could be great!  this could be perfect!  you know, my full-time job could be our relationship.  i could wear stretch pants and wait for you to come home at 5:15. [laughs] it could work.  this could work, really!

Name: michael
Line: [in the office, imitating the terminator] i'll be baaaaack!  and i am baaaack!

Name: pam
Line: how'd it go?

Name: michael
Line: no.  no, pam.  i'm baaaaaack!  for gooood!  kevin nealon.

Name: michael
Line: everybody, may i have your attention please?  it is with great honor and privilege that i announce to you that i have officially withdrawn my name for consideration from the corporate job.  i know, i know, i know.  "michael, what are you thinking?  you were a shoe in."  well, got down there.  i nailed the interview.  and the strangest thing happened.  why is my office black?

Name: dwight
Line: to intimidate my subordinates.

Name: michael
Line: that's stupid.

Name: dwight
Line: it was andy's idea.

Name: michael
Line: you shouldn't have taken it.  bad management!  good thing i'm baaaaaack.  [laughs] ryan, coffee.

Name: ryan
Line: i don't do that stuff anymore.

Name: michael
Line: no, it's for me, bimbo.  kids.

Name: michael
Line: so i'm back.  and i am never, ever going to leave.  i am going nowhere.  this place... is like... the hospital where i was born, my house, my old age home, and my... graveyard... for my bones.

Name: pam
Line: did... karen get the job?

Name: michael
Line: [to everyone] back to work. [to ryan] still waitin' on that coffee.

Name: dwight
Line: pam, hello.

Name: pam
Line: dwight, hello.

Name: dwight
Line: i wanted to thank you... for helping me, when you held the title, secret assistant to the regional manager.  you served the office with great dignity. [pam salutes dwight, dwight returns the salute]

Name: pam
Line: no, i don't know what the future holds, but... i'm optimistic.  and, uh, i had fun goofing around with dwight today.  jim and i... are just... too similar.  maybe one day i'll find my own karen. but--- you--- that is, a, um, you know, not--- a man.  a man version.  but, uh, until then... i can hold my head up. ... i'm not gay.

Name: david
Line: i don't know how i feel about hiring a sixers fan.

Name: jim
Line: i should leave. [pretends to get up] [they laugh]

Name: david
Line: uh, let me ask you a question, jim.  you're clearly a very bright guy.

Name: jim
Line: thanks.

Name: david
Line: always hit your numbers, personable, you make a great impression on everyone you meet---

Name: jim
Line: i'm sorry, wait, so is the question "how'd i get to be so awesome?" [laughs] because, i don't have an answer for you. [laughs]

Name: david
Line: uh, oh, hey, do you have your quarterly numbers?

Name: jim
Line: yes, absolutely.

Name: david
Line: and that, uh, questionnaire.  sorry to make you fill that thing out...

Name: jim
Line: oh, no, absolutely.

Name: david
Line: ...that's a hr formality.  we have this very irritating hr guy here, he's probably the only person you're not gonna like.  [jim notices a small note inside his papers, it reads "jim, don't forget us when you're famous!  pam"  it has a gold medal yogurt lid attached.] kendall.  ugh.  so, first up...

Name: jim
Line: [hands david his papers] there you go.

Name: david
Line: how do you think you function here in new york?

Name: jim
Line: [not thinking clearly because of pam's note] what's that? oh, uh, great.  you know?  i just um, i really appreciate the buildings, and uh, the people, and um, there's just a [sic] energy... new york has, uh...  not to mention, they have places that are open past eight.  [david laughs] so that's a... bonus.

Name: david
Line: you've been in the scranton branch a long time. [jim stares at pam's note] what have you liked most about that place?

Name: jim
Line: [thinks] the friendships.

Name: david
Line: okay.  well, we want the person who takes this position to be here for the long haul.  so... long haul.  where do you see yourself in ten years?

Name: jim
Line: [flashback to beach games] how are your feet?

Name: pam
Line: medium rare.  thanks. [they laugh]

Name: jim
Line: the real reason that i went to stamford... was because... i wanted to be... not here.

Name: pam
Line: i know.

Name: jim
Line: and even though... i came back, i just, i feel like i've never really... come back.

Name: pam
Line: well, i wish you would.

Name: pam

Name: pam
Line: i haven't heard anything, but i bet jim got the job.  i mean, why wouldn't he?  he's totally qualified, and smart, everyone loves him... and, if he never comes back again... that's ok.  we're friends.  and i'm sure we'll stay friends.  we just, we never got the timing right.  you know?  i shot him down, and then he did the same to me, and...  but you know what?  it's ok.  i'm totally fine.  everything is gonna be totally--- [jim walks in]

Name: jim
Line: pam.  [to camera] sorry. [to pam] um, are you free for dinner tonight?

Name: pam
Line: yes.

Line: all right.  then... it's a date.

Line: [to camera, tearing up, smiling] i'm sorry, what was the question?

Name: david
Line: [on phone] so, i know we left the other day on a note of uncertainty.  but, after some more thought, i'm very pleased to be able to offer you this job.  [laughs] great!  i'm so glad.  we're all very excited you're going to be joining us.  it'll be nice to have another mba around here.

Name: ryan
Line: [on phone, smiling] i'm excited too.  okay.  bye.

Name: kelly
Line: who was that?

Name: ryan
Line: [still smiling] nobody.  you and i are done.

Name: kelly
Line: what?! [ryan smiles and glances at the camera]

Line: where do you see yourself in ten years?

Name: michael
Line: well, [clears throat] i've actually done a lot of thinking about that.  and in ten years, i am living in a big house, with my kids.  and in this house we have screens on the walls that have famous art on them and i have a remote that works everything, that has like a belt-loop attachment, or in my ear, like a gluetooth.  and, because it's the future, i can take just a little tiny pill and get all my vitamins for the whole day.

Name: david
Line: a... multivitamin?

Name: michael
Line: well, i don't know what it's gonna be called, but... my point is, the future of this company is now.  and the future... is me.

Name: phyllis
Line: michael, what happened?

Name: michael
Line: jan got fired.  and i realized that i could not work for a company that would fire my girlfriend.   but more than that, i realized that... i couldn't take a job that would take me away from this place.  this is where i belong.  this is... my home.  and home is where the hardest.

Name: oscar
Line: home is where the heart is.

Name: michael
Line: heart is.  that makes a lot more sense.  you think they'd help each other out like that at corporate? [oscar shrugs] i think not!

Name: kelly
Line: well, if michael gets the job, i will be so upset, because dwight used to have a crush on me, so if he's boss, it'll be really awkward.

Name: pam
Line: mmm-hmm. [nods]

Name: kelly
Line: but if jim gets it, you should be happy, because you have a crush on him, and he totally doesn't feel the same way, and then he'll be gone.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, well, you know, whatever happens. [kelly puts her hand on pam's shoulder] oh.

Name: kelly
Line: pam, he's just not that into you.

Name: pam
Line: oh, i know.  we talked about it and he told me.

Name: kelly
Line: no, seriously pam, wake up.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: pam
Line: kelly made me realize something.  she and i have... nothing in common.  and i need more friends.

Name: dwight
Line: define scorched earth policy.

Name: andy
Line: when an attacker goes through another country sometimes they wi...

Name: dwight
Line: nyah ah! too long!  what is the dharma initiative?

Name: andy
Line: it is the source of all energy on this planet.

Name: dwight
Line: wrong.  it is a corporation formed by aliens.

Name: andy
Line: i'm a very good interviewee.  why?  because i have something that nobody else has.  and that is... my brain.  which makes me charming, witty, intelligent... [long pause] and quick on my feet.

Name: dwight
Line: who was the second man on the moon?

Name: andy
Line: trick question.  there was no second man on the moon.

Name: dwight
Line: inventor of the cotton gin.

Name: andy
Line: eli edison.

Name: dwight
Line: talk me through an appendectomy.

Name: andy
Line: step 1, disinfection.  step 2, incision.  step 3, remove the appendix tenderly so it doesn't burst and spread toxic...icity everywhere.

Name: dwight
Line: step 5, [talking over andy, indistinct] ...the wound.

Name: andy
Line: re-suture.  sutures, yes.

Name: dwight
Line: when is the paleolithic age?

Name: dwight
Line: what is a scented candle?

Name: dwight
Line: how is the new boss?  tough.  do people respect him?  they have to.  do they like him?  irrelevant.  they do not.  and i hate them back.

Name: michael
Line: new york real estate.  i started by looking for a brownstone, like the huxtables had, [shakes head] but instead i found this very, very, nice place in jamaica, queens, mon.  it is on the last stop of the subway, which is wonderful, because if i fall asleep, i still end up at home.  it is a suh-weeeet one bedroom.  i have a roommate, uh, vijay chokalingham, he's a sophomore at queens college.  he actually works in the indian restaurant right below the apartment, so... free food, and the place always smells like curry.  so, win/win.

Name: michael
Line: ok, well i did not get the job in new york, but i got the real prize, domestic bliss. jan made me breakfast this morning... well she bought the milk. it's soy. [walks into bedroom, jan sleeping on bed] this is why i do it, that's what i have to come home to. [sighs] she probably won't be up for a few hours.

Name: michael
Line: this is going to be a very good year. very good. jan is at home. jim is back. my protege ryan is at corporate. good stuff. um... andy and dwight are rockin' the sales team. i feel very blessed. [slams on breaks, camera turns, meredith rolls off the hood]

Name: it tech guy
Line: you know generally it's not a good idea to click on offers that you haven't requested. what was the exact offer?

Name: pam
Line: it was for a video.

Name: it tech guy
Line: yeah, what kind of video?

Name: pam
Line: a celebrity sex tape.

Name: jim
Line: really, what kind of celebrity?

Name: pam
Line: not relevant.

Name: jim
Line: how much did you pay for it?

Name: pam
Line: not relevant.

Name: jim
Line: you paid for it?

Name: pam
Line: it all happened so fast.

Name: jim
Line: i broke up with karen after the job interview, and uh... it was a little awkward when she came back from the city. she told me, very clearly, just because we were broken up didn't mean she was going anywhere, because she worked really hard for her career. but the next day her desk was empty, and as for me and my current romantic life, i uh... i'm single now and looking, so if you know anybody.

Name: pam
Line: jim and i went to dinner a few times when he got back from new york. i talked him through his break up. it's really nice to be good friends again.

Name: kevin
Line: are you kidding me, pam and jim are totally hooking up. all they do is smile; they're just keeping it a secret. right? [looks at oscar]

Name: oscar
Line: i don't know, there is no evidence of intimacy. they've been in remarkably good moods. it could be other things.

Name: kevin
Line: are you kidding me?

Name: pam
Line: and sunday i'm thinking of going to that flea-market at the drive-in.

Name: jim
Line: oh that sounds fun. i'm mountain biking on sunday. on montage mountain.

Name: pam
Line: cool.

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: well have fun with that.

Name: michael
Line: ladies and gentlemen. i have some bad news. meredith was hit by a car.

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: dwight
Line: where?

Name: michael
Line: it happened this morning in the parking lot. i took her to the hospital, and the doctors tried to save her life. they did the best that they could... and she is going to be ok.

Name: stanley
Line: what is wrong with you? why did you have to phrase it like that?

Name: oscar
Line: so she's really going to be fine?

Name: michael
Line: yes. she has a slight pelvical fracture, but, ah... people have survived far worse.

Name: pam
Line: thank god you were there.

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: andy
Line: did you see who did it?

Name: dwight
Line: no need we can just check the security tapes.

Name: michael
Line: gah. kind of a good news bad news there. i was able to be on the scene so quickly because i was in the car that hit her.

Name: jim
Line: who was driving?

Name: pam
Line: oh, michael.

Name: jim
Line: one day michael came in complaining about a speed bump on the highway. i wonder who he ran over then.

Name: dwight
Line: it's only meredith.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, it's only meredith, thank god. but did you see the way they looked at me? like i was a murderer or something.

Name: dwight
Line: hey... why did you do it?

Name: michael
Line: it was an accident.

Name: dwight
Line: was she talkin' back?

Name: michael
Line: no.

Name: dwight
Line: did you get sick of that face? did she owe you money? uh-oh. is this downsizing? did she spurn your advances?

Name: pam
Line: hey guys, we're all gonna visit meredith at lunch. and we're kicking in $5 for flowers.

Name: kevin
Line: who's we, you and jim?

Name: pam
Line: no, uh, me stanley and phyllis so far.

Name: kevin
Line: oh, i bet jim goes too.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, i haven't asked him yet.

Name: kevin
Line: oh, i bet you ask?

Name: pam
Line: i was planning on it.

Name: kevin
Line: i bet you were.

Name: pam
Line: angela?

Name: oscar
Line: [whispers to kevin] subtle.

Name: kevin
Line: what

Name: pam
Line: [to angela] are you coming?

Name: angela
Line: i can't, sprinkles is sick.

Name: angela
Line: she's been sick for some time. thank you for asking, no one asks... about sprinkles.

Name: angela
Line: i have to give her her meds, i have to pet her, and who will she eat lunch with?

Name: pam
Line: can't your other cats keep her company.

Name: angela
Line: there's bad blood, jealousies, cliques.

Name: pam
Line: angela, you're the chairman of the party planning committee. i shouldn't even be planning this, it's your job.

Name: angela
Line: [sighs] all right!

Name: michael
Line: my lord my liege.

Name: ryan
Line: yes michael?

Name: michael
Line: so ryan got promoted to corporate, where he is a little fish in a big pond. whereas back here in scranton i am still top dog, in a fairly large pond. so who is the real boss? the dog or a fish?

Name: michael
Line: so i need a little treat for the gang. something to win their affections back.

Name: ryan
Line: back? why is that michael?

Name: michael
Line: well, i ran down meredith in my car.

Name: ryan
Line: oh! did you do this on purpose?

Name: michael
Line: no, i was being negligent. but she's in the hospital, she's fine, recovering nicely. tiny little crack in her pelvis. but she will be up in...

Name: ryan
Line: did this happen on company property?

Name: michael
Line: yes. it was on company property, with company property, so... double jeopardy, we are fine.

Name: ryan
Line: i don't think you understand how jeopardy works.

Name: michael
Line: oh, right, i'm sorry. what is: we are fine?

Name: ryan
Line: [sigh]

Name: ryan
Line: people keep calling me a "wunderkind"; i don't even know what that means. i mean, i know what it means, it means very successful for your age, so i guess it makes sense, but... it's a weird word.

Name: angela
Line: hey d.

Name: dwight
Line: hey monkey, what's up?

Name: angela
Line: can you do me a little favor? go to my place at lunch and give sprinkles her medicine.

Name: dwight
Line: sure.

Name: angela
Line: i have to visit the alchy.

Name: dwight
Line: check to see if she's faking. if a car hit me, it wouldn't crack my pelvis. you know what; i bet she cracked it at home. jumped in front of the car to get some workers comp.

Name: angela
Line: i wouldn't put it past her.

Name: dwight
Line: so what do you need me to do?

Name: angela
Line: i wrote it out.

Name: dwight
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: angela
Line: there's a diabetes shot, roll the insulin in your hand, don't shake it. she gets an ace inhibitor with her meal, but you have to put her right in front of the dish or she won't see it because of the cataracts. mix one capsule of omega fatty acid in with her kidney medicine, um... and you want to give that to her 15 minutes after she's eaten. and, oh and there's a fungal cream because she has this infection under her tail, so you're gonna have to lift her tail and put the cream right at the base of her tail.

Name: michael
Line: ok, i have an announcement.

Name: oscar
Line: you pushed darryl out the window?

Name: michael
Line: no.

Name: phyllis
Line: you shot dwight?

Name: michael
Line: no! that is not funny, i love my employees, even thought i hit one of you with my car. for which i take full responsibility. look i'm just trying to take everybody's mind off of this unavoidable tragedy, and onto more positive things. so i thought we should plant a tree.

Name: jim
Line: oh good, so we don't have to work.

Name: pam
Line: ok, we're leaving for the hospital at 1.

Name: michael
Line: so, like a freedom tree.

Name: pam
Line: i can take 3 people.

Name: jim
Line: i can also take 3 people.

Name: oscar
Line: [to kevin] separate cars.

Name: michael
Line: pam.

Name: pam
Line: alright, i will get a card at the hospital and we'll sign it outside her room.

Name: michael
Line: pam.

Name: pam
Line: sales people can go later in the day. hourly works can go at lunch.

Name: michael
Line: ok, good good, so we'll just all go down there together at lunch.

Name: michael
Line: excellent!

Name: pam
Line: i was thinking that we...

Name: michael
Line: good work pam.

Name: pam
Line: but...

Name: michael
Line: yaaaaaay, pam! alright, since i am the boss i will drive as well. who wants shotgun?

Name: stanley
Line: you can't be serious. you ran a woman over this morning.

Name: michael
Line: everyone inside the car was fine, stanley!

Name: michael
Line: guess what, i have flaws. what are they? oh, i don't know. i sing in the shower. sometimes i spend too much time volunteering. occasionally i'll hit somebody with my car. so sue me... no, don't sue me. that is the opposite of the point that i'm trying to make.

Name: michael
Line: eww. i hate hospitals. in my mind they are associated with sickness. oh... she looks like an angel.

Name: kelly
Line: she looks awful.

Name: michael
Line: no... ok, she always looks like that... that is not my fault.

Name: jim
Line: i think she's awake.

Name: michael
Line: no... she's in a coma.

Name: nurse
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: ok... meredith, [hauntingly] ooooohhhhh. i brought all your friends from the office dear.

Name: meredith
Line: at the same time.

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: stanley
Line: hello meredith.

Name: meredith
Line: this is weird.

Name: michael
Line: brought you some balloons. why don't we... here you go. [wraps them around her iv] tie these up, cheer up your tubes... [iv pops out] oh! shhhh... for god's sake!

Name: kevin
Line: whoa!

Name: michael
Line: nurse.

Name: meredith
Line: no don't bother the nurse, just put it back in.

Name: michael
Line: [groaning] i am going to be sick... i'm gonna puke.

Name: jim
Line: i wouldn't... i wouldn't worry about it. don't touch it.

Name: nurse
Line: what, what are you doing? just gimme that.

Name: meredith
Line: thanks.

Name: kevin
Line: [applauds]

Name: phyllis
Line: does it hurt terribly?

Name: meredith
Line: no, it's not too bad. they have me on a lot of painkillers.

Name: creed
Line: oh really, what kind? codeine, vicodin, percocet, fentanyl, oxycontin, palladone? what...

Name: meredith
Line: i have no idea.

Name: creed
Line: oh. [laughs]

Name: meredith
Line: well it was really great of all of you to come and visit me at the same time. i'll see you guys at the office.

Name: michael
Line: oh, ok... wait up, wait up, guys guys guys, hold on a second. you know what i was thinking might be sort of fun? is if you forgave me in front of everybody.

Name: meredith
Line: michael, i'm not gonna do that.

Name: michael
Line: cause you know what they say in the bible about forgiveness? forgiveness is next to godliness.

Name: angela
Line: no, that's not. that's next to cleanliness.

Name: michael
Line: well, just shhhh... just just...

Name: meredith
Line: you cracked my pelvis

Name: michael
Line: look, i just... i don't understand what is preventing you from laughing this off and giving me a big hug.

Name: meredith
Line: you're not forgiven.

Name: michael
Line: come on. [starts to climb onto the bed with meredith.

Name: pam
Line: michael! michael!

Name: meredith
Line: [screams]

Name: michael
Line: do i need to be liked? absolutely not. i like to be liked. i enjoy being liked. i have to be liked. but it's not like a compulsive need to be liked. like my need to be praised.

Name: angela
Line: hey.

Name: dwight
Line: hey monkey.

Name: angela
Line: any problems?

Name: dwight
Line: well you left the tv on, and your cat is dead.

Name: angela
Line: what!?

Name: dwight
Line: sparkles, the white one, is dead.

Name: angela
Line: sprinkles.

Name: dwight
Line: that was the sick one, right?

Name: angela
Line: uh-huh. but i thought she had more time.

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Name: angela
Line: did she look... when you saw her how was she looking?

Name: dwight
Line: really dead. like a... just a dead cat.

Name: angela
Line: [sobbing]

Name: dwight
Line: so... hey come on, don't be sad, just... ok... just. she's in a better place.

Name: angela
Line: alright.

Name: dwight
Line: actually the place that she's in is the freezer, because of the odor.

Name: angela
Line: [still sobbing]

Name: pam
Line: [to angela] it's gonna be ok.

Name: michael
Line: ok, you know what? everybody, let's just get over the whole meredith thing. she cracked her pelvis, a tiny little crack. she going to be fine, so let's just...

Name: pam
Line: michael, angela's cat died.

Name: michael
Line: sprinkles?

Name: angela
Line: [nods]

Name: michael
Line: [sighs] oh, sh... i'm sorry angela. man what a day huh? how could it get any worse? her computer crashes with the porn, and then meredith with the accident, and then... sprinkles! god, that's 3 things. i'll tell you what's going on. this office is cursed, and we need to do something about it.

Name: michael
Line: well, i am taking responsibility. it is up to me to get rid of the curse that hit meredith with my car. i'm not superstitious, but... i'm... i am a little-stitious.

Name: michael
Line: did anyone do anything involving an indian burial ground?

Name: oscar
Line: like what?

Name: michael
Line: like park on it. or dig up a body... toby? anything you want to tell us?

Name: toby
Line: no, i did not violate an indian burial ground. in fact i had some good luck recently, alfredo's pizza, picked my business card out of the basket, so... uh, i got a week of free pies.

Name: pam
Line: that's cool.

Name: toby
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: perfect. so our tragedy is your good luck. satan.

Name: angela
Line: sprinkles never hurt a soul. god in your infinite wisdom how could you do this? she wasn't ready. she had so much left to accomplish.

Name: dwight
Line: she's only a cat.

Name: angela
Line: you never... you don't like them.

Name: dwight
Line: cats do not provide milk or wool or meat.

Name: oscar
Line: dwight please!

Name: michael
Line: dwight, you haven't seen meredith yet, have you?

Name: dwight
Line: no, i have not.

Name: michael
Line: well, i think you should go to the hospital, and pay your respects.

Name: dwight
Line: i do not respect her, but i will go.

Name: michael
Line: alright, i would now like to talk about each of your individual religious beliefs.

Name: toby
Line: oh, michael, you can't ask about religious beliefs...

Name: michael
Line: satan is a master of lies. everything he says is the opposite.

Name: toby
Line: alright, well then you can ask about religious beliefs.

Name: michael
Line: thank you for the permission. psych! alright let's just go around the room, and tell me what you believe in.

Name: stanley
Line: i'm... um, catholic.

Name: michael
Line: ok.

Name: darryl
Line: presbyterian.

Name: michael
Line: alright.

Name: pam
Line: oh me too.

Name: darryl
Line: oh?

Name: pam
Line: [puts hand up for high five] same religion.

Name: darryl
Line: alright! [high fives pam]

Name: phyllis
Line: i'm a lutheran and bob's a unitarian. it keeps things spicy.

Name: angela
Line: that's why we're cursed.

Name: creed
Line: i've been involved in a number of cults, both as a leader and a follower. you have more fun as a follower, but you make more money as a leader.

Name: michael
Line: kelly, you are hindu, so you believe in buddha.

Name: kelly
Line: that's buddhist.

Name: michael
Line: are you sure?

Name: kelly
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: what are you?

Name: it tech guy
Line: well if you're going to reduce my identity to my religion then i'm sikh, but i also like hip-hop and npr, and i'm restoring a 1967 corvette in my spare time.

Name: michael
Line: ok, 1 sikh, and...

Name: dwight
Line: as a farmer, i know that when an animal is sick, sometimes the right thing to do is to put it out of its misery. with the electricity we're using to keep meredith alive we could power a small fan for 2 days. you tell me what's unethical.

Name: dwight
Line: blink once if you want me to pull the plug.

Name: meredith
Line: don't pull any plugs.

Name: intern
Line: how are you doing ms. palmer?

Name: meredith
Line: better.

Name: intern
Line: excellent.

Name: dwight
Line: are you a doctor, or a male nurse?

Name: intern
Line: um... i'm an intern, which makes me a doctor, but...

Name: dwight
Line: pfft... her chart doesn't indicate that she had a hysterectomy but she did, or at least she got time off for one.

Name: intern
Line: ah, so uh... so that is where her uterus went... um, ms. palmer, your last tetanus shot was when you were bitten by a bat a few months ago?

Name: meredith
Line: yes. dwight here, trapped it in a bag against my head.

Name: dwight
Line: just doing my job.

Name: intern
Line: it also says you were recently bitten by a raccoon?

Name: meredith
Line: and a rat. separate occasions.

Name: michael
Line: you spend your whole life trying to get people to like you, and then you run over one person with your car. [sighs] and it's not even one of the popular ones, and everybody gets on your case. doesn't make any sense... god is dead.

Name: kelly
Line: if there was a god then ryan and i would be married by now.

Name: michael
Line: maybe believing in god was the mistake. what did people believe in before? the sun? maybe there's some sort of animal, that we could make a sacrifice too. like a giant buffalo, or some sort of monster, like something with the body of a walrus with the head of a sea lion. or something with the body of an egret with the head of a meerkat. or just... the head of a monkey, with the antlers of a reindeer, with, ah... the body of a porcupine.

Name: jim
Line: i will do some research.

Name: pam
Line: i can help you with that.

Name: dwight
Line: so, just to be safe they are giving her the rabies vaccine.

Name: michael
Line: oh god, rabies?

Name: dwight
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: michael
Line: i was in the hospital room with her. how contagious is that, is that like an std?

Name: dwight
Line: no, no. you've gotta be bitten by something.

Name: michael
Line: this place is so cursed.

Name: dwight
Line: actually the doctor said it was lucky she came in to the hospital, cause the only way to beat rabies, is to start treatment before the symptoms set in... lock jaw.

Name: michael
Line: [walks out into the office] i know a lot of you are upset with me for endangering meredith's life by hitting her, with my car. but it may make you feel a little better to know that before that happened, dwight endangered her life, by putting a garbage bag over her head that had a bat in it.

Name: jim
Line: six of one, really.

Name: michael
Line: turns out meredith has been exposed to rabies. which is like 10 times worse than a little crack in your pelvis. thanks to me she went to the hospital and i saved her life. curse is broken. curse is broken people! [kevin claps] oh... there is a god, and he has a plan for us after all. so go home get some rest, very very good work today. we got a lot accomplished.

Name: michael
Line: is there a god? if not, what are all the churches for? and who is jesus' dad?

Name: kevin
Line: [pam walks out of the office into the parking lot alone. kevin pops up from the back seat of his car as if spying] oh well, if they aren't together now, then they probably never will be. i thought they'd be good together, like pb&j. pam beasley and jim. what a waste. what - a - waste!

Name: pam
Line: [pam's car pulls out of parking lot and then off to the side of the road] i told you i'm not dating anyone. and even if i was, i don't think it's anyone's business. i mean, when i do fall in love, like when it's for real, the last person i'm gonna talk about it too is a camera crew, or my co-workers. [jim gets into the passenger side] almost marrying roy anderson was as close to pamela anderson as i ever want to be. [jim leans over and kisses pam] trust me, when i fall in love, you'll know.

Name: pam
Line: michael scott's dunder-mifflin, scranton, meredith palmer memorial, celebrity rabies awareness, fun run race for the cure, this is pam.

Name: michael
Line: pro-am.

Name: pam
Line: pro-am race for the... they hung up.

Name: michael
Line: a woman shouldn't have to be hit by a car, to learn that she may have rabies. but that is where we are in america. and that does not sit right with me. and that is why i'm hosting a fun run race for the cure for rabies. to raise awareness of the fact that there is a cure for rabies. a disease that has largely been eradicated in the us. but not very many people know that.

Name: stanley
Line: [on the phone] no, rabies... babies would be a good idea. can i put you down for a dime?

Name: michael
Line: hi stanley, how many sponsors so far?

Name: stanley
Line: zero.

Name: michael
Line: come on man, gotta step it up! it's for a good cause. jan called this morning and pledged $500.00.

Name: andy
Line: isn't that your money?

Name: michael
Line: that... is for a good cause. phyllis, how's the rabies quilt coming?

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, it's coming.

Name: michael
Line: oh, look at that, 3. way to honor meredith, phyllis.

Name: kevin
Line: michael?

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: kevin
Line: you cannot make me run.

Name: michael
Line: ok. [walks away]

Name: kevin
Line: it is not a real charity. it's stupid michael, and i'm not gonna do it.

Name: michael
Line: alright, alright.

Name: kevin
Line: you didn't run for me...

Name: michael

"you can't be on the team", "you can't move on to second grade". well, now they're telling me that i can't win back clients using old fashioned business methods. [shakes head] we'll see about that. and fyi, i eventually aced second grade, and i was the biggest kid in class.

Line: hey.

Line: no talk, i'm animating.

Name: jim
Line: why don't we take a quick ten second break from that so i can show you what's going on here. [pulls up dwight's game] okay, this is dwight's second life. he's on it all the time. so much so that his little guy here has created his own world. it's called second second life, for those people who want to be removed even further from reality.

Name: pam
Line: are you serious?

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: oh my god, he's really in pain.

Name: jim
Line: [sighs]

Name: pam
Line: who's that?

Name: jim

Name: pam

Line: not much, it's just for tracking dwight so---

Name: pam

Name: jim
Line: yep.

Name: pam

Name: jim
Line: i... why don't we go back to this animation.

Name: pam
Line: no no no, i want to see more of philly jim. i want philly jim.

Name: jim
Line: ah, show me how this works.

Name: pam
Line: oh boy.

Name: darryl
Line: [singing in different tune] out of paper, out of stock, there's friendly faces around the block, break loose from the chains that are causing your pain. call michael, stanley, jim, dwight or creed. call andy and kelly for your business paper needs. call dunder mifflin.

Name: andy, creed, kevin, kelly
Line: the people person's paper people.

Name: darryl
Line: dunder mifflin.

Name: andy, creed, kevin, kelly
Line: the people person's paper people.

Name: michael
Line: stop. stop stop stop stop stop stop. this is not me. this is not my music.

Name: darryl
Line: you're right, it's better than you! it's us! [sings] dunder mifflin.

Name: andy, creed, kevin, kelly
Line: the people person's paper people.

Name: michael
Line: no, i hate it! i hate it! ...i don't hate it, i just don't like it at all. and it's terrible.

Name: darryl
Line: you're on your own, mike. [gets up and starts to walk away]

Name: michael
Line: okay, you know what. hold on, hold on darryl.

Name: darryl
Line: you just said you hated it.

Line: no. i said i hate the, the style.

Line: okay, wow. wow, this looks uh, terrible.

Name: andy
Line: break me off a piece of that grey poupon.

Name: michael
Line: andy, andy, this is a pivotal scene in the ad. and if we don't get this, if we don't nail it, we're going to lose the whole triumph of the moment. the triumph of the will. now, god, what? what phyllis?

Name: phyllis
Line: [crying] well, i got in line to buy sue grafton's book and when it came to my turn i asked if she wanted to be in the ad and she said no thank you, but i wasn't supposed to take no for an answer.

Name: michael
Line: that'a girl.

Name: phyllis
Line: so i kept on asking and they finally threw me out of the store in front of all my friends.

Name: michael
Line: did you, or did you not get sue grafton?

Name: phyllis
Line: [sobbing] no.

Name: michael
Line: ugh, can somebody give her a tissue please? [kevin hands her piece of tape]

Name: jim
Line: i hope you're not killing yourself on this, because i'm sure it's good enough for michael's ad that will probably be seen by no one.

Name: pam
Line: maybe, but it's not good enough for me yet.

Name: jim
Line: okay. do you want me to stay?

Name: pam
Line: no no, you can go home. i'm good.

Name: jim
Line: pam is staying late tonight to uh, achieve her dreams. so i'm pretty proud of her, unfortunately she was my ride home.

Name: meredith
Line: you comin'?

Name: jim
Line: i, ah...

Name: meredith
Line: piss or get off the pot!

Name: pam
Line: dunder mifflin, this is pam.

Name: jim
Line: good morning. [pam sees breakfast sitting on her desk] yeah i'm sorry, i looked away for a second and creed snatched your hash browns.

Name: pam
Line: thank you.

Name: jim
Line: you're welcome.

Name: pam
Line: i worked until about 2:45 am. and then i had to decide if i wanted to spend the night with michael editing in his office, and dwight watching michael edit in his office, or drive home and probably fall asleep at the wheel and die in a fiery car wreck. i passed out on my keyboard trying to decide.

Name: andy
Line: let me pour you some bubbly because somebody got to a whole new level last night.

Name: dwight
Line: andy, i can't hear this right now.

Name: andy
Line: no, no no no, this is good. you know how we haven't really gotten anywhere that i want to get to physically yet? well, last night, that changed. we're makin' out, i'm kissin' her neck, and cheek and her ear lobe, and she's not really kissing me back. but she closes her eyes and she's like, "oh d, oh d."

Name: dwight
Line: she called you d?

Name: andy
Line: yeah. d for andy.

Name: dwight
Line: oh d.

Name: andy
Line: oh d.

Name: dwight
Line: [whispers] oh d.

Name: andy
Line: oh d!

Name: both
Line: ohhhhhh d! [laughing] ohhhh d!

Name: michael
Line: i'm about to send the ad to corporate... and it is sent. they'll probably watch it right away. i know i would. okay. [dials phone]

Name: pam
Line: [on phone] yes?

Name: michael
Line: pam, please clear my phone lines.

Name: pam
Line: certainly. [makes beeping noises] okay, clear.

Name: michael
Line: they could call at any second now. [sighs] oh god...i better call.

Name: michael
Line: [ten days later] well, it's been tough. the uh, geniuses at corporate rejected my commercial and tonight they are airing the brain dead version. so welcome one and all to the world premiere of corporate crapfest!

Name: everyone
Line: [watching ad] oh! [clapping and cheering]

Name: bartender
Line: hey it seemed like a big hit.

Name: michael
Line: no, it was stupid. people like waving, waving sells. it's not art. yet we made our ad, the real one was full of humor, and full of depth, and full heart and it was real.

Name: jim
Line: hey, could you do me a favor? could you put that in the dvd player?

Name: jim
Line: hey everybody! just want to welcome you all to the premiere of the real dunder mifflin commercial, the michael scott director's cut. hope you like it.

Name: michael's ad
Line: [chariots of fire theme plays] it all starts with an idea. but you can never tell where an idea will end up. [people passing a corporate memo around to each other] because ideas spread, they change, grow. they connect us with the world. [kelly catches paper airplane that says "i love you"] and in a fast moving world, where good news moves at the speed of time [newspaper with andy saying "hometown boy wins race"], and bad news isn't always what it seems. [dwight hands phyllis paper that says "you have a son, and it's me"] because when push comes to shove we all deserve a second chance. [stanley finds paper that says "turn your life around. now hiring at dunder mifflin"] to score. [jim throws paper in basket, michael retrieves it; it says "world's most creative boss"] dunder mifflin. limitless paper in a paperless world.

Name: everyone
Line: [claps and cheer]

Name: jim
Line: animation? all her by the way. [points at pam]

Name: bartender
Line: really?

Name: jim
Line: i just thought you should---

Name: bartender
Line: the animation was cool.

Name: pam
Line: thanks.

Name: bartender
Line: hey listen, you ever been on a motorcycle?

Name: jim
Line: ahh. [puts his arm around pam]

Name: kevin
Line: michael, that was fun.

Name: michael
Line: that was fun. next round of drinks is on me, people!

Name: andy
Line: [singing] claude van damme, hair for men, poison gas, nutrasweet. [speaking] it's gotta rhyme with "piece." fancy feast! [sings] break me off a piece of that fancy feast! it's the cat food. nailed it.

Name: michael
Line: all right! so, anybody else? no bad ideas. everybody, let's keep 'em coming... oh, god.  okay, toby?

Name: toby
Line: well, you know how everyone fast forwards through ads these days? well, what about an ad in slow motion. you know, if they fast forward through it, it'll just seem normal and it will catch your eye. plus, uh, the slogan could be: dunder mifflin, we adapt to the pace of your business. [murmurs of approval by everyone but michael]

Name: michael
Line: there are no bad ideas but for an idea, that was really, really bad.

Name: toby
Line: i spent three years in advertising before i came here.

Name: michael
Line: and that is probably why most ads suck. [points to the ad men waiting outside the conference room] oh, that's them!  those are the ad guys right there. all right, my very fortunate and creative group, go back to your desks and i will let you know when it is time to film. [everyone starts leaving the conference room] [loud whisper] pam! pam, come here for a second. did you get the memo about dressing your best?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: about dressing your best today?

Name: pam
Line: yeah, i distribute so i get all the memos.

Name: michael
Line: cool. cool, i just wanted to make sure you got it.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, i get all the memos. [starts to leave]

Name: michael
Line: okay, good. good.

Name: michael
Line: this is pam beesly, representing our girl next door.  pretty but nothing special.  you know, but she sort of keeps it real. what you might want to do, is if you could zoom in, like really quick zooms on her. might be good.  [walking away]  who else? [pointing] oh, creed... is the old guy over there. don't look at him. you might want to use him to sort of get that orville redenbacher dynamic going.

Name: ad guy 1
Line: sure.

Name: ad guy 2
Line: right.

Name: michael
Line: and if not we can just make him disappear. [walks quickly over to jim's desk] this is jim! halpert. jim has a very expressive face, don't you jim? he is like our mr. bean.

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Name: michael
Line: so do, um, do sad, do the sad face.

Name: jim
Line: i don't want -

Name: michael
Line: no, that's skeptical. do sad.

Name: jim
Line: mmm...

Name: michael
Line: that's, that's a pirate movie. [jim stares at michael] that's annoyed. well, he doesn't do very well under pressure.

Name: ad guy 1
Line: [shakes head] yeah... no.  [jim turns to pam with an exaggerated sad face; pam laughs. dwight walks towards michael and the ad men]

Name: michael
Line: and anybody else, we can just hire an actor to replace.  follow me!  let's get this movin'. [dwight goes back to his seat, embarrassed]

Name: michael
Line: all right, let's start.

Name: jim
Line: all right!  [sitting down behind michael's desk] i'm not sure what i'm supposed to be doing, but...

Name: michael
Line: you are my producer, you are a suit.  i am the creative genius.  you take care of all the boring stuff, and let my mind just run free.

Name: jim
Line: yup.

Line: now, we have eighty-five dollars, and a sam goody gift certificate...

Name: jim
Line: right.

Line: ...and we need to be done by 9 a.m. tomorrow.

Line: mmmhmm.  why don't you start by telling me what you got.

Line: love it.

Line: mm, can't do that.

Line: definitely can't do that.

Name: michael
Line: bull[censored] man!

Name: jim
Line: you know what?

Name: michael
Line: this is bull[censored]!

Name: jim

Name: michael
Line: ahhhh!  [sweeps toys off his desk]

Name: jim
Line: i'm just doing my job, man.

Name: michael
Line: if you don't let me pursue my artistic vision, i am going to walk!

Name: jim
Line: good!  fine!  i've got one andy bernard that will direct this puppy for half your fee... [dialing phone]

Name: michael
Line: no!  no!  jim, jim, don't, don't...

Name: jim
Line: what?  what?

Name: michael
Line: no, i can do it.

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: i can do it good.  i can do it good.  please, don't.  please.  [kneels in front of desk] please give me it.

Name: jim
Line: okay, make a commercial.

Name: michael
Line: [taps on desk and starts to leave his office] do you want this open or closed?

Name: jim
Line: closed. [michael leaves his office, gives jim two thumbs up, which jim returns]

Name: michael
Line: hey, everybody, i just got off the phone with david wallace, and he has given us the go-ahead to make the first ever dunder mifflin television commercial.  huh?

Name: everyone
Line: [applause]

Name: michael

Line: we had already applauded.

Name: michael
Line: okay, okay.  who could do music?

Name: pam
Line: how about darryl?

Name: michael
Line: actually, i'm a little concerned about having a black person do the music, because that could create a positive stereotype that could then become a... celestine prophesy, and keep the next bon jovi from ever picking up a piano.

Name: jim
Line: michael is on a mission to prove that he's creative.  which i think is odd, because michael actually might be the most creative person i've ever known.  every day, michael says and thinks things that no one has ever said or thought before.

Name: rolando
Line: [on phone] dunder mifflin, this is rolando.  oh yes, she's been expecting your call. [knocks on door]

Name: karen
Line: yeah.

Name: rolando
Line: karen?  he's on line one.

Name: karen
Line: thanks ro.  hey, we finally connected.  how's scranton?

Name: karen
Line: i am the regional manager of dunder-mifflin utica branch.  turns out it's a pretty easy gig when your boss isn't an idiot and your boyfriend's not in love with somebody else.

Name: karen
Line: look, all i'm saying is it would be a great opportunity, and we'd love to have you come aboard.  so think about it, okay?  okay, bye.

Name: karen
Line: look, for the record, a certain scranton salesman approached me, okay?

Name: michael
Line: this is perfect.

Name: dwight
Line: he looks like your twin.

Name: michael
Line: this is a dummy, a la ferris bueller's day off.  we have tied a string to the wrist, which goes to the door.  when somebody opens the door, the hand goes down, hits the remote, turns on the tape recorder, which is me snoring.  now nobody knows whether i am here, or whether i am gone.

Name: dwight
Line: i will know.

Name: michael
Line: but, you will not tell anyone.

Name: dwight
Line: i won't need to because we'll be together playing hooky.  yeah.

Name: michael
Line: well, sometimes.  most of the time i will be with ryan, or darryl.  [knock on the door]  yes?  oh good, good stanley!  first victim, this is what i want you to do.  go out, come back in.  we're going to hide.  i want you to tell me if this looks like me, okay?

Name: stanley
Line: i don't understand why sleeping at your desk is better than you not being here.

Name: michael
Line: just go out, and come back in.

Name: stanley
Line: i got an offer from utica for more money, and i'm going to take it.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: hey everyone, can i have your attention please?  i just thought you all should know that stanley hudson is planning on leaving us, because our old friend karen from utica is going to give him more money to work there.

Name: all
Line: [applause]

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no, no, no-no, no no.  you completely misinterpreted my tone, this is a horrible thing.  clearly, karen is trying to get back at us because jim dumped her.

Name: jim
Line: oh, i don't think that is what's happening.

Name: michael
Line: okay, smarty pants, then why?  why is she trying to take stanley from us?

Name: stanley
Line: i think it's because of my sales record.

Name: michael
Line: that could not possibly be it.

Name: michael
Line: you cannot take the hilarious black guy from the office.  stanley is part of what makes this branch so extraordinary.  the bluesy wisdom, the sassy remarks, the crossword puzzles, the smile, those big watery red eyes.  i don't know how george bush did it when colin powell left, and if utica thinks that they are going to poach stanley, they have another thing coming.

Name: michael
Line: how can i get you to stay?

Name: stanley
Line: money.

Name: michael
Line: yeah we all want money.  but there is none in the budget, so... tell me why you're really leaving.

Name: stanley
Line: money.

Name: michael
Line: mo money mo problems, stanley.  you of all people should know that.  let me ask you this, if i were-

Name: stanley
Line: money.

Name: michael
Line: pssh, kay.

Name: pam
Line: oscar, did you bring it?

Name: oscar
Line: to be edwardian.  his best work.

Name: pam
Line: okay, well i have the tablecloth, don't forget the flatware.

Name: oscar
Line: sure thing pam, can't wait.

Name: pam
Line: oscar, toby, and i are founding members of the finer things club.  we meet once a month to discuss books and art, celebrate culture in a very civilized way.  sometimes the debate can get heated, but we're always respectful.  there is no paper, no plastic, and no work talk allowed.  it's very exclusive.

Name: oscar
Line: besides having sex with men, i would say that the finer things club is the gayest thing about me.

Name: jim
Line: so tell me again why i can't be part of your club?

Name: pam
Line: because some people think you monopolize the conversation by trying to be funny.

Name: jim
Line: oscar?

Name: pam
Line: some people.

Name: karen
Line: [on phone] hello?

Name: michael
Line: fillipellers, how's it hanging?

Name: karen
Line: michael...

Name: michael
Line: to the left?

Name: karen
Line: listen, i-

Name: michael
Line: to the right?

Name: karen
Line: i'm-

Name: michael
Line: okay, enough small talk, go ahead.

Name: karen
Line: you called me.

Name: michael
Line: yes, listen, um...  you cannot tear stanley from his family like this.

Name: karen
Line: i'm pretty sure his family's coming with him.

Name: michael
Line: no, his work family.  look, this is very hard for me, but i'm going to give you my best man.  you may have toby.

Name: karen
Line: toby's not a salesperson.

Name: michael
Line: you can train him.  he's very very smart, and funny, and charming... you know, i can't do it, toby is the worst.  that- that was a bluff, um...  listen, if you are going to poach one of my guys, i'm going to poach one of yours.

Name: karen
Line: oooh.  good-bye michael.

Name: michael
Line: okay, good-bye.  wait!  wait! karen, could you transfer me to one of your salespeople please?  your best one?  [karen hangs up]

Name: pam
Line: i have ben nugent on the line, he is the top salesman in utica.

Name: michael
Line: hi ben, michael scott.

Name: ben
Line: hi michael.

Name: michael
Line: i'm going to cut right to the chase here.  do you like magic?  because i'm a genie in a bottle, and i'm going to grant you three wishes.  to move to scranton, to have a great job, and to be my best friend.

Name: ben
Line: aren't you the guy that hit the woman with your car?

Name: pam
Line: [giggles]

Name: michael
Line: [to pam] get out. [to ben] uh, yeah.  i also saved her life, but i guess that's not as grabby.

Name: ben
Line: everyone says scranton branch is worse than camden.  didn't everyone from stanford quit, like immediately?

Name: michael
Line: no, i fired them, and your next. ... so what do you say?

Name: ben
Line: seriously?

Name: michael
Line: what is that guy talking about?  scranton is not lame.  scranton is the cool, fun branch.  we're like animal house.

Name: dwight
Line: found him!

Name: michael
Line: jim, we're getting crapped on.  word is that our branch sucks, and we have to do something about it.

Name: jim
Line: so what are you going to do?

Name: michael
Line: what are we going to do?  we are going to make a monster sale, that's what we're going to do.  corcroan dropped staples.

Name: jim
Line: did they?

Name: michael
Line: yes they did, oh yes they did, and we are going to murder it.  you, me, dwight are going to jump into my pt cruiser, and we're going to crush this sale.  we're going to prove, what the hell is that music?

Name: pam
Line: it's vivaldi, for finer things.

Name: michael
Line: that's the problem, that's the problem.  we need rock n' roll pam, rock n' roll.  alright? [sees toby in a bow-tie holding a plate full of tea cups] oh... my... god, that's why people are leaving.  i- i have no words.

Name: jim
Line: we just passed the exit for corcroan.

Name: michael
Line: what? what? we did?

Name: dwight and michael
Line: surprise!  ha, ha, ha, ha, ha.

Name: michael
Line: look at his face! look at his face!

Name: jim
Line: what are we doing?

Name: dwight
Line: egg dripping, blah, blah, blah.

Name: michael
Line: what are we doing, dwight, what we are doing?

Name: dwight
Line: well, gee, jim, i don't know, i guess there's no sales call today.

Name: michael
Line: we are going on a panty raid to utica, is what we're doing.

Name: jim
Line: we're going to utica?

Name: michael
Line: uh-huh.

Name: jim
Line: i'm not going to utica right now.

Name: michael
Line: yes you are.  oh, buckle up jim.

Name: jim
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: we are going to make karen wish that she had never been dumped by you.

Name: michael and dwight
Line: [chanting] utica! utica! utica!

Name: michael and dwight
Line: [chanting] utica! utica!

Name: michael
Line: in your face

Name: dwight
Line: yow!

Name: jim
Line: i can't believe you guys.  i'm not going to go further piss off my ex-girlfriend.

Name: michael
Line: are you calling karen?

Name: jim
Line: no, i'm not calling karen.

Name: dwight
Line: he's lying.

Name: michael
Line: yep, get it.

Name: jim
Line: what are you doing? stop it, dwight!

Name: dwight
Line: [throws jim's cell phone out of the window] gah-ah-hah-ha!

Name: jim
Line: are you kidding me?

Name: dwight
Line: no communication with the outside world jim.

Name: michael
Line: it had to be done, it had to be done.

Name: jim
Line: well, that kind of sucks, because it had all the photos of my brother's new baby on it, so...

Name: dwight
Line: oh no, that is too bad.  shoot.

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Name: michael
Line: hey dwight, he found it.

Name: jim
Line: you know what?  i'm just going to call a cab from here.

Name: michael
Line: alright, you're going to miss the best prank ever.

Line: alright.  wait, what are you planning on doing?

Name: michael
Line: do you really wanna know?

Name: jim
Line: oh, god. [hangs up phone]

Name: michael
Line: follow me, come here.  here's what we brought, we brought uniforms from the warehouse.  i brought silly string, dwight brought gasoline and chunks of rubber to make stink bombs.

Name: dwight
Line: or real bombs.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, not real bombs.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah, come on, it will be so badass.

Name: michael
Line: uh, maybe, maybe, i don't know.

Name: jim
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: it could be badass.  yeah, it will.

Name: jim
Line: no, no absolutely we are not doing this.

Name: dwight
Line: come on, i already filled the bottles with the gas, it's going to be so badass.

Name: jim
Line: are you kidding me?  we've been driving around with this stuff in the trunk the whole time?

Name: michael
Line: teach her to offer stanley more money.

Name: jim
Line: so the deal was, dwight doesn't blow anything up, and i wear a costume.  and a moustache.

Name: michael

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: i can't imagine the sex being bad, i mean her body is...

Name: jim
Line: okay, you know what?

Name: michael
Line: ...awesome.

Line: why don't we play that alphabet game that you were talking about?

Name: michael
Line: okay, i will start.  um, "a." [singing] "a" my name is alan, and my wife's name is alice, we live in alaska, and we sell...  damn it! what do we sell?  um...

Name: jim
Line: it doesn't matter.

Name: michael
Line: i'm trying to think of what we could sell.

Name: jim

Name: michael
Line: [to own camcorder] day one. i'm in the interior of the vast pennsylvania wilderness. i've brought with me only the bare essentials. a knife, roll of duct tape, in case i need to craft some shelter or make some sort of water vessel. it's hot today. the sun is in the two-thirds easterly quadrant, which would make it about [looks at watch] 2 o'clock in the afternoon. it's really beating down on me now. i think that i want to get a little more comfortable because the sun is depleting my resources. [cuts pants with knife] ok. oh, there we go. watch that i don't hit my corroded artery here...

Name: dwight
Line: i lied to michael. i said that i would leave him alone, but i will not. i will remain close by to provide unseen moral support, but i will never help him. i will let harm befall him. i will even let him die. but i will never let him lose his dignity.
