Line: yep. you're being replaced.

Name: pam
Line: i think he meant personal day.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, that's quite a leap pam.

Name: phyllis
Line: i hope he's ok, i feel bad.

Name: creed
Line: give it up, he's dead.

Name: jim
Line: he just sent a text...

Name: creed
Line: what's a text?

Name: michael
Line: [at a park throwing whole pieces of bread] caw... caw... caw caw... caw...

Name: michael
Line: you know sometimes, to get perspective, i like to think about a spaceman on a star incredibly far away. and, our problems don't matter to him, because we're just a distant point of light. but he feels sorry for me, because he has an incredibly powerful microscope, and he can see my face. [looks towards the sky] i'm okay. no, i'm not.

Name: pam
Line: phyllis there's a package for you.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, ok. [phyllis signs for the package, opens an empty box]

Name: dwight
Line: [after snatching the clipboard with her signature] got it.

Name: lily
Line: [movie] sam, sam sam. it's not that you dumped my granddaughter, and its not that you want children. it, it's that you lied to me. can't you see that? can't you see? oh, i can never trust you. [andy looks like he's going to cry]

Name: sam
Line: lilly no. lilly! lilly please! lilly stop! i don't care how much time we have left. i don't care what my friends say! and i don't care what your mom thinks! frankly i'm pretty sure she's not makin any sense. please. move back to my apartment. [andy's crying, "i'm all out of love" starts playing] lilly. i'm not giving up. i'm not giving up. lilly... lilly! push the reverse button! reverse the button!

Name: andy
Line: [through tears] sam! sam!

Name: pam
Line: hey dad. no i know, mom told me. ok. yeah i'll see ya then.

Name: jim
Line: so what did he say? was it my fault?

Name: pam
Line: yeah. he said that you told him how much you love me. about how you feel when i walk in a room, and about how, you've never doubted for a second that i'm the woman you want to spend the rest of your life with. i guess he's never felt that with my mom, even at their best.

Name: jim
Line: you ok?

Name: pam
Line: yeah. [they hug]

Name: pam
Line: when you're a kid you assume your parents are soul mates. my kids are gonna be right about that. i guess it also means that sometimes love affairs look different to the people inside them. [andy is in the background, looks incredulous]

Name: andy
Line: i am not insightful enough to be a movie critic. mm... maybe i could be a food critic. these muffins taste bad. hmm, or an art critic. that painting is bad.

Name: pam
Line: michael! it's really good to see you.

Name: dwight
Line: hey. why are you wearing a turtleneck?

Name: jim
Line: are you alright?

Name: oscar
Line: michael, i feel like i was a little harsh yesterday. [murmurs of agreement]

Name: michael
Line: i um, i spent the afternoon in the park trying to feed the pigeons, i guess they all flew west for the winter, and i, i just had some thoughts that i wanted to share with you people.

Name: pam
Line: what?

Line: take it andy! take me home, to the place i belong, ba bah dah duh

Name: toby
Line: you have to stop. [bangs on glass window]

Name: michael
Line: i once had a dream. that i was eating a peanut butter and tuna fish sandwich. and, let me tell you something it was delicious. so the next day, i decided to make that sandwich. and in real life it is disgusting. [the phone rings] it is a disgusting sandwich. [it rings again.] and the reason i tell you this story. [phone] pick up the phone.

Name: pam
Line: dunder miff...michael scott paper company, this is pam. oh, hi russell from the pancake luncheon, how are you? well we'd like to do business with you too! how can we make that happen?

Name: ryan
Line: keep going. [whispers]

Name: michael
Line: don't tell them we have free delivery! [also whispers]

Name: pam
Line: we already offered free delivery!

Name: michael
Line: they don't know that!

Name: pam
Line: um, i can offer you free delivery on any order that you place today. okay, twenty boxes? i can do... just a second. i can do 20 boxes at 43 dollars a box. great!

Name: ryan
Line: write it down.

Name: michael
Line: give him a guarantee.

Name: pam
Line: a guarantee of what?

Name: michael
Line: just say the word.

Name: pam
Line: and i guarantee, that you will be satisfied! 'cause your satisfaction is our guarantee! we guarantee it. we look forward to doing business with you too. thank you russell.

Name: michael
Line: yes!

Name: pam
Line: i made a sale!

Name: ryan
Line: oh!

Name: michael
Line: you did!

Name: pam
Line: oh!

Name: michael
Line: oh yeah!

Name: ryan
Line: we did it !

Name: michael
Line: she did it!

Name: michael
Line: yeah! yeah! yeah! yeah! [dancing in the office]

Name: michael
Line: who would have thought, that the thing that would save this company would be work? and pancakes? in the end, this day definitely had its ups and downs. i realize that we don't have the biggest office. which is a surprise, because 165 square feet sounds like a lot. but, we have people with the biggest hearts. and i think for a small company that is really [flushing] someone went to the bathroom. that is really what's important.

Name: andy
Line: literally every song is better a cappella. name a song.

Name: dwight
Line: cherry pie, warrant.

Name: andy
Line: better a cappella!

Name: dwight
Line: no! really?

Name: andy
Line: yeah. name another.

Name: dwight
Line: enter sandman, metallica.

Name: andy
Line: better a cappella.

Name: dwight
Line: rebel yell, billy idol

Name: andy
Line: aw!! way better a cappella

Name: dwight
Line: really?

Name: andy
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: hup! [throws cheese puff to ryan who catches it in his mouth]

Name: pam
Line: things are a little slow here. and there's only so much cold-calling you can do in a day. turns out there's no limit to the number of cheese puffs you can throw at someone's face.

Name: michael
Line: hup! [throws cheese puff to pam who catches it in her mouth]

Name: pam
Line: we're getting pretty good at it.

Name: jim
Line: andy put down a bunch of deposits on stuff for his wedding with angela, but then she was sleeping with dwight for... several years. wait, no, that can't be right.

Name: pam
Line: the timeline's messy.

Name: jim
Line: anyway, now we are going bargain hunting in the haunted graveyard of their love.

Name: andy
Line: this is my solo. [stereo plays andy imitating bass guitar, a cappella starts singing 'you can call me al']

Name: pam
Line: i'm confused. am i walking down the aisle to 'you can call me al?'

Name: andy
Line: trust me. you will not be walking. you will be boogie-ing.

Name: jim
Line: i am extremely interested. so, how much will all of this cost?

Name: andy
Line: well, 12 guys, airfare, three nights in a hotel, food per diem, table up front for merch... $9,000.

Name: pam
Line: i don't know. it seems like a lot for an a cappella group from a college we never went to.

Name: andy
Line: did you even hear the music i just played for you?

Name: pam
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: phyllis
Line: what's wrong with you?

Name: dwight
Line: these sleeves are cutting off my circulation. not enough blood getting to my hands.

Name: phyllis
Line: i think you look nice.

Name: dwight
Line: doesn't charles know he's compromising my attack readiness? it's not a dress code. it's a death sentence.

Name: charles
Line: looking good.

Name: dwight
Line: 'kay, thank you. it's a straight jacket! [knocks things off shelf with arms] okay.

Name: dwight
Line: when michael was in charge, this place was like the roman empire. and the wild west. and war-torn poland. and poland. there was just a lot going on, so what you wore to work was the least of anybody's worries. and in that chaos, i soared.

Name: michael
Line: hey.

Name: dwight
Line: hey. ed's tires is thinking of making a change.

Name: michael
Line: [gestures to 'bed & breakfast' magazine] is this good?

Name: dwight
Line: they have some great kitchen ideas.

Name: michael
Line: oh. okay. ed's tires, huh?

Name: dwight
Line: it's small, i know.

Name: michael
Line: i really appreciate it.

Name: dwight
Line: thanks, michael. [michael palms dwight cash in their handshake] wait, what is this?

Name: michael
Line: it's for your trouble.

Name: dwight
Line: wh-  i don't need $6 to help a friend.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, listen, as a friend, i want you to have this.

Name: dwight
Line: michael, you know i can't take this.

Name: michael
Line: yes, i do.

Name: dwight
Line: but don't forget you owe me $10.

Name: michael
Line: that was four years ago. why don't you let it go?

Name: dwight
Line: michael.

Name: andy
Line: what was up with pam being all pushy and negative in there?

Name: jim
Line: i think she just didn't want a crucifix cake.

Name: andy
Line: it scares me to see you going down a road that i went down.

Name: jim
Line: am i going down a road?

Name: andy
Line: when i see her bossing you around like that, it just makes me wonder if this thing really has the legs to go the distance.

Name: jim
Line: it's so scary how right the things you're saying are. and you're coming at it with almost no knowledge, so of course i trust your opinion on this.

Name: andy
Line: i know a few things about love.  horrible, terrible, awful, awful things.

Name: jim
Line: i was going to use today to purge my inbox, but now something much more pressing has come up.

Name: michael
Line: ed's tires. why don't you tell them that we have fewer clients, so we can spend more time with each of them. also, try to discuss it over indian food, and try to mention how you distrust women.

Name: pam
Line: i'm not gonna do that.

Name: michael
Line: that is smart. that would not seem genuine. ryan?

Name: ryan
Line: i can get there.

Name: michael
Line: good, you take the lead on this one. also, do not forget that he has just gone through a messy divorce.

Name: ryan
Line: oh, awesome.

Name: michael
Line: bring it in. morning cheer. [clears throat]

Name: michael, pam & ryan
Line: u-g-l-y, you ain't got no alibi! you ugly, huh huh, you ugly! you mama says you ugly! hey! go michael scott paper company!

Name: pam
Line: i'm here. i'm a part of this now.

Name: dwight
Line: you needed to speak to me?

Name: charles
Line: dwight, take a seat.

Name: dwight
Line: i prefer to stand. less blood clots.

Name: charles
Line: nah, that's weird. you're gonna sit. [dwight sits] great. you know, dwight, it has been quite a transition for all of us. are you happy with the way things have been runnin' lately?

Name: dwight
Line: do you mean compared to the ways things ran with other bosses? comparisons are hard.

Name: charles
Line: i've just been impressed with your performance and i wanted to make sure good work doesn't go unnoticed.

Name: dwight
Line: your concern is noted.

Name: charles
Line: yeah, i like your work ethic. you're so... focused.

Name: dwight
Line: like a wolf. thank you.

Name: charles
Line: and i wanna start givin' you more responsibility. what do you say you and i go out for a drink this week?

Name: dwight
Line: really?

Name: charles
Line: definitely.

Name: dwight
Line: [sighs] it's firm.

Name: michael
Line: [on phone] i need you to get me the prices that you're charging ed's tires so i can undercut dunder mifflin.

Name: dwight
Line: i don't know that i can do that now. you know, uh, something's come up.

Name: michael
Line: oh n- is it mose? did you put the cover on that well?

Name: dwight
Line: no, mose is fine. i roped it off. it's not about mose. listen, things are changing here, michael, they're changing fast.

Name: michael
Line: i'm not following you.

Name: dwight
Line: imagine... someone has a personal hero they really wanna help. but then there's this new guy. very cool, very will smith-esque, who would not like it if he helped his hero.

Name: michael
Line: personal hero, cool new guy. okay, i think i'm getting your drift.

Name: dwight
Line: good, do you see what i'm saying?

Name: michael
Line: crystal clear. so is this for a movie that you're writing?

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: can i use it? [pam holds up note saying "he's talking about you!"]

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: [michael dismisses note, ryan and pam point to notepad] dwight, are you talking about us?

Name: dwight
Line: it is possible that i could be talking about us.

Name: michael
Line: someone could say that it is like the situation that we are in now?

Name: dwight
Line: it is the situation that we are in now.

Name: michael
Line: so i would say that the old boss has always been good to dwight, and he was there first, so he has dibs. you respect dibs, don't you?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm not a barbarian.

Name: michael
Line: good. will you meet me in 20 minutes at the spot?

Name: dwight
Line: i will.

Name: michael
Line: dwight?

Name: dwight
Line: yes?

Name: michael
Line: is the cool new guy charles?

Name: dwight
Line: i've said too much.

Name: michael
Line: is it stanley?

Name: jim
Line: hey, andy. you know i've been thinkin about what you said-

Name: andy
Line: 'noishe.'

Name: jim
Line: -i just don't know if i can do it.

Name: andy
Line: that's interesting, because i hear what you're saying is that you want to do it, which means you can do it. believe me, i broke up with angela, and i'm like, the happiest guy ever. i mean, i'm so happy. i'm so happy. like, total freedom, you know?

Name: jim
Line: it's just that pam gets me through the day, you know? i really rely on her. i'm pretty emotionally needy.

Name: andy
Line: and you know what? i am here for you. let me be your traveling pants. [imitates punching on jim's fist] ah, what'd you do that for?

Name: jim
Line: [both laugh] you know that i was doin' this.

Name: andy
Line: [fist pound each other] totally.

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Name: michael
Line: hello, dwight. what's with the shirt? are you alright?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm sorry, michael

Name: charles
Line: [charles comes from around corner] hi, michael.

Name: michael
Line: oh my god! run! run! it's a setup. setup!

Name: charles
Line: no, mich-michael.

Name: michael
Line: dwight, run!

Name: charles
Line: michael, no, let's be cool, ok?

Name: michael
Line: you be cool.

Name: charles
Line: yes.

Name: michael
Line: just-what's going on?

Name: charles
Line: we need to talk about our two companies, and how we should behave. dwight tells me you've been pestering him for company info.

Name: michael
Line: mm-do... dwight would not-

Name: charles
Line: he did.

Name: dwight
Line: i did, michael.  i was upset about the shirt sleeves at first, but now i'm okay with it.

Name: charles
Line: michael, i want you to stop pestering my salesmen, and i want you to leave dunder mifflin alone. do you understand?

Name: michael
Line: i. understand. nothing.

Name: michael
Line: [michael storms into office] wow.

Name: pam
Line: michael, are you alright?

Name: michael
Line: it was a setup. dwight told charles. he told him.

Name: pam
Line: tell us what you're talking about.

Name: ryan
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: it's like, a girl says she'll make out with you, but then her boyfriend is waiting around the corner with a pee-filled balloon.

Name: pam
Line: we can't help you if you don't just tell us what happened.

Name: michael
Line: i got hit in the face with a pee-filled water balloon, pam, ok? i don't know how they did it. they filled the balloon with pee. a funnel? i don't know. is that clear enough for you?

Name: andy
Line: hey, jim.

Name: jim
Line: [jim slams lunchbag on table] i just totally blew a sales call.

Name: andy
Line: bro, i do that all the time.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, well, with you it's different, okay? cause i just- i just suck. i just- i suck!

Name: andy
Line: tuna, be nice to my friend jim, ok?

Name: jim
Line: why? when i look in the mirror, i don't like the face that looks back.

Name: andy
Line: well, so what?  your body's a ten.

Name: jim
Line: forget it.

Name: andy
Line: jim.

Name: jim
Line: i said forget it. [drop kicks lunch across room, stomps on it]

Name: dwight
Line: [on phone] dwight schrute.

Name: michael
Line: hello, traitor.

Name: dwight
Line: i think you have the wrong number, michael.

Name: michael
Line: i want you to listen to me, friend, and i want you to listen to me good. i am going to come at you, and i am going to come at you hard. i am going to steal all of your clients, and then i am going to kill them in front of you.

Name: pam
Line: michael!

Name: michael
Line: i'm just getting hardcore with him.

Name: ryan
Line: finally.

Name: michael
Line: yes, and hear me, dwight, when i say i brought you into this world, and i can take you out. [hangs up] bill cosby.

Name: dwight
Line: [on phone] mr. schofield, please?

Name: secretary
Line: he's in a meeting.

Name: dwight
Line: dammit! [hangs up]

Name: michael
Line: [on phone] is mr. schofield there?

Name: automated phone voice
Line: if you'd like to reach an outside line, please dial nine first. [michael sighs, hangs up phone]

Name: stanley
Line: so, you think michael's going after the whale, huh?

Name: dwight
Line: i have a long term relationship with harper collins publishers and mr. schofield. i'm not worried.

Name: phyllis
Line: you sound worried.

Name: dwight
Line: and you have bad skin. oh, look everyone, we're all making observations! [gibberish sounds]

Name: michael
Line: [on phone] well, if you could do me a big favor and tell mr. schofield that michael scott has tickets to the wilkes-barre penguins game this weekend, and if he would like to join me... hello, daniel. how are you? uh-huh. i sure do. yes. [referencing rolodex card] wanted to ask, did kathy ever make jv?

Name: ryan
Line: look at that old dude and his rolodex go.

Name: pam
Line: i spent a month putting that rolodex on his blackberry, which he now uses as a nightlight.

Name: michael
Line: wow. high score?

Name: dwight
Line: and no, i cannot lower my current prices. [phone rings] hold on. hello? mr. schofield, thank you so much for taking the time to talk. i wanted to discuss your contract with us- oh, you're considering him. i thought michael scott left the paper business after his nervous breakdown.

Name: dwight
Line: michael has been talking to my biggest client. master and apprentice pitted against one another for the fate of the greater scranton area paper market.  so it's not exactly like 'highlander,' but still...

Name: michael
Line: hello, dwight, i've been expecting your call. what do you want?

Name: dwight
Line: i would like to arrange a truce.

Name: michael
Line: so you heard schofield is considering a switch, and you want mercy?

Name: dwight
Line: meet me in our spot in four minutes.

Name: michael
Line: no. no. you think i am going to fall for that? there's no-

Name: dwight
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: meet- ok, go to the spot and then walk 100 feet.

Name: dwight
Line: in which direction?

Name: michael
Line: toward the sun.

Name: dwight
Line: at what time?

Name: michael
Line: noon.

Name: dwight
Line: that-

Name: michael
Line: you have two seconds. [dwight starts running]

Name: dwight
Line: [looking at his watch] michael. [madge walks by] sorry.

Name: michael
Line: dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: i hope you're not recording this conversation. [dwight drops his pants and lifts up his shirt] good. i cannot believe that you sided with charles.

Name: dwight
Line: you were making me do things that were not all right.

Name: michael
Line: so you just rat me out? you could have said no.

Name: dwight
Line: and not come through for you?

Name: michael
Line: if you want a truce, i will give you a truce.

Name: dwight
Line: i want a truce.

Name: michael
Line: i do too.

Name: dwight
Line: let me take you and your whole company out for lunch at alfredo's.

Name: michael
Line: cooper's.

Name: dwight
Line: i had fish yesterday.

Name: michael
Line: damn it.

Name: michael
Line: [michael, ryan and pam sitting at restaurant, phone rings] oh. dwight-elicious. where you at?

Name: dwight
Line: oh, hi, michael. i'm so sorry i'm late. i got stuck in traffic.

Name: michael
Line: really? that's weird. we didn't see any.

Name: dwight
Line: i hit a bear.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: dwight
Line: he's technically fine. i imagine the true horror will be when he wakes up in a zoo. [throws a fish into the vent at michael's office] hey, listen, will you do me a favor and order the meatball parm for me, with extra cheese?

Name: michael
Line: yeah, sure.

Name: dwight
Line: ok, i will see you very soon, alright? [takes all the items off michael's desk and puts them into briefcase, including rolodex]

Name: michael
Line: okay, see you in a bit. dwight hit a bear. he'll be here in a sec.

Name: pam
Line: [pam, ryan and michael enter office] sounds neat.

Name: ryan
Line: we can spend a couple days there.

Name: pam
Line: oh my god, i think we've been robbed!

Name: michael
Line: [michael answers phone] yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: did you enjoy your lunch?

Name: michael
Line: dwight, not now, we've been robbed.

Name: dwight
Line: no, michael, you were sabotaged.

Name: michael
Line: no, dwight, we were robbed. how would you even know? you're still stuck in traffic. [pam holds up sign saying "dwight did it!!"] you?

Name: dwight
Line: me.

Name: michael
Line: what about our truce?

Name: dwight
Line: i broke it.

Name: michael
Line: on purpose?

Name: dwight
Line: yes.

Name: michael
Line: why?

Name: dwight
Line: you think this is some kind of game? no, this is a war, and i will not stop, i will not rest. you have no idea what kind of enemy you've created. you have unleashed the wolf!

Name: michael
Line: be that as it may, i have your meatball parm sandwich here, and i am going to eat it.

Name: dwight
Line: and i knew that you would do that. the meatball parm is their worst sandwich!

Name: michael
Line: oh. [bites into sandwich, looks disgusted] bastard!

Name: dwight
Line: hi there. dwight schrute here. i was just calling to see if michael scott paper was meeting all of your paper needs, and how is [reading off rolodex card] brenda, age four, ponytail, and simon, age 7? oh, you don't say.

Name: dwight
Line: [holding up rolodex card] schrute comma dwight. and on the back he wrote, "great salesman, better friend." [turns card over] "tall" and "beets."

Name: dwight
Line: and say hello to cheri, who is your black wife. [hangs up and answers cell phone] i see you're begging for mercy, huh?  well, you will find none here.

Name: michael
Line: dwight, do you mind if we talk?

Name: dwight
Line: sure. that'd be fine.

Name: michael
Line: if you keep coming after us, the michael scott paper company cannot succeed.

Name: dwight
Line: this is war and that is what happens.

Name: michael
Line: oh, one more thing. i'm going to have you listen while i steal your biggest client.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, no. no. no. no. no.

Name: michael
Line: oh, uh oh, i'm turning you down right now.

Name: dwight
Line: michael! michael!

Name: michael
Line: you can hear me, but i can't hear you.

Name: secretary
Line: mr. schofield's ready to see you now, mr. scott.

Name: michael
Line: oh, great. mr. schofield's ready to see me. thank you so much.

Name: dwight
Line: don't let him in! he's a traitor! michael!

Name: michael
Line: walking in the door...

Name: mr. schofield
Line: michael, good to see you.

Name: michael
Line: mr. schofield, good to see you. and i'm closing the door. [dwight runs out of the office]

Name: michael
Line: [on speakerphone in dwight's car] now, when dwight tells you that he will keep prices steady for a year, i think he is speaking out of turn.

Name: mr. schofield
Line: really?

Name: michael
Line: yes. he does not have the authority to say that. i, on the other hand, am the president, the owner, and the founder. it is like you are buying software from bill gates.

Name: dwight
Line: are you saying you invented paper?

Name: andy
Line: [hugging a crying jim] okay, okay.

Name: jim
Line: oh, god.

Name: andy
Line: okay, tuna.

Name: kelly
Line: hey, guys.

Name: jim
Line: hey.

Name: andy
Line: hello.

Name: andy
Line: excuse me, can i have your attention, everyone? here's the deal, everybody, jim halpert is very upset and disturbed. i don't know if it was something you did, something you said, a look you gave him, maybe it was nothing at all, but here's the deal, ok? it stops now.

Name: kevin
Line: i guess i could be nicer.

Name: phyllis
Line: andy, i think jim is messing with you.

Name: andy
Line: oh, really?

Name: phyllis
Line: mm-hmm. [looks over to jim smiling through windows to the kitchen]

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, okay, what the heck is happennin' here?

Name: jim
Line: two things i need you to understand. one, pam and i are very happy together.

Name: andy
Line: uh, that's not what was-

Name: jim
Line: and two, that stuff that happened with you and angela is a bummer, and i know you don't think you're ever gonna find someone else, but you will. i promise you, you will.

Name: andy
Line: oh man, he got me so good. i learned something about myself today. yeah. i wish this was a sofa, cause i feel like i could sit here and talk for hours.

Name: michael
Line: what is that thing that dwight always says? paper is the soil in which the seeds of business grow?

Name: dwight
Line: it's not the soil! it's the manure! paper is the manure! on-time delivery is the soil! aah! [runs into office]

Name: secretary
Line: uh, hello, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: spin move.

Name: secretary
Line: oh-

Name: dwight
Line: ha ha! april 13th, 2002.

Name: mr. schofield
Line: dwight, i'm in a meeting.

Name: michael
Line: that's very rude.

Name: dwight
Line: i barge because i care. april 13th, 2002, that is the date when you tried to switch paper providers for an obscure sociology textbook, but were hung out to dry when the price of glossy stock increased.

Name: mr. schofield
Line: maybe we should schedule a meeting on our-

Name: dwight
Line: la la la! continuing.  notice my persistence and recall. continuing! you called dunder mifflin, and your order was filled within an hour!

Name: michael
Line: i'm going to pull a date out of the air right now. april 13th, 2002. that is the last day that you evaluated your paper needs. is it not? we all know that the economy is bad, and bloated companies like dunder mifflin...

Name: dwight
Line: come on.

Name: michael
Line: are going to fall by the wayside. two of their branches have closed within the last year. the michael scott paper company, however, has opened a new branch this very month.

Name: dwight
Line: what he's not telling you is that he will abandon you.

Name: mr. schofield
Line: why don't you guys just e-mail me your best offers and we can finish it up that way?

Name: michael
Line: that sounds like a fantastic idea. i will see you this weekend for the penguins. box seats as usual.

Name: mr. schofield
Line: uh, ok, sure.

Name: michael
Line: good, good, good. i will see you.

Name: dwight
Line: thank you, mr. schofield, for your time. much appreciated. oh, and tell me, um, how's your gay son?

Name: mr. schofield
Line: excuse me?

Name: michael
Line: i color code all my info. i wrote "gay son" in green. green means go, so i know to go ahead and shut up about it. orange means "orange you glad you didn't bring it up?" most colors mean "don't say it."

Name: dwight
Line: how is tom, the homosexual sophomore?

Name: michael

Name: michael
Line: well, i guess the first order of business is to welcome back me, and pam and ryan.  [scattered applause] and how about casual friday again, huh?  reinstituting casual friday?  you all look great.  what i want to do right now is try something a little different.  i'm going to throw it out there, starting with this meeting.  i want you guys to run it.  i want you to say whatever you want,  take it away.  your meeting.

Name: dwight
Line: [after a few moments of silence]  wh--what are you doing?

Name: michael
Line: if there is something that you would like to say as a group, then by all means, you may say it to me right now.

Name: angela
Line: okay.

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: angela
Line: people are dressed inappropriately.

Name: michael
Line: take it up with toby.  what i want you to do, is i want you to look inward.  and i want you to reflect.  and i want you to say something different.

Name: jim
Line: can you give us a hint?

Name: michael
Line: when i needed salespeople for my new paper company,  everyone here turned their back on me.  am i going to ask them to beg for forgiveness?  no. am i going to ask for big, crying apology? no.  am i going to ask them to slit their wrists for me? no.  i just want a tiny, microscopic version of that.

Name: michael
Line: oscar, what were you going to say?

Name: oscar
Line: nothing.  i didn't say anything.

Name: michael
Line: all right.

Name: erin
Line: do i still have a job here?

Name: michael
Line: not important. [everyone mutters] okay, alright.  yes. yes, you have a job.  frankly, you have a job because ryan and pam are starting with us as salesmen.

Name: dwight
Line: wait, what?

Name: stanley
Line: how is that going to work?

Name: michael
Line: it's going to work very smoothly, because pam and ryan are bringing over a ton of clients from michael scott paper company and--

Name: phyllis
Line: you mean the clients you stole from us.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah , aren't we getting those clients back?

Name: michael
Line: no, you lost those clients.

Name: andy
Line: i call foul, sir.

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: dwight
Line: you were bought out.  so the company then bought out all of the stolen clients.

Name: michael
Line: okay, dwight.  let me explain something to you.  i set the rules and you follow them.  blindly. okay?   and if you have a problem with that then you can talk to our complaint department.  it's a trash can.

Name: meredith
Line: [to ryan] don't fall in love with me, kid.

Name: pam
Line: [laughs]  boscov's at the steamtown mall?

Name: phyllis
Line: it sure looked good on the mannequin.

Name: pam
Line: well, you have good taste.

Name: phyllis
Line: well, thanks.  i sure wish i had more time to talk to my clients, though.

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: phyllis
Line: isn't that what you said to a bunch of my clients when you were stealing them?  that i didn't have enough time for them?

Name: pam
Line: oh, i, um...

Name: phyllis
Line: close your mouth, sweetie.  you look like a trout.

Name: angela
Line: the man is wearing sandals.  i don't need to see oscar's toes at work.  gross!  i mean he looks like he just got off the boat.

Name: toby
Line: can't you just not look at his feet?

Name: angela
Line: excuse me? oh. you're so educated, aren't you toby?  so trained to deal with a hysterical woman.  i don't want to look at his feet.  [storms off] do your job!

Name: toby
Line: well, i was in the seminary for a year and dropped out 'cause i wanted to have sex with this girl, cathy.  followed her to scranton.  took the first job i could find in h.r.  later she divorced me.  so no, i wouldn't say i have a passion for h.r.

Name: michael
Line: [hands ryan a soda] there you are, my friend.

Name: ryan
Line: oh, thanks, man.

Name: michael
Line: pamela.

Name: pam
Line: thank, michael.

Name: michael
Line: yep.

Name: dwight
Line: fresh hot ink.

Name: stanley
Line: "new file system".

Name: dwight
Line: trust me, stanley,  you're going to want to read this memo very carefully.

Name: stanley
Line: i am not changing the way i do my files.

Name: dwight
Line: no, no.  this goes for all of you.  believe me, you are going to want to heat my words.

Name: dwight
Line: when held over heat the invisible ink will reveal that everyone should meet at the warehouse immediately.  do not ask me where i got the invisible ink.  urine.  it was urine.

Line: i'm sorry you're offended by my shoes, but i am not going to drive home to change.

Name: toby
Line: i could loan you a pair of socks.

Name: oscar
Line: no.

Name: oscar
Line: i don't think so.

Name: andy
Line: andrew bernard.

Name: dwight
Line: okay, what are you still doing at your desk?

Name: andy
Line: what are you still doing not at your desk?

Name: dwight
Line: did you even read the memo?

Name: andy
Line: all my files are now in reverse alphabetical order--

Name: dwight
Line: no, you idiot.  there is a code embedded in the memo.  listen, you need to round up all the salesmen, except for ryan and pam, and get them down to the warehouse pronto.

Name: andy
Line: oh, it is on like a prawn who yawns at dawn.

Name: dwight
Line: stop doing rhyming poetry.  just tell them, please.  god, the simplest thing.

Name: dwight
Line: we're in crisis mode here, do you understand?  the two unqualified so-called salespeople are being favored because they all failed together.  and frankly, i'm not convinced that michael and pam didn't have a thing going while they were gone.

Line: can i address that?

Line: no, you're too close.

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Line: it's not right.  i don't like it.

Name: dwight
Line: he doesn't like it.

Name: phyllis
Line: you don't take my clients away and give them to a secretary.  [sighs] no offense, jim.  i think she's very pretty.

Name: dwight
Line: her face is okay, but-- jesus!  what --what are you doing here?

Name: meredith
Line: i don't know.  i saw a crowd.  i thought there might be a dogfight or something--

Name: dwight
Line: get out!  we need to do something.  i'm thinking maybe a coup or we take ryan hostage.

Name: phyllis
Line: those sound too harsh.

Name: dwight
Line: no, i'm not saying we do those things.  i'm saying something like those things.

Line: of course.  what is like a hostage?

Name: dwight
Line: excellent question.

Name: andy
Line: we could write a strong-worded letter.

Name: dwight
Line: words will never be enough.

Name: jim
Line: strongly-painted picture.

Name: dwight
Line: no, pictures are too interpretive.

Name: jim
Line: can i just say something?  i know that tempers are high, but i think the best way to handle this might be to just talk to michael directly.

Name: dwight
Line: oh.  well, that--that's a great idea, jim.  oh, i totally see your point.  okay, we'll talk to michael directly.  so uh,  meeting is over, i guess.  i'll see everyone upstairs.

Name: jim
Line: great.  see you upstairs.

Name: dwight
Line: c'mon. [whispers]  guys. psst, listen.  now is the time for action.  i'm talking action--

Name: pam
Line: that one's great.

Name: michael
Line: i know.

Name: ryan
Line: you look so classy in that picture.

Name: michael
Line: i do?  well--where is that bowl?

Line: hey, you have a second?

Name: michael
Line: michael scott paper company only.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, i think you're going to want to cool it with that 'cause it's starting to upset the other salesmen.

Name: michael
Line: okay, well---

Name: ryan
Line: tough.

Name: michael
Line: i will--no, no.  i'll talk to them when they all get back from the bathroom.

Name: jim
Line: this is awkward to talk about, but there may or may not be--but definitely is--a mutiny  forming in the warehouse right now.

Name: michael
Line: against who?

Name: ryan
Line: you.  us.

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: ryan
Line: it's gotta be because they all want their clients.

Name: michael
Line: the old michael scott might have taken this, but not the new michael scott.  they are in for a bitter surprise.  i am not to be truffled with.

Name: michael
Line: six weeks ago, none of these people wanted to come with me.  you two were the only ones with the stones to follow.

Name: pam
Line: mm-hmmm.

Name: michael
Line: that was  us, right there.

Name: pam
Line: we were something else.

Name: ryan
Line: what you gotta do is you gotta go down to that warehouse and you gotta crack some skulls.

Name: michael
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: ryan
Line: chiklis style.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, the commish.

Name: ryan
Line: yes, but chiklis shield style.  not commish style.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, yeah. the shield.

Line: it's crazy what's going on out there today, huh?

Name: jim
Line: i know.  yeah, it's...kinda--

Name: creed
Line: sometimes it's best just to say out of it.

Name: jim
Line: that's true.  that's right.  yeah.

Line: want to play a game?

Line: hey gang. where you been?

Name: dwight
Line: lunch.

Name: michael
Line: where'd you eat?

Name: phyllis
Line: a restaurant.

Name: michael
Line: what'd you have, stanley?

Name: andy

Name: stanley
Line: i had mexican food.

Name: michael
Line: so since you guys already ate, you won't be eating the stuff you brought with you for lunch, will you?  [walks into kitchen] oh, wow, stanley.  is that egg salad?  andy brought some salmon.

Name: ryan
Line: that looks great.

Name: michael
Line: dwight, is that a meat sandwich?  you guys hungry?

Name: dwight
Line: whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.  give me the phone.  give me the phone.

Line: exactly.

Name: ryan

Line: ryan, hand the phone over.

Name: ryan
Line: stop flustering me, everybody!

Name: stanley

Name: dwight
Line: ah! mr. bart!  ugh! [slams phone down[ i cannot believe you lost that account.  he was my client for ten years!

Line: okay.

Line: hey, hey guys.  you know what i want you to do?  shake hands, get over it.  that was not a shake, dwight.

Name: michael
Line: i love it.  i love this idea, and i fully support you.  as a matter of fact, i'm going to give you some seed money.  [throws money at phyllis] there you go.  there's some seed money for you.  and you can take it, no hard feelings.  but if you stay, i want an apology,  and i want a big one.

Name: michael

Name: stanley

Line: well, that's--

Line: i like his hair.

Name: jim

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: jim
Line: he definitely stole my ipod.

Name: michael
Line: that sounds pretty biased.

Name: jim

Name: michael
Line: okay. pam, pros.

Line: mm-hmm.

Name: michael
Line: i like her.  i think that she is a fast learner.  cons, she doesn't always follow through.  sh--new york and the whole art school thing.  and roy.  she has a weird voice.

Line: that's not true.

Name: michael
Line: i don't need to tell you that.

Name: jim

Line: i don't think you are being totally impartial though, because you haven't said one bad thing about pam.

Line: okay.  so be it, then you've lost credibility.  and i'm going to go with my guy, and that's ryan.

Name: michael
Line: oh, wow!  whoa!

Name: jim
Line: take it easy.

Name: michael
Line: ho-ho, man!  wow. [in a high-pitched voice] honey!  i want you to bring the garbage out.  'cause i'm not going to have sex with you unless you bring out the garba--

Name: michael

Line: you don't understand clothing, toby.  you're dressed like this amorphous blob of khaki.

Name: toby
Line: all right, look, what you gotta understand is that when you come to work, you give up certain rights.

Name: dwight

Line: no.

Line: ooh, where has this guy been?

Name: andy
Line: you're running from the problem.

Line: pam, can you come in here, please?  have a seat.  [clears throat] well, there's no easy way of saying this.  so i think i will just...drag it out.  since the dawn of time there has been--

Line: yep.

Line: no, you--no.

Line: i did?

Name: michael
Line: no, you're the best person for the job.  you're going to be great.

Name: pam
Line: oh, michael, thank you.  thank you.

Name: michael
Line: [laughing] oh, oh!

Name: pam
Line: thank you.  you will not be sorry.

Name: michael
Line: you should have seen your face.  oh man! oh, that was classic.

Name: pam
Line: oh. [laughing] i really thought i didn't get it.

Name: michael
Line: oh, really?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.  'cause you said i didn't

Name: michael
Line: oh, man.  that was really good.  that was really good.

Line: oh! what's our receptionists name?

Line: oh, i can go.

Name: erin
Line: oh!

Name: michael
Line: oh, your face!  oh!

Name: erin
Line: is--do the people--

Line: oh!

Name: erin
Line: okay.

Line: oh my god! i can't believe it! i jut won an art contest! [erin screams, pam and jim look at each other, dwight, laughing, gets up and hands her some money]

Name: michael
Line: [caught by camera crew dancing to "at the car wash", but laughing] oh, no. i still have the lease on the michael scott paper company, so occasionally i will sneak down here for a little coffee and dancing. i actually dance all the time. tip-toeing around corporate - it is a ballet. when i am breaking all the rules, i am break dancing. and expresso.

Name: michael
Line: guys, i'm scared. i'm really scared. i think i'm growing into a giant. because look at this normal sized coffee cup. looks so tiny in my giant hand now. anybody want to go to lunch with me later on?

Line: hey michael.

Name: michael
Line: hey. [hugs aj a little too forcefully] arrggh. so would you guys like some lemonade? or one of you? or both of you? either or. the combinations are endless.

Name: holly
Line: lemonade sounds great.

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: aj
Line: i'd love an iced tea, actually.

Name: michael
Line: you can go to hell. [laughs] i'm kidding. um, sure, i will get you the best iced tea in the world.

Name: michael
Line: i lied to kevin. holly and i can never be just friends. i wrote down a list of bullet points why holly and i should be together, and i'm going to find the perfect moment today and i am going to tell her. number one: "holly, you and i are soup snakes." the-and the reason is... because... in terms of the soup, we like to- that doesn't make any sense. we're soul mates. holly and i are soul mates.

Name: charles
Line: jim. pam.

Name: jim
Line: hey, how are you?

Name: pam
Line: hey charles.

Name: charles
Line: nice day, huh?

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: charles
Line: must be nice to get a rest from all your rest. [walks away]

Name: jim
Line: i don't get it. he's not even my boss anymore.

Name: pam
Line: do you want me to beat him up for you?

Name: jim
Line: no, i shouldn't have to ask you to do stuff like that. you should just do it.

Name: dwight
Line: listen up everyone! i've gone over this lineup very carefully. we cannot forget the humiliation we suffered last year at the softball game with jim's whole spider-in-the-mitt incident. right?

Name: jim
Line: well, i could've died, so... i looked it up online afterwards.

Name: dwight
Line: erin, back row. ryan, you move up a row!

Name: andy
Line: bro-migo, you think you could put erin on my row?

Name: dwight
Line: why? i don't understand.

Name: andy
Line: if-

Name: dwight
Line: woah, woah, woah. w-w-wait a minute. i get it. you want her to set you up so you can spike it.

Name: andy
Line: uh... [laughs sheepishly]

Name: dwight
Line: i'll tell you what, i'm gonna do you one better. i'm gonna put you next to phyllis. she is the best setter on the team.

Name: andy
Line: that's...

Name: dwight
Line: sly dog.

Name: andy
Line: ... not what i meant.

Name: dwight
Line: come on, folks!

Name: michael
Line: what is up with you two, holly?

Name: holly
Line: um, not much.

Name: aj
Line: we're designing a house.

Name: michael
Line: cool. for who?

Name: aj
Line: for us.

Name: michael
Line: wow... i'm designing a chair. it's part of your pants. you sit down, you're supported.

Name: holly
Line: i remember your chair pants idea. [laughs]

Name: aj
Line: i like that. put me down for a pair. i'm a size 34 waist.

Name: michael
Line: all right, fatty. i will do it. you know what, we should actually rehearse.

Name: holly
Line: okay, yeah.

Name: aj
Line: you guys are really gonna do this?

Name: michael
Line: you bet your fat ass we are.

Name: michael
Line: well, in his infinite wisdom, david wallace has authorized us to put on a little presentation about the history of dunder mifflin.

Name: holly
Line: yep, the old comedy team is back together again.

Name: michael
Line: that's right.

Name: holly
Line: [in a new york accent] have ya hoyd the news? extry! extry! read all about it!

Name: michael
Line: newspapers for sale!

Name: andy
Line: [playing volleyball, yelling at erin, who hit the ball out of bounds] are you blind?! are you blind?! [turns attention to a man on the other team] sir, with the glasses, are you literally blind? i'm concerned you might be in danger.

Name: man
Line: these are expensive ray-bans, jackass.

Name: andy
Line: okay, i was just looking out for you. [to erin] you're doing great, by the way.

Name: erin
Line: thanks.

Name: kevin
Line: [playing volleyball] i got it. [kevin misses]

Name: dwight
Line: ohh! oh, kevin! come on!

Name: andy
Line: are you blind?!

Name: dwight
Line: i could've gotten that, idiot!

Name: andy
Line: can you see things with your eyeballs?!

Name: dwight
Line: it's not a sledgehammer! come on, people! we need to get our heads in the game! let's focus! come on, you're better than this! i am better than this! phyllis, why are you sitting on the ground?!

Name: phyllis
Line: we've been out here for a while. i don't need this.

Name: dwight
Line: [grunts in frustration]

Name: dwight
Line: [playing volleyball, ryan hits the ball away, not paying attention to the game] oh come- ryan, come on, man! w-w-wait. net. net. her hand's on the net.

Name: woman
Line: so what?

Name: dwight
Line: rule violation. ball is ours. give it to me. our point. okay. hey, pam, how ya doin? hey, do you know if you're right-handed or left-handed? or do you even know? what hand do you use to answer the phone?

Name: pam
Line: back off, dwight. [serves] hyuh! [the opposing team misses the ball, the scranton team cheers] what?

Name: pam
Line: maybe i played a little in junior high... and in high school... maybe a little in college... and went to volleyball camp most summers.

Name: pam
Line: [serves] hyuh! [other team misses and scranton cheers] well, look at that, we win!

Name: jim
Line: nice job, beesly.

Name: dwight
Line: yes! we advance to the next round!

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, lord in heaven.

Name: stanley
Line: [to phyllis] had to be part of the group. [laughs]

Name: michael
Line: i brought some snacky snacks, in case we get hungry.

Name: holly
Line: ooh, yes please. [takes a bite] mmm. so what do you have planned for us today? hmm?

Name: michael
Line: [watching her eat] what?

Name: holly
Line: do you have a script for the sketch, or...

Name: michael
Line: um, no, i just thought we'd wing it. that cool?

Name: holly
Line: crystal cool.

Name: dwight
Line: [playing volleyball] hit it andy!

Name: andy
Line: bump! i bumped it!

Name: kevin
Line: set!

Name: dwight
Line: don't set it to yourself!

Name: kevin
Line: [pam saves the play and scranton cheers] yeah!

Name: phyllis
Line: ow, my ankle!

Name: dwight
Line: what happened?

Name: phyllis
Line: i... twisted it.

Name: dwight
Line: you weren't even moving. [phyllis leaves the court] okay, sub!

Name: angela
Line: i can play.

Name: rolph
Line: is there a... meredith here?

Name: meredith
Line: yeah! man in!

Name: angela
Line: rolph, did you not hear me?

Name: rolph
Line: i don't hear cheaters, tramps, or women who break my friend's heart. let's go!

Name: michael
Line: we could do a movie... sort of thing.

Name: holly
Line: [gasps] we could do back to the future.

Name: michael
Line: oh!

Name: holly
Line: we have to convince dunder and mifflin to go back in time... fix their parents. [both laugh]

Name: michael
Line: could we get a delorean?

Name: holly
Line: jaws. they swim in the ocean and they terrorize the whole community.

Name: michael
Line: oh! [to the theme of "jaws"] dun-der. dun-der...

Name: holly
Line: dun-der. dun-der...

Name: michael
Line: dun-der. dun-der. dun-der. dun-der. blooo!! [both laugh]

Name: holly
Line: oh... we haven't found our great idea yet.

Name: michael
Line: no. no.

Name: holly
Line: oh.

Name: michael
Line: we're circling it.

Name: holly
Line: hmm...

Name: david
Line: [playing volleyball, scranton wins another game] nicely done. we're still going to crush you though!

Name: charles
Line: yes we are!

Name: rolph
Line: you suckers are goin down! they're gonna wipe their asses with your serves! piss all over your faces!

Name: dwight
Line: okay, rolph! woah. wait, wait- [shouts of disapproval]

Name: rolph
Line: it's true!

Name: toby
Line: ah, this reminds me of the hr convention last fall.

Name: kendall
Line: oh yeah, with bernie and efrem. that was hilarious.

Name: toby
Line: really, really funny.

Name: kendall
Line: really funny.

Name: dwight
Line: listen guys, one more point and we play corporate. [they get the last point, jim and dwight hug]

Name: oscar
Line: settle down gentlemen.

Name: pam
Line: good game!

Name: david
Line: welcome to the 43rd annual company picnic, everybody. thanks for being here. now, a couple of employees have volunteered to entertain us with a song.

Name: michael
Line: [shouts from behind the trees] uh, it's a sketch now.

Name: david
Line: okay, introducing scranton's michael scott performing with nashua's holly flax! i have not seen this. [applause]

Name: michael
Line: and now, presenting...

Name: both
Line: slumdunder mifflinaire! [laughter]

Name: michael
Line: [imitates who wants to be a millionaire theme music as both sit in folding chairs]

Name: holly
Line: are you ready to play slumdunder mifflinaire?

Name: michael
Line: yes, i am.

Name: holly
Line: for one hundred dollars, where did dunder meet mifflin? a.) on easy street, b.) a tour of dartmouth college, c.) they never met, d.) brushing their teeth?

Name: michael
Line: ohh, i'm thinking... i'm going to say... b, tour of dartmouth college.

Name: holly
Line: that is correct! [both run to another side of the stage, acting out a different scene] how did you know that?! [pantomimes electrocuting michael]

Name: michael
Line: [screams] ahhhh!! ohhh!! ahhh!! i was there! ahhh!! i was a tour guide at dartmouth college!! noooo!!!

Name: holly
Line: [now pretending to be dunder and mifflin] nice campus. think you'll get in?

Name: michael
Line: yeah, i'm definitely getting in. i'm a shoo-in.

Name: holly
Line: i'm robert dunder.

Name: michael
Line: i'm robert mifflin. [pause to see audience's response] ah, okay. [both run back to chairs]

Name: holly
Line: robert mifflin had a great life. but unfortunately, had undiagnosed depression, which over nine million americans suffer from and is very treatable. for two hundred and fifty dollars, how did he kill himself? a.) a rope, b.) a knife, c.) a gun, d.) brushing his teeth!

Name: michael
Line: two hundred and fifty dollars is more money than i've ever seen in my life. i will say, c, a gun. he shot himself in the head.

Name: holly
Line: that is correct!

Name: michael
Line: yes!

Name: stanley
Line: i usually don't enjoy the theater, but this is delightful.

Name: holly
Line: the economic downturn has been difficult recently, forcing the closures of both camden and yonkers, to be followed soon by what other branch? for five-hundred thousand dollars, is it a.) scranton, b.) buffalo, c.) utica, or d.) toothbrush!

Name: michael
Line: i will say b, buffalo! final answer!

Name: holly
Line: that is correct!

Name: man from buffalo
Line: [over crowd of murmurs] what is he talking about?

Name: holly
Line: [pantomimes biting off michael's fingers, michael screams] how did you know that?!

Name: michael
Line: david wallace told me!!

Name: woman from buffalo
Line: david, is this true?

Name: david
Line: uh, okay everyone, we're at a picnic today...

Name: man from buffalo
Line: are we losing our jobs or not, david?

Name: holly
Line: they didn't know?

Name: michael
Line: [whispers] i guess not.

Name: david
Line: i'm sorry, this certainly wasn't the time or the place to announce this sort of thing, but there have been talks about closing the buffalo branch.

Name: woman from buffalo
Line: and?

Name: david
Line: we're- we're closing the buffalo branch.

Name: man from buffalo
Line: [over shouts of protest] you've got to be kidding me! you've got to be kidding me! we're the best branch in the company! i can't believe it. [michael and holly bow]

Name: david
Line: how could you possibly think that the right way to announce a branch closing was in a comedy sketch at the company picnic?

Name: michael
Line: well... i didn't know they didn't know.

Name: david
Line: what about the fact that they're here today? what about that? that didn't throw up any alarms? no, michael needed a little bit for his comedy sketch, and he thought, "oh, this would be really funny."

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: david
Line: damn it, michael, i told you that in confidence. now i have to go over and deal with these employees and their families. a little boy just walked up to me and said, "is my daddy gonna have a job by christmas?"

Name: michael
Line: well, he's just thinking about his own gifts.

Name: meredith
Line: maybe we shouldn't play due to the circumstances.

Name: dwight
Line: hey, people need volleyball now more than ever.

Name: pam
Line: how do you figure?

Name: dwight
Line: because if we don't play, then the other team wins.

Name: oscar
Line: dwight's right. corporate deserves to get its ass kicked.

Name: pam
Line: let's do this.

Name: andy
Line: [playing volleyball] jim, come on! [jim scores a point, scranton cheers]

Name: charles
Line: look who just woke up! [laughs, scores a point on the next play] i've been up for a while.

Name: kevin
Line: it's six to six. it's a nail-biter. [ball hits kevin]

Name: angela
Line: kevin! now it's seven-six, or is that too much accounting for you?

Name: rolph
Line: here's an accounting question for you: what does one fiance plus one lover equal? answer: one whore.

Name: dwight
Line: okay, knock it off, rolph.

Name: rolph
Line: what? she is sitting there, casting aspersions-

Name: dwight
Line: rolph, please. i am asking nicely-

Name: rolph
Line: no way! you don't mean that!

Name: dwight
Line: rolph, leave it alone!

Name: erin
Line: [hits the ball over the net and scores a point] yeah! boo-yah!

Name: pam
Line: [running for the ball] i got it!

Name: dwight
Line: pam!

Name: pam
Line: [falls] oof!

Name: jim
Line: you all right?

Name: pam
Line: yep. no, no, no, i'm fine.

Name: jim
Line: you sure?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: hey, easy, easy...

Name: charles
Line: woah, woah, woah, woah, you wanna get that looked at.

Name: pam
Line: no, no, it's fine. just gimme a second.

Name: charles
Line: i don't know. you know, this is a company picnic, so technically that is a company injury, you know? safest thing to do is get that examined, right david?

Name: david
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: all right, you know what? you're just trying to get rid of our best player.

Name: charles
Line: oh, jim, you're putting a volleyball game in front of your fiance's health.

Name: jim
Line: no, uh-

Name: pam
Line: look, seriously, i can move it fine. come on, let's go, it's our ball. let's go!

Name: charles
Line: yeah, i don't think we can let you play with that foot.

Name: dwight
Line: [whispering] tell you what. i spotted a small hospital a few kilometers south of here. get her back as soon as possible. i'll stall 'em.

Name: charles
Line: i guess that's it for you, jim.

Name: jim
Line: all right, you know what? [picks pam up and carries her off the court] let's do this.

Name: pam
Line: we'll be back!

Name: dwight
Line: oh man, i am so mad that pam got hurt! argh!! rrrraah!!! [kicks volleyball into the woods, calmly] i'll get it. [walks slowly toward the woods]

Name: michael
Line: probably shouldn't have mentioned buffalo.

Name: holly
Line: hindsight.

Name: michael
Line: should've had hindsight.

Name: holly
Line: how do you think it went before the buffalo thing?

Name: michael
Line: i think it went well. i think it was good.

Name: holly
Line: there weren't any laughs.

Name: michael
Line: no, it was a tough audience.

Name: holly
Line: yeah, but we wrote it specifically for this audience.

Name: michael
Line: believe me, i have seen a lot of tough audiences in my time, and that was one of them.

Name: holly
Line: well, i'm glad we did it.

Name: michael
Line: me too. [long pause] we have a lot of good material for next year's sketch.

Name: holly
Line: i can't wait.

Name: jim
Line: [on the phone] yeah, she's with the nurse right now, so you'll have to stall a little longer... no, don't send in the subs yet... dwight, i don't know. think of something!

Name: nurse
Line: to be safe, we should do an x-ray.

Name: pam
Line: how long will that take?

Name: nurse
Line: oh, shouldn't be too bad, it's a slow day. so, no other radiation this year, no metal plates, no chance you're pregnant...

Name: pam
Line: i'm sorry, can we just hurry this up? i've got a game to get back to.

Name: nurse
Line: oh good, because my next question was "do you have a game to get back to."

Name: holly
Line: what'd you think?

Name: aj
Line: i loved it. you know, there was a part near the end that seemed like that went on a little long, but...

Name: michael
Line: well you guys should hit the road before... i close down another branch.

Name: holly
Line: [laughs] okay. so good to see you.

Name: michael
Line: good to see you. [they hug] aj.

Name: aj
Line: michael. [they shake hands]

Name: michael
Line: i didn't find a perfect moment, because i think that today was just about just having today. and i think that we are one of those couples with a long story, when people ask how they found each other. i will see her every now and then, and... maybe one year she'll be with somebody, and the next year, i'll be with somebody, and it's gonna take a long time... and then it's perfect. i'm in no rush.

Name: david
Line: dwight, come on now, it's time to put in the subs.

Name: charles
Line: yeah, it looks like pam won't make it back. okay?

Name: dwight
Line: okay. fine.

Name: charles
Line: all right! come on.

Name: dwight
Line: except, you know what? it's not fine. how many people need to get hurt before we learn a valuable lesson? one? two? three? four?

Name: andy
Line: dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: no, no, hear me out. five? six?

Name: david
Line: dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: seven? can i finish please?

Name: david
Line: okay.

Name: dwight
Line: eight?

Name: jim
Line: [on the phone] oh, dwight, we're so close! just buy us a few more minutes... well, they just called me in for an update, so i'll call you right back... okay... okay, great. [goes into a private room where pam and the doctor are, the voices are inaudible, but the camera can see through a window, pam and jim look in shock, they hug and jim goes back out into the hall to call dwight back, trembling] hey, dwight, uh... send in the subs! [laughs] ohh! [goes back into the room to hug pam]

Name: michael
Line: [enters office, somersaults onto couch, kicks over painting and lamp] parkour!

Name: dwight & andy
Line: [rush into office, andy climbs on reception desk, dwight holds video camera]

Name: andy
Line: parkour!

Name: dwight
Line: [walking on pam's desk, then jim's desk] extreme! parkour!

Name: jim
Line: this... is parkour. [turns laptop to camera, shows parkour instructional video] internet sensation of 2004. and it was in one of the bond films. it's pretty impressive. [michael is shown climbing/walking on various objects in office] the goal is to get from point a to point b as creatively as possible, so technically they are doing parkour, as long as point a is delusion and point b is the hospital.

Name: dwight
Line: [stands on his hands kicking open bathroom doors as andy films, meredith is seen applying deodorant in women's bathroom]

Name: dwight & andy
Line: [approaching elevator, as michael films] parkour! parkour!

Name: dwight
Line: andy! leapfrog! [andy leapfrogs dwight]

Name: andy
Line: do me! do me!

Name: dwight
Line: yeah! [dwight jumps on andy's back, riding him like a horse] parkour! parkour!

Name: andy
Line: ow! get off! get off!

Name: dwight
Line: okay.

Name: andy & michael
Line: [walking across cars in parking lot, dwight filming] parkour! parkour!

Name: dwight
Line: [crouching beside car] jump over the camera! jump over the camera! [michael feebly attempts to jump off car, gives double thumbs up to camera]

Name: michael
Line: [standing on tractor trailer with dwight and andy, looking down] okay, we all go together or we go one at a time.

Name: andy
Line: here it is, here it is... truck, to refrigerators, to dumpster, [camera pans to refrigerator boxes, then dumpster] 360 onto the pallets, backflip gainer to the trash can.

Name: michael & dwight
Line: [in unison] yeah! gainer! woohoo!

Name: andy
Line: [to michael's camera] hardcore parkour!

Name: michael
Line: parkoooooour!

Name: dwight
Line: let's do it!

Name: andy
Line: [leaps from trailer, disappears into empty refrigerator box]

Name: michael & dwight
Line: [look down, appearing shocked and concerned]

Name: andy
Line: [inside refrigerator box, sounding injured] parkour!

Name: dwight
Line: [on telephone] good. excellent. thank you.

Name: female intern
Line: [hands dwight a cup of water] there you go. is there anything else i can do?

Name: dwight
Line: [chugs water, throws away cup] yes. umm... see those files behind kevin's desk?

Name: female intern
Line: [nods] mm hmm.

Name: dwight
Line: go put them all in random order.

Name: female intern
Line: [confused] mm-kay.

Name: dwight
Line: then come back here for your next assignment concerning their order.

Name: pam
Line: this is the last day of our summer interns. it's been nice. we haven't had interns for a while, ever since michael's monica lewinsky incident. [interns are shown gathered around kelly's desk, one holding a box of tissues, as kelly cries and wipes tears] he didn't do anything sexual. [female intern opens a jar of salsa for michael] he just made far, far too many monica lewinsky jokes. [meredith rubs her breasts into maurie's back] it was just easier for corporate to shut down the program.

Name: meredith
Line: [to oscar, motioning to male intern and female intern] think she did him?

Name: oscar
Line: i bet there's something there. i was with them in the kitchen yesterday, and they were all too happy to be cleaning the freezer.

Name: kelly
Line: if they get married before i do, i'm going to kill myself.

Name: michael
Line: [entering break room] who's getting married?

Name: pam
Line: nobody.

Name: michael
Line: if somebody doesn't tell me, i'm gonna start screaming.

Name: kelly
Line: it's eric and megan.

Name: michael
Line: oh! hey, i hired them! matchmaker! this place is like spaniard fly.

Name: phyllis
Line: they're not getting married. it's just talk.

Name: michael
Line: did everybody know about this but me?

Name: phyllis
Line: there's nothing to know, it's just gossip.

Name: michael
Line: [shaking head disgustedly] okay... okay. [leaves room]

Name: pam
Line: [talking head with jim] we haven't told anyone i'm pregnant.

Name: jim
Line: well, with her being unmarried... knocked up by some guy, i mean the yakity-yaks in this office would have a field day.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, we don't want them at the wedding thinking jim's being marched down the aisle by my dad with a shotgum.

Name: jim
Line: wait, there's not gonna be a shotgun?

Name: pam
Line: nope.

Name: jim
Line: no shotgun... 'cause that changes everything.

Name: pam
Line: can't back out now, halpert.

Name: jim
Line: what are you gonna do about it? there's no shotgun, so... free at last, free at last!

Name: pam
Line: no, keep it up.

Name: michael
Line: [approaches dwight's desk] you'll never guess what i know.

Name: dwight
Line: [typing] okay, let me finish this thought.

Name: michael
Line: eric likes megan.

Name: dwight
Line: [still typing] he most definitely does. he's been asking her out repeatedly for weeks. she finally said yes. they went out on a group date the other night; apparently it went very well.

Name: michael
Line: [annoyed] how do you know this?

Name: dwight
Line: [still typing] people tell me things. i guess i have a face you can trust. i think it's because of my low cheekbones. and... boom. [finishes typing, turns to face michael] okay, what is it, what can't i guess?

Name: michael
Line: i hate, hate, hate being left out. whether it's not being picked for a team, or being picked for a team and showing up and realizing the team doesn't exist. or that the sport doesn't exist? i should've known. poopball?

Name: michael
Line: [to maurie, the asian intern] man, i know how you feel. third wheel. i have been the third wheel so many times in my life. my mom told me something once that made me feel a lot better. she said "the third wheel is what makes it a tricycle."

Name: maurie
Line: what are you talking about?

Name: michael
Line: i'm talking about your group date with megan and eric.

Name: maurie
Line: at tink's?

Name: michael
Line: yes

Name: maurie
Line: how'd you know about that?

Name: michael
Line: well...

Name: maurie
Line: did stanley tell you?

Name: michael
Line: [confused] stanley was on your group date?

Name: maurie
Line: no, stanley was with his wife. i waved at him, but he didn't wave back.

Name: michael
Line: [laughs] does anybody else know about this?

Name: maurie
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: [laughs, looks to camera excitedly]

Name: michael
Line: there he goes. there he goes. [stanley gets up from his desk, walks into kitchen area]

Name: michael
Line: so, what is the scuttlebutt? anybody hear anything?

Name: dwight, jim & pam
Line: [stare blankly at michael]

Name: michael

Name: michael

Name: michael
Line: i am very happy right now. thrilled perhaps, to be part of the office, to be part of the conversation. when you have somebody's attenton, and their eyes are lighting up because they are very interested in what you have to say, [michael is seen whispering to jim, then pam] that is a great feeling, and i experienced that firsthand today. it is wonderful to be the center of attention.

Line: t! yes! yes! that is a "t", and there's another one right there. just sound that out. you're almost there.

Name: michael
Line: [in parking lot, blocking path of stanley's car] stop. hold up, hold up, hold up! no, no, no. time to stop being polite and get real. [stanley honks horn repeatedly] stanley, are you having an affair?

Name: michael
Line: how do you un-tell something? you can't. you can't put words back in your mouth. what you can do is spread false gossip so that people think that everything that's been said is untrue, including "stanley is having an affair." it's like the end of spartacus. i've seen that movie half a dozen times, and i still don't know who the real spartacus is, and that is what makes that movie a classic whodunit.

[interns do nothing] one of you will do exceedingly well in business, just unlimited potential. one of you will make a living, and nothing more. and one of you [looks directly at megan] will make a great mother. it's up to you to choose which you want to be.

[camera pans down from michael's office window to parking lot below, stanley is seen destroying michael's sebring with a crowbar] uhh, cynthia kept calling him, she would not stop calling him, and she was in love with him. oh, and get this. cynthia, also married. so... you can't stop love, i guess [jim is seen displaying fetus picture on his desk as pam smiles] and quite frankly, i don't think you should ever try.

Name: maurie
Line: [talking head with eric and megan] i learned that a company can describe their internship as "full of exciting experiences," even if that's a lie. there's no regulation.

Line: okay.

Line: sure.

Line: hey, good luck.

Line: yeah.

Line: am i worried that jim and david are having a meeting without me?  no, because we are the three amigos.  and once in awhile one of the amigos will go off... to the bathroom... while the other two have a secret meeting.  [shrugs]

Line: i just don't want you to lie to me.  i don't want you to ever lie to me.  have i ever lied to you?

Line: i just don't want you to.

Line: i was rushing to fill an order.  i put the ladder up to grab a box of three hole from the top shelf.  next thing i know, i'm on the ground and the ladder's on top of me.

Line: i'm talking about... hmmm.

Line: what is jim telling him?  that i can't handle this job?  that 's bull crap.  that is bull crap.  although, it has been chaotic lately.  corporate shut down the buffalo branch which left us to absorb all of their clients.  i will tell you there has been work everyday.  had to come in on a saturday. to retrieve... i left my cell phone here.

Line: we invited everyone in the office to our wedding.  even though we realized most people wouldn't be able to make the drive to niagara falls.  [whispers] which is why we're having it in niagara falls.  [normal volume] then michael told everyone they could have friday and monday  off, if they came.  so now, people have to decide if they want to come to our wedding or have to work.

Line: wallace had to show up on the one four month period that i'm completely overwhelmed.

Name: michael
Line: you know when they say it's so crazy it just might work?  well, i don't believe that.  i say go for the air-tight plan and that is why i am having andy wheel me into the conference room inside a makeshift cheese cart.  it is just elegant.

Name: andy
Line: oui, oui, monsieur.  from the wisconsin region, a nice firm cheddar.  also from the great state of wisconsin, an aged parmesan.  here you will find a cheddar style spread which has reacted nicely with the air to form a light rind which i think you'll  find both challenging and delicious.  at that point, i would recommend you take a trip south of the border to the great state of illinois where you will find this fine bleu cheese dressing.  if i may be so bold, it's a lot of fun to let the goldfish take a little swim in the bleu cheese.  bon appetit.

Line: that's not what i meant.

Name: michael
Line: listen, jim, no offense, but when push comes to shove, what i want is more important that what you want.

Name: jim
Line: i disagree.

Name: michael
Line: what do you guys think? [all start talking at the same time]

Name: jim
Line: great. guys, can i just have a moment alone with michael?

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no, you don't need to go anywhere. anything that jim has to say to me, he can say in front of these types of people.

Name: jim
Line: that is not what i said, and, also, i am co-manager, meaning you are not the only manager anymore. i am also i co-manager.

Name: michael
Line: that is not what wallace told us.

Name: jim
Line: that's exactly what wallace told us.

Name: michael
Line: that is not the way i heard it.

Name: kelly
Line: i love rivalries-- michael or jim, paris or nicole, heidi or l.c. it's so much fun. but i guess if i'm really thinking about it and answering your question honestly, i'd have to go with l.c.  heidi's a bad friend, and her skin is terrible.

Name: michael
Line: it is one thing, me giving you the co-manager title. it is another thing, you bossing me around.

Name: jim
Line: i'm not bossing you around. i'm trying to do my job, which is sharing your job, so maybe we should just call david wallace.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no. no, we will not call david wallace. [michael pulls out his cell phone] i will call david wallace.

Name: erin
Line: david wallace is on line two for you guys.

Name: michael
Line: or david wallace will call us on line two. why don't we just--

Name: jim
Line: hey, david. you got jim here.

Name: michael
Line: hey david, this is michael, senior co-manager.

Name: david wallace
Line: hey guys, um, i'm calling, because, unfortunately, we will not be able to give out cost of living raises this year, and i know people expect it. however, there just is only a small amount of money for each branch, so we're leaving it up to the managers to decide how to distribute it.

Name: michael
Line: got it, dave. sounds like your classice big-picture decision.

Name: jim
Line: which will clearly affect the day-to-day well-being of our employees.

Name: david wallace
Line: it's probably a little of both.

Name: michael
Line: which is it more of?

Name: david wallace
Line: excuse me?

Name: jim
Line: david, i know that i'm very new at this, but i have a very good perspective on how things work.

Name: david wallace
Line: wait, i'm sorry. michael, are you-- are you texting me?

Name: michael
Line: i thought maybe we could talk after this is over.

Name: david wallace
Line: look, i need you both to take care of this. this is not going to be a problem, is it?

Name: jim
Line: nope, not at all.

Name: michael
Line: no, it will not be. i am on top of it.

Name: david wallace
Line: very good.

Name: jim
Line: alright, thanks alot, david.

Name: michael
Line: talk to you later-- [jim hangs up] okay, you didn't let me say good-bye. [sighs, and claps hands once] alright, i am looking forward to this.

Name: jim
Line: you don't have to lie.

Name: michael
Line: i hate the fact that we have to do this together. i think we work better separately. when i am irritated and i look at you, i don't see you anymore.

Name: jim
Line: right.

Name: michael
Line: all i can see is how big and gross the pores on your nose are.

Name: jim
Line: alright. let's get started.

Name: creed
Line: hey, why haven't we ever, um...

Name: meredith
Line: we have.

Name: michael
Line: you know, there's no easy way to do this. i say we add 1.5% to their paychecks and don't say anything about it.

Name: jim
Line: do you mean, like break-in in the middle of the night and change the numbers on payroll?

Name: michael
Line: no, we can do it during the day. it doesn't have to be that dramatic, jim.

Name: jim
Line: okay. you know what would help is a pros and cons list for our options.

Name: michael
Line: jim, don't take this the wrong way. are you gonna take this the wrong way?

Name: jim
Line: it's hard to tell so far.

Name: michael
Line: you use your brain too much.

Name: jim
Line: i'm sorry, are you advocating that i use it less?

Name: michael
Line: sometimes the smartest people don't think at all.

Name: jim
Line: you just came up with that.

Name: michael
Line: as i was saying it.

Name: jim
Line: yeah. okay, so for the 1.5% increase, pro-- everyone gets a little bit.

Name: michael
Line: [in nerdy voice] con-- you look like a nerd.

Name: jim
Line: con-- no one gets as much as they did last year.

Name: michael
Line: pro-- you get to share your pros and cons list with the other nerds.

Name: jim
Line: pro-- no favoritism.

Name: michael
Line: con-- you unzip your pants, and you find that there's a calculator down there.

Name: jim
Line: i've been studying michael for years, and i've condensed what i've learned into this chart-- [pulls out a pie chart] how michael spends his time. as you can see, we have procrastinating and distracting others, and this tiny sliver here is critical thinking. i made it bigger, so that you could see it.

Name: kevin
Line: hey, pam, i heard that you were registered, but i didn't hear where.

Name: pam
Line: i don't think we registered anywhere. we just want cash.

Name: kevin
Line: like money? like you-- you want my money?

Name: pam
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: kevin
Line: will you take a check?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: kevin
Line: cool. in the memo line, i'm gonna write, "to love's eternal glory."

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: kevin
Line: wait til' monday.

Name: pam
Line: is this what i've become? materialistic? shallow? i feel horrible. [looks down at the check] oh look! "mrs. pam halpert!" that's the first time i've seen it in writing!

Name: jim
Line: you know, the more i think about it, the more i think we should give it to the salesmen.

Name: michael
Line: that will not go over well.

Name: jim
Line: i know. i just think it seems smart to keep the salesmen happy right now. 'course i know that this might come off as biased, so you know what? let us...

Name: michael
Line: oh, my god! are you gonna make another pro and con list? i'm gonna kill myself.

Name: jim
Line: i'm not gonna let you stop me from thinking.

Name: michael
Line: no! i could not do that, jim. i can see it in your crusty little eyes that you are going to make everything perfect. if i can just think this through, if i could just think it exactly right, i can make this perfect, and then i can go down every avenue, and every avenue off of that avenue, and then another avenue.

Name: jim
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: and then another--

Name: jim
Line: look, you have a lot of strengths.

Name: michael
Line: oh, i do?! tell me what they are.

Name: jim
Line: i think that you are able to take constructive criticism very well.

Name: michael
Line: ha! that-- i am not known for that!

Name: jim
Line: but there is a reason why i'm here!

Name: michael
Line: yes! you went over my head to wallace!

Name: jim
Line: no, it's because you also have a lot of weaknesses, michael!

Name: michael
Line: okay. well, why don't you tell me what those are, jim? why don't you enliven me?

Name: jim
Line: i don't think you're good at making tough decisions!

Name: michael
Line: ah.

Name: jim
Line: at thinking out the options, and then stating that decision very clearly, especially when it's an unpopular decision.

Name: michael
Line: okay, here's a tough decision for you. you suck! you suck! is that clear enough for you?!

Name: jim
Line: but maybe i'm here for a reason, because i might have some good ideas, too. i've been sitting out there, and i've been learning a lot, and maybe i can just bring something different to the table.

Name: michael
Line: okay, skippy, here we go. why don't you run yourself out there and tell them? [laughs] you call it.

Name: jim
Line: [leave the conference room to address everyone]

Name: michael
Line: [to the camera] this had better be terrible.

Name: jim
Line: could i have everyone's attention, please? i have some tough news, so i'm just gonna give it to you straight. truth is, we only have so much money for raises this year, so the simple fact is some people will get raises, and some people won't. now, what we've decided is, we are gonna give those raises to the sales staff.

Name: meredith
Line: wait. seriously?!

Name: jim
Line: look, you guys are smart, so i'm just leveling with you. i'm just trying to treat you like adults.

Name: oscar
Line: thank you, jim, for thinking that we're smart people.

Name: angela
Line: but, i do not understand. if we're such smart adults, then why don't we get raises?

Name: oscar
Line: excellent question, genius. it's because jim wants to give the raises to his friends and the people he sleeps with.

Name: jim
Line: ooh, easy. that's not it at all.

Name: oscar
Line: well?

Name: jim
Line: really what it is, is about the money the sales staff brings into the office.

Name: kelly
Line: [walks in from shopping, with bags in her hands] what's going on?

Name: kevin
Line: jim is only giving raises to the salesmen.

Name: kelly
Line: what the hell?! why are you being such a jerk?!

Name: oscar
Line: hold on, kelly. would it help you to know that jim thinks you're smart?

Name: kelly
Line: no! [put's down her bags] how is that gonna repair ryan's car?!

Name: dwight
Line: this is ridiculous! how could he do this to us?!

Name: jim
