Name: dwight
Line: what about all these people, huh?! how is it fair to them?!

Name: oscar
Line: exactly!

Name: kevin
Line: totally!

Name: oscar
Line: we work just as hard as the sales people. we deserve raises.

Name: creed
Line: yes.

Name: angela
Line: yes. they don't get 'em, if we don't get 'em!

Name: meredith
Line: my kid needs shoes! you want to tell him he doesn't get shoes?!

Name: kevin
Line: yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: her kid needs shoes, jim!

Name: meredith
Line: what the hell?! [everyone complaining at jim]

Name: jim
Line: wow! i'm just gonna rewind and back off a bit, so... [imitates a tape rewinding and chuckles, michael comes over by jim laughing]

Name: michael
Line: that was good! that was good! okay, all right. well, we all know it's hard to be a boss, right? you know what? look around you. these are your best friends. these are the people who will open their hearts to you. they all have heart-ons for you [someone growns in disgust], and that is a gift. so in terms of gifts, we should be giving each other gifts. angela, yes, lend oscar a cup of sugar. this--

Name: angela
Line: what are you talking about michael?

Line: my plan-- a man-- panama.

Name: meredith

Name: michael
Line: alright! let me get this clear! does everybody want a raise? [all say yes] alright, everyone wants a raise, so what we're going to do is go into here, and we will not come out until we do.

Line: this isn't a game, you know? it's our livelihood!

Name: michael

Line: yeah. who said that?

Name: creed
Line: yep.

Name: jim
Line: [to camera] it's going really well, actually.

Name: jim
Line: [to camera, holds up a bean] each boston baked bean represents half a percent raise. we each got 24 beans, so the idea is, you place the bean on the picture [walking around the table] of who you think deserv-- who's that? [picture that michael drew of toby, looks like a monster]

Line: toby.

Name: dwight
Line: people are starting to notice how terrible jim is. it's great. eventually, they'll rise up and revolt. my only hope is that they do it sooner rather than later. if the people here were our founding fathers, the revolutionary war would have been delayed ten years, because stanley washington was napping, and phyllis hancock was still signing the declaration, and kevin jefferson was distracted by a butterfly.

Name: dwight
Line: come on in. [everyone looking around at all the pictures and beans on the table]   that's right. come in, feast your eyes. they determine our worth by putting beans upon our faces.

Name: oscar

Name: dwight
Line: things were not this bad when just michael was manager.

Line: hey, what are you guys doing in here?

Name: kevin

Line: jim?

Name: kevin

Name: phyllis

Name: angela

Name: andy
Line: there's no way that stanley gets more beans than me. [starts to take stanley's beans, stanley swats andy's hand with his crossword puzzle] that is ridiculous. this is how it works. [everyone continues to argue]

Name: phyllis
Line: it's not so much that i might not get a raise. it's just demeaning!

Name: andy
Line: thank you! that is exactly-- by the way, i would also like a raise.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah, i would, too.

Name: dwight
Line: are we idiots? [gets up, starts walking around] what right does jim have to claim authority, hmm? is he as good a salesman as i? is he as matronly as phyllis? there are moments where we can affect change. for a few seconds every decade, we exist, and these are those seconds! let us storm his castle! come on! tick-- let's get him. tock-- let's get jim! tick-- and drag jim out of his office! tock-- take his keys away from him! tick-- that's a clock! the time is getting very close! it's now or never! what say you?!

Name: phyllis
Line: i say no.

Name: dwight
Line: no, i mean, what do you say to my plan? [all groan] okay.

Line: [leaving his office, hurrying to jim's office]

Name: kevin

Line: six. you?

Line: i mean, a performance-based raise sounded like a good idea, right?

Name: michael
Line: i know, i know.

Name: michael
Line: yes, we did.

Name: jim
Line: i just-- what?

Name: phyllis
Line: michael!

Name: kevin
Line: michael!

Name: phyllis
Line: come on! this isn't fair!

Name: jim

Line: gin. [toast, sip]

Line: ooh!

Line: yeah, i mean, if it's all the same for you.

Line: question for you. would you guys rather have $100 now, or $5,000 a year from now?

Name: ryan
Line: because you just give me $50 to cover the broker fee, i put in a hundred of my own money as the gift...

Name: pam
Line: yeah. no, no, i'll um-- the hundred. i'll just take the hundred.

Name: ryan
Line: instead of $5,000 a year from now?

Name: pam
Line: how sure is this?

Name: pam
Line: the guy has an algorithm to determine the winner of any given college basketball game.

Name: pam
Line: i'm sorry. you guys have probably noticed my stomach's a little more sensitive lately. so, if you wouldn't mind wearing a little less perfume... and if your lunch is especially pungent, maybe have it in the break room?

Name: jim
Line: we would really appreciate it.

Name: dwight
Line: pam is constantly throwing up because of the pregnancy. if she eats something the fetus doesn't like she is screwed. it's amazing. a three ounce fetus is calling the shots. it's so bad ass.

Name: pam
Line: phyllis, if you could switch to a different soap, just for a month or two? yours is kind of perfumy.

Name: phyllis
Line: now this is getting ridiculous.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, gee, i'm sorry. i guess i missed the meeting where we all all voted for you to get pregnant. no! i reserve the right to peel my hard-boiled eggs at my desk.

Name: meredith
Line: all morning i look forward to my afternoon cigars and i'm not stopping for anyone.

Name: pam
Line: i don't think i'm asking for too much. i guess it's just the end of courtesy in the workplace.

Name: andy
Line: [dwight peels a hard-boiled egg at his desk, sniffs it and takes a bite; pam stares at him, picks up her trash can and pukes into it] watching people get sick always makes me sick. and... frankly so does talking about it. so... wow...  [andy, phyllis, meredith, erin, oscar and angela all proceed to throw up in various places while creed looks on eating a bowl of noodles; dwight stares shocked; pam wipes her mouth with a satisfied look]

Line: [standing next to a car decorated for leaving a wedding] what do you think? i spent all morning on it.

Name: jim
Line: it is really special.

Line: yeah, but aren't you supposed to do that to our... no. it's great.

Line: it's just a really important day for me.

Line: well, congrats.

Line: thanks.

Line: dunder mifflin scranton will be closed today and friday for a company wedding in niagara falls. so, please leave a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. have a great day.

Line: believe it or not, kevin, fire crackers are in the don't column.

Name: kevin
Line: what the hell?

Line: come on. you've got to be kidding me.

Line: absolutely. 'cause not everyone knows and some people may be offended.

Line: well, we're thinking of my grandmother who we haven't told and is very old-fashioned.

Name: jim
Line: that's nice.

Name: pam
Line: you know, angela, you don't have to come to the wedding.

Line: really, pam...

Name: michael

Name: michael
Line: no.

Line: we'll see.

Line: don't. don't. don't. you stole my joke. don't steal my joke.

Line: oh yeah.

Line: no. no. no. please, please. dwight, that's my joke.

Line: it's easy. that's what i'm saying.

Name: michael
Line: this is what i'm talking about. when we leave here and go up to niagara falls we are representing dunder mifflin, everyone. this is a very important wedding for the branch. the most important wedding until i get married. so, i want you all on your best behavior or so help me, god. so... i will see you up there in viagra falls!

Name: michael
Line: pam and jim's wedding will be the single best pick up destination in the history of the universe.

Line: get out of here.

Line: yes.

Line: oh, my god, dwight.

Line: ok.

Name: michael

Name: michael
Line: you're an idiot.

Line: people don't think of me as one of the sharper dressers in the office... but i'm going ot turn that around at this wedding. i thought, how could i take it to the next level? the hair. [angela beeps her car horn.] it's the hair-- [beeps again.] ok. ok. i'm going. [long beep] god.

Line: yeah?

Line: oh, wow. that's cool.

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Line: [aims imaginary camera at pam] click. oh, you blinked. damn it. now that's in my brain forever.

Name: pam
Line: oh.

Line: games have the power to distract people from stressful situations.  battleship got me through my parents' divorce.  operation got me through my vasectomy, i.e., my operation.  i don't think i would have been able to endure my breakup with holly had it not been for toss across.

Line: very good, very good.  now, no one was there in the wine cellar. [creed gets in his car and drives away]

Name: andy
Line: [in character] hey there young lady.

Name: erin
Line: hello.

Name: andy
Line: i would be remiss if i did not ask the pretty young lady out on a date for this weekend.

Name: erin
Line: sounds like a plan, sugar.

Name: andy
Line: alright, a plan it is.

Name: dwight
Line: voodoo mama juju, explain your dalliance with the dark arts.

Name: angela
Line: it's not my fault, i was exposed to harry potter.

Name: dwight
Line: i know you did it!

Name: dwight
Line: i know she didn't do it.  it's never the person you most suspect. it's also never the person you least suspect, since anyone with half a brain would suspect them the most.  therefore i know the killer to be phyllis, aka beatrix bourbon, the person i most medium suspect.

Name: kevin
Line: [in character] do you want to go out on a date with me?  we can make out by the horses.

Name: erin
Line: well, you know ol' nellie's always up for a romp in the hay.

Name: meredith
Line: how about a threesome?

Name: erin
Line: yeah, my boudoir's always open.

Name: kevin
Line: nice.

Name: andy
Line: i'm a little worried i might have asked out naughty nellie and not erin.  which would be a whole lot less appealing, because naughty nellie says yes to everyone.  and she might be a murderer.

Name: oscar
Line: i just got an email from corporate, specifically for accounting to stop all payments to our vendors.

Name: phyllis
Line: what does that mean?

Name: oscar
Line: well, maybe nothing but it could mean a problem with liquidity-

Name: michael
Line: [accent] whoa. what's this strange yankee accent coming out of your mouth, son?  this here's savannah.

Name: oscar
Line: [tries to speak in a high-pitched southern accent] this plantation, we're running low on greenbacks.  we're having problems paying the people who give us the seeds and the dirt.  we can't pay... [in regular voice] - michael, i can't - basically it could mean a lot of things, but it is unprecedented, so it's cause for concern.

Name: jim
Line: ok, i'm going back to work.

Name: michael
Line: no no no no no no no. [accent] i'm going to skip forward to a relevant clue.  here we go.

Name: voice on cd player
Line: well by now you've figured out that ol' beatrix bourbon was the killer.

Name: phyllis
Line: michael, i was doing so well.

Name: michael
Line: [accent] are you going to believe that? that is a mis- that's a misdirection.  we still don't know who the murderer is.  [everyone leaves] nellie nutmeg, come back in here.  i can't do this myself.  voodoo mama juju... what am i gonna do?

Name: jim
Line: ok, so corporate is still in their meeting.

Name: kevin
Line: that could be a good sign.

Name: angela
Line: hey everyone, kevin's going to give us his take on the situation.  let's listen up.

Name: jim
Line: alright guys, it's a work day and you guys work here, so let's go do some work.

Name: kevin
Line: now, jim telling us all to work?  i think that is a very good sign.

Name: angela
Line: don't just say things.

Name: jim
Line: [michael walks in] oh, hey, michael. listen, i brought up those sales targets.  do you want to-

Name: michael
Line: [accent] i do believe you have me mistaken, my name is caleb crawdad. y'all skedaddled way too soon.  we need to reopen this case.

Name: jim
Line: no, you're not reopening the case.  the case is closed.

Name: michael
Line: no it ain't.

Name: dwight
Line: frankly, i'm not surprised.  a lot of the evidence seemed to be based on puns.

Name: andy
Line: just thinking about weekend at bernie's.  it's funny, the guy's dead the whole time.

Name: erin
Line: i haven't seen it.

Name: andy
Line: speaking of weekends, you excited about our date this weekend?

Name: erin
Line: [accent] of course, nathaniel.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, ok.

Name: erin
Line: [accent] where are you taking me?

Name: andy
Line: [accent] well, finest steakhouse in all savannah.

Name: erin
Line: [accent] savannah?  that's a far way from scranton.

Name: andy
Line: did you mean a real date?

Name: erin
Line: no. [laughs] did you?

Name: andy
Line: totally... not. [erin gets up and walks away]

Name: erin
Line: i thought it was for real.  so i was excited, but it was just, it was part of the game.

Name: dwight
Line: you're sure it was water, it couldn't have been acid?

Name: michael
Line: i already declared you, it was too dark to tell.

Name: dwight
Line: stop playing games with me, crawdad.

Name: michael
Line: this is not a game, this is my life.  you are out of order, sir.

Name: dwight
Line: answer me.

Name: michael
Line: you are out of order.

Name: dwight
Line: you are out of order.

Name: michael
Line: you are-

Name: pam
Line: i think michael may have snapped.

Name: jim
Line: or maybe he's just stuck in character.

Name: pam
Line: well, which is worse? snapped or stuck?

Name: jim
Line: both.  they're both worse.

Name: jim
Line: it's going to be alright. we're a good company, we'll figure this out.  we're not going under.

Name: pam
Line: jim, what if we both lose our jobs?  i'm trying to think of a way that this all ends up fine, and i can't think of one.

Name: michael
Line: [comes into jim's office using accent] deb, what in the world - do you have the vapors?

Name: jim
Line: michael, not now.

Name: michael
Line: can't wait, we have to get you to our witch doctor right now.  come on.  come on.

Name: pam
Line: i should just go.  [accent]  where to now caleb?

Name: michael
Line: to mama juju boo boo.

Name: jim
Line: michael, can i... ok, i'm just going to skip right past the what and go with why.

Name: michael
Line: because this is the recreation of a crime scene.

Name: meredith
Line: [laying on the ground] i'm the dead body and these are my brain chunks.

Name: dwight
Line: hey shut up.  you're dead.

Name: jim
Line: michael, can i talk to you in your office?

Name: michael
Line: no michael here, my name is-

Name: jim
Line: caleb!

Name: jim
Line: today of all days...

Name: michael
Line: no, you shut up.  they need this game, jim.  let us have this stupid little game, alright? [jim nods]

Name: michael
Line: [accent] oh, you startled me.  my stars, my heart nearly leapt out of my chest.  what can i do you for?

Name: erin
Line: wallace is on the phone.  he's returning your call.

Name: michael
Line: detective wallace?

Name: erin
Line: i don't think so.  i think it's david wallace from dunder mifflin.

Name: michael
Line: aw, shucks, tell him i'm not here.

Name: oscar
Line: you're not gonna answer the phone?

Name: michael
Line: no, i only answer to detective wallace 'cause i got a warm body in the other room.

Name: jim
Line: i'll take it.

Name: jim
Line: hey david.

Name: david
Line: hey, sorry to be getting back to you guys so late.  things are still a bit unclear, we didn't officially decide anything yet.

Name: jim
Line: oh, ok.

Name: david
Line: but if i can be candid with you here jim, it's not good.  we fully expect to be out of money by the end of the year.  insolvent.  so, well... you know what?  i'm sorry, i have to run.  but we will talk soon, ok?

Name: jim
Line: sure.  oh, you know, while i have you... today i was working on this pitch for a supermarket chain, and it would actually be a big account and i wanted to-

Name: david
Line: you know what? i can't really get my head around anything like that right now, but that's great.  keep after it, but i gotta run.

Name: jim
Line: ok.

Name: david
Line: thanks jim.

Name: jim
Line: see ya.

Name: pam
Line: [jim comes out of the office]  what's the news?

Name: jim
Line: nothing yet.

Name: phyllis
Line: well, i guess that's not-

Name: jim
Line: well there is some bad news.  [accent] there has been another murder.

Name: michael
Line: a murder, you say?  i do declare.

Name: jim
Line: conference room everyone.

Name: stanley
Line: do we have to play?

Name: jim
Line: no.

Name: stanley
Line: super.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, this could be a juicy one.

Name: michael
Line: get in there!

Name: jim
Line: i think today was a good day to have two managers.  'cause if you're a family stuck on a lifeboat in the middle of the ocean, one parent might want to just keep rowing.  but if the other parent wants to play a game, it's not because they're crazy.  it's because they're doing it for the kids.  and i get that now.

Name: michael
Line: there has been a lot of murder and a lot of intrigue.  my little heart can barely take it no more.  [regular voice] today is the hardest i have worked in a long, long time.

Name: andy
Line: [andy, michael, and dwight are pointing imaginary guns at each other] i didn't do it!

Name: dwight
Line: ok, everybody just calm down.

Name: andy
Line: i am calm.

Name: michael
Line: on the count of three we're all going to put down our guns.

Name: dwight
Line: i have crossbows.

Name: michael
Line: we'll put down our weaponry on the count of three, you ready?

Name: dwight
Line: ok, i'm ready.

Name: michael
Line: one, two, three.. [all scream]

Name: jim
Line: andy revealed himself to be a double agent.  at which point dwight felt comfortable revealing that he also was double agent.  and then michael announced to everybody that - get this- he was a double agent.  oh, and it is 6:00.

Name: jim
Line: [michael, dwight, andy and now pam are in the circle and training their 'weapons' on each other, jim walks in]  really?

Name: pam
Line: [accent] it wasn't me.  i'm not goin' down for this!

Name: jim
Line: yeah, i want to go home.

Name: pam
Line: get the keys out of my purse, start the car. [jim and pam slowly back out of the office, pam has her weapon trained on everyone and then they run out]

Name: oscar
Line: [dwight enters dressed as recyclops] not again.

Name: dwight
Line: bow down before recyclops.

Name: jim
Line: five years ago, corporate said we had to start a recycling program for earth day so dwight took the lead on that and introduced us to a very close friend of his named recyclops.

Name: dwight
Line: happy earth day, everyone. i'm recyclops. did you know that an old milk carton can be sawed in half and used as a planter?

Name: jim
Line: the next year he really stepped things up.

Name: dwight
Line: who has put a number seven plastic in a number four bin?

Name: jim
Line: a year after that recylcops really began to take shape.

Name: dwight
Line: recylops will drown you in your over-watered lawns.

Name: jim
Line: then tragedy struck recyclops when his fictional planet was attacked by some other fictitious thing... i can't remember.

Name: dwight
Line: recyclops will have his revenge.

Name: jim
Line: i think this was also the year he renounced earth day and vowed to the destroy the planet he once loved.

Name: pam
Line: oh my god, you guys, look. it's recyclops.

Name: dwight
Line: recyclops destroys! [starts tearing through the office]

Name: stanley
Line: oh, is today recyclops day?

Name: dwight
Line: yes.

Name: stanley
Line: i thought you were killed by polluticorn.

Name: dwight
Line: polluticorn wishes. [starts spraying the office with something]

Name: andy
Line: that's aerosol spray. it's terrible for the environment.

Name: dwight
Line: humans are terrible for the environment.

Name: pam
Line: the thing i like most about recyclops is that he's creating a different world for our child.

Name: jim
Line: mmm.

Name: pam
Line: a world where you truly can be anything you want.

Name: jim
Line: god bless you, recyclops. and your cold robot heart. [dwight throws an aluminum can towards the recycling bin and misses]

Name: michael
Line: [seated] ok. ok. how 'bout this? [rises, waves, sits back down]

Name: pam
Line: that's great.

Name: michael
Line: i want it to be better than 'great', pam. how 'bout i remain seated... and i just do a little bit of a nod. sort of a humble thing. [demonstrates]

Name: pam
Line: sure.

Name: michael
Line: nope. then my face is down. they can't see my face.

Name: meredith
Line: and it looks like you're taking a dump.

Name: michael
Line: alan brand is the ceo of the company, if title's important to you, has personally invited moi to go to new york to the shareholder's meeting  and sit up on the stage with the board of directors. and at some point they are going to introduce me as the most successful branch manager that they have. and then michael scott turns and waves to the crowd... and the crowd goes wild.

Name: andy
Line: [doing an announcer voice] ladies and gentlemen from scranton, pennsylvania, please welcome michael 'the machine' scott. [michael waves, twirls and sits down]

Name: pam
Line: don't do the twirl.

Name: phyllis
Line: lose the twirl.

Name: dwight
Line: the twirl sucks.

Name: kevin
Line: michael, i hated the twirl.

Name: andy
Line: [still doing the voice & spinning in his chair] hate the twirl!

Name: michael
Line: ok. obviously i'm not going to do the twirl. i only did it because i nailed the wave.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah, good. don't do it.

Name: michael
Line: i am not going to do the twirl. alright? it's not even a twirl, it's a spin. i might do the spin.

Name: oscar
Line: the long term problem is bad investments that they need to dump. the short term problem is the company has no cash and there's no where to get it.

Name: michael
Line: ok, oscar, i don't need the whole enchilada just the bullet points.

Name: oscar
Line: those are the bullet points.

Name: michael
Line: well, could you condense it please?

Name: oscar
Line: that's as simple as i can make it.

Name: erin
Line: michael? the limo's here for you.

Name: michael
Line: it's not a limo. it's a town car. town cars are actually better, though. better torque. better handling.

Name: erin
Line: he said limousine, so...

Name: kevin
Line: [at window in conference room] check it out, guys. there's a limo down here. [everyone heads to the conference room] michael, look. oh, man.

Name: michael
Line: they sent a limo.

Name: michael
Line: town cars suck. town car is something that a company sends when they're in trouble. a limousine is something that a company sends when they have cause for celebration. and in this case i think we are celebrating me.

Name: michael
Line: [everyone is rushing down the stairs to see the limo] oh, wait. wait. wow. wow! oh, no way. look at that.

Name: dwight
Line: what kind of mileage does this baby get?

Name: erin
Line: it's like what high school kids take to prom on tv shows.

Name: oscar
Line: this is so typical of management to spend money on this. ugh. bunch of boobs.

Name: michael
Line: hate to break it to you oscar but some of us like boobs.

Name: dwight
Line: calves. calves all the way.

Name: andy
Line: i'm so jealous right now.

Name: michael
Line: hey, you know who you should be jealous of? yourself. because you're invited and you're invited and you're invited and you and you and you and you and you and you-

Name: limo driver
Line: car seats eight.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: limo driver
Line: the car seats eight.

Name: michael
Line: the limo seats eight. ok. then jim and pam and ryan plus a guest.

Name: jim & pam
Line: no thanks.

Name: ryan
Line: i'll use it when you're done.

Name: michael
Line: [others  start raising their hands to be picked] mmm... whoa.

Name: oscar
Line: the dunder mifflin stock symbol is dmi. do you know what that stands for? dummies, morons and idiots. because that's what you'd  have to be to own it. and, as one of those idiots, i believe the board owes me answers.

Name: michael
Line: [in the limo with dwight, andy and oscar] i wish the windows weren't tinted so people could see us in here.

Name: andy
Line: hey, guys, do you think anyone might have had sex in here?

Name: michael
Line: definitely.

Name: dwight
Line: smells like it.

Name: michael
Line: definitely. look they got pillows. that. that's bigger than my bed.

Name: dwight
Line: word.

Name: andy
Line: yeah! yeah! yeah!

Name: michael
Line: [the limo driver raises the divider window] who's playing with the button?

Name: jim
Line: hey, ryan. could you start consolidating all our rolodex information into outlook?

Name: ryan
Line: uh, it doesn't seem like there's much of a point if the company's going under.

Name: jim
Line: but if the company doesn't go under then we'll finally have all our contacts in one program.

Name: ryan
Line: the company's probably going under, though.

Name: jim
Line: could go either way.

Name: ryan
Line: seems like it's leaning one way.

Name: jim
Line: maybe we should just wait and find out.

Name: ryan
Line: definitely.

Name: jim
Line: ok.

Name: ryan
Line: so should we wait to find out before we start doing all this stuff?

Name: jim
Line: nah. might as well do it now.

Name: andy
Line: michael, what if somebody asks you a question at this meeting? are you just gonna wave, or what?

Name: michael
Line: i will have to answer.

Name: dwight
Line: i'll ask you a question.

Name: andy
Line: make it a softball. something he can, like, crank out of the park.

Name: dwight
Line: michael scott you run the most profitable branch of dunder mifflin. how do you do it?

Name: michael
Line: no, no. that's too hard. say your name is zamboni and then i will say, 'well, we're sort of on thin ice.' [they all laugh] i won't say that. i'll something like that.

Name: andy
Line: this is your big day. come on.

Name: michael
Line: oh, my god. this is it.

Name: laurie
Line: mr. scott?

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: laurie
Line: i'm laurie.

Name: michael
Line: oh, hi.

Name: laurie
Line: thank you for joining us. come with me.

Name: michael
Line: well, thank you and, and please call - continue to call me mr. scott.

Name: laurie
Line: ok. if you just want to follow me i'll take you up to the lounge.

Name: michael
Line: well, i guess this is as far as i can take you guys. so -

Name: andy
Line: kay.

Name: dwight
Line: good luck, michael.

Name: michael
Line: see you later.

Name: michael
Line: [walking past bodyguards at the door] officers. thank you.

Name: laurie
Line: after you, mr. scott.

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: david
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: hello.

Name: david
Line: so glad you could make it.

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: david
Line: how was the ride?

Name: michael
Line: oh. it was awesome. very, very sublime.

Name: david
Line: i'm glad. i want to introduce you to everyone. first we'll start with alan brand. alan? ceo. michael scott, branch manager, scranton.

Name: alan
Line: it's nice to meet you, michael.

Name: michael
Line: it's nice to meet you, too. it's an honor and a privilege.

Name: david
Line: seated, we have the former congressman, chris o'keefe.

Name: michael
Line: ah. [bows] your eminence.

Name: registrar
Line: for those of you with questions, please line up behind one of the four microphones that have been placed in the aisles.

Name: dwight
Line: coming through. che, che, che, che, che, che. [spots microphone and gets in line, sees an empty mic and attempts to get there first] excuse me. excuse me. excuse me. excuse me. [a line appears from nowhere] ah. damn it. [ heads back to the original line which is now even longer] wha- okay [grunts]

Name: dwight
Line: i was hoping to lob michael his softball question early. i wanted to swing by the garment district, pick up a few crates of my shirts. i got a shirt guy.

Name: oscar
Line: can you believe this? the money they spent on this convention hall. [finding a seat] excuse me, miss. i just want to take the stupid board of directors by their necks. this is so simple.

Name: andy
Line: yeah. well, you should do that. get in line.

Name: oscar
Line: oh, what a great idea and lose my job. no thank you.

Name: andy
Line: look, do you want to be able to tell your grandkids you stood up for yourself during the - america's biggest financial crisis?

Name: dwight
Line: how is he gonna have grandkids?

Name: michael
Line: you guys ever protect the president?

Name: security
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: what about madonna? or obama twins? anybody famous?

Name: security
Line: not supposed to talk about it. nelly furtado.

Name: alan
Line: alright, guys. you ready?

Name: michael
Line: rock and roll. [they walk into convention room and are booed by everyone]

Name: alan
Line: dunder mifflin is still a strong company. we are poised to come through this more streamlined and profitable than ever. [boos from the crowd]

Name: michael
Line: [to david] this is not as much fun as i thought it would be.

Name: david
Line: it was fun when we weren't on the brink of bankruptcy.

Name: michael
Line: [accidentally into his microphone] we're going bankrupt, you think? [angry jeering from the crowd] they are really angry.

Name: alan
Line: the shareholders need to empower our leadership -

Name: woman in line
Line: i'm just gonna run to the bathroom. will you save my place?

Name: man in line
Line: sure.

Name: dwight
Line: no. you will not.

Name: woman in line
Line: excuse me?

Name: dwight
Line: oh, i'm sorry. were you raised in a household with no consequences?

Name: woman in line
Line: it'll just be a second.

Name: dwight
Line: oh. if onlys and justs were candies and nuts then every day would be erntedankfest.

Name: alan
Line: ... and we're confident. there are many things to be optimistic about in dunder mifflin's future and one of them is here with us today. michael scott, scranton branch manager.

Name: dwight
Line: [loudly applauds] yes.

Name: alan
Line: in these uncertain times, michael has managed to maintain steady profits from his scranton branch. we all thank you, michael. [scattered applause] another bright spot in the dunder mifflin landscape, our new waste pulp re-purposing plant in milford. [applause]

Name: jim
Line: hey, phyllis. are you just getting back from lunch now?

Name: phyllis
Line: bob took me to capello's. we got a little tipsy.

Name: jim
Line: ok. you shouldn't be telling me that stuff and also shouldn't be taking two hour lunches without telling me.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh, it's ok. michael doesn't really care about these things.

Name: jim
Line: i care about them and i'm just as much of a boss as michael. [stanley laughs] what's so funny? i'm a co-manager.

Name: stanley
Line: that doesn't make you a boss.

Name: phyllis
Line: it's not like you can fire people or anything.

Name: jim
Line: well - who? how did you? who, who told you this?

Name: phyllis
Line: ryan.

Name: stanley
Line: can't say.

Name: phyllis
Line: sorry. plastered.

Name: jim
Line: ok. who else has heard the rumor that i am not as much in charge as michael? [everyone raises there hands - including pam]

Name: pam
Line: stuff gets around. i don't participate.

Name: jim
Line: who here heard it from ryan?

Name: kevin
Line: does and email count?

Name: jim
Line: yes.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah. [everyone raises hands again]

Name: jim
Line: i am just as much of a boss as michael and i can do anything that michael can do. alright?  who here believes that i have as much power as michael? [pam, after a moment,  is the only one who raises her hand]

Name: pam
Line: i forgot i have to support him no matter what. close one.

Name: oscar
Line: these questions are bush league.

Name: andy
Line: you should get up and say something. you've got to be true to what's in there. [points to oscar's heart] don't be a wuss.

Name: andy
Line: i've always been the guy who can rally other people to rebel. in high school i organized a walk out over standardized testing. got over 500 students to just skip the sats. at the last second i chickened out, took it anyway, got a 1220, always regretted it. i feel lachrymose .

Name: david
Line: [over the crowd booing] believe me everyone is working very hard, working weekends, struggling, trying to right the ship.

Name: shareholder
Line: you're a criminal.

Name: michael
Line: hey, hey, hey. i'm sorry. these are not criminals. they are nice. they invited me to come here today. they invited me to their hospitality suite where i  had free food and it was delicious. get this. know how nice they are? the sent a stretch limo all the way to pick me up in scranton. that's -

Name: female shareholder
Line: limousine?

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: second shareholder
Line: you're all corrupt. you should be in jail. [crowd agrees]

Name: alan
Line: quiet! quiet, please! please, quiet! quiet, please. we want to hear your questions.

Name: ryan
Line: do you love her or do you love the idea of her?

Name: creed
Line: i don't know, man. i just don't know.

Name: jim
Line: i gotta make an example out of him. should i just fire him?

Name: pam
Line: can you actually fire people?

Name: jim
Line: to be honest, i don't know, but maybe i could just yell at him in front of people.

Name: pam
Line: well, i can't really imagine you yelling at anyone.

Name: jim
Line: oh, well i yell. you've heard me yell.

Name: pam
Line: oh. ok. i've heard you exclaim. like the time you said, 'hey, look. we parked over here!'.

Name: jim

Name: fourth shareholder
Line: how are you gonna fix the company?

Name: michael
Line: ok. alright. we are gonna - we're gonna go out there during this break and we are gonna come back with a plan. we're gonna come back with a plan for you. it's a 45 day plan. 45 days to get us back on track. [crowd starts to agree and perk up] 45 points. it's a 45 day/45 point. one point per day. we get the 45 points we are back in business. [crowd applauds] and you can take that to the bank. [applause continue] and limo lady, we are going completely carbon neutral. [crowd has gotten very excited and is cheering] i love you, new york! [michael does the spin and leaves the stage - then runs back across the stage] you. you.

Line: hey, ryan. how's it going?

Name: jim

Line: yes.

Line: yes.

Name: lefevre

Line: yes.

Name: jim
Line: no.

Name: david
Line: uh, hey, i'm sorry.  i'm taking this out on you.

Line: no!

Name: david
Line: it's been crazy here.  you know i think you're doing a great job, right?

Line: yeah.  thank you.

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Line: okay.  hey, we still on for dinner this weekend?

Name: dwight
Line: what?

Name: jim
Line: yes.

Name: david
Line: okay.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, you're kidding me!

Name: jim
Line: see you.

Name: dwight
Line: damn it!

Name: erin
Line: hey mr. scott, what you gonna do, what you gonna do make our dreams come true.  hey mr. scott, what you gonna do---

Name: michael
Line: please stop.  15 lives.  i destroyed 15 young lives today.

Name: erin
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: erin
Line: no, there's financial aid, uh, they could join the army or the navy.

Name: michael
Line: you're what, like, 12?

Name: erin
Line: the principal told me that 90% of scott's tots are on track to graduate, and that's 35% higher than the rest of the school.  so i think if you hadn't made that promise, a lot of them would've dropped out.  which is something to think about, i think.

Name: michael
Line: i think you're doing a great job.

Name: erin
Line: really?

Line: what do you want from this job, provided the company doesn't go out of business?

Name: erin
Line: i've always wondered what it might be like to be an accountant.

Line: really?

Name: erin
Line: yes, but i'm terrible at math so...

Name: michael
Line: you know, when i hired kevin, he was actually applying for a job in the warehouse.

Name: erin
Line: seriously?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.  i just sort've had a feeling about him.  i have a feeling about you too.

Name: michael and erin
Line: hey mr. scott, what you gonna do, what you gonna do make our dreams come true.  hey mr. scott, what you gonna do, what you gonna do make our dreams come true.

Line: see you tomorrow, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: apparently.

Name: ryan
Line: how's it going?  good day?

Name: dwight
Line: not now, temp.

Line: um, okay, so, um, listen.  i know about your diabolical plan.

Name: dwight
Line: what?  diabolical plan?  i wouldn't even know how to begin a diabol... [ryan holds up a written copy of dwight's daibolical plan]

Name: dwight

Name: jim

Line: merry christmas.

Name: dwight
Line: merry christmas. good.

Name: dwight
Line: my diabolical plot is on hold for christmas. my heart just melts with the sound of children singing. hmmph! [laughs] not really! i'm just tired. the days are short. i don't know. maybe i'm depressed.

Line: hey, rockefeller center!

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: ryan
Line: ugh.

Name: dwight
Line: it is warm feelings.

Name: dwight

Name: dwight
Line: twenty- seven! twenty-six! ...

Line: ooh.

Name: erin
Line: hello. sorry guys. [louder, face is scratched up.] sorry guys. i'm not sure i've earned the right to make announcements yet. but whoever is giving me the twelve days of christmas? as my secret santa? please stop. i can't take it anymore. my cat killed a turtledove; the french hens have started pulling out my hair to make a nest. please. stop.

Line: ho ho ho! merry christmas boys and girls! it's me, santa claus!

Line: hey santa!

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah!

Line: i have been wanting to be santa for years. i believe i have the right temperament, and the figure to do the job well. i slipped a note to jim eleven weeks ago, and he said i could do it. [she awkwardly hugs jim] it's been a long journey... but [sniffles] i'm santa claus!

Line: so santa, what can we expect from this party?

Name: dwight
Line: for several weeks, my secret santa has been giving me pieces of a machine that i've been attempting to assemble. i'm suspicious of this because i had the exact same idea, for catching osama bin laden. i would simply send him a different piece each day. he would assemble it, to find himself... in jail!

Line: you know oscar every time i make this lasagna people ask me if it's a family recipe, but really, i just get the recipe from the box!

Name: oscar
Line: that's funny.

Name: oscar
Line: that's too funny.

Name: pam
Line: oscar and the warehouse guy! go oscar! go gay warehouse guy!

Name: michael
Line: [santa voice] ho ho ho! why pay more to sit next to old tranny claus over there, when you can sit on my lap. phyllis is only ... pretending to be a man, i'm the real thing. sit down on my lap and there will be no doubt!

Line: [mutters] okay...

Name: michael
Line: no it's not, not like penis-wise. [as santa] hello little boy, what's your name?

Line: aw, michael!

Line: not a gun.

Line: well, unless the missing piece is a gun, you don't have a gun.

Line: not a gun. [crosses gun off his "what could it be" list]

Name: phyllis
Line: in the north pole i spend many nights alone tinkering with toys. so today, let's put a twinkle in ole kris kringle's eye! let the party begin! [dwight plugs in tree lights, office applauds.]

Name: michael
Line: i don't ask for much for christmas, i really don't. it's not like i'm begging people to buy me diamonds and ...broach pendants. "oh buy me something expensive or i'm gonna kill myself."  that's not - i don't care about that. all i want to be is santa. and, you want to take that away from me?  fine. go ahead. but when you need my help because i am ruining everything, don't look at me.

Name: michael
Line: behold! [extends his arms] jesus christ. and i bring to you glad christmas tidings. i want to remind everyone the true meaning of christmas. [angela claps] those of you who wish to join me, that's great. i'm excited by that. and those of you who don't, i forgive you. but i never forget.

Line: wow michael, like this must be obvious how wrong this is.

Name: michael
Line: oh the anti-christ!

Name: michael
Line: oh but i can push drugs in here? is that what you're saying?

Name: toby
Line: no!

Name: michael
Line: well you have to pick one or the other. your choice. pick your poison. get back to me. in the meantime, i am going to spread my goodness all over this company!

Line: i don't think so.

Line: i had some.

Name: pam

Name: oscar
Line: okay pam.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: phyllis
Line: ho ho ho! for stanley! ho ho ho! you've been very good this year -

Line: i have.

Name: michael
Line: [on microphone] yeah, except for cheating on your wife. adultery's a sin, look it up in the bible people. what'd you get?

Name: kevin
Line: he got scented candles!

Name: michael
Line: [on microphone] oh, that's appropriate. lot of fire where you're going. better get used to it. you're going to h-e-l-l double hockey sticks. you're going to hell stanley.

Name: angela
Line: amen.

Name: phyllis
Line: and this brings us to you, little one.

Name: michael
Line: [on microphone] i can't see from here people. somebody shout it out, don't make me get up.

Name: angela
Line: it's fabric! i really wanted this.

Name: michael
Line: [on microphone] that's fantastic. you can make another dress that goes past your feet.

Name: angela
Line: andy, is this you?

Name: michael
Line: [on microphone] no!

Name: phyllis
Line: it's a secret.

Name: michael
Line: [on microphone] andy had erin.

Name: andy
Line: nnnnya.

Name: michael

Name: jim
Line: no. [michael gets up and walks into his office]

Name: david
Line: yes michael, what is so urgent?

Name: michael
Line: david, guess who i'm sitting here dressed as.

Name: david
Line: i'm not going to guess. you can tell me or i am going to hang up.

Name: michael
Line: i'll give you a hint. his last name is christ. he has the power of flight. he can heal leopards.

Name: david
Line: michael...

Name: michael
Line: i'm jesus, david, and you know why? because phyllis, a woman, has uslurped my role as santa.

Name: david
Line: michael-

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: david
Line: this is a very very bad time.

Name: michael
Line: really? what's going on?

Name: david
Line: stephanie, can you hop off please?

Name: stephanie
Line: sure david. [disconnect]

Name: michael
Line: what the hell? how rude! does she do that all the time?

Name: erin
Line: do you want me off the call too michael?

Name: michael
Line: hey! get off! get off the phone!

Name: david
Line: listen, i shouldn't tell you this, but the company has a buyer. the board will have no choice to approve. they are going to clean house.

Name: michael
Line: what does that mean?

Name: david
Line: i'll be fired.

Name: michael
Line: well, can't alan protect you?

Name: david
Line: alan will be out too. all of us.

Name: michael
Line: all of us?

Name: david
Line: goodbye michael.

Name: michael
Line: oh my god.

Name: michael
Line: earlier today this office needed a santa. and then it needed a second santa. and then it needed a jesus. and now, it needs a michael. and that's one suit phyllis cannot fit into.

Name: michael
Line: hey. how's everybody doing?

Name: jim
Line: not great. you heckled santa for an hour and a half.

Name: michael
Line: that was a different guy. that was jesus. jesus sort of ruined the party. hurt petulant jesus.

Name: angela
Line: are you serious?  this is so offensive.

Name: michael
Line: you know what's even more offensive, is baling on this party because some...  jerk ruined the first part of it. dwight come here. here's my debit card, i want you to go pick up a bunch of pizzas and meet me in the conference room.

Name: dwight
Line: what's your pin number?

Name: michael
Line: i don't want to say. but, "it's fun to stay at the -" [nods to fill in blank, but dwight doesn't know]

Name: michael
Line: "it's fun to stay at the -"

Name: dwight
Line: where? holiday inn? i don't ...

Name: michael
Line: [gestures the ymca dance] mmm, mm mm mm. [dwight smirks, leaves]

Name: andy
Line: i, i thought that you would like it.

Name: erin
Line: it was a little much andy.

Name: andy
Line: well it's the thought that counts.

Name: erin
Line: what were you thinking? [andy freezes]

Name: andy
Line: i suppose a gentlemen might... throw in the towel, at this point. guess what? not gonna happen.

Name: michael
Line: you know what, christmas isn't about santa, or jesus. it's about the workplace. all of you feel like my family. ryan, you are my son. and pam, you're my wife. and jim. and angela and phyllis, you are my grandmas.  and stanley, you're our mailman. and i can't help but look at all your wonderful beautiful faces and think, "how could they do this to us?"

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: pam
Line: how could we do what? [general murmur]

Name: michael
Line: it's not... nevermind. nothing. [arguing voices]

Line: we deserve to know.

Name: jo bennett
Line: you'll find it easy to embrace the sabre spirit. welcome. we're very excited to go on this journey with you.

Line: who? the -

Name: jim
Line: i don't know. i don't know.

Name: pam
Line: the guy we're meeting with?

Name: jim
Line: i don't know, i don't know.

Line: i am telling you, there are no strawberries in here.
