Line: i'm very relieved to learn it wasn't you.

Name: gabe
Line: all right. uh, stan, you're up.

Name: stanley
Line: it wasn't me.

Name: gabe
Line: what a rich timbre your voice has. okay, i am prepared to conclude the investigation. and... you did it. [nods at andy]

Name: andy
Line: what? based on what?

Name: gabe
Line: uh, just all the evidence. and it really seems like it was you. can we all agree to say that it was andy for now, and sit with it, see how it feels?

Name: dwight
Line: all right. sounds good.

Name: jim
Line: guys, i think that seems a little unfair. i mean, i feel like we don't definitely know it was andy.

Name: andy
Line: yeah. you know, i mean, for all we know it could have been... jim.

Name: jim
Line: really?

Name: jo
Line: michael.

Name: michael
Line: i have rights.

Name: jo
Line: let's just talk.

Name: michael
Line: i am not going to tell you anything.

Name: jo
Line: honey, you don't seem like your normal self.

Name: michael
Line: well, i'm going through a little bit of a rough patch.

Name: jo
Line: mama jo knew there was something up.

Name: michael
Line: whole year, actually. my favorite restaurant closed down.

Name: jo
Line: oh, i hate that.

Name: michael
Line: and my new favorite restaurant sucks... i bought a video camera last year, and i was looking at the tapes, and there were only like twelve minutes that i felt was worth taping the whole year. and most of that was just birds in my condo complex. what is that? ... i miss holly.

Name: jo
Line: who's holly?

Name: michael
Line: holly flax from the nashua branch. best hr rep that dunder mifflin has ever seen. it's not been a blockbuster year for me financially. my blockbuster stock is down.

Name: kevin
Line: well, i think that the real question is: who is the whistleblower?

Name: dwight
Line: oh, just...

Name: david wallace
Line: i may have heard from an old client, and i may have immediately started spreading the news to other clients and potential clients, yeah. but i'm not here to talk about that. i am here to talk about suck it. suck it.

Name: andy
Line: gabe, i told you all about the printers.

Name: jim
Line: i mean, it could be you, gabe. i mean, that's the point.

Name: pam
Line: yes, it's totally obvious.

Name: creed
Line: i think we all can agree that it's either gabe or angela. [flips a coin] it's angela. get her, boys.

Name: nick
Line: hey guys, uh, sorry to interrupt. i just wanted to say goodbye to everyone. through teach for america, i'm going to go down to detroit and teach, uh, inner city kids about computers.

Name: gabe
Line: uh, not now.

Name: nick
Line: oh yeah, it's just that my friends are in the car waiting, so i thought i would...

Name: stanley
Line: [quietly] phyllis, what's this guy's name again?

Name: phyllis
Line: i don't know, is it shadow or garth, it's something weird, i...

Name: nick
Line: my name is nick.

Name: angela
Line: okay, well, nick, we're in a meeting.

Name: nick
Line: okay, look, i get it, people. i'm the lame it guy, and everybody hates me.

Name: jim
Line: hey, listen man, you can't take it personally.

Name: nick
Line: you called me man? i just said my name just now, did you forget it already?

Name: jim
Line: no... sport.

Name: nick
Line: you, you guys have fifteen parties a week, you can't learn my name?

Name: dwight
Line: hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey it guy. here's the story, champ. none of us have spent a lot of time getting to know you, okay? we liked the last guy, siddiq, because he kept to himself, and we also thought he might have been a terrorist. you know what, i'm going to leave you with one other thought. inner city kids use computers for two things, games and porn. so good luck wasting your life, lurch.

Name: nick
Line: thank you so much for that. i saw all your hard drives, and guess what? [gestures to ryan] you're not a photographer. [gestures to kelly] and you definitely can't fit into a size two. darryl, man, you're on facebook. why you been telling people you're not on facebook? people want to be your friend, man! all right? and you. [points to andy] this guy, you're the one who told the press. you wrote an e-mail to the editor. i saw it, and i also saw a quicktime movie of your little printer fire test on your hard drive. this guy's the snitch, he's the snitch. so that's it, check it out. [gives the finger]

Name: andy
Line: you're going to believe that guy?

Name: jo
Line: when i was growing up, there was nothing better than being a big old business tycoon. and i thought i'd break that glass ceiling and be a hero to all those little girls out there... and they'd make a barbie out of me.

Name: michael
Line: hmm, hmm.

Name: jo
Line: i, did i sell cheap printers? i do. but if i have to go out there in front of the press and make one of them public apology recalls, i mean, it's all i'll ever be remembered for. nobody will want to play with my barbie.

Name: michael
Line: you know, i would be willing, under the right circumstances, to do that for you.

Name: jo
Line: oh honey, surely you don't want that.

Name: michael
Line: i, i surely do, and don't call me honey. [jo laughs] you were playing too.

Name: dwight
Line: i'm about to buy this building, you know.

Name: hank
Line: you don't say? i own a one-eighth share in a rental property down in pittston.

Name: dwight
Line: well, i'm one-eighths proud of you... enjoy that chair for now... 'cause pretty soon, you will be on your feet, at buckingham palace.

Name: andy
Line: hey phyllis, have you seen my bag?

Name: phyllis
Line: [points to the ceiling] you deserve it.

Name: andy
Line: look, i didn't want houses and schools to burn down, and children to die. does that make me a hero? i...

Name: kevin
Line: [offscreen] no, it does not!

Name: andy
Line: well, it doesn't make me the worst guy in the world, either.

Name: angela
Line: it does!

Name: erin
Line: andy?

Name: andy
Line: hey.

Name: erin
Line: i wanted to say that i think it was very brave of you to go to the press.

Name: andy
Line: uh, thanks. yeah, you know, just seemed like the right thing to do.

Name: erin
Line: yeah.

Name: michael
Line: [to press] we at sabre have betrayed the trust that we have built with our customers. we regret our slow response and our lapse in candor and judgment. at this time, we are issuing a full recall of all sabre gh400 printers. we will not rest until this problem is solved. there will be no questions. are there any questions?

Name: jo
Line: hey, i appreciate you reading that statement. you looked pretty up there.

Name: michael
Line: that was fun.

Name: jo
Line: i hope your rough patch ends soon.

Name: michael
Line: thanks. today helped.

Name: jo
Line: well, give me a shout if i can brighten your life.

Name: michael
Line: okay. hey, you could transfer holly back from nashua.

Name: jo
Line: let me see what i can do.

Name: stanley
Line: [to toby, who's filming] you fallin' behind.

Name: ryan
Line: [jumps in front of camera] wuphf.com!

Name: kelly
Line: ryan, we're doing the dance!

Name: ryan
Line: this is how you build a business. this is how you make it in this country.

Name: creed
Line: [bluetooth rings] you got creed.

Name: ryan
Line: -and you jump in front of them.

Name: kelly
Line: you make it so hard to love you sometimes.

Name: stanley
Line: still behind.

Name: angela
Line: [closing door] i said i didn't want to be on the internet!

Name: andy
Line: go, go, go, go!

Name: michael
Line: [performs magic-tricks while lip-syncing]

Name: all
Line: streamers! [everyone throws streamers in the air and starts dancing]

Name: dwight
Line: hiya! ha! [climbs on phyllis' desk and starts kicking things off, bites off the head of a stuffed animal]

Name: phyllis
Line: dwight! [dwight pulls out a hunting knife and jumps off desk]

Name: stanley
Line: are you crazy?

Name: andy
Line: [song ends] toby, how did we do?

Name: toby
Line: well, that was better.

Name: andy
Line: whoo! we did it! [everyone starts cheering]

Name: michael
Line: i suppose summer had to end sometime. it's sad, though, because i had a great summer. i got west nile virus, lost a ton of weight. then i went back to the lake. i stepped on a piece of glass in the parking lot, which hurt. that got infected even though i peed on it. saw 'inception.' or at least i dreamt i did.

Name: andy
Line: brocolli rob, obviously, will be there.

Name: erin
Line: yes, of course.

Name: andy
Line: and jc. we call him blorville, because he looks like a black orville redenbacher.

Name: erin
Line: who's the guy who invented the peanut?

Name: gabe
Line: hey, guys.

Name: andy
Line: hey!

Name: gabe
Line: sorry, didn't mean to interrupt.

Name: andy
Line: not at all.

Name: gabe
Line: i'm gonna head back to siberia there. ciao. [he and erin kiss]

Name: gabe
Line: i started dating erin this summer. it has been, in a word, exquisite.

Name: erin
Line: gabe is awesome. he has accomplished so much career-wise and height-wise. thank god he's my boss because i would not have said yes to a first date if i didn't have to, but... it's been great.

Name: andy
Line: am i angry that gabe stole my girlfriend over the summer? no. i've been through anger-management, ok? so right now, i am sitting on a nice beach at cape cod, gazing out across the whitecaps. oh, look, it's a humpback whale. how pretty. he's eating gabe.

Name: pam
Line: [goes to change thermostat as dwight puts a locked cover over it] hey. what are you doing?

Name: dwight
Line: from now on, if you're hot, sit on an ice pack.

Name: kevin
Line: well, what if you're cold?

Name: dwight
Line: like you'd ever be cold, kevin. stop asking me hypothetical questions, ok? i'm too busy.

Name: jim
Line: hey, dwight, i don't know if you heard, but we're supposed to be drinking out of weird backpacks instead of cups, like regular people.  oh, you did hear.

Name: dwight
Line: [drinking from camelback] jim, you have one job to do. and you do it forgettably.  those of us who are busy require hands-free hydration.

Name: dwight
Line: dwight schrute, star salesman, beet farmer, bed-and-breakfast proprietor, aspiring freelance bodyguard. add to that list owner of this building. then burn the list.

Name: kelly
Line: this summer, i did the minority executive training program at yale. you guys, i'm, like, really smart now. you don't even know. you could ask me, "kelly, what's the biggest company in the world?" and i'd be like, "blah blah blah, blah blah blah blah blah blah," giving you the exact right answer.

Name: luke
Line: coffee monkey's arrived.

Name: oscar
Line: the coffee's supposed to be here at 9.

Name: luke
Line: here you go, big o. tiny. [hands kevin his coffee] darryl hannah.

Name: darryl
Line: it says decaf. you get me decaf?

Name: luke
Line: ooh, yeah. must've been some sort of mix-up there. you could just drink it, or i could drive all the way back?

Name: darryl
Line: my summer, i, um, blew out my knee playing softball. ended up watching cnn most of the time. i don't know how we're going to get out of afghanistan. i hate the new assistant. he's only been here for a week, and i hate him.

Name: andy
Line: new guy sucks. calls me the nard-man. i'm the nard-dog, okay? nard-man is my father.

Name: luke
Line: my name is luke cooper. i love cinema. my favorite movies are citizen kane and the boondock saints.

Name: andy
Line: that kid is the worst. needs to be fired, michael.

Name: michael
Line: he's not the worst, okay? he's not the worst. you know who's the worst? that intern we had a few years ago. that guy-remember? eeeh! that face, how ugly he was? he was the worst. good worker, though. [starts drinking coffee] ah! it's not cappuccino.

Name: oscar
Line: he messed yours up to.

Name: darryl
Line: he's got to go, mike.

Name: michael
Line: it's just coffee, guys! but, yeah, i'll look into it, okay?

Name: jim
Line: wow, that's a lot of keys.

Name: dwight
Line: the bigger the key chain, the more powerful the man.

Name: jim
Line: that's right. the janitor said that. by the way, the raccoons are back.

Name: dwight
Line: where?

Name: jim
Line: i think they run through these panels and then down under the map. i wouldn't know for sure cause i don't have a trained ear. that's why i have to use one of these. [pulls out stethoscope]

Name: dwight
Line: give me that.

Name: jim
Line: yep. wait, and this. [hands dwight a hammer]

Name: dwight
Line: yes.

Name: jim
Line: go get 'em.

Name: jim
Line: what happened to me this summer? dwight bought the building, so actually, this has been the busiest summer of my life.

Name: dwight
Line: [jim quietly takes dwight's keychain and starts adding keys to it, pam giggles] hey, what's so funny over here? ha. very nice. give me my keys. [removes keys and throws them at jim] ha. ha. not. funny. jim.

Name: pam
Line: sorry.

Name: jim
Line: oh, no. don't worry about it. i was just gonna put a couple keys on it every day until christmas. then his pants would have fallen down, which was a little gift to me, but...

Name: pam
Line: it was really funny.

Name: jim
Line: well, it would have been. so unprofessional, mrs. halpert.

Name: pam
Line: i love you.

Name: phyllis
Line: luke? luke!

Name: luke
Line: what's up, venus?

Name: phyllis
Line: did you send those samples to justin at lehigh motors yesterday? because he didn't get 'em.

Name: luke
Line: uh, if you asked me to do it, i'm sure i did it. yeah, strawberries are ripe.

Name: meredith
Line: hey, turn off the chumbawamba and scram, twerp.

Name: luke
Line: you don't have to yell.

Name: michael
Line: okay, rude. luke, i want you to go to the supermarket for me.

Name: luke
Line: what for?

Name: michael
Line: to get some ice cream for everybody. it's national ice cream afternoon. great.

Name: michael
Line: and another thing i did this summer, i hired my nephew.

Name: michael
Line: having luke here is a pretty big deal for me, because his mother, who also happens to be my half-sister, kind of cut me off from that side of the family 15 years  a-  14. the last time i saw luke was the opening day of 'ace ventura ii' and that was '95, so yes, 15 years on the dot. anyway, i lost him in a forest.

Name: michael
Line: don't bother luke.

Name: pam
Line: why is there a circle with a line through it?

Name: michael
Line: that means don't. haven't you seen ghostbusters, pam?

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah, but it's like you're saying we should bother luke.

Name: michael
Line: no, it... yes, okay, right. [erases don't] all right, yep. my bad. i got it. here we go. [writes "don't"  in front of symbol]

Name: darryl
Line: don't don't bother luke. got it.

Name: michael
Line: come on. okay, um... [draws a circle around "don't" with a line through it] that's as clear as i can make it.

Name: phyllis
Line: hey, why can't we bother luke? he deserves it.

Name: michael
Line: because i don't want it getting back to sabre that we're yelling at assistants. i think it would reflect poorly on us.

Name: dwight
Line: who's gonna tell on us? gabe?

Name: gabe
Line: that'd be hilarious. uh, "jo, they're creating a hostile work environment. stop  'em."

Name: michael
Line: nope, it won't be gabe but actually, there is somebody in the office that is very, very close to luke.

Name: dwight
Line: how close?

Name: michael
Line: well, dwight, he wiped his butt. is that close enough for you?

Name: dwight
Line: yes. of course.

Name: toby
Line: guys, i think michael and luke are related.

Name: michael
Line: no. no, toby. he's not. yes he is. he's my nephew.

Name: all
Line: what?

Name: michael
Line: luke is my nephew.

Name: oscar
Line: michael, that's nepotism. luke is getting special treatment because he's your nephew.

Name: michael
Line: yes, exactly. that is a very nice way of putting it, oscar. mixing family and business is a beautiful thing.

Name: darryl
Line: what's wrong with a level playing field?

Name: michael
Line: do you think they should have had open auditions for the band hanson? what if no one named hanson showed up? that wouldn't even make sense. or what if they just hired the littlest kid and a 50-year-old guy who was a murderer? really safe.

Name: jim
Line: oh, man, so many points being made.

Name: creed
Line: i couldn't care less about nepotism. but, i'm loving the debate. great minds battling it out. and i've got a front row seat.

Name: michael
Line: god, when he needed help on earth, who did he hire? jesus christ, his son.

Name: erin
Line: that's a really tight argument.

Name: michael
Line: thank you.

Name: jim
Line: but you're comparing you and luke to god and jesus.

Name: michael
Line: no! no. i'm just saying, why does god get to do something that i don't?

Name: oscar
Line: this is hypothetical. we're talking about luke who happens to be terrible.

Name: michael
Line: well, then, why aren't you bugging me to fire everybody who's bad? you just want me to fire luke. that's reverse nepotism.  he should not be punished because he is related to me and bad at what he does!

Name: kelly
Line: i would just like to say something off of what darryl said about the level playing field. that is actually a zoning issue. so, thank you.

Name: oscar
Line: if there's nothing wrong with this, michael, why have you been keeping it a secret?

Name: michael
Line: because i wanted you to come to me and say, "wow, he is so great." and i was gonna say, "well, it's in the genes." and i was actually gonna be wearing jeans. and i'd point to them, right? no. but you ruined it. so, thank you very much. here he comes. guys, look. i don't want you to treat him like anyone else in the office. i just want you to treat him like my nephew. hey, there he is.

Name: erin
Line: hey! ice cream afternoon!

Name: michael
Line: whoo! whoo! whoo!

Name: kevin
Line: wait, soy ice cream? did you get real ice cream?

Name: pam
Line: or enough for everyone?

Name: luke
Line: no, man. there was no list. uh, but i got bagel chips.

Name: oscar
Line: ah, my favorite part of an ice cream party. the bagel chips.

Name: andy
Line: clutch cream run, bro.

Name: pam
Line: get whatever you want, on me.

Name: jim
Line: you really think you can make it up to me with food?

Name: pam
Line: i don't know. that usually works.

Name: pam
Line: i feel horrible for blowing jim's prank. i don't know if you can tell, but he's mildly upset. and dwight hasn't been messed with in a while, so he's become a monster. i need to make this right.

Name: angela
Line: i came down here to feed the feral cats like i usually do and i found something unsavory in the back of your nephew's car.

Name: michael
Line: ok, you know what? just -just back off! back off!

Name: phyllis
Line: well, take a look. it's all the packages he was supposed to overnight. he never bothered to send them.

Name: michael
Line: all right, those might be his. he might own an ebay store.

Name: jim
Line: yep. that's exactly what my first thought was. and then i remembered having a conversation with him where he was like, "i don't own an ebay store," so...

Name: michael
Line: ok, ok. you know what? this is disgusting. this is like a witch hunt. this is like the blair witch hunt project.

Name: oscar
Line: oh sure, those are the expense reports that corporate was waiting for yesterday.

Name: stanley
Line: let's just make this kid open this damn car.

Name: erin
Line: oh my gosh, those are the pants he wanted to return to talbots.

Name: michael
Line: i'm reconsidering sending them back anyway.

Name: andy
Line: you get that kid to open this car, or i'm gonna do it myself... by calling tripple a.

Name: michael
Line: wait a minute.

Name: meredith
Line: [breaks into the car] i'm in.

Name: michael
Line: don't-all right. well, ok, you've just committed a felony.

Name: oscar
Line: yep, here they are.

Name: phyllis
Line: yep, i just lost a client cause i swore i sent these samples on time.

Name: andy
Line: this kid's costing us sales, michael.

Name: erin
Line: i'm sorry, do you want to try them on again to see.

Name: michael
Line: no, i know they fit. it's not about the fit.

Name: jo
Line: why is this my problem, michael?

Name: michael
Line: because gabe tattled. i was perfectly happy to just hide it from you.

Name: gabe
Line: those overnight packages needed to go out, and michael refuses to hold the guilty party accountable.

Name: jo
Line: lower yourself, gabe. i don't wanna be having a conversation with your crotch. ok, educate me now why you won't fire the boy.

Name: michael
Line: you don't have all the facts.

Name: jo
Line: which are?

Name: michael
Line: i love him.

Name: jo
Line: oh, god. how far has it gone?

Name: michael
Line: no. no. he's my nephew.

Name: jo
Line: well, i got a nephew too. but he don't work for me. you know why? cause he's a screw-up. he can swim in my pool but he can't come in my house.

Name: michael
Line: well, this office is my pool. and my house is my house. and i just want my nephew to work in my pool.

Name: jo
Line: if you keep him, michael, i'm gonna hold you accountable for him. you're on the hook for this kid. you got that? cover his ass like tighty-whities.

Name: michael
Line: i will cover his ass like moss on a mississippi tree stump.

Name: jo
Line: was how i put it not clear enough? i mean, you had to go and make up your own saying? deal with it, boys.

Name: michael
Line: luke and i have been working side-by-side as master and commander. me as master, he as commander. occasionally he will need a little push, and i will do that, and he'll slow down, and i'll push him again. that's the thing with kids, you have to keep pushing. you have to push them until they push you back. and then you push some more. it's all about give and take, but mostly it's about pushing each other.

Name: kevin
Line: oh, yeah. this'll be easy. so just, like, rearrange the buttons and stuff.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, yeah. like when he presses "doors closed" the doors open. or he presses "lobby" it goes to third floor, stuff like that. can you do that?

Name: kevin
Line: yeah. let me take a look at the circus board.

Name: pam
Line: dwight is about to get so pammed.

Line: hey, did you sms text message me?

Name: pam
Line: yeah, i wanted to show you something in the lobby. come on.

Name: dwight
Line: [as elevator doors won't shut] okay, that's weird. just hitting "door closed." what?

Name: pam
Line: there we go.

Name: dwight
Line: is this elevator going up? hey, the elevator is disobeying us! [elevator stops between floors]  okay, okay. we are stuck. we are stuck. hank, hank! can you hear us? oh, my god. okay. emergency protocol.

Name: pam
Line: let's just calm down.

Name: dwight
Line: pam, try and pry open those front doors, immediately.

Name: pam
Line: i don't-

Name: dwight
Line: use your talons! pry 'em open! [starts to urinate in elevator corner]

Name: pam
Line: ok, dwi-oh, my god!

Name: dwight
Line: well, don't look, freak!

Name: pam
Line: dwight, what are you doing!? we've only been in here for, like, two seconds!

Name: dwight
Line: i've got 56 ounces of fluid in my bladder! and we have to establish a pee corner!

Name: pam
Line: you've gotta be kidding me.

Name: michael
Line: luke is going to use his laser pointer to point to account setup. you click on that first, then a whole new-not, no, no, no! [luke points laser at oscar's forehead] luke, come on. come on. not on oscar's head. alright. luke, come on. stop it!

Name: luke
Line: what? i'm stopping it. that's what you said.

Name: michael
Line: give me the pointer.

Name: luke
Line: so you just want me to move it? you're being totally unclear here. i'm just gonna go ahead and move it. [points it at angela's chest]

Name: michael
Line: no, just power it down. no, no, no, no, no. not on angela's boob. come on. come on. luke, seriously.

Name: luke
Line: all right, fine. fine. i'll just go.

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: luke
Line: i'm gone.

Name: michael
Line: all right. okay. good job. okay, email accounts. so we're starting with account setup-

Name: andy
Line: oh, my god, is it in my eyeball? i think he's burning my eye.

Name: angela
Line: michael, do something.

Name: meredith
Line: sack up, man.

Name: michael
Line: okay, can i have that?

Name: luke
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: ok, i am going to count down from five.

Name: both
Line: five, four...

Name: michael
Line: i'm not kidding.

Name: both
Line: three, two, one.

Name: michael
Line: give-okay. alright, give it up.

Name: luke
Line: no!

Name: michael
Line: [bending luke over desk, spanking him repeatedly] you are going to learn to be more professional, luke!

Name: luke
Line: what the?

Name: michael
Line: that's what you're going to do, luke!

Name: luke
Line: what the hell was that?

Name: michael
Line: i had to do that.

Name: luke
Line: hey, [bleep] this! screw it!

Name: michael
Line: all right. are we good? [luke runs out crying] you're okay. he's okay. there are many different schools of thought on capital punishment.

Name: kevin
Line: that was awesome!

Name: stanley
Line: texas justice.

Name: kelly
Line: yeah, your nephew is so lame.

Name: creed
Line: he's been trashing us relentlessly on twitter. yeah, it's funny stuff, but mean.

Name: jim
Line: you follow him on twitter?

Name: creed
Line: everywhere i look it's betty white this and betty white that. finally a kid that's not talking about betty white. of course i follow him.

Name: gabe
Line: michael, you just physically assaulted an employee. can we talk in private?

Name: michael
Line: yes, of course. what is this in reference to?

Name: jim
Line: pam?

Name: pam
Line: oh, hey jim. some prankster switched the elevator buttons on dwight.

Name: jim
Line: i did not do this.

Name: pam
Line: i know. yeah, and it was going really great at first. i got video.

Name: jim
Line: this is impressive.

Name: pam
Line: well, you know... they don't call me the bart simpson of scranton for nothing.

Name: jim
Line: do they call you that?

Name: pam
Line: they do call me that.

Name: jim
Line: come on, give me your hand. i'll help you down.

Name: pam
Line: nope. scared of getting cut in half. also, there's pee on the floor.

Name: jim
Line: oh! of course there is. hey, chinese tonight?

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: great.

Name: dwight
Line: how ya doin'?

Name: jim
Line: pretty good. you must be almost out of water.

Name: pam
Line: stop drinking the water! stop!

Name: andy
Line: [phyllis and andy act out luke getting spanked] no, no, no, no. it's the other hand. right hand. yeah.

Name: michael
Line: would have been nice to work with my family. it would have been nice if luke had been able to stay here. but he couldn't. these things seldom work out. i don't know how ringling brothers do it. night after night, town after town, all across america. you would think they'd be sick of each other by now. but, clearly, they make it work. and my hat's off to them.

Name: andy
Line: [dwight starts aggressively spanking andy] whoa! whoa! hey. whoa. dwight! stop!

Name: gabe
Line: legal says the best way to protect us from a lawsuit is to call this a stress-induced outburst.  you will have to undergo six sessions of counseling.

Name: michael
Line: that's it? really? that's nothing. all right. that's highway robbery.

Name: gabe
Line: good. well, that's the spirit.

Name: michael
Line: i can do that.

Name: gabe
Line: and, uh, you will do your counseling right here, because our hr staff are all certified counselors.

Name: michael
Line: okay. wait, what?

Name: toby
Line: yeah, i'm really looking forward to working with you, michael.

Name: michael
Line: is there another option?

Name: gabe
Line: the alternative is termination. [michael stares off, considering termination...]

Name: dwight
Line: wow. late every day this week.

Name: pam
Line: we signed cici up for this daycare. it's on the other side of town. the traffic...

Name: dwight
Line: why didn't i think of this before? did you know that there is a daycare center opening right here in this building?

Line: is there really?

Name: dwight
Line: now that i own the building, i'm looking for new sources of revenue. and a daycare center... ha ha ha [laughing maniacally] well i guess it's not an evil idea. it's just a regular idea. but there is no good laugh for a regular idea.

Name: dwight
Line: welcome to the sesame avenue daycare center for infants and toddlers.

Name: jim
Line: aaah!

Name: mose
Line: aaah!

Line: you remember my cousin mose.

Line: welcome children.

Line: were you painting in the dark?

Line: wait. is this your place dwight?

Line: oh no. i like to think of it as a kids place. would you like a tour?

Name: pam
Line: i don't really think we need...

Name: jim
Line: oh... lets take the tour pam.

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: dwight

Name: meredith
Line: thanks, hun.

Name: jim
Line: meredith was the perfect choice to play the head of the company. her lunch break lined up with our appointment with danny and...that's it. that's really all we were looking for.

Name: danny
Line: danny cordray. it's great to meet you.

Name: meredith
Line: meredith van helsing. pleased to meet you.

Name: jim
Line: meredith van helsing?

Name: dwight
Line: van helsing was a respected professor before he was a vampire killer.

Name: jim
Line: okay. but what is he more famous for?

Name: michael
Line: shhh! hey! that's my mug.

Name: jim
Line: you know this isn't real tv, right?

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: darryl and andy
Line: [singing] please mr. president, if you wanna give hope a whirl, bring our troops home safe and sound, says this little girl.

Name: andy
Line: [in falsetto] please mr. president-

Name: darryl
Line: one second, one second, one second. [stops playing] so, this song is from the point of view of a little girl?

Name: andy
Line: yeah.

Name: darryl
Line: but you're singing it.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, but i'm using my falsetto.

Name: darryl
Line: no, that's not a good idea. i don't see that as a very good song.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, well, it'd sound a lot better if you actually sang with some soul.

Name: darryl
Line: oh, i never sing with soul.

Name: andy
Line: that's a lie.

Name: kevin
Line: i could sing it.

Name: andy
Line: i just was hoping to maybe save your voice in case we did a novelty song about frogs.

Name: kevin
Line: but my voice is unique. like bob dylan.

Name: andy
Line: okay, three-way argument between a drummer, a keyboardist, and the front man lead singer. wonder who's gonna win this one. two, three, four-

Name: danny
Line: i'm gonna take off my coat, if you don't mind. it's a bit warm in here.

Name: meredith
Line: hel-lo!

Name: michael
Line: oh, no, no. no. don't-

Name: dwight
Line: people can't keep their true natures hidden for long, and this guy is smoldering like a tire fire.

Name: michael
Line: testify.

Name: jim
Line: okay, he's not that good-looking. i don't understand why everybody's obsessed with this-

Name: michael
Line: yeah, he is that good-looking.

Name: dwight
Line: he's very, very handsome.

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: meredith
Line: that's a great set of shoulder's you got there. what is that...genetics? creatine? [phone rings] sorry. yeah?

Name: michael
Line: pull it together, all right? stop lookin' at him.

Name: meredith
Line: i'm sorry. [hangs up] you're here to sell me some paper.

Name: danny
Line: well, actually, uh... no, miss van helsing, that's not why i'm here. i'm here to meet you, see if we'd be a, you know, good fit.

Name: meredith
Line: what do you mean?

Name: michael
Line: oh...my god! he's making her sell to him.

Name: andy
Line: [everyone finishes listening to song] okay. honest feedback time. oscar?

Name: oscar
Line: it's pandering. and it makes me think you think i'm stupid.

Name: andy
Line: but do you think it could be famous? like in a car commercial or something?

Name: pam
Line: not really. it's kinda weird that a grown man is singing from the point of view of a little girl.

Name: andy
Line: i feel like i can see someone ice skating to it. you know, like in the olympics.

Name: ryan
Line: i-i don't think they usually...skate to such...bad songs.

Name: andy
Line: rude. and not helpful.

Name: creed
Line: well, i really, really, really liked it.

Name: andy
Line: well, that...really bums me out.

Name: creed
Line: you're welcome.

Name: danny
Line: we should think of this as a first date. and i think it's going very well, how 'bout you?

Name: meredith
Line: real well. uh...feels more like a third date to me.

Name: danny
Line: ha ha, okay, there you go! [phone rings, meredith answers]

Name: michael
Line: stay-

Name: meredith
Line: shut up and let me do this! [hangs up] you know, what is with this desk keeping us so far apart?

Name: danny
Line: i've never been a desk man. always traveling on the road. come on...why not, huh?

Name: dwight
Line: oh...

Name: danny
Line: well, we'll get this...[meredith unbuttons]

Name: michael
Line: oh!

Name: dwight
Line: oh, man!

Name: meredith
Line: so, what's your drink? you a vodka man? me too.

Name: jim
Line: we gotta get someone else in there right now.

Name: jim
Line: you're an exec at pennsylvania solartech and-

Name: oscar
Line: that sounds fake.

Name: jim
Line: what do you mean?

Name: dwight
Line: i told you! you're an exec at stark industries, a corporation you inherited from your father-

Name: jim
Line: will you stop? stop it, stop it. here's the story-they need meredith somewhere else asap, okay?

Name: oscar
Line: okay.

Name: jim
Line: so you're taking over. you just gotta get her out of there as soon as you can.

Name: oscar
Line: all right. i can do that. then what?

Name: dwight
Line: then make him pitch to you.

Name: jim
Line: yes.

Name: dwight
Line: we gotta see what he's got.

Name: jim
Line: exactly. you can do this.

Name: dwight
Line: okay, and remember-you're not gay.

Name: jim
Line: stop it! it's gonna be great.

Name: oscar
Line: okay.

Name: jim
Line: and listen if anything else happens, just...roll with it.

Name: oscar
Line: meredith, i-

Name: meredith
Line: oh, manuel! this is manuel, my cleaning man. he doesn't speak any english.

Name: danny
Line: hola. que tal?

Name: oscar
Line: como estas, senor?

Name: meredith
Line: uh, manuel, cleano el window.

Name: jim
Line: who else we got?

Name: dwight
Line: okay. you're a young hotshot from stark industries. you've just bought this company. meredith is fired. it's a whole new regime. he's gotta pitch to you now.

Name: ryan
Line: okay. stark industries isn't real. i run google. larry and sergey brought me in-

Name: jim
Line: great. sounds awesome. just have him pitch to you.

Name: michael
Line: don't let us down.

Name: ryan
Line: [points to jim] will do. [points to michael] won't do.

Name: danny
Line: yeah, sure.

Name: meredith
Line: you smell like a scorpio. [ryan enters] this is...esteban...another cleaning man. he doesn't speak english either. esteban, el flooro.

Name: danny
Line: you know what? i may have parked my car in a compact space, and i hate when i see others do that, so-

Name: meredith
Line: danny, i feel a real connection to you, and i gotta get real, i'm-

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no....

Name: jim
Line: no, no, no, no...

Name: michael
Line: i'm goin 'in!

Name: dwight
Line: michael! no, michael, stop it! no!

Name: michael
Line: stop, stop! oh, my god! [enters office] okay. stop it, stop it, stop it. gross! stop it, please. everybody, stop.

Name: danny
Line: michael scott.

Name: michael
Line: i said stop. okay, danny...this is not pennsylvania solartech. this is dunder-mifflin paper company. this is meredith palmer-

Name: meredith
Line: please to meet you-

Name: michael
Line: don't! get away from him. please, just leave. get out of here. go. forever.

Name: danny
Line: hmm.

Name: michael
Line: i owe you...a most sincere and humble apology. we were trying to watch you to see your sales technique, so we could stop losing so many clients to you.

Name: danny
Line: but from where?

Name: michael
Line: a surveillance room next to this one.

Name: danny
Line: okay, so you...set up this fake company, then you hired this homeless woman to impersonate an executive to spy on me so that you could copy my sales technique?

Name: michael
Line: yes. and it's the sincerest form of flattery.

Name: danny
Line: or...crazy.

Name: michael
Line: well-

Name: danny
Line: i'm gonna go.

Name: michael
Line: okay. you know what, it wasn't just me. jim and dwight are behind that wall in the surveillance room and it was their plan as well.

Name: dwight
Line: no!

Name: jim
Line: no, no, no, no.

Name: danny
Line: oh, well then, yeah. all right. hey! [knocking on wall] good luck, guys. seems like you got a great operation here.

Name: michael
Line: no, we don't. here's-here's my point. danny, listen, you have to understand that we are not normally like this. we just-we wanted to know your tricks.

Name: danny
Line: what do you mean, my tricks? there's no tricks, man. i'm just a good salesman. you wanna copy that? you can't copy that! [opens door to leave]

Name: michael
Line: you are, you are. you are! stop it, stop it. stop. [closes door] you are a good salesman. and because of that...i want you to work for me.

Name: danny
Line: sure. you seem like a fun, professional guy.

Name: michael
Line: so, you will?

Name: danny
Line: [opening door again to leave] no!

Name: michael
Line: hold it, hold it. [forcing door closed] hold on, hold on. wait, wait, wait, wait. wait. wait. danny, i want you to look at me. do you want your life to be better...or to be worse or to stay the same?

Name: danny
Line: get out of my way.

Name: michael
Line: answer the question. do you want a better life, danny?

Name: danny
Line: i swear to god, i'm gonna hit you. i didn't mean that. i'm sorry. i'm not-it's just i'm very upset right now.

Name: michael
Line: i know, i know.

Name: danny
Line: i'm very upset!

Name: michael
Line: do you want more freedom, less freedom, or to stay the same?

Name: danny
Line: more freedom.

Name: michael
Line: i can give you more money-there's your better life. i can let you come and go as you please-there's your freedom. and you already know dunder-mifflin has the best service and the best prices, but you beat us anyway. can you imagine how well you would do selling our stuff?

Name: michael
Line: everyone, may i have your attention? i would like to introduce you to mr. danny cordray. he is going to be joining us as our new traveling salesman. say hello to danny!

Name: kelly
Line: [bleep] me!

Name: michael
Line: o-kay. you know what? no. no. this is not some sort of construction site...or all of italy, where you can just go around treating people like meat. we are to respect him. i respect him because he reminds me of somebody. can anybody guess who that is?

Name: kelly
Line: josh duhamel.

Name: angela
Line: yeah, i can see that.

Name: michael
Line: no. no. no. somebody in this office.

Name: kevin
Line: he's like a better-looking andy.

Name: andy
Line: thanks, kevin.

Name: michael
Line: no, me. right? sorta like...a little younger version of me.

Name: oscar
Line: it's hard to judge ourselves accurately, isn't it.

Name: dwight
Line: michael?

Name: michael
Line: yes.

Name: dwight
Line: can i talk to you about something?

Name: michael
Line: no, you may not.

Name: dwight
Line: it's about this very announcement you just made.

Name: michael
Line: i said no.

Name: dwight
Line: michael-

Name: michael
Line: we're not-

Name: jim
Line: michael, i think you really want to talk to him.

Name: michael
Line: okay. let's-all right, all right. let's talk. please don't let him leave. [pointing to danny] don't leave. don't let him.

Name: erin
Line: gotcha. [they go into michael's office]

Name: jim
Line: you hired him?

Name: michael
Line: guys, let me ask you something. do you want your life to be better or worse or stay the same?

Name: all
Line: stay the same.

Name: michael
Line: okay. well...get ready, 'cause it's gonna get better.

Name: phyllis
Line: it's not gonna get better; he's gonna steal all of our clients.

Name: michael
Line: no, no. wrong. he would have stolen your clients, but you know what? he can't now. this guy used to steal sales from us; now, he's going to steal sales for us.

Name: dwight
Line: where's he gonna sit? there's no more seats.

Name: michael
Line: he doesn't need to sit, he's a traveling salesman. look, i am not going to exclude good people from our staff simply because they are threatening to you. and unless you have a better argument than that, i suggest you leave.

Name: stanley
Line: hmpf!

Name: dwight
Line: where's he gonna park? there's no more reserved parking spots.

Name: michael
Line: good-bye!

Name: darryl
Line: song's about truth.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah.

Name: darryl
Line: what's something you really care about?

Name: andy
Line: reverse snobbery.

Name: darryl
Line: more universal.

Name: andy
Line: sometimes i feel like life has passed me by.

Name: darryl
Line: [plays soft chords and sings]  couldn't get outta bed today. wish the alarm clock would go away.

Name: kevin
Line: oh, nice!

Name: andy
Line: holy crap. are you kidding me? you just made that-that's amazing!

Name: darryl
Line: go ahead.

Name: andy
Line: [singing] which me am i gonna be today?

Name: darryl
Line: which me am i gonna be today?

Name: andy
Line: i gotta closet full of mes. am i gonna be the happy me?

Name: kevin
Line: or the me that stinks.

Name: andy
Line: oh, my gosh! we're almost out of time. how much for another half hour?

Name: darryl
Line: oh, don't worry about it.

Name: andy
Line: wait. seriously?

Name: darryl
Line: yeah.

Name: andy
Line: so we're just, like, jamming as friends?

Name: darryl
Line: one, two, three, hit it.

Name: andy
Line: closet full of mes-

Name: danny
Line: oh, you know...funny. your wife and i went on a few dates.

Name: jim
Line: did ya?

Name: danny
Line: yeah. way ,way, way back.

Name: jim
Line: i'm just kidding. she told me about it.

Name: danny
Line: oh. she was not into me.

Name: jim
Line: oh.

Name: danny
Line: obviously. i don't even think she called me back.

Name: dwight
Line: you snubbed her.

Name: jim
Line: dwight, please.

Name: dwight
Line: let me handle this, jim. drop the act, cordray, okay? we all know that you probably thought that pam was too "meh" or thin without being toned. but i wanna tell you something-she is one of the plain hearty women of scranton that make this city great. and so what if she doesn't wear makeup? [pam mouthing "i wear makeup"] we like her better that way! and you steal clients, don't you? don't you!

Name: danny
Line: okay...that's different.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, that's different, is it? okay...thief. you better check your things, people. in fact, where are my keys? oh, there in my pocket. false alarm. okay. [awkward pause] so...you're gonna be workin' here?

Name: danny
Line: uh...i mean-yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: welcome aboard.

Name: danny
Line: thank you.

Name: jim
Line: hey, crazy, um...so...that's it? you're just-you're fine?

Name: dwight
Line: it's after 5:00, jim. i'm not gonna take this home. [shakes danny's hand]

Name: danny
Line: oh.

Name: dwight
Line: pleasure.

Name: danny
Line: thanks.

Name: michael
Line: this morning, danny cordray stole a sale from me. so what do i do? i go out and i steal danny cordray. the sale that mattered, i made. boom. funny thing about it, we don't even need him. we already have packer on the road. chhguuh! crap. i forgot about packer.

Name: kevin
Line: [singing and playing drums] sun's in her eyes, tongue full of flies. would you like to share my paaaaaaad?

Name: all
Line: croak, croak, croak. bullfrog in love. croak, croak, croak. bullfrog in love and i gave her the croak that meant i love you.

Name: darryl
Line: i'll be your croak monsieur.

Name: andy
Line: [falsetto] i'll be your croak madame.

Name: kevin
Line: your mama mighta said that bullfrogs are dogs, but i'm here to tell you that i am a frog! come and sit on my log, you little pollywog.

Name: darryl
Line: i find you absolutely ribbiting!

Name: all
Line: croak, croak, croak. bullfrog in love.

Name: andy
Line: croak, croak, croak. bullfrog in love.

Name: kevin
Line: croak!

Name: andy
Line: ribbit!

Name: darryl
Line: scoopity-splash!

Name: kevin
Line: nice.

Name: andy
Line: what about this one? it's kinda badass, right? just seems kinda crazy in a way i might need right now.

Name: jim
Line: i don't know. [looks at stanley, who took his mug and is drinking out of it] oh! that's... not... yours.

Name: jim
Line: stanley just drank oj out of my mug, and didn't seem to realize that it wasn't his hot coffee. so the question has to be asked, is there no limit to what he won't notice?

Name: stanley
Line: what's a seven letter word for purse?

Name: kevin
Line: [sitting at phyllis' desk, dressed like phyllis; high pitched voice] satchel!

Name: stanley
Line: nope. starts with an h.

Name: andy
Line: [shirtless, wearing only a tie] handbag.

Name: stanley
Line: hmmm. [glances at andy] thank you.

Name: andy
Line: shh! shhh! [watches jim put a cardboard box over stanley's monitor]

Name: michael
Line: [standing outside the conference room, wearing fake teeth, watching stanley walk in] all right, everybody, take a seat. as you may have heard, our branch on the planet jupiter is up eight thousand percent in sales!

Name: all
Line: yay! [applause]

Name: stanley
Line: [looks at the clock, then at his watch] hold up! that clock is slow. it is five o'clock, i will see you all tomorrow:

Name: pam
Line: [turns around, is wearing a mustache] bye, stanley! love you! [waves, stanley leaves]

Name: dwight
Line: [standing next to a pony] so long, stanley!

Name: stanley
Line: night, everybody.

Name: oscar
Line: so what kind of statement are you making with that costume, kevin?

Name: kevin
Line: the statement that i am making, oscar, is that i kind of look like michael moore.

Name: erin
Line: dunder mifflin, this is erin! happy halloween! how can i haunt you today?

Name: michael
Line: a lot of people are really getting into halloween this year! [puts head down over fake bomb made from cardboard, high pitched voice] six seconds, macgruber! [lifts head] pam's got a lot of fun stuff planned! [puts head down, high pitched voice] uh, two seconds macgruber! [lifts head] including a... costume contest, and bobbing for apples, and a ouija board... ohhh! boom! ohh explosion! [throws fake bomb, takes off sunglasses, points to camera] macgruberrrr!

Name: pam
Line: people are really into the costume contest this year. might have something to do with the prize, maybe you've heard of it. the 2011 scranton wilkes-barre coupon book worth over fifteen thousand dollars in savings!

Name: jim
Line: stop.

Name: dwight
Line: [has his hands around jim's neck] too late! if i was the real scranton strangler, you'd be so strangled right now. if you're out there, strangler, you will get caught! by me.

Name: jim
Line: sounds like someone's really trying to convince us that he's not the scranton strangler.

Name: dwight
Line: to my chickens i'm the scranton strangler.  [looks at pam] oh-ho! that's very funny. looks like someone decided to dress up as old dwight schrute's mom.

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: dwight
Line: you're only one third as beautiful and only half her height.

Name: pam
Line: i'm supposed to be olive oyl. and it makes more sense when i'm standing next to popeye, but... jim doesn't want to put his costume on.

Name: jim
Line: [places pipe in mouth] i am popeye!

Name: jim
Line: i've never really been a costume guy. even when i was a kid, it just felt like something i was too old for. and then this morning, when pam hands me this little number [holds up popeye costume, shakes head] ...no.

Name: gabe
Line: [dressed as lady gaga] in case you can't read m-m-my poker face... [laughs] we will be reviewing our sales policies. [accepts note from michael, reads it out loud] i have ten seconds to read them or this whole place blows up.

Name: michael
Line: macgruber!

Name: todd packer
Line: lame. why don't witches wear panties?

Name: michael
Line: oh, here we go!

Name: todd packer
Line: because they need to grip the broom!

Name: michael
Line: [laughs] oh! who likes to water ski on lake erie? no wai-where does dracula like to water ski?

Name: dwight
Line: lake erie.

Name: gabe
Line: when our warehouse workers make deliveries, they're going to be encouraged to offer clients extra products. and then they will split those commissions with sales.

Name: michael
Line: so, wait, drivers are going to be able to sell paper on the road?

Name: gabe
Line: that is correct.

Name: todd packer
Line: has anyone started calling you "gabe-wad" yet?

Name: gabe
Line: not here.

Name: danny
Line: gabe-wad.

Name: gabe
Line: okay, guys, fun is fun, but-

Name: michael
Line: blackula!

Name: darryl
Line: dracula.

Name: michael
Line: oh, so... i almost forgot. you'll find this hilarious. apparently corporate is going to have drivers sell paper on their routes now. that's like, exactly sort of the idea that you had.

Name: darryl
Line: yes. i do remember saying something like that to you.

Name: michael
Line: yeah. i'm sorry. i blew this. you should have gotten credit for that, man.

Name: darryl
Line: i'm just glad we're gonna try it out.

Name: michael
Line: really? we're good?

Name: darryl
Line: yeah. we're cool.

Name: michael
Line: okay. [reaches out and shakes darryl's hand] okay.

Name: darryl
Line: what's under your shirt?

Name: michael
Line: oh. it's a ream of paper. thought you might hit me.

Name: michael
Line: darryl philbin is the greatest guy in the world. and you know what i'd like? i would like to have all the racists brought together and take darryl philbin out to lunch. just to see what they're missing.

Name: toby
Line: [leans hobo sack against the refrigerator] it's a great stick, right?

Name: ryan
Line: it's really good. it's a classic. i think you might win the whole thing with that.

Name: toby
Line: thanks!

Name: oscar
Line: everyone realizes that this coupon book isn't actually worth fifteen thousand dollars, right? you'd have to spend two hundred thousand dollars on crap you don't actually need to get fifteen thousand dollars worth of benefits. i'm not the only one who sees this, right?

Name: toby
Line: no.

Name: ryan
Line: no.

Name: kelly
Line: i get that. i get that.

Name: danny
Line: excuse me, everybody. i want to invite you all to the halloween party i'm having at my bar.

Name: kevin
Line: you own a bar?

Name: danny
Line: public school, at exit 11.

Name: oscar
Line: that's a great name. you're hilarious. a plus!

Name: danny
Line: so. you're all on the list!

Name: ryan
Line: hey, man, can i get a plus five? it's all guys.

Name: creed
Line: hey, what's the crowd like, danny? our age?

Name: danny
Line: okay.

Name: kevin
Line: i don't think that she would leave jim for danny.

Name: phyllis
Line: i don't know, they're both handsome.

Name: dwight
Line: pam is gonna choose whoever has a scent most like that of her father. does anyone remember what her dad smelled like?

Name: phyllis
Line: i think he-

Name: creed
Line: hey hey hey, quiet, here she comes! did you hear about that danny guy? heard he used to date pam.

Name: jim
Line: so four years ago, when i was in stamford, connecticut, and dating someone else, pam went on two dates with danny. which was obviously the greatest love story ever told, given how much people are walking on eggshells around us.

Name: pam
Line: we were basically romeo and juliet.

Name: jim
Line: that's right.

Name: pam
Line: except where juliet doesn't have that great a time and romeo doesn't call back after two dates.

Name: jim
Line: yikes.

Name: pam
Line: but i've learned to love again. [puts her arm on jim's shoulder] he's a cartoon sailor.

Name: jim
Line: oh, no.

Name: pam
Line: and looks so handsome in his uniform! please?

Name: jim
Line: no. no, i'm not gonna-no.

Name: andy
Line: tuna! tuna! do you want us to skip this party?

Name: jim
Line: i don't care.

Name: kevin
Line: i am never gonna forget what danny did to pam. i forget nothing. i'm like an elephant in that way.

Name: andy
Line: you know what else? [pulling fake teeth out of his mouth] the-this... this sucks for jim. right? but it also sucks for us. because we don't get invited to a ton of halloween parties. [puts teeth back in]

Name: kevin
Line: yeah, and everyone else is gonna be there. stanley, phyllis, angela, darryl... creed's a maybe.

Name: andy
Line: [removes teeth] creed's going?!

Name: jim
Line: madge from the warehouse just made her first sale. madge. we should have been doing this a long time ago.

Name: michael
Line: erin! would you please do me a solid and get darryl philbin on the speakerphone?

Name: darryl
Line: [answers phone] hello?

Name: michael
Line: hi, darryl, come out here, please.

Name: darryl
Line: i'm good.

Name: michael
Line: you need to stop being so shy, come out here, and embrace who you really are, superstar!

Name: darryl
Line: this is embarrassing, michael.

Line: [pointing to group of young adults laughing] look at that. look at that. that's fun. we need to do stuff together outside of work. let's go help africa. let's go build an airport. we'll start small. we'll have a car wash. we'll send some cheerleaders to regionals.

Name: little girl
Line: i don't know!

Name: dwight
Line: nothing. life lesson? some tasks are not worth doing.

Name: angela
Line: dwight?

Name: ryan
Line: wuphf t-shirts. who wants one? just imagine that you're at spring break, daytona beach.

Name: michael
Line: here we go.

Name: ryan
Line: everyone's like, "hey dude, whats up with all the hotties in the wuphf shirts?" or, uh, "hey, what's up with that helicopter? it's ry from wuphf!"

Name: michael
Line: "it's ryan the wuphf guy!"

Name: ryan
Line: "yo, ry from wuphf!"

Name: michael
Line: "he's up there."

Name: ryan
Line: "what's he dropping?! wow, what's falling on us, man?!" wuphf condoms! 50,000 condoms out of the sky!

Name: michael
Line: look at that! he threw 'em on the ground!

Name: daryl
Line: look, this is a marketing campgain. you got nine days. let's say you do get the money. what are you going to do with it?

Name: ryan
Line: the first lesson of silicon valley, actually, is that you only think about the user, the experience. you actually don't think about the money. ever.

Name: andy
Line: that sounds weird.

Name: michael
Line: no, it's not weird, andy, and you know what else? we have an offer from washington university. so monetize that.

Name: kelly
Line: [walks in] are you guys meeting about wuphf? you know that that was my idea, right?

Name: kelly
Line: i said to ryan, "i try to call you, and you don't have your phone. i try to i.m. you, and you're not online. i wish there was a way that i could do everything all at once, and i could just be like this little dog going, 'ruff! ruff! ruff! ruff! ruff!'"

Name: ryan
Line: baby, baby, baby--

Name: kelly
Line: i think i'm gonna stay here.

Name: ryan
Line: no, no, no, no, no.

Name: kelly
Line: i do, i do. this isn't right.

Name: ryan
Line: i help you with your things and you help me with my things.

Name: kelly
Line: but i--it's not right.

Name: ryan
Line: [whispering] i got this, it's okay. don't worry about this.

Name: daryl
Line: is it any particular branch of washington university?

Name: ryan
Line: the washington university public health fund.

Name: daryl
Line: w.u.p.h.f.

Name: pam
Line: oh, god!

Name: daryl
Line: they only want it for the initials.

Name: ryan
Line: the domain name. yeah, they do.

Name: pam
Line: i move we sell!

Name: micheal
Line: what?

Name: daryl
Line: yeah, sell!

Name: andy
Line: yeah, sell.

Name: pam
Line: sell.

Name: stanley
Line: get us out of this!

Name: ryan
Line: have some faith in this idea!

Name: daryl
Line: if everybody wants to sell, we sell, right?

Name: michael
Line: i won't sell. and you know what? ryan and i have the majority of shares. isn't that right?

Name: ryan
Line: yes. you alone do, actually.

Name: michael
Line: i--yes. we're not selling. i will not sell.

Name: kevin
Line: [runs to and inside the hay place maze] awesome!

Name: man
Line: do you mind if we share this bale?

Name: angela
Line: sure.

Name: man
Line: there's no charge to sit on the hay, is there?

Name: angela
Line: probably.

Name: man
Line: i mean, wouldn't you think the ten dollars to build your own broom would include the hay and not just the instructions?

Name: angela
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: man
Line: i mean, i'm starting to think this guy is just trying to make money off the holiday.

Name: angela
Line: yeah, instead of hay place, it should be pay place. [man laughs] don't laugh at me.

Name: man
Line: no, no, no, i wasn't--i was just laughing at your joke.

Name: angela
Line: oh.

Name: man
Line: pay place.

Name: angela
Line: mm. yeah, so we can celebrate thanksgiving-me-your-money day. [both laugh]

Name: man
Line: that's humorous.

Name: angela
Line: thank you.

Name: kevin
Line: [stuck in the maze, says to some kids running around in the maze] you guys know how to get out? [kids run away screaming]

Name: pam
Line: hi, michael.

Name: michael
Line: can't talk, saving the planet.

Name: pam
Line: oh, we don't recycle.

Name: michael
Line: we don't? well, why have i been separating the trash into whites and colors?

Name: pam
Line: i'm sure no one asked you to do that.

Name: michael
Line: [throws the sack of garbage onto the floor] eight years.

Name: pam
Line: listen, i know you really like ryan--

Name: michael
Line: no, i won't even consider it.

Name: pam
Line: michael, i... [sits down] i hate to say this, but... you know this special bond that you've always felt with ryan, where, like, you're best friends or you're his mentor or something?

Name: michael
Line: right, yes, yeah. best friend/mentor.

Name: pam
Line: michael, i think that feeling only goes one way. and i think that ryan knows that, and he's taking advantage of you.

Name: michael
Line: i think you are wrong.

Name: pam
Line: and there are a lot of other people in this office who have money at stake. other people you care about.

Name: michael
Line: you may be right. i may be crazy.

Name: pam
Line: don't.

Name: michael
Line: i'm just saying that i think i agree with your point.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, but in a jokey way where you're gonna start singing.

Name: michael
Line: i thought it might make me feel better.

Name: pam
Line: okay. go ahead.

Name: michael
Line: [singing] but it just may be a lunatic... [stops singing] no.

Name: jim
Line: [hovering over meredith's desk] oh, nice, wasting time, here we go.

Name: meridith
Line: hey, back off. it's solitare.

Name: creed
Line: hey, kid--hear you're looking for work.

Name: jim
Line: talk to me.

Name: creed
Line: how far can you reach those lovely long arms of yours? [jim reaching his arms out as far as he can go] eh, put 'em down. how long can you hold that pretty little breath of yours? [jim inhales] good.

Name: gabe
Line: hey, jim? are you distracting these people?

Name: creed
Line: we're working. [jim still holding his breath]

Name: gabe
Line: can you at least try to look busy? [jim exhales]

Name: jim
Line: [listening to and editing jo's book on tape]

Name: jo
Line: "the moment darla put the cupcake in her mouth, her daddy pulled her aside and said, "you're too fat. no one's gonna like you if you're too fat." the next time i saw david geffen was at the buffalo club. "i love you, you gay bastard," i said. "you gay bastard," i s--. "gay ba--" "gay b--""

Name: ryan
Line: michael, how's it going, bro?

Name: michael
Line: good, good, bro.

Name: ryan
Line: hey, thanks so much for having my back out there.

Name: michael
Line: always have your back. so, any ideas on how we can get over this nine-day hump here?

Name: ryan
Line: i have nothing but ideas. the thing is, they all require money.

Name: michael
Line: nine days, though. that's, like...

Name: ryan
Line: look, i know i've tapped you so hard.

Name: michael
Line: yes, you have tapped this. hard.

Name: ryan
Line: [laughs] oh, you are funny, michael. you--people, people don't give you enough credit.

Name: michael
Line: maybe i could take a second mortgage on my condo.

Name: ryan
Line: well, a lot of people are doing that. and there don't seem to be any consequences. and they say the rates have never been lower.

Name: michael
Line: so you would think that's a good idea for me to do?

Name: ryan
Line: think about this. you and me on a private plane flown by our private pilot--

Name: michael
Line: mm-hmm.

Name: ryan
Line: eating our private meal cooked by our private chef.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, well, we never even have dinner now, so...

Name: ryan
Line: we totally should.

Name: michael
Line: tonight?

Name: ryan
Line: i gotta work on this.

Name: michael
Line: oh right. what am i saying? rain check.

Name: ryan
Line: yeah. [michael closes the door]

Name: dwight
Line: and now, by show of applause, we will crown this year's hay king. all in favor of purebred. [crowd applauds] put your hands together for... mixed bread. [crowd applauds] and let's hear it for... purebred. [crowd applauds] mm. it appears we have a three-way tie. i have no choice but to pick the hay king myself. i pick... [all three contestants begging for dwight to pick them] me! i am your hay king! all hail your hay king! [drowd leaves disgusted, as dwight's worker claps]

Name: dwight
Line: did i truck 300 bales of hay to a parking lot to rectify some childhood disappointment? yes.

Name: man
Line: so, if i were to call dunder mifflin and ask for miss angela martin, would i get through to you?

Name: angela
Line: you would. and if i were to call your house and ask for your wife, would i get through to you?

Name: man
Line: my wife passed away a few years ago.

Name: angela
Line: how tragic. very sorry to hear that.

Name: man
Line: thank you.

Name: kevin
Line: [still stuck in maze] help! hello?! oh! help![runs around the maze]

Name: daryl
Line: [opens the door the ryan's office, grabs him by the shirt, pulls him out of his chair] consider it a wuphf in person. [shoves ryan down to a chair]

Name: andy
Line: your doing the wrong thing. you're gonna lose michael's investment. you're gonna lose ours.

Name: daryl
Line: you got this crazy opportunity to get our money back. tell mike to sell.

Name: andy
Line: if you tell michael to sell, he'll sell.

Name: ryan
Line: i'm betting on myself.

Name: stanley
Line: it's a bad bet.

Name: michael
Line: hello.

Name: ryan
Line: hey. it's an ambush here. nobody here believes in this company. will you tell them they're wrong?

Name: daryl
Line: it's not that we don't believe in the company, we don't believe in you.

Name: andy
Line: all those in favor of selling, say aye. [all say "aye"]

Name: michael
Line: i. do not agree to sell, which is to say nay.

Name: daryl
Line: what is wrong with you? what happened to you in high school?

Name: stanley
Line: michael, are you that blind?

Name: michael
Line: i'm not blind! i know exactly who he is. he is selfish and lazy and image-obsessed, and he is a bad friend. [all seem to be in agreenment] and he's also clever. and he shoots incredibly high. and he may just make it. but you know what? even if he doesn't, i would rather go broke betting on my people, than get rich all by myself, on some island like a castaway. and there is no middle ground.

Name: andy
Line: you're gonna lose all of our money.

Name: michael
Line: only if he fails. and you know what? ryan, i believe in you. just like i believe in all of you. you have nine days to save everybody's money.

Name: ryan
Line: oh... uh, that's a lot of pressure. i--i'm gonna need some more time.

Name: michael
Line: you can't have it.

Name: ryan
Line: okay. i won't let you down. [ryan goes back into his office and shuts the door]

Name: dwight
Line: angela? [slides open the door] angela! [see's a note on the door, reads it, and then crumples it up]

Name: michael
Line: the world sends people your way... ryan came to me through a temp agency. andy was transferred here. no idea where creed came from. the point is you just have to play with the cards that you're dealt. [camera pans to different people in the office] jim, that guy is an ace. dwight is my king up my sleeve. phyllis is my old maid. oscar is my queen. that's easy. gimme a hard one. that's what oscar said. toby is the instruction card you throw away. pam's a solid seven. and yeah, you know what? ryan is probably, like, a two. but sometimes twos can be wild. so watch out. and i am obviously the joker. so... [phone rings, computer chimes, etc.] that's uh...

Name: robotic voice
Line: wuphf, from ryan howard. decided to sell company. thanks, bro. hell of a ride.

Name: michael
Line: thank god.

Name: jim
Line: [puts his phone in his coffee mug and calls gabe]

Name: gabe
Line: gabe lewis.

Name: jo
Line: [jim's edited version of her book on tape]: now listen here, gabe, you're too fat. no one's gonna like you if you're too fat. i made some changes to my book. see if you like them.

Name: gabe
Line: well, jo--

Name: jo
Line: now, i love reading, and i hate being interrupted. shut up and listen, you gay bastard. chapter one. i was born, not into luxary, nor poverty. [gabe looks through jo's book] but into adversity, and for that, i thank the lord. my father was a man. that's all we can know.  after i learned to ride a bike, there was no stopping me. i would ride up magnolia stree and down azalea lane. which would later become my--

Name: jim
Line: [opens door to gabe's office] all right, good night, gabe. just wanted to say thanks again. [gabe motions that he's on the phone] 'cause i really think i made good use of my day, oh! sorry.

Name: jo
Line: i've always been a fighter. and fate has obliged me with plenty of battles, the first being a hard--

Name: dwight
Line: [picks up pencil between his toes]

Name: jim
Line: why?

Name: dwight
Line: twenty minutes a day jim, that's all it takes. twenty minutes a day, all feet, no hands and i'll have the pedi-dexterity of a chimp, and you'll be sitting there like an idiot. [attempts to place pencil in pencil sharpener] okay. here we go. ah, yes. [accidentally kicks items from his desk onto pam's]

Name: pam
Line: do you mind?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm sorry pam, allow me to write you an apology letter.

Name: pam
Line: you don't have to do that.

Name: dwight
Line: [typing with his toes] d-e-a. oop, backspace. a. dear.

Name: jim
Line: [whistling, places cup of coffee onto dwight's desk] ahh, thank you hands. nothing else in the universe can do what you do.

Name: dwight
Line: [lifts cup up with toes]

Name: jim
Line: oh, don't worry about it. dwight, its okay. you were wrong.

Name: dwight
Line: [spills hot coffee on himself] uhh, aah!

Name: jim
Line: well, a for effort right?

Name: dwight
Line: [taps jim's hand with his foot]

Name: hank
Line: welcome, start your morning right with a burst of blueberry. or try plain.

Name: andy
Line: what's the occasion?

Name: hank
Line: dwight said this entry was a waste of space.

Name: andy
Line: i would like a muffa du blueberry por favor.

Name: hank
Line: eight dollars.

Name: andy
Line: eight dollars?

Name: dwight
Line: owning a building is a war between the landlord and the tenant. not a literal war, unfortunately, but i am using the same tactics. i've surrounded the enemy, and i'm slowly starving them. to save on electricity i've installed a timer and motion sensors on the lights. it's part of my green initiative. and by green, i mean money.

Name: michael
Line: [examines items on the reception desk] mmhmm, china. china.

Name: erin
Line: how was the dentist?

Name: michael
Line: it was great. china.

Name: pam
Line: are you okay, what's wrong?

Name: michael
Line: everything here was made in china, pam.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, its where they make stuff.

Name: michael
Line: they used to make stuff in america, andy. but we're falling behind, did you know that? china is a sleeping dragon that is just beginning to stir.

Name: erin
Line: oh, no.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, right here. it is right there. [holds up magazine] anybody read the news any more?

Name: dwight
Line: china is on the move?

Name: michael
Line: i found that in the waiting room at the dentist's office. this kid had the magazine i wanted to read, that's the only one i could reach and i read it and then i read it again.

Name: michael
Line: my whole life i believed that america was number one, that was the saying. not america is number two. england is number two. china should be like eight.

Name: darryl
Line: hey andy.

Name: andy
Line: hey darryl.

Name: darryl
Line: you gotta stop texting me so much.

Name: andy
Line: but i wanted you to know that michael and i are wearing the same tie today. it's insane.

Name: darryl
Line: you need to change your standard for what's worthy of a text. ask yourself is this something darryl needs to know. the answers almost always no.

Name: andy
Line: got it. then i will call you.

Name: darryl
Line: no.

Name: darryl
Line: there was a time when the only people who texted you were people you wanted to text you. girls. and they'd all say the same thing. "i'm coming over baby." and i would text back "btb", bring that booty.

Name: stanley
Line: dwight, why is the toilet paper only half a ply?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm sorry, isn't that good enough for your anus? don't get me started on how coddled the modern anus is.

Name: pam
Line: umm, stanley. maybe you could just unspool a little more each time you need to...

Name: stanley
Line: don't tell me how to do my business.

Name: dwight
Line: stanley, as a fellow dunder mifflin employee i feel for you. but, like you, i am completely powerless to the whims of the new building owner.

Name: jim
Line: which is you.

Name: dwight
Line: "which is you" is not a sentence.

Name: jim
Line: i disagree with.

Name: stanley
Line: are you just gonna sit there, office administrator, or are you going to do something?

Name: pam
Line: dwight, can we talk about these cutbacks.

Name: dwight
Line: pam, when i'm sitting at this desk, i'm a salesman. if you wanna talk to the new building owner, you should call nate and schedule and appointment.

Name: pam
Line: i'm not going to do that.

Name: dwight
Line: well then you're not going to talk to the new building owner. which is a shame, because i hear he's a very reasonable guy.

Name: nate
Line: [on the phone] y'ello.

Name: pam
Line: hi nate, its pam halpert.

Name: nate
Line: oh, hey pam.

Name: pam
Line: hey, i would just love to schedule a meeting today with dwight.

Name: nate
Line: let me put you on hold for just one 'eensy sec.

Name: pam
Line: sure.

Name: dwight
Line: [answers phone] dwight schrute. mhm. tell her i'm busy. i don't know, make something up.

Name: nate
Line: hey pam, dwight's being questioned by the police in connection with a string of dog-nappings that ha...

Name: pam
Line: [hangs up phone] dwight. dwight. can you please tell new building owner that he is screwing over all the people he works with, people he's worked with for years. his friends.

Name: dwight
Line: you know what pam? you're right. this isn't just a business. this is a home, and i would much rather see a smile from kevin than save hundreds on plumbing and electricity. [kevin smiles]

Name: erin
Line: oh my god.

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: erin
Line: according to the internet, the tallest man in the world is chinese.

Name: michael
Line: so much for keeping our secrets up high.

Name: erin
Line: what's america gonna do?

Name: michael
Line: i know what we're going to do. we're going to put our best minds on it.

Name: michael
Line: everybody stop working. i want you all to imagine a world in which america is not the number one superpower, where forks are irrelevant, and where every man, woman and child is expected to learn how to play the cello. now open your eyes.

Name: angela
Line: you never told us to close them.

Name: michael
Line: welcome to your future.

Name: phyllis
Line: what do we do? how do we stop this?

Name: michael
Line: how do we stop it? with a big idea. that's what america is built on, big ideas. blue jeans, the grand canyon. whose got one, whose got a big idea?

Name: pam
Line: an idea bigger than the grand canyon?

Name: michael
Line: yes, indeed. yes kevin.

Name: kevin
Line: an antacid that you only take once a week.

Name: michael
Line: once a week antacid is the idea to beat. anyone else? nobody? okay then we are... yes.

Name: kevin
Line: michael! an antacid pill that you take once every six weeks.

Name: stanley
Line: why not just go one for the year?

Name: michael
Line: i don't know.

Name: kevin
Line: it's too big of a pill to swallow.

Name: michael
Line: alright.

Name: erin
Line: what if we all get together and help each other and hire a new guy, and then we all kill him, but first we take out like a hundred thousand dollar life insurance policy. i bet you guys like that idea don't you?

Name: erin
Line: i think that's what they're doing to me. i can't prove it, but i wanted to see their faces when i said it. i learned nothing.

Name: michael
Line: i don't know what the [expletive] that was.

Name: dwight
Line: i say we bomb 'em. by 2020, they're gonna be the world's largest economy and they're getting a taste for protein. we'll all starve.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah, dwight's right we should drop a bomb.

Name: michael
Line: no he's not right. we're not. where would we even drop it, phyllis? did you know that in china there are fifty six cities with over a million people? you know how many we have here? nine.

Name: erin
Line: [gasps]

Name: oscar
Line: actually, that's not true. i know the figure you're referring to, and it's a projection of fifteen years from now.

Name: kevin
Line: thank god.

Name: michael
Line: no, no. that is right now.

Name: oscar
Line: michael, china's agrarian. urbanizing fast? you bet 'cha, but still agrarian.

Name: michael
Line: in terms of land, not population.

Name: oscar
Line: come on michael. you can...

Name: michael
Line: no, no you're wrong about this.

Name: oscar
Line: where are you getting this information?

Name: michael
Line: i got it from newyorktimes.com

Name: kevin
Line: uh oh, getting nervous oscar?

Name: jim
Line: okay, someone look it up.

Name: ryan
Line: i'm on it jim. i'm on it.

Name: oscar
Line: guys its not worth it really. guys this is not worth our time.

Name: darryl
Line: [reads text] "are you watching this?" seriously?

Name: andy
Line: well are you?

Name: darryl
Line: i'm sitting right here.

Name: ryan
Line: got it. china has fifty six cities with a population of over one million. the us has... nine.

Name: meredith
Line: suck it oscar.

Name: jim
Line: well on the plus side all this worrying about china has made you smarter than oscar, michael.

Name: oscar
Line: great. i was wrong. i'm wrong. is everyone happy?

Name: michael
Line: so i happen to know more than the smartest guy in the office. so what? [laughs] i don't care.

Name: michael
Line: okay, now where were we before i bested oscar?

Name: meredith
Line: wow, so this building can get uglier.

Name: stanley
Line: i will not work in a roach billboard.

Name: gabe
Line: oh my god, i can't look at roaches.

Name: angela
Line: michael do something about this.

Name: michael
Line: absolutely, pam this is exactly why i hired you as office administrator, handle it. taking care of business.

Name: pam
Line: dwight take it down.

Name: dwight
Line: [chuckles]

Name: pam
Line: i'm serious, take it down or else.

Name: dwight
Line: or else? or else what? there's nothing you can do.

Name: pam
Line: we can move out.

Name: angela
Line: [lights turn off] really? [jumps to try and activate motion sensor, kevin walks through the door setting it off, and the lights come back on]

Name: pam
Line: so, does anyone wanna know where i've been for the last 2 hours?

Name: jim
Line: oh god, i've been playing zombie soccer for two hours?

Name: pam
Line: i went out to look for a better office space.

Name: dwight
Line: waste of time.

Name: pam
Line: not really, because i found one.

Name: jim
Line: oh wow, these are nice.

Name: pam
Line: yup.

Name: dwight
Line: let me see.

Name: pam
Line: look at the huge offices jim, check out that conference room.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, yeah. totally.

Name: dwight
Line: you can't just move out.

Name: pam
Line: oh in three months we can. check the lease, and if you don't undo all the changes you've made, we're moving. hey guys, can i show you some pictures.

Name: andy
Line: [without looking at the pictures] oh my gosh she is so cute. she looks like both of you.

Name: pam
Line: they're not of cece.

Name: andy
Line: oh, cool.

Name: pam
Line: this is possibly our new dunder mifflin office.

Name: phyllis
Line: well i like being in the same building as bob. keeps me honest.

Name: pam
Line: well, this building isn't far, and its much newer. there's a dry cleaner, nail place and a gym. oh, and it's next-door to and outback so it always smells like steak.

Name: stanley
Line: are you trying to kill me?

Name: kelly
Line: is the nail place koreans or whites?

Name: pam
Line: koreans.

Name: kelly
Line: good. and the dry cleaners?

Name: pam
Line: white.

Name: kelly
Line: good.

Name: jim
Line: woah, there is a lot of brainpower in this room. we've got michael and oscar, the two smartest guys in the office, also in that order.

Name: oscar
Line: funny jim. that is funny.

Name: michael
Line: very comedically humorous jim.

Name: kelly
Line: i have a computer question. hey oscar?

Name: oscar
Line: what is it?

Name: kelly
Line: can you move aside so that i can ask michael?

Name: oscar
Line: alright. alright i get it.

Name: kelly
Line: michael, how do i create a new tab?

Name: michael
Line: try 'control p'.

Name: oscar
Line: that's print.

Name: michael
Line: not if the printer isn't hooked up. you are making some very dangerous assumptions oscar.

Name: kelly
Line: oscar it must be killing you to know that michael is smarter than you.

Name: oscar
Line: he's... he's not smarter than me, he was just right about one thing.

Name: kelly
Line: yeah, but it was a really smart thing to be right about, actually.
