Line: okay.

Name: jim
Line: hey.

Name: pam
Line: hey.

Name: jim
Line: we still doing the gifts today? [pam nods] i mean, it is the christmas party. well, the classy christmas party.

Name: pam
Line: yes. but don't get too excited, 'cause i didn't have a lot of time this year.

Name: jim
Line: me neither. whew.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: pam
Line: i've been working forever on jim's present. he always gives me the best christmas gifts. he'll take a memory or a private joke, and he'll create something totally unique. i love them. so this year i made him something. a comic book. it stars jimmy halpert, a mild-mannered paper salesman who, while riding his bike through the forest, is bitten by a radioactive bear, becomes 'bear man'. wreaks havoc on the office. it's really good.

Name: jim
Line: [a note is on jim's computer that says, "it is time. parking lot at noon." jim nods and hands it to dwight who burns it.]

Name: michael
Line: okay... [sighs] oh, no, no, no, no! fake tree. no, no!

Name: pam
Line: no, it has the little...

Name: michael
Line: pam, no, no. holly's coming from new hampshire. somebody from new hampshire looks at that and thinks it's a burning cross. no, no. i want you to go and get a real tree. take some money. thank you.

Name: bass player
Line: hi, i'm looking for michael scott.

Name: michael
Line: yes, that's me. come on it.

Name: michael
Line: [scats awkwardly] there's nothing classier than boring jazz music. i am here to tell ya. and i made a bit of a judgment call. i hired one musician, because i thought, what's better, to hire an entire quartet for half an hour, or one bassist for the entire day?

Name: pam
Line: hey, uh, any volunteers to come with me to go buy a christmas tree?

Name: kevin
Line: i would, but i don't want to get dirty. there might be girls at the party.

Name: pam
Line: why do you always think that girls are gonna be at the party? no one invited girls. it's just us.

Name: andy
Line: i will help. although my 'brid', my hybrid, my prius hybrid, won't fit a tree. which is ironic, considering how many trees it saves on a daily basis.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah.

Name: andy
Line: i do, however, have a hookup with a dude who has a pickup.

Name: pam
Line: oh, do you mean darryl? that's a great idea. i'll ask him.

Name: andy
Line: you know darryl?

Name: pam
Line: yeah. he works here. we all know him.

Name: andy
Line: i should come along, just 'cause he's my, you know, he's my hookup.

Name: pam
Line: cool.

Name: darryl
Line: come on, now, justine, look... listen, look, i've been planning this, okay? you cannot do this, justine.

Name: justine
Line: [on the phone] i'm not doing it! she told me she wants to have christmas here.

Name: darryl
Line: she did?

Name: justine
Line: yes. she wants to be around family for christmas.

Name: darryl
Line: i don't know... i thought i was enough family for my daughter.

Name: darryl
Line: [pam knocks on darryl's door] don't come in, i'm busy. [pam opens the door]

Name: andy
Line: it's cool, darryl, i'm here too.

Name: pam
Line: hey, sorry, i really didn't want to come in. it's just that we have to go buy a new christmas tree, and we're hoping we could borrow your truck.

Name: darryl
Line: uh, no.

Name: andy
Line: come on, it'll be fun. we could do doughnuts in the snow on the way back.

Name: darryl
Line: no. thank you for your interest in my truck.

Name: pam
Line: okay. sorry. we'll uh, we'll leave you alone.

Name: darryl
Line: hey... [sighs] you know what, i could use a breath of fresh air. let's do it.

Name: michael
Line: when holly gets here, i want you to be very helpful to her.

Name: erin
Line: i've looked her up online... there's nothing about her. she's made no impression on the internet.

Name: michael
Line: she doesn't need an internet presence, you just know.

Name: erin
Line: oh...

Name: toby
Line: hey.

Name: michael
Line: what the hell are you doing here? you're supposed to be in the courthouse.

Name: toby
Line: uh, we're on recess. i came for the party. hey, everyone.

Name: kevin
Line: hi, toby.

Name: meredith
Line: what does the strangler look like? is he gorgeous? he looks gorgeous in the drawings.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah.

Name: meredith
Line: that scowl.

Name: toby
Line: i can't talk about it or i'll get removed from the jury.

Name: michael
Line: and then he will come back here and replace holly, so stop asking him questions.

Name: toby
Line: i know people are only this excited to talk to me because of the trial. but, they talk to me for a while, and maybe people realize i have something to say. and then one day, we're just talking.

Name: jim
Line: [standing outside, dials dwight's cell phone]

Name: dwight
Line: [voicemail recording] you've reached the voice mail of dwight kurt schrute. please leave... [jim hangs up and turns for the door. it is pad locked. jim turns as dwight springs from a nearby snowman and pelts him with snowballs.]

Name: dwight
Line: ahhhhhhh!!!! ahh! ahh! ahh!

Name: jim
Line: stop! stop!

Name: dwight
Line: ahh!

Name: jim
Line: oh... oh!

Name: dwight
Line: [grunting, shouting]

Name: dwight
Line: i have no feeling in my fingers or penis. but i think it was worth it.

Name: dwight
Line: [dumps the remainder of the snow in his bag on jim, then rests his foot on jim and raises his arms in the air] haahh!! [runs off]

Name: jim
Line: um, i was laying on the ground, defenseless, and uh, he just kept throwing 'em until he exhausted himself. and, uh, [cell phone chimes] then... [reading text message] "how 'bout icing it? lol. dwight."

Name: holly
Line: hi.

Name: erin
Line: hello.

Name: holly
Line: is there any way i can get a hand with these, please?

Name: erin
Line: i'm really sorry, i can't help you. i'm waiting for my boss' pretty friend to arrive.

Name: michael
Line: there she is. hey. erin, would you help her, for god's sake?

Name: erin
Line: oh, you're holly! of course. sorry.

Name: michael
Line: hello.

Name: holly
Line: [weak clint eastwood accent] well, well, well, if it isn't michael scott. you old bastard.

Name: michael
Line: [imitating her accent] well, i never thought i'd see your face around these parts, you old bastard.

Name: holly
Line: well i did show my face around these parts, you old bastard.

Name: michael
Line: [as curly] why, you're some sorta wise guy, huh?

Name: holly
Line: [as curly] i most certainly am.

Name: michael
Line: nyuk, nyuk, nyuk, nyuk!

Name: holly
Line: unnnnnnngh!

Name: michael
Line: [as homer] d'oh!

Name: holly
Line: [as marge] oh, homey. [they both laugh]

Name: jim
Line: okay... holly's back.

Name: michael
Line: hi. hi. oh... [they hug]

Name: holly
Line: [in monster voice] oh, huggy monster!

Name: michael
Line: oh no, not the huggy monster! i don't wanna die! i don't wanna die! i don't wanna die! [both sigh] wow. well, everybody, you remember holly.

Name: holly
Line: hi.

Name: kevin
Line: did you bring us anything from nashua?

Name: holly
Line: oh, yeah. i brought um, some maple candy. but i have to admit, i got a little hungry on the drive, and i ate some of them.

Name: michael
Line: that's adorable.

Name: holly
Line: would you put those out?

Name: erin
Line: to throw out? or put out, like, six pieces for everyone?

Name: holly
Line: oh, it's so nice to be back. it looks beautiful in here. super classy. it's like a party for limousine drivers.

Name: michael
Line: well, you came on the day of our christmas party.

Name: holly
Line: oh, it's fabulous. i love what you did.

Name: michael
Line: isn't it wonderful? we love it here. don't you love it? all right, let me show you to your desk. [in a stereotyped mexican accent] i show you to your desk.

Name: holly
Line: [in the same accent] watch out for my guns they're both loaded. [makes gun noises]

Name: michael
Line: what kind of guns do you have? six-shooter?

Name: jim
Line: aww...

Name: holly
Line: it's a pea shoot...

Name: michael
Line: this is weird. i can't believe you're here. this feels like you never left. doesn't it?

Name: holly
Line: yeah, kind of.

Name: michael
Line: oh...

Name: holly
Line: oh...

Name: michael
Line: oh, and you have a woody. bah! [the both chuckle] oh, i love toy...

Name: holly
Line: aj gave me that.

Name: michael
Line: well, that's understandable. still raw. woody your favorite character?

Name: holly
Line: mmhmm.

Name: michael
Line: you know who my favorite character in toy story is? andy's mom.

Name: holly
Line: why?

Name: michael
Line: because without andy's mom, there's no plot. and without any plot, there is no movie.

Name: holly
Line: that is a really good point. aj said he hadn't seen any of the toy story movies.

Name: michael
Line: you're kidding me. ahh!

Name: holly
Line: no. i know. i was like, "what? are you serious?"

Name: michael
Line: what a douche bag!

Name: holly
Line: get a life!

Name: michael
Line: get a... yeah! good riddance.

Name: holly
Line: we sat down and we watched them all in one day.

Name: michael
Line: mmhmm.

Name: holly
Line: now he's the biggest toy story fanatic ever.

Name: michael
Line: good for him.

Name: holly
Line: next day i found him in my bed.

Name: michael
Line: really? that's creepy. how did aj get in your house?

Name: holly
Line: we live together.

Name: michael
Line: oh, you do?

Name: holly
Line: he had a little note pinned to him that said, "you've got a friend in me."

Name: michael
Line: [fighting back tears] yeah, randy newman's the best.

Name: holly
Line: yeah. i love him.

Name: michael
Line: me too.

Name: andy
Line: [singing] christmas tree, christmas tree. won't you be my christmas tree.

Name: pam
Line: hey, how about this one?

Name: andy
Line: ehh, seems a little full of itself, right? kind of a pretty boy? what if we got a really beat up one, like on charlie brown. and we just loved it for what it is?

Name: pam
Line: maybe. i mean...

Name: darryl
Line: [on the phone] i just, no, she be talking to your mom or something. this is my daughter too, justine! you seem to think, [justine hangs up] oh... pick a damn tree already.

Name: pam
Line: um, hey, darryl, listen, it's none of my business, but if i couldn't have cece for christmas, i'd be really upset too.

Name: andy
Line: i don't have kids or anything, but if my grandmother ever dies, i'm going to kill myself.

Name: darryl
Line: jada don't want to spend christmas with me. she told her mom it wasn't as much fun. and how could she say that? you know, i took her to the toy store to buy her own presents.

Name: pam
Line: well darryl, no kid wants to buy their own christmas presents.

Name: darryl
Line: her mom wants me to take her to mass. i guess that's something to do.

Name: pam
Line: no, you should have her mom do the boring christmas stuff on her time. you should be associated with the fun parts of christmas.

Name: darryl
Line: how do i do that?

Name: pam
Line: bring her to the party. yeah, we'll have santa, and we'll play games with her. it'll be a lot of fun.

Name: andy
Line: yes.

Name: pam
Line: you'll be mr. christmas by the end of the night.

Name: pam
Line: hey guys, the tree's here.

Name: michael
Line: hey.

Name: andy
Line: nobody hug me, i'm covered in tree sap, so...

Name: oscar
Line: why would someone hug you?

Name: michael
Line: hey there, jada. nice to see you again. i'm santa claus. welcome.

Name: darryl
Line: are you serious?

Name: michael
Line: it's a sophisticated take.

Name: jada
Line: he doesn't look like santa claus.

Name: darryl
Line: no, he doesn't. [to michael] i told her santa would be here.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, well, i was told that holly would be here, single and ready to date. and we all got misled.

Name: pam
Line: who told you that?

Name: michael
Line: nora ephron, in every romantic comedy ever made.

Name: phyllis
Line: so is it an open relationship?

Name: holly
Line: oh, god, no.

Name: kelly
Line: well, you're almost 40. oh, do you not want kids?

Name: holly
Line: oh, i want kids. i really want kids. but aj and i are practically engaged. we talk about spending our lives together.

Name: kelly
Line: so where's the ring?

Name: pam
Line: kelly! um, how are you adjusting to the move?

Name: phyllis
Line: nobody cares about that. look, you have to make him commit, or kick his butt to the curb.

Name: pam
Line: you guys, i don't think any of us are really qualified to be giving holly personal advice about her love life.

Name: erin
Line: yeah, i mean, maybe holly's not in any position to be shooing guys away.

Name: erin
Line: i don't get it! i'm sorry. i just, i don't get it!

Name: holly
Line: okay, listen, i'm gonna tell him that if he doesn't propose by the end of this year, we're over.

Name: pam
Line: wow, an ultimatum.

Name: holly
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: it doesn't really seem like you.

Name: kelly
Line: that is a great idea. ultimatums are key. basically, nobody does anything for me anymore unless i threaten to kill myself.

Name: dwight
Line: [turns in pam's chair with a pam wig on and laughs maniacally]

Name: jim
Line: don't. stop, dwight! [dwight pelts jim with snowballs] dwight, stop! dwight, stop!

Name: dwight
Line: oh, no. oh, no!

Name: jim
Line: stop!

Name: dwight
Line: oh, no. yes, taste my wrath!

Name: jim
Line: okay. okay. okay.

Name: dwight
Line: huh? you like that?

Name: jim
Line: seriously!

Name: dwight
Line: huh?

Name: jim
Line: okay. okay. [dwight throws another snowball and laughs maniacally]

Name: dwight
Line: yes, i have a wig for every single person in the office. you never know when your gonna need to bear a passing resemblance to someone.

Name: jim
Line: i just want it to stop.

Name: pam
Line: so, cool right?

Name: ryan
Line: there's no connection between the origin story and the quest.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: ryan
Line: we need to know who jimmy halpert was before he was bitten by the bear. otherwise, it's the bear's quest.

Name: pam
Line: okay, well, i just sorta meant, like, cute, right?

Name: ryan
Line: well, did you come here for help, or did you come here for me to tell you how great it is?

Name: pam
Line: i mean, help, if it's something simple, like add page numbers or laminate it or...

Name: ryan
Line: well, it sounds like you know what you want. [pam walks away] it's also a little derivative of a serias called 'bear man'. did you look that up?

Name: pam
Line: no.

Name: ryan
Line: okay.

Name: toby
Line: oh, jim. hey.

Name: jim
Line: hey, toby.

Name: toby
Line: there's this female uh, uh, stenographer at the courthouse...

Name: jim
Line: no way.

Name: toby
Line: who looks exactly like you.

Name: jim
Line: that's increadible.

Name: toby
Line: yeah. no, it's uncanny.

Name: jim
Line: you know what's crazy?

Name: toby
Line: what?

Name: jim
Line: i can't reconnect with you right now. hold on one second. [he hurls a snowball at dwight with a lacrosse stick, misses, and shatters a window, everyone gasps] excuse me. [clears throat]

Name: michael
Line: i guess there are just some people who you stay together with when you transfer, and some people you don't. and that's just the way it is. and i can be mature about that. [clip of michael throwing holly's woody in the trash and pouring coffee on it]

Name: angela
Line: it's so cold. even with my coat on.

Name: meredith
Line: maybe your senator boyfriend has a blanket in his car... for screwing americans.

Name: gabe
Line: yet another opportunity where a blanket would have come in handy.

Name: holly
Line: you guys, this has to stop. someone could have really gotten hurt.

Name: michael
Line: what if meredith was taking her smoking break below that window? you know what would have happened? the shards of glass would have shaved her face right off. and, yes, it might have been funny. but it also would have been incredibly tragic.

Name: dwight
Line: i could not agree more. and just want to state for the record that i am intending to sue jim for acute psychological distress.

Name: jim
Line: what are you talking about? you're the one terrorizing me.

Name: dwight
Line: with snowballs, jim? with fluffy little snowballs? no. i thought we were just playing.

Name: holly
Line: dwight's right. what you did was dangerous and inappropriate. i'm really surprised at you guys. last time i was here, you were both best friends.

Name: michael
Line: all this arguing reminds me of a very funny story. you see this on my desk? [he holds up a toy taxi cab] know who gave me this? my girlfriend tara, who lives in new york city.

Name: dwight
Line: wait, what girlfriend?

Name: michael
Line: i haven't told you about her.

Name: dwight
Line: i find that unlikely. you email me when you get a new zit.

Name: michael
Line: i'm a man in my mid-40s and i still get zits. i think that's pretty interesting. but you know what? i am not on trial here. the scranton strangler is. so, anyway, we have this great weekend, and she drives me to the airport, and we get to jfk, but i am flying out of laguardia. so we laugh and laugh and laugh, and then we spend the rest of the day walking around slo-mo, drinking latte. and at the end of the day, she gives me this, and she says, "michael, maybe next time, you should take a cab."

Name: holly
Line: i didn't know you had a girlfriend.

Name: michael
Line: i do. she is.

Name: michael
Line: did you see her face? well it seems to me that there is a person sitting out there in the annex that still has feelings for michael g. scott. and it ain't tara.

Name: phyllis
Line: so you went homemade this year.

Name: pam
Line: yup.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah. money problems, is that what this is about? i mean, oh, dear, i don't think we can help you out.

Name: pam
Line: no, no. jim had a great year, actually. i just wanted to get your opinion.

Name: phyllis
Line: are you good at homemade?

Name: pam
Line: look at this.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah...

Name: holly
Line: [walks in with a dirty woody] who did this? it's obvious to me i'm not welcome here, but somebody better tell me who did this, or else i'm leaving.

Name: phyllis
Line: well, i don't think erin seems to like you.

Name: erin
Line: that's not true. i don't know her enough to make a decision even.

Name: michael
Line: what happened? what happened? toby, what did you do? i think toby's very jealous of all the attention you've been getting.

Name: toby
Line: no, i would never ever do anything like that. but it does seem like something you would do.

Name: michael
Line: oh, really? turn it on me. well, isn't that nice? thank you very much.

Name: kevin
Line: wait, wait, guys, listen. toy story is all about toys that come to life when people aren't looking. you don't think... it's not possible... that woody did this to himself.

Name: michael
Line: it is christmas.

Name: angela
Line: no, it really seems like something michael would do.

Name: michael
Line: mmhmm. mmhmm. well, the fact that you would think that points to the possibility that it is probably not me. and that i have been framed.

Name: andy
Line: why would anyone frame you for that?

Name: jim
Line: okay, i'm sorry, why are we discounting this whole "woody came to life" thing so quickly?

Name: michael
Line: ahhhhhh! [laughs] surprise! it was part of the party. pretty funny, huh?

Name: holly
Line: you think this is funny?

Name: michael
Line: [laughs] i don't. but someday i think we will laugh about this... when we tell our kids...

Name: jim
Line: yikes. [everyone gasps]

Name: kevin
Line: oh no, that's, that's not happening.

Name: dwight
Line: dear god in heaven.

Name: michael
Line: all right. shh. okay, you know what? holly, i didn't mean to do it. it was an accident. an accident borne of jealous feelings.

Name: holly
Line: michael, you have to let this go. i'm with someone else. i don't feel that way anymore.

Name: michael
Line: oh, really? you certainly seemed jealous when i told you about my fake girlfriend. that's what jim and dwight thought.

Name: dwight
Line: okay, hey, hey, hey...

Name: jim
Line: no, fake girlfriends are always wrong.

Name: holly
Line: you made up a fake girlfriend to see if i'd get jealous? and you destroyed a gift my boyfriend gave me? what is the matter with you?

Name: michael
Line: when you got transferred, and i drove you up to nashua, you said, "michael, i love you, but i can't do this." but then, with this other guy, you don't have any problem with a long-distance relationship, do you? and you know what, that is what is the matter with me.

Name: holly
Line: michael, i'm sorry.

Name: michael
Line: and we did this whole stupid party for you.

Name: erin
Line: [blocks holly's path] no.

Name: holly
Line: you guys, it wasn't my fault.

Name: kevin
Line: oh, nothing is ever your fault! just like when you ate those maple candies that you brought for us!

Name: erin
Line: i really think you're better off.

Name: michael
Line: mmm. erin, would you do me a favor and find my street clothes for me, please?

Name: erin
Line: yeah. is she an amazing cook or something?

Name: jim
Line: [walks over to his desk and sees a present sitting on it, reading the note] "hey, pickles, merry christmas. open immediately. love, swiss cheese." [opens the present and a snowball shoots out at him, everyone laughs] damn it, dwight!

Name: dwight
Line: didn't think your affectionate nicknames would be your undoing, did you, jim? let that be a lesson to you all.

Name: stanley
Line: so do they bring in food, or do you get to go out?

Name: toby
Line: no, they bring it in.

Name: stanley
Line: you lucky son of a bitch.

Name: stanley
Line: i have been trying to get on jury duty every single year since i was 18 years old. to get to go sit in an air-conditioned room downtown, judging people while my lunch is paid for... that is the life.

Name: jada
Line: daddy, i'm bored. can i read my book in your office?

Name: darryl
Line: sure, sweetie.

Name: pam
Line: jada, darryl, i'm so glad i found you guys. a grinch stole the star from on top of the christmas tree and is hiding it in the warehouse somewhere. you want to go help me find him?

Name: pam
Line: oh, my goodness.

Name: andy
Line: i am the mean old grinch. the little girl who wishes to win back the christmas star must first succeed at these challenges.

Name: darryl
Line: ohh, that sounds fun and christmasy, you mean old grinch!

Name: jada
Line: what kind of challenges.

Name: andy
Line: wahhh...

Name: pam
Line: something like an obstacle course, mr. grinch?

Name: andy
Line: no. you must answer topical political questions. how many congressmen is the state of pennsylvania guaranteed? and what other state has the equal number?

Name: jada
Line: i don't know.

Name: andy
Line: do you know the other state?

Name: darryl
Line: maybe the grinch hid the christmas star, and we could ask for clues, and he'll tell us if we're hot or cold.

Name: andy
Line: the star has been hidden. is the little girl hot or cold? well, it turns out she's burning up because the star is right behind her ear! [pulls star from coat and pretends to find it behind jada's ear]

Name: darryl
Line: and the game's over seconds later.

Name: angela
Line: i'm so glad you could come.

Name: robert
Line: it's nice. i know.

Name: angela
Line: hey everybody, this is my boyfriend, senator robert lipton.

Name: robert
Line: hi.

Name: oscar
Line: senator, it's an honor. i'm angela's friend oscar.

Name: robert
Line: oscar. a pleasure.

Name: oscar
Line: robert seems great. he's very handsome, firm handshake, he's gay, good sense of humor.

Name: aj
Line: hi.

Name: erin
Line: hello.

Name: aj
Line: i'm, uh, i'm aj. i'm here to see holly. it's kind of a surprise.

Name: erin
Line: i know who you are, and i think you should go.

Name: kevin
Line: i bet you didn't even bring us anything, did you?

Name: aj
Line: was i supposed to bring you guys something?

Name: holly
Line: what? aj!

Name: aj
Line: surprise.

Name: holly
Line: what are you doing here? oh, my god.

Name: aj
Line: i wanted to see you. how are you?

Name: holly
Line: wow! nice.

Name: aj
Line: oh, god, you look great.

Name: holly
Line: oh... when did you get here?

Name: aj
Line: just now.

Name: michael
Line: hey

Name: aj
Line: just now. hey, michael.

Name: michael
Line: nice to see you again, aj. welcome.

Name: aj
Line: pleased to see you. thank you.

Name: michael
Line: good trip down?

Name: aj
Line: yeah, it was great.

Name: michael
Line: good, good. good to see you. have fun. enjoy the partay.

Name: michael
Line: i am dead inside.

Name: darryl
Line: what do you want, baby? we got some granola, got some cupcakes, chips, apples, pies...

Name: jada
Line: you have a whole room of vending machines?

Name: creed
Line: [chuckles] i know. isn't it something?

Name: jada

Line: ladies and gentlemen, i have an announcement to make. as of today, officially, holly and i are moving into together. yay! [claps] thank you. thank you. oscar, this must be tough for you, watching this go down. you could not stand in the way of true love, my friend!

Name: oscar
Line: are you kidding? i wasn't trying to break you guys up.

Name: kevin
Line: better luck next time, pal.

Name: michael
Line: well, the point is, there will no longer be any need for pda here at the office between us because, when we get home, we are going to make love to and with one another, and that, to me, is the best valentine's day present that a person could receive. so i bid you all adieu.

Name: holly
Line: you do?

Name: michael
Line: i do.

Name: oscar
Line: go on. kiss each other already. [they kiss]

Name: kevin
Line: suck it, oscar. this must kill you.

Name: oscar
Line: i just told them to do it!

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: pam
Line: no.

Name: jim
Line: no. we took a walk.

Name: pam
Line: we took a walk.

Name: dwight
Line: my perfect valentine's day? i'm at home, three cell phones in front of me, fielding desperate calls from people who want to buy one of the 50 restaurant reservations i made over six months ago.

Name: ryan
Line: anybody can be prince charming one day a year with the dinner and the flowers and all that. but you know what impresses me? when a guy can do that no days a year.

Name: kelly
Line: flowers, diamonds, three-course meal, violinist comes to my table to serenade me...

Name: kevin
Line: pizza, soda, the moon, someone to share it with.

Name: michael
Line: what are our plans for tonight? umm...

Name: holly
Line: [imitates a squeaky bed] [laughter]

Name: delivery guy
Line: i got a delivery for ya'.

Name: michael
Line: leave it at reception.

Name: delivery
Line: i'm supposed to deliver this one in person. [pulls out a gun and starts shooting at michael, who dodges dramatically]

Name: michael
Line: [pulls out two handguns and kills the man with an unnecessarily large amount of bullets] clean up on aisle five. [threat level: midnight titlescreen appears]

Name: michael
Line: after three years of writing, one year of shooting, four years of re-shooting and two years of editing, i have finally completed my movie, threat level: midnight.

Name: michael
Line: erin... what are you doing?

Name: erin
Line: guys! guys. did you guys know that our own michael scott has made a movie, and that he maybe will let us watch it, but only if everybody's dying to see it.

Name: michael
Line: that's... that's. well, don't put words in my mouth.

Name: jim
Line: threat level: midnight is the great lost film of michael scott.

Name: pam
Line: we're all in it, from like years and years ago. it's like a home movie.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, if michael scott did your home movie!

Name: pam
Line: michael screened a work in progress for us, years ago, and it didn't go well. we thought it was a comedy. [flashback clip of michael angrily leaving the conference room while the whole office is laughing at the tv] everything pointed to it being a comedy.

Name: pam
Line: we'd love to see it!

Name: michael
Line: sweet, i will go invite holly.

Name: pam
Line: okay everyone, i know we're really excited to see this movie that everybody's in, but we have to remember that michael is sensitive, so let's stay positive! and no laughing, no comments, just positive energy and we'll have a pure fun day! okay?

Name: creed
Line: thanks mom.

Name: holly
Line: you never told me you made a movie.

Name: michael
Line: mhmm! it's got action, it's got heart, it's got some bosom.

Name: holly
Line: it's got you.

Name: michael
Line: it's got a lot of me.

Name: holly
Line: [laughs] i can't wait.

Name: michael
Line: ladies and gentleman, threat level: midnight. [applause]

Name: narrator
Line: [stanley's voice as the screen shows scarn manor] michael scarn, well that's an interesting story. [headlines of michael scarn's success are shown as well as an article reporting the death of michael's wife, catherine zeta scarn] he was once the best secret agent in the business. that was years ago. where is he now? well, that's also an interesting story.

Name: samuel
Line: [dwight schrute dressed as a butler. speaks in slow, deep voice] master scarn.

Name: dwight
Line: i play samuel, michael scarn's robot butler. i wanted samuel's voice- [robot impression] to be like this! [normally] but michael thought that samuel should be a very advance android, almost indistinguishable from a real person.

Name: michael
Line: dwight does not play a robot.

Name: samuel
Line: [crashes cymbals by michael's ear]

Name: michael
Line: [lying on bed with a bottle of alcohol] i'm up.

Name: samuel
Line: it's the president. he needs you for a mission.

Name: michael
Line: tell him i'm retired.

Name: dwight
Line: it's goldenface.

Name: michael
Line: goldenface, this makes it personal.

Name: president
Line: [darryl, sitting at a desk in the oval office] scarn, you're right on time. [cheering from the office]

Name: daryl
Line: i gave up a lot of weekends because i thought it'd be good for my daughter to see a black man as president. even in a silly home movie. what a stupid waste of time.

Name: president
Line: it's your old enemy, goldenface. he's after the nhl all star game. he's hidden a bomb somewhere in the stadium. scarn, this one is personal for me. i own the stadium. i can't see it blown up. it's my retirement plan.

Name: samuel
Line: we have to search the stadium.

Name: president
Line: not so fast, goldenface has taken all the concession stand workers hostage. scarn, will you find these hostages, and save the game?

Name: michael
Line: [holding a quarter up] heads i do it, tails i don't. best out of seven. [flips the coin] heads. [flips it again] tails. [president winces each time he says tails]...heads...tails...heads...tails. [flips one more time and the quarter spins around on the table. michael looks at it] well, it looks like there's going to be a clean-up on aisle five.

Name: narrator
Line: well, the hostages were scared.

Name: kevin
Line: [as a hostage] don't you guys get it? nobody's coming for us.

Name: goldenface
Line: [jim, with his face painted with metallic gold paint] oh someone's coming alright, the only man who would care. [goldenface turns in his chair, holding a golden gun] michael scarn. see i'm gonna lure him here, then i kill everybody, then... i'm gonna dig up scarn's dead wife, and i'm gonna hump her real good. [malicious, deep laughter]

Name: jim
Line: i did not love the dialogue. or the character.  i took the role to impress a receptionist who will remain nameless.

Name: narrator
Line: [scene shows michael scarn driving through the rain] well, the all star game was three days away, so naturally it was all sold out. the only way scarn was getting in was in a uniform. just one problem with that, scarn didn't know a hockey stick from a slim jim. so he went to meet with the famed trainer... [michael stops the car and gets out] cherokee jack.

Name: cherokee jack
Line: [creed wearing a tunic and carrying a mop, standing with michael in front of an ice rink] mop the ice.

Name: michael
Line: i'm not here to learn how to mop, i'm here to learn how to play hockey.

Name: cherokee jack
Line: mop it. [a montage of michael mopping the ice awkwardly and using an ab-cruncher, and slowly getting better. after a little while, cherokee jack slams a hockey stick on the ice to stop michael, then offers it to him] now take this.

Name: michael
Line: what am i supposed to do with this?

Name: cherokee jack
Line: mop. [a montage shows michael sliding around the ice skillfully and hitting the puck into the goal]

Name: narrator
Line: well, michael scarn was quickly becoming one of the hottest hockey players in the country.

Name: ryan
Line: [ryan is acting as an official for the competition taking place. a line is formed in front of a line on the ice. standing behind it are michael scarn, oscar in a blue full-body suit, and a mysterious man in a hockey mask] each year, the national hockey league selects one civilian amateur to play in the all star game. it's down to the three of you. the final test is speed skating. [holds a gun to the ceiling] on your marks, get set...

Name: goldenface
Line: die! [the masked man pulls off the mask to reveal that it is goldenface]

Name: michael
Line: [michael and goldenface skate around the rink, goldenface shooting with a solid gold gun, michael with two pistols. michael is out of breath at the end of the race] nice try goldenface, but you forgot one thing, to kill me.

Name: goldenface
Line: i wasn't trying to kill you, i was trying to slow you down. [ryan is seen placing a medal around oscar's neck]

Name: michael
Line: no!

Name: goldenface
Line: oh by the way!

Name: michael
Line: yeah?

Name: goldenface
Line: how's your wife doing?

Name: michael
Line: [begins to cry as goldenface laughs]

Name: michael
Line: congratulations.

Name: oscar
Line: hey, you came in second. not bad either.

Name: michael
Line: i am sorry that i have to do this... [starts choking oscar to death with his towel]

Name: oscar
Line: huh...[muffled screaming as he slowly chokes, and eventually dies]

Name: michael
Line: i'm so sorry. i'm so sorry.

Name: samuel
Line: i'm intercepting a name. jasmine winsong. she works for goldenface. what i can't figure out is, who is the funky cat.

Name: michael
Line: not who, what. the funky cat is the hippest jazz club in town. [stands up with his cup of tea and walks by samuel, pouring his tea all over him]

Name: samuel
Line: oh-[starts to freak out, but the scene is crudely cut short]

Name: dwight
Line: he cut the part where my circuit board malfunctioned! what was the point of spilling the drink on me?

Name: jan
Line: [acting as a jazz singer at the funky cat, singing] they call me jasmine winsong.

Name: michael
Line: [walking into the funky cat] bingo.

Name: jan
Line: he finished his movie? [frantically trying to open her car door, as if trying to get away from the camera crew] no kidding. wow, that's great. yeah that's good for him.

Name: jan
Line: [singing gibberish while laying on the piano on stage]

Name: michael
Line: [pulls out a recording device from his pocket and clicks it on]

Name: jan
Line: [michael pushes the backwards button on the recorder] the hostages are under the stadium. [an assassin with a golden tie shoots her with a tranquilizer and she falls]

Name: michael
Line: jack blaise.

Name: pam
Line: you have to let us go goldenface! we have families!

Name: goldenface
Line: ha! this is gonna show them [cocks his golden gun] that i mean business. see ya! [points gun to toby the hostage's head, shoots and toby's fake head explodes, the shot is shown repeatedly]

Name: michael
Line: by far and away, the most expensive shot in the movie. but, it was integral to the story.

Name: samuel
Line: ha! [kicking open the gate in the stadium where the hostages and goldenface are]

Name: kevin
Line: michael scarn!

Name: goldenface
Line: sorry about your friend, scarn!

Name: michael
Line: the joke's on you goldenface, that man was a wanted animal rapist.

Name: goldenface
Line: [gives michael a disgusted look]

Name: samuel
Line: we've searched the whole building, goldenface, where is the bomb?

Name: goldenface
Line: hm?

Name: samuel
Line: we've searched the whole building, goldenface, where is the bomb?

Name: goldenface
Line: hm?

Name: samuel
Line: we've searched the wh- ok...

Name: michael
Line: he said, where is the bomb?

Name: goldenface
Line: in the puck! [tosses the puck to michael]

Name: michael
Line: why are you telling me this?

Name: goldenface
Line: because i'm going to kill you. [takes out golden gun] unless! you forgive me for murdering your wife. [distraught, memories of him and his wife are shown on the puck in a dreamy haze]

Name: michael
Line: hey goldenface.

Name: goldenface
Line: yeah?

Name: michael
Line: go puck yourself!

Name: goldenface
Line: [dodges the puck and shoots at michael]

Name: samuel
Line: noooo! [jumps in front of michael to receive the bullet]

Name: michael
Line: that was not scripted.

Name: goldenface
Line: [re-cocks gun and shoots at michael, who looks shocked and scared]

Name: michael
Line: more tylenol.

Name: helene
Line: [as a busty nurse] you've already had four.

Name: pam
Line: looking at her mother on screen, horrified] oh god... [looks at michael] so good.

Name: helene
Line: you're lucky to be alive.

Name: michael
Line: it'll take a lot more than a bullet to the brain, lungs, heart, back, and balls to kill michael scarn.

Name: helene
Line: let's just make sure that everything's... working properly... [leans in closer to michael and the heart rate monitor, which was beating steadily, now beats very quickly]

Name: president
Line: you just said the bomb... is in the puck?

Name: michael and samuel together
Line: yes.

Name: president
Line: is that where you hid the bomb goldenface?

Name: goldenface
Line: [walks into the oval office with an accomplice, troy]

Name: samuel
Line: but why would you blow up the stadium? you own the stadium!

Name: michael
Line: for the insurance money! i knew it all along! [the president, goldenface, and his minion pull out automatic machine guns] you will never get away with this! [takes a painting of abraham lincoln and awkwardly smashes it on the president's head, runs out of the office as goldenface and his minion shoot at them]

Name: michael
Line: where had i gone wrong? all i wanted was to start a family with my beautiful wife. but somewhere along the way, things got messed up.

Name: narrator
Line: it wasn't easy for scarn to admit that he had lost his self-confidence. and he hadn't of course, he just wasn't using it right now.

Name: michael
Line: [in a bar] beer me billy.

Name: billy
Line: [andy as a bar tender with  a brooklyn accent] you don't looks so good, what's got ya down?

Name: michael
Line: i got problems billy. big problems...

Name: billy
Line: you got problems?! my tv don't work! i pay thirty bucks a month for the damn satellite what's-a-whosit, i can't even get the damn game! now you tell me, what's worse than that?

Name: michael
Line: [laughs to himself] don't ever change billy. goldenface is going to blow up the nhl all star game tomorrow.

Name: billy
Line: i see what you mean about problems. i know what'll cheer you up. that table of bachelorettes over there bought you this drink. [a table with meredith, phyllis, karen, and angela all say hey to michael]

Name: karen
Line: ever banged an entire bachelorette party, baby? [winks]

Name: karen
Line: why are you singling my line out, like, a million years later?

Name: michael
Line: i'm too depressed to save the big game billy.

Name: billy
Line: i'm gonna cheer you up, the only ways i know hows. [to a small boy in overalls] hey kid! hit g-9 on the jukebox!

Name: michael
Line: no billy, i haven't done that dance since my wife died.

Name: billy
Line: there is a whole crowd of people out there, who need to learn, how to do the scarn.

Name: michael
Line: [a funky beat sounds from the jukebox and michael starts dancing poorly] well my name's michael scarn and i'm here to say, i'm about to do the scarn in a major way. [the bachelorettes and the others in the bar stand up to join him] you jump to the right and you shake a hand and you jump to the left and you shake that hand. you meet new friends, and tie that yarn, and that's how you do the scarn! [doing the actions he says to] you jump to the right and you shake a hand and you jump to the left and you shake that hand. you meet new friends, and tie that yarn, and that's how you do the scarn! you jump to the right and you shake a hand and you jump to the left and you shake that hand. you meet new friends, and tie that yarn, and that's how you do the scarn!

Name: todd packer
Line: [as a drunken man in the bar] if doing the scarn is gay, then i'm the biggest queer on earth!

Name: jim
Line: [cracking up at the stupidity of it, the rest of the office besides michael and holly are concealing their laughter. pam is trying to quiet jim up] sorry.

Name: michael
Line: [turns off the movie from the remote, the office complains]

Name: jim
Line: i'm sorry, i'm really, really sorry. i think i was just relieved, to see that michael scarn got his confidence back.

Name: kelly
Line: yeah michael the movie is amazing!

Name: kevin
Line: it's like one of the best movies i've ever seen in my life.

Name: ryan
Line: you should enter it in festivals!

Name: kevin
Line: or carnivals!

Name: michael
Line: [to holly] well that's a... pretty good reaction. [holly nods] pretty cool, right? did you like it? did you like that?

Name: holly
Line: uh... which part?

Name: michael
Line: okay. [stands up and leaves the conference room to the dismay of the office] no, it's not good enough. it's not good enough...

Name: andy
Line: some people are really popping on screen!

Name: michael
Line: hey.

Name: holly
Line: hey! good movie.

Name: michael
Line: mmmm, good? everybody out there says it's great!

Name: holly
Line: i loved it.

Name: michael
Line: did you? what did you love about it?

Name: holly
Line: uhm, i loved that you got to work together with all your friends. isn't that great when you can all work together like that?

Name: michael
Line: no, no. holly, this isn't ocean's eleven, where you get together with all your friends and just have fun and don't care about how it turns out. what'd you really think, honestly.

Name: holly
Line: uhm...

Name: michael
Line: is it, is it because you're afraid of where this is gonna take me? see, because i need you... to keep me grounded.

Name: holly
Line: not worried about that.

Name: michael
Line: [angrily] it was eleven years, okay? this has been my dream for eleven years, and if you don't think it's great than you're basically saying that you don't believe in my dream.

Name: holly
Line: wha- it's your dream and you never even mentioned it before!

Name: michael
Line: i talk about a lot of things, holly! i was eventually gonna get around to my dream! obviously! eleven years i could've been working on the scarn nebulus.

Name: holly
Line: well why do you have to make a movie at all?

Name: michael
Line: because, if i don't have this, what do i have? i have nothing.

Name: holly
Line: really, you can't think of anything else that you might have?

Name: michael
Line: i have my book on business, somehow i manage. i have my hbo comedy special, here i go again dot-dot-dot. but you know what? when i think about it, when i really think about it, none of those things are as real to me as my movie.

Name: holly
Line: i'm real.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, you're a real pain in the ass. and i'm gonna go watch the movie with people who think it's great! and i'm sorry i called you a pain in the ass, i'm angry, and i love you.

Name: holly
Line: i love you too.

Name: michael
Line: i am a huge woody allen fan. although i've only seen antz, but i'll tell you something. what i respect about that man, is that when he was going through all that stuff that came out in the press, about how antz was just a rip-off of a bug's life, he stayed true to his films.  or at least the film that i saw which again was antz. the thing is... i thought bug's life was better, much better. than ants. the point is, don't listen to your critics, listen to your fans.

Name: michael
Line: who likes threat level: midnight? [applause from the office] okay then who wants to watch the rest?! [everyone yells approval]

Name: samuel
Line: michael! you have to get to that puck before halftime! or the whole stadium will explode!

Name: michael
Line: i know, it's a good thing my trainer and mentor is here to cheer me on!

Name: samuel
Line: cherokee jack? michael he died.

Name: michael
Line: [crying] this one's for you cherokee jack. [michael skates into the rink of an already in-play match]

Name: michael
Line: we filmed this during an actual scranton high school hockey game, trying to qualify for states.

Name: jim
Line: [he office shushes michael to hear the movie better] that's fine, it's great!

Name: michael
Line: no, no! actually it's really screwed up because they [chuckles], they were trying to qualify, they were disqualified, they had to forfeit the game. undefeated season. that's why there were so many people there. [michael stands up, clearly realizing that his movie is not as great as he thought]

Name: pam
Line: why is your face gold?

Name: goldenface
Line: why do you care?

Name: pam
Line: i'm just making conversation.

Name: goldenface
Line: i worked in a gold factory, we had a boss, who only cared about money...

Name: michael
Line: hey...

Name: holly
Line: hey, i'm sorry. it is good.

Name: michael
Line: no it's not. [kisses holly while smiling] it's not. but, they really seem to be enjoying it.

Name: hostage
Line: please goldenface, let us go!

Name: michael
Line: [ees cherokee jack from a confusion of heavenly light and smoke] cherokee jack.

Name: cherokee jack
Line: i want you to take all of your frustrations, with women, the system, with everything. take it out on the puck. all on the puck.

Name: michael
Line: [laughs at the stupidity]

Name: michael
Line: [skates forward, hits the puck, and stares in wonder as it flies by]

Name: samuel
Line: yah! [kicks open the gate to save the hostages, hostages rejoice as samuel unties them] [the puck is seen flying into space and it hits a satellite, billy is at his bar and his tv suddenly turns back on]

Name: billy
Line: hey! we got sports games again! [people at the bar cheer]

Name: goldenface
Line: [seen at his house counting his money] ha ha ha! ha ha ha ha ha! [the puck lands on his lap] oh-[a large explosion blocks out his words] [the office cheers at the ending of the movie, michael scarn holds up a trophy]

Name: michael
Line: [in scarn manor] some breakfast for me [shows a plate of bacon and eggs] and some breakfast for you. [pulls out an oil can and oils samuel's circuit board on his back]

Name: michael
Line: oh yeah, i guess i did let him be a robot.

Name: michael
Line: [phone rings] i'll get it! man i love being retired! scarn here!

Name: president
Line: [on phone] michael, it's the president.

Name: michael
Line: hello sir.

Name: president
Line: i need you for another mission.

Name: michael
Line: ugh... [after a little thought] i'm in.

Name: andy
Line: [the office cheers] whoa whoa whoa! isn't the president evil?

Name: michael
Line: oh yeah! [laughs] yes he is!

Name: dwight
Line: no no, he's doing it to catch the president!

Name: michael
Line: no, no dwight. he's just being stupid. [the office laughs]

Name: narrator
Line: [in stanley's voice, a chair is shown with a gray haired head sticking above it] well, michael scarn was back in the game. and i bet you're wondering why do i know so much about michael scarn. [the chair revolves to show michael scarn, gray haired, talking with stanley's voice] well because i am michael scarn. [applause]

Name: rapper
Line: [andy rapping to a montage of scenes from the movie] ahhhh, yeah! threat level midnight! makes all the girlies feel alright! from madonna to madelyn allbrite, threat level midnight! it's a threat, a level, a level level threat. he's the greatest hockey-star i ever seen yet. threat level what? midnight! threat level who? michael scarn! threat level why? apartheid! gotta fight it, free mandela! peace i'm out!

Name: dwight
Line: i have the best survival stock shelter in north eastern pennsylvania. but everything has a shelf-life. so i must eat and replace everything that's about to expire. it's nice not to have to plan my meals.

Name: kevin
Line: you're eating eight year old tomatoes?

Name: dwight
Line: they're still good for another week.

Name: meredith
Line: you know, i think i have some type of cheese in the back of my fridge you might like. [jim smiles]

Name: kevin
Line: i've got some cheese you might like too. in between my toes. [all laugh]

Name: dwight
Line: hardy har har. okay picture this: snowy ash drizzles from the sky. a ravenous pack of dogs surrounds you as the flame at the end of your stick dies out. there's only one hope left for you. the door to my shelter. you pound, you beg, dwight! please let me in! but i ignore your cries and do not let you in. you wanna know why?

Name: jim
Line: because of the sign, that says no pounding no begging.

Name: dwight
Line: no. because you laughed at me. kevin will be eaten! pam will be taken slave! jim will be made a warlord's gesture. meredith will do ok. be assured this day will come. it's just a matter of time. could be one month, could be two months.

Name: jim
Line: three months.

Name: dwight
Line: could be.

Name: jim
Line: four months.

Name: dwight
Line: i can see that happening, yes.

Name: jim
Line: eight months?

Name: dwight
Line: that's a realistic time line.

Name: jim
Line: [pam kisses jim on the cheek] eleven months.

Name: dwight
Line: perhaps.

Name: jim
Line: okay now really think hard about this one:  one year.

Name: dwight
Line: i can see that as a very real possibility.

Name: jim
Line: [time has obviously passed, as everyone is gone except jim and dwight] four hundred and ninety-four months?

Name: dwight
Line: i can see that happening.

Name: jim
Line: four hundred and ninety-five months. that's just...

Name: todd
Line: i really though i was becoming too much of a womanizer. i realized i had shirts in five different women's houses.

Name: michael
Line: still not seeing the problem here.

Name: todd
Line: all right, truth is i gotta couple love bumps on my ding-dong so, game-over!

Name: michael
Line: it was the best of times, it was the awesomest of times. and now packer wants to come home. and ohh, look who's here to sign off on it! my boo, holly.

Name: holly
Line: [walks into conference room with michael and todd] hi!

Name: michael
Line: hi. [holly and michael kiss]

Name: holly
Line: you must be todd.

Name: todd
Line: [shaking holly's hand] whoa! i'm sorry, michael. i thought we were meeting holly today, not jennifer aniston!

Name: holly
Line: [laughs oddly] very funny. okay let's get started.

Name: todd
Line: after you!

Name: michael
Line: oh, michael! this'll be just us.

Name: michael
Line: oh, yes yes yes yes. just so you know, he's at his funniest when you've given him five shots.

Name: holly
Line: all right.

Name: michael
Line: and it also helps if you've had five shots.

Name: holly
Line: i already have.

Name: michael
Line: whoa!

Name: jim
Line: [to michael] why is packer back?

Name: michael
Line: is packer here?

Name: dwight
Line: why's he talking to holly?

Name: michael
Line: [peering into conference room] don't know, don't care.

Name: holly
Line: [to todd] michael loves you, and your sales speak for themselves.

Name: todd
Line: [excitedly] oh!

Name: michael
Line: [sees holly and todd shaking hands in the conference room] yes! the pack is back! ladies and gentlemen, i would like to introduce you to a man who needs no introduction, probably because most of you have done it with him. just kidding he wouldn't be interested in any of you. in all seriousness, todd packer, is a permanent salesman at this branch. and i would like to invite you to welcome him with open arms.

Name: kevin
Line: yes!

Name: jim
Line: what!?

Name: todd
Line: it's great to be among friends, but until then, you suckers will do!

Name: kevin
Line: nice! we got burned!

Name: michael
Line: you did! you got burned, because packer's back! packer is turning in his car for a desk. he is turning in his condoms, for a condominium! although he's probably going to have to use condoms from here on out.

Name: dwight
Line: [seething] holly, you approved this?

Name: holly
Line: yes i did, i think todd's gonna make a great addition to the staff.

Name: jim
Line: you did approve it?

Name: holly
Line: yeah.

Name: kevin
Line: what don't you understand about the word approved? it seems some of you don't know what the word approved means.

Name: kevin
Line: i have very little patience for stupidity.

Name: erin
Line: [walking in with gabe behind her] sorry we're late. gabe fell in the shower.

Name: gabe
Line: i'm such a klutz!

Name: erin
Line: yeah, it took the fire department forever to get there. [realizing there's a new computer at her desk. gets very excited] oh my god, where did this come from?! who did this?!

Name: pam
Line: i got erin a new computer, because the one at reception sucked. i should know. and i don't wanna say the other one was old, but its i.p. number is one! [laughs sheepishly] right?

Name: erin
Line: thank you pam.

Name: pam
Line: awwh, you're welcome. [they hug] my pleasure.

Name: jim
Line: [pam walks over to him and smiles excitedly while bouncing, jim imitates her] can i do something for ya?

Name: pam
Line: i just helped someone out. it feels good.

Name: jim
Line: nice. you know, i cleaned our daughter for like, an hour at four a.m. this morning, so...

Name: pam
Line: so you know the feeling.

Name: michael
Line: special delivery for dwight k. schrute.

Name: dwight
Line: i didn't order anything.

Name: michael
Line: and i don't have anything for you. but i do wanna talk to you about something. we have been thinking about where packer should sit... and we can't just sit around and wait for creed to die.

Name: dwight
Line: well there's a lot of seats in the annex.

Name: michael
Line: so you wouldn't mind permanently relocating, so that packer can take this desk here. [jim looks appalled]

Name: todd
Line: thanks man, it'd mean a lot.

Name: dwight
Line: i have been sitting here for ten years, michael.

Name: todd
Line: well i was there for twelve years. plus my name's carved under the desk.

Name: dwight
Line: no it is not.

Name: todd
Line: is too!

Name: michael
Line: [grunting as he crawls under dwight's desk. dwight follows] let's look at this.

Name: todd
Line: check it out!

Name: dwight
Line: i don't wanna move desks!

Name: michael
Line: don't be a baby! okay! there it is. packer was here and so was your mom! [todd starts humping dwight and michael who are still under the desk.

Name: jim
Line: do i have any say in this?!

Name: michael
Line: no!

Name: todd
Line: [grunting while humping michael and dwight] don't even watch, halpert!

Name: dwight
Line: [in the annex, moving into his new desk. holds up a red tray with rocks on it] hey, who's dirt box is this?

Name: holly
Line: oh, that's our zen garden.

Name: dwight
Line: what do you grow in here, bullcrap? [puts the tray into the garbage]

Name: pam
Line: [walking into the annex with jim] hey, um...

Name: holly
Line: hey, what's up guys?

Name: meredith
Line: don't what's up us! you think you're so cute, with your pretty blonde hair!

Name: jim
Line: whoa, pull it back. uhm, why did you hire todd packer?

Name: holly
Line: uhm.

Name: pam
Line: he's seriously awful!

Name: holly
Line: michael's recommendation was glowing! and, honestly, he's been nothing but nice to me!

Name: meredith
Line: that's how he gets you to take off his panties.

Name: jim
Line: [pam starts nodding in agreement] why are you nodding?

Name: pam
Line: united front...

Name: holly
Line: okay, look. we can't fire someone because we don't like him.

Name: ryan
Line: right this isn't the u.s. government.

Name: kelly
Line: what are you referencing?

Name: ryan
Line: [seems unsure] everything... everything.

Name: holly
Line: do any of you have any concrete complaints about something he's done?

Name: jim
Line: well, i mean he humped michael.

Name: holly
Line: well if that's the case, i guess i've gotta be fired too. [all groan in disgust]

Name: andy
Line: [looking at his computer, gasps] hey! hey you guys! the armeth regado video is up, gather around! [no one moves] check it out! this guy's on a full beam reach. [watching a sailing video on his computer] they're hiking out like mad! lock 'em up! lock 'em up! nice job! ughh. [computer is frozen, taps the top of it] this computer's a hunk of jjunk.

Name: erin
Line: hey sailor! come watch it over here! [pats her new computer]

Name: andy
Line: where did you get this?!

Name: erin
Line: pam gave it to me!

Name: andy
Line: this is a sick computer! gwen stefani has this computer! [to pam, in a fake british accent] uhhh, pamela! what does a guy have to do to get, ahem, one of them?

Name: pam
Line: you have a computer andy.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, but if you donated my computer to africa, it would become world famous as the slowest computer in africa. so...

Name: pam
Line: ok, but listen. we just don't have the budget for it. okay? reception needed a computer so we got one.

Name: andy
Line: well andy's desk needs a computer. and, i mean, it's just kinda a coincidence that i work there, but...

Name: pam
Line: yes, but reception is a one person department. if i get you a new computer i have to get one for everyone in sales. for dwight, for stanley, it would be crazy.

Name: stanley
Line: so something good happening to stanley is crazy now?

Name: andy
Line: i'm not asking for one, i need it.

Name: phyllis
Line: if you're just handing them out, i want one too.

Name: andy
Line: phyllis, no body is handing anything out.

Name: pam
Line: see, this is what i'm talking about.

Name: andy
Line: what are you gonna play mange on faster?

Name: pam
Line: sorry andy.

Name: todd
Line: hey what's going on you guys? [walking into the kitchen with holly, dwight, and kevin, with whom he fist bumps] yeahh! three muska-queers!

Name: kevin
Line: [giggling] mean but good!

Name: holly
Line: so, todd, this must be nice for you getting off the road. you get to spend some time with your daughter.

Name: todd
Line: i don't know, i love her and all, but she turned into a bitch. mostly she's great, but some days she acts like her mom. [holly is un-amused]

Name: holly
Line: well, some girls go through a phase.

Name: kevin
Line: hey, your life is so insane! you should write a book!

Name: todd
Line: since when did you learn how to read?

Name: kevin
Line: i do know how to read though!

Name: todd
Line: yeah. you know how to read... a menu!

Name: kevin
Line: [todd leaves. kevin laughs uncertainly] he's right. i mean, i could lose some weight.

Name: dwight
Line: kevin, in sumo culture, you'd be considered a promising up and comer.

Name: pam
Line: [walking through the office, notices andy with erin's computer set up at his desk] what the heck! why do you have erin's computer!

Name: andy
Line: it's crazy, right? erin just wanted me to have it, so we switched.

Name: pam
Line: what? erin is that true?

Name: erin
Line: [nods] i just thought, he really needed a new computer, and he knew so much about that one.

Name: pam
Line: erin, it's not up to you. this computer was for reception! okay? it's not yours to give away.

Name: andy
Line: pam, when i'm freaking out, i just sorta step back and-

Name: pam
Line: i'm not freaking out, andy.

Name: andy
Line: -take a few breaths, and then i ask myself: is this worth freaking out about?

Name: pam
Line: andy, why should she have your crappy computer?

Name: andy
Line: that's interesting. so you also think my computer is crappy.

Name: pam
Line: switch the computers back andy.

Name: andy
Line: seriously?

Name: pam
Line: seriously.

Name: andy
Line: pam! come on!

Name: pam
Line: now please.

Name: andy
Line: fine! [the office goes back to their work] please make sure no one is humping me!

Name: erin
Line: [to holly who is walking by] oh! if you're going back to the annex, could you take these to dwight? i think the ants are waking up. they need to start farming soon. [picks up an ant farm and tube of ants from her desk, holly takes them] thanks.

Name: michael
Line: best day ever. best day ever!

Name: holly
Line: so much happening. [not as excited as michael]

Name: michael
Line: question, should i get stripes shaved on the side of my head?

Name: holly
Line: no! no.

Name: michael
Line: please.

Name: holly
Line: did todd tell you to do that?

Name: michael
Line: yeah, you love him right? [holly seems unsure] you love him. i can tell.

Name: holly
Line: i love you.

Name: michael
Line: no. not me, him.

Name: holly
Line: that's certainly opinionated.

Name: erin
Line: [looking anxious] if you're not gonna take the ants over i should probably just do it myself.

Name: holly
Line: oh i'm going.

Name: michael
Line: whoa! look, are you jealous of him? because you think he's funnier than you? oh honey...

Name: holly
Line: i don't think he's funnier than me.

Name: michael
Line: he's funnier than me.

Name: holly
Line: no, he's not funny at all.

Name: michael
Line: so i'm less funny than not funny at all?

Name: erin
Line: [very anxious at this point] gee! uh oh! i think the ants are starting to eat each other!

Name: holly
Line: no, what i'm saying is, he's not funny, but you're funnier than he is.

Name: michael
Line: [seems taken aback] uhm...

Name: holly
Line: ok: bill cosby [puts the ant tube high up. each time she mentions a name it gets lower], steve martin, charlie bit my finger, michael scott, then all the way down here [tube takes a jump to the bottom] todd packer.

Name: michael
Line: that's insane!

Name: holly
Line: honey, he's a jerk.

Name: erin
Line: [getting up and walking towards them, worriedly] for pete's sake it just needs to be done! [takes the ant farm and tube from holly and heads towards the annex]

Name: todd
Line: [to jim] so you two are married to each other now, right?

Name: jim
Line: yeah.

Name: todd
Line: that's sweet. how's the sex?

Name: jim
Line: [continues working]

Name: dwight
Line: [walks towards todd] hey packer, i made you some hot chocolate.

Name: todd
Line: why?

Name: dwight
Line: 'cause i wanna let bygones be bygones. show you i'm cool. you're the new guy. it's cold out. i made too much. i got this awesome hot chocolate recipe from my wife.

Name: jim
Line: that's a lot of reasons! [suspicious]

Name: dwight
Line: drink it!

Name: todd
Line: i think i'll pass. the only hot chocolate i'm into is viva a fox. [winks]

Name: jim
Line: [interrupts dwight trying to force feed todd] can i talk to you a second?

Name: jim
Line: so, this hot chocolate thing.

Name: dwight
Line: none of your business.

Name: jim
Line: well, you know you can't actually poison him.

Name: dwight
Line: it wasn't poison jim, it was a laxative. people take laxatives all the time. this is just, a lot more of a laxative. let me handle this.

Name: jim
Line: i really think we should join forces on this one.

Name: dwight
Line: really.

Name: jim
Line: what do we think, what would drive him crazy.

Name: dwight
Line: i know.

Name: jim
Line: here we go.

Name: dwight
Line: pepto-bismol, in his hot chocolate.

Name: jim
Line: you've gotta stop with the hot chocolate stuff. i was thinking we can jam his drawers, so they only comes out two inches, then he can see everything in them but he can't get to them.

Name: dwight
Line: [mocking] ooh does edgar allan poe know about that one? so sinister! that wouldn't annoy a person at all! where do you come up with this stuff?

Name: jim
Line: okay! well this isn't my best, but call froggy101, say that we're the tour manager for justin bieber, and we're giving away free tickets, we give him a number to call for the tickets, and it's his own number.

Name: dwight
Line: who is justice beaver?

Name: jim
Line: he... it's a crime fighting beaver.

Name: dwight
Line: why don't you write up your best forty ideas and e-mail them to me. can you do that?

Name: jim
Line: absolutely, i'll e-mail you a hundred.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah, write up your list of one hundred, edit it down to your top forty, then e-mail it to me, and i'll read it over.

Name: andy
Line: pam. can i talk to you in private?

Name: pam
Line: i don't know if there's really a private place in this office.

Name: andy
Line: well they put a sign-up sheet on the conference room and i signed us up for three mods. a mod is five minutes. and it started two minutes ago.

Name: pam
Line: [looking confused] you did that?

Name: andy
Line: can we talk about this in the meeting? because we're a little late.

Name: pam
Line: okay. [walks to conference room with andy and stares at the sign up sheet with wonder] when did people sign-

Name: andy
Line: mind if i close the door? [after shutting door in the conference room] what you did out there, earlier, was totally un-cool.

Name: pam
Line: well what was i supposed to do, let you walk all over me?

Name: andy
Line: you humiliated me in front of every body!

Name: pam
Line: okay, well i didn't think about it like that. it's just, i can't do anything about it. i can't replace that one unless that computer breaks.

Name: andy
Line: i mean, it's pretty broken already.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, well if it breaks all the way i can get you a new one.

Name: andy
Line: [looks at her knowingly] pretty sneaky sis. [knocking on conference room door]

Name: ryan
Line: [walking in] hey cats, we got a jazz session in mod six, nine, and twelve. [pam and andy exit as ryan and others holding saxophones walk in, pam looks at the sign up sheet in awe]

Name: dwight
Line: [to jim, the two are alone in the annex] there are over four hundred of these! [indicating a packet of paper]

Name: jim
Line: yeah i couldn't cut it down.

Name: dwight
Line: they're all good. so good! number three: eat a frog. that sounds promising. number four: eat a dog. i don't know, um, from practical stand point-

Name: jim
Line: one thirty-five. did you like one thirty-five?

Name: dwight
Line: eat a brog. maybe it's because i didn't understand it. i just had a couple of notes, let me grab a pen. [dwight tries to open up a drawer on his desk but it only goes out two inches] damn it. gah! just when we were getting going.

Name: andy
Line: [andy is seen clicking random things and warning boxes pop up. he pours coffee on his keyboard, puts bologna with mustard in his cd drive, and many other computer harming things] allow all cookies? why certainly! pop-ups? yes please! bit torrent streaming from a somalian music website? yeah! why not? [mock baby voice] oh i hope you don't get sick mr. computer. [computer voice] why are you doing this to me andy? [normal voice again] because i hate your programs!

Name: todd
Line: [at hank's with michael, talking to hank] and a '76 that's good to boot, i like that. [hank smiles]

Name: michael
Line: and you made hank smile, that doesn't happen often. you're very charming. that is something you should take upstairs, and use on people that really matter. [hank looks irritated again]

Name: todd
Line: why?

Name: michael
Line: i don't know, holly mentioned that there were some complaints. and that you had said some things about kevin.

Name: todd
Line: holly said that?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: holy
Line: she was laughing hysterically that whole time!

Name: michael
Line: i guess you said something weird about your daughter?

Name: todd
Line: she asked me, michael! it would've been rude not to answer.

Name: michael
Line: you've been on the road a long time. and you've been an outdoor cat. and now you have to be an indoor cat, so you can't be peeing all over the walls.

Name: todd
Line: michael, can i open the kamomo with you. i've been on the road too long. but, i wanna connect with my daughter. and it's not right to call her a bitch in front of strangers.

Name: michael
Line: no it isn't.

Name: todd
Line: you're right. i gotta watch my behavior.

Name: michael
Line: yeah, a little bit.

Name: todd
Line: don't give up on me.

Name: michael
Line: i won't.

Name: michael
Line: [michael and todd are walking into the office] okay, every body. i need you to see this. because maybe there is somebody here that you all underestimated, who will surprise you. todd packer, is going to apologize. kevin! front and center, come here.

Name: kevin
Line: i got a lot of numbers here to put together.

Name: michael
Line: kevin, we know that you are just trying to save face, we know that you are hurt and embarrassed.

Name: kevin
Line: that's silly. if anything, i should be apologizing to packer. because we all know i can dish it, as good as i can take it.

Name: michael
Line: okay, sweetie, no. you shouldn't be apologizing to packer. that doesn't make any sense. you ready for this? you ready for this? gentlemen, start your engines.

Name: todd
Line: i'm sorry if you were offended by my comments earlier.

Name: kevin
Line: well, like i said, i wasn't offended, but i'll stand here for the big show.

Name: michael
Line: kevin, do you accept the apology?

Name: kelly
Line: don't do it kevin, that's the fake kind of apology.

Name: michael
Line: okay, go back to the annex.

Name: kelly
Line: this is textbook. it's so uncool. ryan does this to me all the time. like it's some offense to have feelings. don't do it kevin.

Name: ryan
Line: [muttering] sometimes you over react.

Name: oscar
Line: michael how's this supposed to work? packer's gonna keep saying terrible things, and then he's just gonna make half-assed apologies. and we're back to square one.

Name: todd
Line: okay. you want an apology? here it goes. kevin, i am so sorry. you are skinny, and you are a genius.

Name: michael
Line: that-that was maybe too much. packer is a survivor of divorce stanley. packer doesn't speak with his child, meredith. packer never lived up to his parent's expectations, andy. [andy looks confused and shrugs] angela loves pussy cats, and packer loves-

Name: angela
Line: [cutting in] no! don't!

Name: michael
Line: i was going to say dogs! okay, you know what, this is over! apology has been issued! and we're through with it. packer will be here until the day he dies, just like the rest of us!

Name: pam
Line: [in a car with andy, by the dumpster you can see a new computer box] so listen, we have to really scuff this up.

Name: andy
Line: no no no no no! we can say that the previous owner was a neat-freak. or an elegant old lady and she just kept it around in case her grand-kids came to visit, but they died and they never came, i think i'm gonna make myself cry.

Name: pam
Line: andy, this is the deal we made.

Name: andy
Line: [watching pam scrap his computer] that's probably good. that's enough.

Name: pam
Line: we should break this hinge maybe.

Name: andy
Line: let's not go crazy.

Name: todd
Line: well thanks, will do.

Name: jim
Line: [using fake southern accent, on the phone with todd packer, dwight is also with jim] absolutely, now when you get down there, jo's a little bit, uh, forgetful. so she may have locked the gate, but what you're gonna do is go ahead, hop it, and just head back to the pool. [michael walks in on jim and dwight]

Name: todd
Line: that sounds weird.

Name: jim
Line: it is weird! look at you, perceptive. now i know why jo's kept her eye on you!

Name: dwight
Line: [also in southern accent] and you make sure to get down there and check out that harry potter world.

Name: jim
Line: [trying to stop him] whatever you wanna do in your spare time is up to you!

Name: dwight
Line: harry potter world is supposed to be faaantastic!

Name: todd
Line: apparently, as soon as corporate found out i wanted to come in off the road, jo offered me a cushy new job in tallahassee. and here's the best part. i'm a huge alligator nerd. i can name you every genus, every sub species. also i'm a huge boob nerd.

Name: dwight
Line: check it out and have a free butterbeer on us. keep the receipt and we'll get ya' back!

Name: michael
Line: what are you doing?

Name: jim
Line: [trying to hide from michael what they're doing, he picks up the phone and talks directly into it] all right, so just pack your bags and, uh, be sure to bring those swimming trunks! bye now! [hangs up]

Name: michael
Line: i cannot believe this, you're sending packer to florida? why?

Name: jim
Line: he's a jerk.

Name: dwight
Line: he took my desk.

Name: michael
Line: okay, so you're tricking him into flying to florida?

Name: dwight
Line: it wasn't my first choice, jim had so many better ideas.

Name: michael
Line: you have to tell him. you have to tell him what you did.

Name: dwight
Line: no, no, no. that is not part of the plan. that is actually anti-what we're doing.

Name: michael
Line: he is my oldest friend, i am going to tell him.

Name: jim
Line: wait! why don't we come up with a plan we're all happy about? [michael leaves]

Name: andy
Line: [plugging in new computer, acting to make people think he got a bad computer] pam, how is this thing even any better than my old computer?

Name: pam
Line: come on andy! i mean you said you wanted a new computer and this is the best i could do!

Name: andy
Line: where'd you even find this thing, like, in the corner in the warehouse?

Name: pam
Line: yes, i found it in a shelf in the corner of the warehouse. [darryl gives the camera an odd look]

Name: andy
Line: all right, well thank you for my garbage computer. [andy turns it on and looks amazed, clearly happy with it]

Name: todd
Line: [walking into michael's office] you're looking at the new face of corporate. gonna put the "ass", in tallahassee!

Name: michael
Line: yes, about that.

Name: todd
Line: well we gotta go out and celebrate, tonight!

Name: michael
Line: well... i don't know if that's a good idea.

Name: todd
Line: do you have a ball and chain?

Name: michael
Line: no, nothing like that at all.

Name: todd
Line: listen, i'm gonna tell you something that none of these people have the stones to tell you. it's your girlfriend, man. she's uptight.

Name: michael
Line: sorry?

Name: todd
Line: i know this stuff can hurt, but i wish someone had said something to me about my ex-wife. all i'm saying is about a month or so, meet me down in florida, i'll introduce you to all the local [spanks the air] talent.

Name: michael
Line: [thinks a moment] sounds great.

Name: todd
Line: it's gonna be so good.

Name: michael
Line: that is. [jim sees them and looks happy] it's gonna be awesome. i think you're really going to enjoy it down there.

Name: holly
Line: i'm sorry about your friend.

Name: michael
Line: nah, he's an ass.

Name: holly
Line: [brooklyn accent] you ahh.

Name: michael
Line: [imitating] you ahh.

Name: holly
Line: what ah you wicked smaht?

Name: michael
Line: no you ahh.

Name: holly
Line: who ahh?

Name: michael
Line: [kisses her and speaks normally again] you ahh.

Name: daryl
Line: so this new computer you found in the warehouse.

Name: pam
Line: yep. lucked out.

Name: daryl
Line: yeah, you really did. 'cause i know every inch of that warehouse.

Name: pam
Line: yep, super lucky.

Name: daryl
Line: maybe you could go back down there and see if you can find me some extra sick days.

Name: pam
Line: [hesitating at the bribe] yeah. you know what , i think i saw one sick day down there.

Name: daryl
Line: really? 'cause i think maybe i saw five.

Name: pam
Line: three. [daryl nods]

Name: pam
Line: i'm full on corrupt!

Name: pam
Line: hey oscar, big will and grace fan huh?

Name: oscar
Line: no. everybody assumes i am. i always get them as gifts.

Name: pam
Line: oh.

Name: pam
Line: dunder mifflin is having our first own garage sale. like many americans, we realized we had a lot of things that we really didn't need. and 10 cents of every dollar is going into the party fund so we can throw parties for ourselves.

Name: dwight
Line: people! look alive. it's showtime. doors open in 3...2...1.

Name: jim
Line: oh, yikes.

Name: pam
Line: it's cold dwight. just shut the door and let people come in the front.

Name: dwight
Line: it's good that its cold it will drive business inside.

Name: pam
Line: the signs will drive people inside.

Name: dwight
Line: the warmth will lure people inside.

Name: andy
Line: close it.

Name: dwight
Line: this is how business...

Name: andy
Line: close it.

Name: dwight
Line: i'm not closing the door.

Name: andy
Line: close it. [starts wrestling dwight]

Name: dwight
Line: stop it.

Name: andy
Line: just close it.

Name: dwight
Line: uh oh, looks like someone's sign is a little crooked. uh, looks awful. need a thumb tack?

Name: meredith
Line: sure.

Name: dwight
Line: not so fast.

Name: dwight
Line: schrute's are farmers by hobby, and traders by trade. through the art of the swap, i will walk out of this garage sale with the finest item here.

Name: dwight
Line: i will trade you for the used candle.

Name: meredith
