Name: deangelo
Line: no, not officially, actually, i saw you walking out of the bathroom before.

Name: kelly
Line: well, i guess i'll go back to my cave. it was really great meeting you.

Name: deangelo
Line: [offers kelly the papers as she walks away]

Name: kelly
Line: and that is what you call a meet cute.

Name: michael
Line: and we talk for like 20 minutes, no clue it's deangelo the whole time!

Name: darryl
Line: kind of embarassing.

Name: angela
Line: yeah, that story makes you sound stupid.

Name: michael
Line: i happen to like the hilarious hijinx i get myself into. there he is! deangelo, i was just telling them about last night, when we met. remember that? that was crazy!

Name: deangelo
Line: oh. [chuckles] that was... let's see, where's my replacement? where's the guy i'm replacing? why don't i look to the left? he's sitting right there! [office laughs]

Name: michael
Line: oh yeah... i know... that's what i was just saying... that's what...

Name: deangelo
Line: [silences michael]

Name: andy
Line: that exact situation is why i always carry around some of these. [holds up 'hello, my name is..,'] nametags. just in case. because sometimes you just need to i.d. yourself.

Name: deangelo
Line: [laughs] office funny guy! always glad to have an office funny guy around!

Name: andy
Line: i wasn't even trying to make a joke. but i guess i've always been sorta quirky, offbeat, a little twisted.

Name: michael
Line: this is jim and pam, aka jap. what started as an affair has blossomed into a family before our eyes.

Name: pam
Line: well, it wasn't an affair.

Name: michael
Line: yes it was.

Name: pam
Line: but, no, but we are a family.

Name: jim
Line: [points to picture of cecelia] we made that.

Name: pam
Line: cecelia.

Name: deangelo
Line: well, congratulations. i have four kids of my own.

Name: pam
Line: really? oh, my gosh! we just have the one, but she poops for four. [laughs]

Name: pam
Line: uh oh. someone started off on the right foot with the new boss!

Name: jim
Line: yeah, they don't ever talk about careers that were made because of unplanned pregnancies.

Name: dwight
Line: thanks for meeting me.

Name: michael
Line: are you kidding? i'd come anywhere to see a turtle? where'd you find him.

Name: dwight
Line: there's no turtle, michael. i just wanted to get you here.

Name: michael
Line: you know me very well, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: that's because i'm your right-hand man, michael, but i can't do it again. i can't do it again for a whole new guy.

Name: michael
Line: now i'm gonna have to go online and look at turtles or i'll be off all day.

Name: dwight
Line: i want to be manager. i just don't understand why i wasn't even interviewed for the job. what's wrong? i was totally qualified, you were pushing for me.

Name: meredith
Line: that apple looks delic!

Name: deangelo
Line: i do a lot of portion control. i try to keep my daily calor intake under 1200. [laughter]

Name: stanley
Line: deangelo, you're going to starve to death. [laughter]

Name: michael
Line: so you decided to have an orgy and not invite me? i call the middle!

Name: darryl
Line: it's cool that you like the southwest. it's one of my favorite regions.

Name: darryl
Line: it's one of my favorite regions? did i just sound totally lame? no, i sounded good.

Name: darryl
Line: i love the desert. it's one of my favorite ecosystems.

Name: deangelo
Line: here's the great thing about the southwest; there's so much more than desert. along the north rim of the grand canyon is a forest as lush as you've ever seen.

Name: kevin
Line: burnt! it's lush, dummie. hey, deangelo, what do you think of bald people? i hate them.

Name: angela
Line: deangelo, i forget, did you mention you like politics?

Name: deangelo
Line: i did not.

Name: angela
Line: cause i was thinking that you should meet my boyfriend, he's a state senator. i really think the two of you would hit it off. he's a great person to know.

Name: deangelo
Line: sounds very interesting, thank you.

Name: erin
Line: dunder mifflin, this is erin. ok, let me transfer you.

Name: deangelo
Line: why do you use your name when you use the phone?

Name: erin
Line: oh, that's how pam does it. i just copy her. she's sort of a living legend.

Name: deangelo
Line: try it without using your name.

Name: erin
Line: dunder mifflin, this is... oh, i like it!

Name: deangelo
Line: dunder mifflin, how may i assist you?

Name: erin
Line: oh, assist.

Name: michael
Line: i sorta like the old way.

Name: deangelo
Line: i just prefer it without the name and i thought- i've got to start doing some managing at some point.

Name: michael
Line: i know, i know, i'm sorry, but if it's not a big deal we should just-

Name: deangelo
Line: and it really isn't.

Name: michael
Line: is that good?

Name: erin
Line: yeah, ok, good.

Name: deangelo
Line: well, i'd like to change it, actually.

Name: michael
Line: well, whatever. whatever you think will work.

Name: erin
Line: what do you think?

Name: deangelo
Line: i think a change would be nice.

Name: michael
Line: you can do the old way or whatever you think would work. [phone rings]

Name: denagelo
Line: [whispering] change it.

Name: erin
Line: [picks up phone] ...i'm so sorry. sorry. [hangs up]

Name: deangelo
Line: hey, funny guy. wanna have a little mid-day lawl here. make me laugh, huh? what you got? i can't even look at you.

Name: andy
Line: here we go... ok... what do african americans call... [laughter]

Name: erin
Line: deangelo, did you order a barber?

Name: deangelo
Line: oh, yeah. put a pin on that, kid. can't wait to hear the punchline.

Name: darryl
Line: finish the joke, andy. what do african americans call?

Name: andy
Line: i... don't know. help me.

Name: ryan
Line: [a barber enters the office for deangelo] that is so badass. so hardcore.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah, real cool. real power move.

Name: deangelo
Line: i saw a hawk today. just sitting right there on the overpass. looking at me.

Name: michael
Line: [to erin] shave me. [walks into office with deangelo] this is going to be funny! looks like we are going to be shaving buddies!

Name: deangelo
Line: ok, alright! i love it! i love it! michael, this is reggie. he is the #1 yelp reviewed shaver in scranton. it's not even close.

Name: michael
Line: and this is erin and she is going to shave my face. here we go. [erin puts too much shaving cream on michael's face, none on the neck]

Name: deangelo
Line: alright. this is how we do it. feels nice, doesn't it?

Name: michael
Line: it really does. this is luxery. here we go. ah, that is nice.

Name: oscar
Line: you wanted to talk to us deangelo?

Name: deangelo
Line: ah, yes, please! just cozy up there. just thought we could have some rap sessions with smaller groups.

Name: michael
Line: well, we don't really do rap sessions. we kinda do... [erin shaves michael] god... we sorta do more of like powwows or-

Name: deangelo
Line: ok, then, powwows then, fine.

Name: michael
Line: that's-

Name: pam
Line: hey, deangelo, my mom just sent me this picture of cece, it is so adorable.

Name: jim
Line: alright, wait, little bit of backstory, she loves dogs. she calls them 'da-das'.

Name: pam
Line: da-das.

Name: jim
Line: and what happens here is-

Name: deangelo
Line: you know what, enough about your baby, ok? i'm sorry.

Name: jim
Line: we were... i think she was just trying to-

Name: deangelo
Line: no, no, no, i know what you're doing. just quit it. i want to hear from the rank and file. how can i be the best manager for you all? what can i do better?

Name: michael
Line: you know what, everybody? you have to be honest, here. you can't say that everything is perfect. so, you know, come up with something.

Name: oscar
Line: well, deangelo, i'd say communication could be improved. people stopped reading memos, so everyone marks them urgent.

Name: michael
Line: ok, you know what, i mark it urgent a, urgent b, urgent c, urgent d. urgent a is the most important, urgent d you don't even really have to worry about.

Name: erin
Line: michael, can you stop talking now? i need to shave your lips.

Name: michael
Line: don't shave my lips.

Name: deangelo
Line: [andy walks into room] what's up?

Name: andy
Line: i don't mean to go into a rant here, but...

Name: andy
Line: i wrote the perfect joke. topical, edgy, funny.

Name: andy
Line: ...i saw this thing on the news. democrats want electric cars. republicans don't. i'm thinking, 'how crazy is it that we have a car debate going on in a city known for gridlock.

Name: deangelo
Line: let's not talk politics in the office, ok? i like you better as a funny guy.

Name: andy
Line: [leans on table] i wasn't taking a position. it's just one of those things where- [table collapses under andy]

Name: deangelo
Line: [laughter] now that's funny! that's funny! you walk much?

Name: andy
Line: yeah, right, i mean- [walks into door, jokingly]

Name: deangelo
Line: little click...

Name: erin
Line: [pushing box into office] deangelo, this box came for you.

Name: deangelo
Line: thank you. that's my stuff. yeah. michael, take a look at this.

Name: stanley
Line: need a hand?

Name: deangelo
Line: oh, that'd be great, thank you stanley!

Name: michael
Line: you know, this office sort of has a perfect feng shui to it, so... you know, let's not go overboard with the re-decorating, and i'm still here-

Name: ryan
Line: [holds up painting of desert to office, who are impressed]

Name: michael
Line: i still have to look at this stuff, guys.

Name: darryl
Line: so this is a ten-gallon hat, huh?

Name: deangelo
Line: yep, ten-gallon hat. technically, it only holds about three quartz. little factoid.

Name: kevin
Line: interesting.

Name: michael
Line: deangelo's great. i love the guy. but i'm not sure he's a great fit for the office. and also, i'm not sure if i love the guy.

Name: darryl's sister
Line: [holds out cowboy boots for darryl]

Name: darryl
Line: cool, cool. alright, see you later.

Name: darryl's sister
Line: hey, hey, hey! [holds up set of pistols in holsters]

Name: darryl
Line: no, i'm good. keep them.

Name: deangelo
Line: hey, funny man! whatcha got for me? make me laugh?

Name: andy
Line: [mimes using a rope to pull himself forward to microwave] let's see if they have my favorite teas in here... [throws tea packets into air, puts hand in unplugged toaster, pretends to be shocked, takes container of cheese-puffs and throws them into air, pours hot coffee on his pants]

Name: deangelo
Line: [laughs] drink some soap!

Name: andy
Line: [drinks hand soap]

Name: deangelo
Line: [laughter and applause]

Name: andy
Line: i guess this is my life now.

Name: dwight
Line: how do i become a manger at sabre?

Name: gabe
Line: first thing's first, thank you for coming here directly. i know you could have called tallahassee but they would've just looped back to me, so, it's cool you recognized my role here.

Name: dwight
Line: i left a message at corporate.

Name: gabe
Line: ahh. there you go. get a recommendation from michael. that'll put you right on the shortlist for next time there's an opening.

Name: dwight
Line: can't you just use the recommendation you already have on file?

Name: gabe
Line: what recommendation?

Name: dwight
Line: from when he recommended me to replace him.

Name: gabe
Line: ...i'm sorry, i never know how to act in these awkward-type situations.

Name: deangelo
Line: best whale watching: easily the west coast. if you're going whale watching on the east coast, you might wanna bring a magazine called "west coast whales'. [laughter] because you're not gonna see them-

Name: michael
Line: [interrupting deangelo] snack time! it's the witching hour! it's the sandwitching hour!

Name: kevin
Line: awesome!

Name: phyllis
Line: mmm, whatcha got?

Name: michael
Line: pb and j, my mom's recipe! [throws sandwitch at phyllis]

Name: angela
Line: michael! deangelo has a peanut allergy.

Name: deangelo
Line: i need a wide berth. i need a wide berth from those nuts.

Name: stanley
Line: what are you doing? have you lost your mind?

Name: michael
Line: i think kevin wants one. kevin, here you go! [throws sandwitch into kevin's open mouth]

Name: oscar
Line: michael, this is serious! do you know what happens if deangelo touches a peanut?

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: deangelo
Line: michael, the last time i was exposed to a peanut, i was itchy for three days, ok? i had to take baths constantly. i missed the o.j. verdict. i had to read about it in the paper like an idiot.

Name: jim
Line: wait, so, you don't go into shock or die or anything?

Name: deangelo
Line: no, jim, not everything is life or death. i want to feel comfortable.

Name: michael
Line: oscar, here you go. [throws sandwitch]

Name: deangelo
Line: [uses book to stop the sandwitch's flight] you're getting nut particles all in the air!

Name: michael
Line: no one had a problem with the air here until you came around.

Name: deangelo
Line: [steps into conference room] everyone, mandatory meeting. multi-purpose room, now.

Name: michael
Line: no, that's good. you just stay in there, stay in there by yourself, loser. no body go in. [disgusted comments by co-workers] no body go in there. stay where you are.

Name: oscar
Line: michael, this is insane.

Name: michael
Line: no, it's not insane, oscar. i'm been here for 19 years, and just because someone else is called the boss, you're gonna throw it all away? no.

Name: jim
Line: listen, you're the one who decided to leave. come on, he's the new boss, you know we have to do this.

Name: michael
Line: well, who needs him. guess it's just you and me, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: correction. just you. alright, meeting. multi-function room.

Name: deangelo
Line: [walks out] hold on, hey michael, michael, wait up, hold on. um, so for these meetings do you just jump into business or do you start with some chit-chat or...?

Name: michael
Line: i start with some chit-chat and a maybe a couple of jokes. and you might want to develop a couple of characters. you know what, you'll be fine.

Name: deangelo
Line: maybe. maybe not. 50/50. you know what, it is too bad for this place that you're leaving. [extents hands for hug] bring it in, come on. [michael doesn't accept hug] ok. [walks back]

Name: michael
Line: ok. [hugs deangelo from behind] why did you have to be so damn good?

Name: deangelo
Line: i... i'm adequete. i'm half as good as you.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no. come on. you are good, they know it.

Name: deangelo
Line: will you do me a favour and enjoy this time, ok? you've worked so hard, get your senioritis on. it's lake havasu time!

Name: micahel
Line: guess i've been working so hard i forgot what it's like to be hardly working.

Name: deangelo
Line: ok. what is the native american girl's name?

Name: michael
Line: you'll figure it out.

Name: jim
Line: hey, deangelo! wanna meet cece?

Name: deangelo
Line: that's a cute baby. very cute baby. adorable. very cute.

Name: jim
Line: thank you very much.

Name: pam
Line: see, we knew it! if he just met her, he'd understand.

Name: jim
Line: we're back in! right?

Name: deangelo
Line: i swear, that baby could be the star of a show entitled 'babys i don't care about.'

Name: michael
Line: it is six a.m. [deangelo yawns] and we are about to go house to house to give everyone their dundie nomination certificates. just like the oscars!

Name: deangelo
Line: yes, and this happens every...?

Name: michael
Line: every year! this happens, you have a lot to learn my friend. [deangelo laughs]

Name: deangelo
Line: well, you know, why don't we try it, and if it goes good it'll be part of my tradition.

Name: michael
Line: why do you always say that? you're gonna love it.

Name: michael
Line: [arriving at the first house] alright let's go! [deangelo runs in the wrong direction] this way, this way! [michael knocks on the door]

Name: deangelo
Line: thanks.

Name: michael
Line: surprise!

Name: deangelo
Line: congratulations!

Name: jim
Line: yep, okay...

Name: michael
Line: you and pam have both been nominated for dundie awards!

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Name: michael
Line: [holds up a camera and deangelo meows] here we go! have pam come down.

Name: jim
Line: no she doesn't wa- she's not here.

Name: pam
Line: what's going on?

Name: jim
Line: stay in bed!

Name: michael
Line: [next house] congratulations!

Name: stanley
Line: have you lost your mind! get off my property before i call the police!

Name: michael
Line: we got it.

Name: deangelo
Line: uh, leave it at the door or...?

Name: michael
Line: yeah that's fine.

Name: michael
Line: [next house] hey toby! you suck! [throwing eggs at his house]

Name: deangelo
Line: is this an employee of ours?

Name: michael
Line: [giggles] go go go go go go!

Name: michael
Line: [arriving at a dumpy looking, unkempt house] i've never seen this place in the daylight.

Name: deangelo
Line: it reminds me of katrina.

Name: michael
Line: here we go, alright got it? set? [the door is ajar, michael knocks lightly] hello? [turns around to see meredith walking towards her house]

Name: meredith
Line: i'm so busted! walk of shame!

Name: deangelo
Line: do you usually leave your door unlocked? and ajar?

Name: meredith
Line: ahh, nice! i got a dundie nomination!

Name: michael
Line: yes you did. that's right! congratulations meredith. we should head out.

Name: meredith
Line: no no no! you guys stay! no no no! i have vienna sausages and i have napkins. [walks into her house] let me fix you breakfast!

Name: deangelo
Line: [whispers] i'm not going in there.

Name: michael
Line: [quietly shuts the door] go.

Name: michael
Line: [walking into the office] good morning erin.

Name: erin
Line: oh hey, didn't see you.

Name: michael
Line: you have big plans for tonight?

Name: erin
Line: i don't know, maybe volunteer at the shelter, or go to bed, or... i don't know. maybe i'm going to the dundies!! [flashes her nomination certificate]

Name: michael
Line: you are getting so funny! [erin giggles] very good.

Name: michael
Line: the dundies are my baby, and they need to go on. when larry king died they didn't just cancel his show. they got pierce morgan to come in, and do his show, and, that way, larry lives on.

Name: michael
Line: anything can happen at the dundies! [deangelo laughs] they're like the golden globes but less mean. and i just want all of us to have a good time!

Name: dwight
Line: just a little announcement folks, remember, the dundies is a black tie affair.

Name: michael
Line: black tie optional.

Name: dwight
Line: every day is black tie optional!

Name: michael
Line: a la, tonight we will be hosting at louie volpies!

Name: kevin
Line: nice! [rest of the office looks excited]

Name: phyllis
Line: i love their breadsticks!

Name: pam
Line: oh, their breadsticks are like crack!

Name: ryan
Line: i love when people say like crack when they've obviously never done crack.

Name: pam
Line: well the breadsticks are like what then, ryan, what can i use?

Name: ryan
Line: i don't know, something from your world. the breadsticks are like scrapbooking.

Name: pam
Line: you're right, you're right. i'm a middle class broad. [jim does his "jim face"]

Name: michael
Line: shh, shh! okay, okay. everybody's right. they're like breadsticks on steroids. right?

Name: ryan
Line: yeah that's great.

Name: michael
Line: so as you know, the dundies are my legacy. so i'm going to need to train a replacement. so this year, i have decided to have a co-host. [dwight looks suspecting] and that person is [he and deangelo roll their tongues as a drum roll] deangelo! [all applaud]

Name: dwight
Line: always the padawan, never the jedi.

Name: deangelo
Line: thank you michael, uh, but i will have to pass.

Name: michael
Line: think of it as part of your training.

Name: deangelo
Line: not much of a performer, unless you count singing in the shower. boy, okay...

Name: michael
Line: [smiling] okay, well we'll work on it.

Name: deangelo
Line: [whispers to michael] michael, i'm very, very bad.

Name: michael
Line: you are doing it.

Name: michael
Line: [all in conference room] guys! i want you to help us work on some banter.

Name: kevin
Line: yes! i love banter. but i hate witty banter.

Name: michael
Line: here we go! so, deangelo! you and i have a lot in common. you lost two hundred pounds, and i lose my car keys every morning.

Name: deangelo
Line: that is true, we do share some similarities. i know how you can fix one of those problems, for me it was portion control. for you, you need a key chain. maybe one with a-

Name: michael
Line: [cutting him off] okay, okay. you know what, i didn't actually lose my keys...

Name: deangelo
Line: this did not happen.

Name: michael
Line: mmmmkay. there needs to be what you call a rat-a-tat. and right now it's all rat and no tat. ryan come on up here. tap deangelo out. just watch this. okay. [ryan stands next to michael up front] ryan how are you today?

Name: ryan
Line: why don't you ask my therapist, my mom certainly pays her enough.

Name: michael
Line: [very excited] there you go! lovely! regis and kelly! nice! use that as an inspiration.  just be funny.

Name: deangelo
Line: uhhh, you sir! [points to jim] are we having fun tonight?

Name: jim
Line: having a great time.

Name: deangelo
Line: oh good!

Name: jim
Line: thanks, yeah.

Name: deangelo
Line: where were you on september 11th?

Name: michael
Line: no! god! [jim looks at him oddly]

Name: deangelo
Line: this is so weird! if i'm conducting a meeting, good to go. but if i think of it as a performance... i-i fall apart. obviously.

Name: andy
Line: why don't you think of hosting the dundies like you're just running a meeting.

Name: michael
Line: no, no, no! this is the performance of your life!

Name: jim
Line: why don't you just, privately, in your own head, think of it like a meeting.

Name: michael
Line: jim, please no loopholes.

Name: darryl
Line: mike, why do you have to control how he perceives it in his mind?

Name: michael
Line: this is my last dundies ever, if i want mind control over him, is that too much to ask?

Name: deangelo
Line: [laying down, michael is sitting on deangelo's stomach bouncing up and down in michael's office] me mo. me mo.

Name: michael
Line: good. good. good!

Name: deangelo
Line: meee mo, mee!

Name: michael
Line: now, tell me something terrible that happened in your childhood.

Name: deangelo
Line: when i was very young, my mother divorced my father and i had to go to court and choose between them.

Name: michael
Line: [getting off his stomach] too personal. i don't wanna hear about it. [picking up a portable tape player] let's try this. put these on. [deangelo puts the headphones in] i am going to turn this on, and turn the volume all the way up. so you can't- [deangelo winces] that's right, you're not going to be able to hear yourself. read this, [gives him a card] and make it sound perfect.

Name: deangelo
Line: the dundies are-ow-about coming together! and recognizing, the adominability of the human spirit! [jim comes and closes the door]

Name: michael
Line: say it with an accent!

Name: deangelo
Line: [bad australian accent attempt] the dundies!

Name: michael
Line: [also in a poor australian accent] the dundies!

Name: deangelo
Line: the dundies!

Name: jim
Line: [jim and pam are walking outside] i just don't understand the desire to push sweet potato fries on me, and not just regular fries.

Name: pam
Line: yeah... [they see erin eating in her car, and ducking when they see her. pam knocks on her car window] hey, erin, everything okay?

Name: erin
Line: get away from the car, he's gonna see you.

Name: jim
Line: who's gonna see us?

Name: erin
Line: [desperately] just get in! get in! just get in!

Name: jim
Line: get in the car? [jim and pam get in the back seat]

Name: erin
Line: please! sorry. get in. [jim and pam are confused and worried] sorry sorry sorry.

Name: pam
Line: what's wrong?

Name: erin
Line: i eat lunch in the car now.  it's my alone time. it's just nice to have some time away from gabe.

Name: pam
Line: why don't you wanna eat lunch with your boyfriend?

Name: erin
Line: i, really don't like spending time with him.

Name: pam
Line: don't you think it's better to tell him the truth now? you know, rather than waste more of his time?

Name: jim
Line: i think i'm gonna go.

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: jim
Line: i think you got this. kay? [erin nods] alright. feel better!

Name: erin
Line: thank you jim.

Name: jim
Line: i'm sorry, that just wasn't interesting to me.

Name: erin
Line: i can't just dump him pam, i'm not like you, i can't be mean.

Name: pam
Line: wait, when am i...? you just have to be clear and firm. you know, just tell him you don't love him. just be honest with him. [erin nods]

Name: dwight
Line: [standing by the louie volpies entrance greeting people and giving them menus]

Name: kevin
Line: [walks in] hi!

Name: dwight
Line: appalling. [meredith walks in] eye sore. [jim and pam come in] surprisingly adequate! okay everyone! the activities commence in four seconds!

Name: erin
Line: deangelo, jo's on the phone for you.

Name: deangelo
Line: hello?

Name: "jo"
Line: [michael dressed as jo bennett, using a bad southern accent] deangelo! we're in serious horse manure here! the dundies are tonight! and we ain't got no host!

Name: deangelo
Line: oh no!

Name: "jo"
Line: luckily i have someone for you!

Name: deangelo
Line: billy crystal?

Name: "jo"
Line: better.

Name: deangelo
Line: neil patrick harris?

Name: "jo"
Line: he's in little shop of horrors on broadway. now we need michael scott! the best darn dundies host on both sides of the mississippi! [everyone in the audience is laughing]

Name: deangelo
Line: ughhh, i gotta find michael scott! and then i gotta, [russel brand impression] get him to the dundies!

Name: deangelo
Line: [in the office near the accountants] hey, can you help me find michael scott angela?

Name: "angela"
Line: [michael is wearing a blond wig, talking in a high obnoxious voice] my boyfriend can, he's a state senator.

Name: audience
Line: [laughing]

Name: deangelo
Line: mmhmm.

Name: angela
Line: oh wait, he can't help because that title has no meaning!

Name: oscar
Line: [laughing]

Name: oscar
Line: try jim deangelo, he'll be able to help.

Name: deangelo
Line: jim! do you know where i can find michael scott?

Name: "jim"
Line: [michael is wearing a wig that is very close to jim's actual hair, and he is wearing fake earrings, and speaking in a punk-ish deep voice] i totally don't know where michael is, dude, hey you wanna listen to some records?

Name: jim
Line: [shaking head at the camera]

Name: deangelo
Line: no one is listening to me! and i'm running out of time!

Name: "phyllis"
Line: [micheal dressed as phyllis, pretending to knit] well, what are you talking about? [cracking noise] ohh! ohh! [falls onto the ground] i've fallen and i can't get up!

Name: deangelo
Line: maybe i just need to look into my heart. [in the bathroom in front of the mirror] deangelo, where is michael scott. [his reflection in the mirror turns around to reveal that it is michael]

Name: michael
Line: i'm here. [deangelo gasps and turns around] in a good way! i've been here the whole time.

Name: oscar
Line: the analytical part of me wants to examine it, but i know it has no content.

Name: dwight
Line: ladies and gentlemen, please stand up for you co-host this evening, michael gary scott. [michael comes running up to stage as people applaud] please remain standing for your other co-host, and new manager, deangelo jeremitrius vickers! [deangelo presents himself, and changes his mind and runs off] was that part of the...?

Name: michael
Line: [in the bathroom] deangelo, what are you doing? there's a live audience out there!

Name: deangelo
Line: go do it by yourself, get ryan.

Name: michael
Line: no, ryan would never do it. it's too on the radar. look, look. the boss, hosts, the dundies! it's sort of our perk!

Name: deangelo
Line: this was not, part of the job description!

Name: michael
Line: listen to me, you're not doing this for me, you're not doing this for you, you're not even doing this for them!

Name: deangelo
Line: who am i doing this for?

Name: michael
Line: [slaps him] you're doing this for all those kids out there, eating off the louie volpies kid's menu, wondering: does it get better? what i want you to do, is i want you to say: it's showtime. get out there.

Name: deangelo
Line: i can't. [michael slaps him again]

Name: michael
Line: say it.

Name: deangelo
Line: stop, hitting me.

Name: michael
Line: you can do it, just say it.

Name: deangelo
Line: hit me again. [michael slaps him once more]

Name: michael
Line: now hit me. [deangelo slaps him] one, two, three.

Name: together
Line: it's showtime.

Name: michael
Line: alright, here we go.

Name: michael
Line: okay! okay! sorry about the delay everybody! but we were at the dmv waiting in line. [everyone laughs]

Name: deangelo
Line: fall asleep right after sex. huh guys?

Name: jim
Line: nope, go back to the script.

Name: michael
Line: there are a lot of great salesmen in this office, but one of our great salesmen is also a great dad. and a close personal friend of mine, jim halpert! best dad dundie! [dwight plays a celebratory honking noise on his keyboard]

Name: jim
Line: wow! i do not parent for the award but i gotta tell you it feels pretty good. uh, cece, if you're watching this at home it's way past your bedtime, by the way how'd this get televised?

Name: michael
Line: well done.

Name: jim
Line: i don't know maybe being a good dad is just all in your own compass. i don't know, i don't know. thank you!

Name: michael
Line: alright. [all applaud jim]

Name: pam
Line: you didn't think to mention me huh?

Name: jim
Line: didn't i?

Name: michael
Line: which moves us to, best mom dundie. [pam gets ready and jim smiles at her] i guess we all kinda consider her a mom around the office. meredith palmer!

Name: meredith
Line: [jogs up and makes out with michael, who is unwilling] tell ya one thing, i'm not gonna be a good mom tonight! whooo!

Name: dwight
Line: excuse me, can i get a photo of the best mom and the best dad please?

Name: jim
Line: i gotta go do this.

Name: pam
Line: [annoyed] why?

Name: dwight
Line: big smiles folks! there they are.

Name: michael
Line: year after year, i catch a lot of flak on this particular award, because year after year i present this award to a guy instead of a girl. hottest in the office goes to, [ryan stands up] danny cordray! [ryan quickly sits] danny couldn't be here tonight...

Name: ryan
Line: how do i feel about not winning hottest in the office this year? uhm, i'm very relieved. how do you, how do you judge something like that? what is the criteria even? it's, it's so subjective.

Name: michael
Line: stanley hudson is a grump, everybody knows that. [stanley looks angry] but did you know, that stanley hudson is also the face of a debilitating disease known as diabetes. the diabetes award goes to stanley hudson! [stanley slowly walks over, angry] come on up here you sick bastard.

Name: phyllis
Line: i have diabetes too. you don't see me making a big deal about it.

Name: deangelo
Line: they say he's going to be my right hand man, adlib masturbation joke. [realizing he wasn't supposed to read that directly off the cue card, speaks quietly] no, i hate this, i hate it so much. [loud again] dwight schrute! please accept this promising assistant manager dundie. [people clap as dwight takes the microphone, he is obviously unenthused] thank you, thank you so much. i would like to thank something that we, uh, take for granted in our daily lives. and that is the humble trashcan. [creed nods] this is for you trashcan! [walks off and throws the dundie into the trashcan]

Name: manager
Line: [the manager of louie volpies approaches a giggling kevin, who is coloring with crayons on the tablecloth] who gave you those crayons?

Name: kevin
Line: i brought them from home! do you have a red?

Name: manager
Line: this is a cloth tablecloth! you can't color on it!

Name: kevin
Line: oh really? [camera shows that kevin has drawn a house on the tablecloth.

Name: michael
Line: you know, herpes affects one in five sexually active adults? [manager looks up, angrily at michael] pippy longstocking, ronald mcdonald's wife, ron howard, ron weasley, what do thay all have in common? red heads. erin hannon, come on up here and receive your cutest red head in the office award! [erin looks thrilled and walks up to the stage]

Name: meredith
Line: that is bull! [throws her dundie]

Name: erin
Line: thank you, thank you! this is the first award i've ever won in my entire life. [gabe and andy smile at her] people are right about the dundies, they are magical. but, i don't feel it. and i think that's because i'm not with the right person. gabe, we should break up.

Name: gabe
Line: what?

Name: erin
Line: i'm not attracted to you. i just, i cringe when you talk. i have to be honest. right, right pam? [pam looks very awkward] thank you for hearing me.

Name: gabe
Line: [stands up and walks to stage, takes the microphone] well, this is embarrassing, um, i'm obviously really angry at erin. it's that quarter life crisis everyone's been talking about. [jim is looking wide eyed, jaw dropped] alright i'm gonna go. [dwight plays cricket noises]

Name: michael
Line: [escorts erin off stage] there you go.

Name: darryl
Line: damn that was cold.

Name: michael
Line: it is difficult to recognize the person who will be replacing you. but he is a good guy, so the michael scott award for best dundies host goes to deangelo vickers. [deangelo jogs up and takes the dundie and tries to go back to his seat]

Name: audience
Line: speech! speech! speech! speech!

Name: deangelo
Line: hold on, hold on one second. [puts on the headphones and turns the volume up all the way] i wanna, i wanna, i feel truly blessed! uhhh, to be working with all of you! before this all started, funny story, i was in the bathroom, vomitting, and vomitting in the men's room!

Name: manager
Line: okay, okay. [trying to stop him from offending other people in his restaurant]

Name: deangelo
Line: that's why it's been shut down for most of the evening...

Name: michael
Line: [stopping manager] deangelo is expressing himself. [manager pulls the microphone cable, everyone can still here deangelo.

Name: deangelo
Line: this is truly special, for me! and uh, anyway. it's so much lighter!

Name: michael
Line: okay, we're done! that's it.

Name: deangelo
Line: michael, are we?!

Name: michael
Line: we're done. we're done!

Name: michael
Line: [outside of the restaurant, obviously sad] so that is how it ends. my last dundies ever. i was hoping it'd be more like godfather three. that rapped up the whole franchise in an extremely satisfying way. but instead it is like godfather one! that was, very confusing, had maybe three big laughs. oh well...

Name: pam
Line: michael, we were thinking maybe we could keep this thing going!

Name: michael
Line: what?

Name: deangelo
Line: i know i'm the cause of this royal screw up but i would like to see this show go on.

Name: michael
Line: no, no. you're being too hard on yourself. we had a very truncated rehearsal time.

Name: pam
Line: let's grab some ice cream, go back to the office, and finish what we started. [others nod in agreement]

Name: michael
Line: so what you're saying is you kinda like it? [phyllis impression] i've fallen and i can't get up! [normal again] that phyllis bit, that was pretty good.

Name: jim
Line: i don't know that we need to dissect it all now, but-

Name: michael
Line: that got a big laugh.

Name: jim
Line: that did. pretty huge laugh.

Name: michael
Line: [to stanley, who is cracking up again] you were laughing right?

Name: stanley
Line: i was.

Name: deangelo
Line: [with dwight and michael outside michael's car] you know what, i have to go to the bathroom.

Name: michael
Line: we're really close.

Name: deangelo
Line: i can just run over to the gas station.

Name: dwight
Line: we should just wait here and not get good seats in the conference room?

Name: michael
Line: that's true, we wouldn't get seats together.

Name: deangelo
Line: okay, fine i'll hold it.

Name: michael
Line: [in the car] you know, despite a couple hiccups, i think that went very well.

Name: dwight
Line: i thought it was the worst dundies i've ever been to.

Name: michael
Line: man! maybe you should have won the kind of a bitch award.

Name: dwight
Line: gladly! i'd accept that award, because a bitch, is a female dog!

Name: deangelo
Line: [as michael pulls over and stops the car] please don't stop so suddenly, the seatbelt is pressing on my bladder. why are you even wearing a seatbelt, you're sitting in the backseat, baby.

Name: michael
Line: what is your problem?!

Name: dwight
Line: i just don't see a point in the dundies! okay? the jokes are terrible, the venue is bad, the fashion is boring.

Name: michael
Line: okay! that, that is unfair! the clothing was safe, but tasteful.

Name: dwight
Line: and next time, why don't you pick a co-host, that doesn't have microphone-a-phobia!

Name: deangelo
Line: [very uncomfortable] look, what ever you're going to do, how long is it going to take? ballpark. 'cause i just, i gotta make a decision here. [gets out and slams the door]

Name: michael
Line: he is in an all-out sprint.

Name: michael
Line: [in conference room] here... [andy walks in] okay! by his own omission, this person actually tried marijuana in college, so the doobie doobie pothead stoner of the year award goes to, andy bernard! [andy walks up]

Name: andy
Line: a lot of people i'd like to thank, but i think we all actually wanna thank you michael.

Name: michael
Line: oh, okay. [nods to him]

Name: andy
Line: i mean, we actually all really wanna thank you, for everything.

Name: darryl
Line: [starts playing the tune to seasons of love while andy sits down]

Name: michael
Line: oh my god, something's happening.

Name: andy
Line: [singing] nine million, nine hundred eighty six thousand minutes! we actually sat down, and did the math.

Name: all
Line: nine million, nine hundred eighty six thousand minutes! that's how many minutes, that you've worked here.

Name: pam
Line: in costumes!

Name: jim
Line: and impressions!

Name: toby
Line: in meetings.

Name: erin and kelly
Line: and cups of coffee.

Name: kevin
Line: for birthdays!

Name: stanley
Line: more meetings and-

Name: women
Line: e-mail forms you made us read.

Name: all
Line: nine million, nine hundred eighty six thousand minutes! that's like watching die hard, eighty thousand times!

Name: meredith
Line: you hit me with your car!

Name: ryan
Line: you helped me get off drugs!

Name: creed
Line: i watch you when you sleep.

Name: oscar
Line: i forgive you for kissing me!

Name: all
Line: remember to, call. call. remember to, call. call. remember to, call. call.

Name: kelly and erin
Line: call, text or e-mail, or call.

Name: deangelo
Line: [falsetto] measure your life in love!

Name: all
Line: remember to call, remember to, call. remember to call.

Name: michael
Line: [choked up] yeah, okay. [pauses, then takes a deep breath] well this is gonna hurt like a mother[bleep].

Name: deangelo
Line: [recall to dundies at louie volpies] every day, millions of americans suffer from extreme repulsiveness. someone in our midst, is bringing that problem to light. toby flenderson, please come up here and accept the extreme repulsiveness award. oh that's so mean!

Name: michael
Line: no it's not.

Name: oscar
Line: [toby is shaking his head, no] it's his last dundies.

Name: jim
Line: you gotta play along man.

Name: oscar
Line: come on toby.

Name: michael
Line: here he comes! alright! you deserve it! [toby comes up and take the mic]

Name: toby
Line: i really disagree with this. i think it's kind of hateful. though i am a little happy right now to have a platform to talk about the outcome of a case i was recently a juror on. the scranton strangler. that man's being put to death. i was part of the verdict, and i'm not so sure he's guilty any more. [dwight plays a clip from the song oh yeah: ohhhh yeah! chica chicaaa]

Name: michael
Line: [sitting on the roof of the office building] well, i'm moving to colorado to start my new life with holly. just up here, getting used to the altitude.

Name: dwight
Line: [walking up] michael?

Name: michael
Line: yes?

Name: dwight
Line: i've got a treat for you!

Name: michael
Line: ahh, thank you. like a butler.

Name: dwight
Line: colorado specialty, rocky mountain oysters.

Name: michael
Line: [michael takes one and bites] oh, these do not taste like oysters.

Name: dwight
Line: [angrily] that's because they're not oysters, they're bull testicles! i cut them off fresh this morning! [michael spits it out] hah!

Name: michael
Line: sick freak! what is wrong with you?

Name: dwight
Line: what is wrong with you? i'm the sick freak? after what you did? you expect to be buttled? you didn't recommend me?!

Name: michael
Line: i don't own dunder mifflin, okay? [dwight scoffs] the job was not mine to give. [sighs] look, i need your advice on something. i am told that there are bears in the rockies.

Name: dwight
Line: where did you hear that? obvious xm radio?

Name: michael
Line: well, i was just thinking that maybe i should keep a salami in my pocket...

Name: dwight
Line: great idea.

Name: michael
Line: ...in order to feed the bears.

Name: dwight
Line: especially if you think that life would be better without legs!

Name: michael
Line: how do you mean?

Name: dwight
Line: black bears can smell a salami at five miles michael, what are you thinking?! and they run faster than a horse, so if you were thinking about outrunning one on a horse i would try a cheetah. you, in tight pants, michael, are a salami to a black bear. do you understand? [michael nods in agreement] you're like a giant walking salami!

Name: michael
Line: okay, so no salami in the pants. how about a pepperoni?

Name: dwight
Line: any kind of meat that you can possibly name!

Name: michael
Line: okay.

Name: deangelo
Line: [with michael in his office] you're not gonna take all these toys are you?

Name: michael
Line: hm?

Name: deangelo
Line: i mean you don't have a job lined up, so it's not like you have a desk to put 'em on.

Name: michael
Line: well i have interviews.

Name: deangelo
Line: that's nice. [reaches and a grabs a toy truck] how 'bout that truck? can i have this little truck? i was thinking i might... glue a stapler on top. or put a hole here, stick pens in it. [michael gives an obviously fake smile] you okay?

Name: michael
Line: yes. yes, you know what? take my favorite truck. sure.

Name: deangelo
Line: you know what? uh, it's your last couple days, i'm gonna get out of your hair.

Name: michael
Line: oh you don't, that's-

Name: deangelo
Line: i will be in the break room.

Name: michael
Line: that sounds good. thank you.

Name: deangelo
Line: dead man walking.

Name: michael
Line: sad? no, no, no. i don't leave 'til tomorrow, so... tomorrow i will be a wreck.

Name: gabe
Line: [sees andy walk into the men's room and follows him in] stay away from erin! [cornering him in the bathroom]

Name: andy
Line: hey!

Name: gabe
Line: i'm your boss!

Name: andy
Line: why don't you, uh, stay away from me?

Name: gabe
Line: no, i'm gonna stand where i want. okay? you don't wanna get on my bad side! i've seen some horrible things! i own over two hundred horror movies!

Name: andy
Line: okay! that's so weird! just go away!

Name: gabe
Line: no! you go away! [storms out, toilet flushes, jim exits the bathroom]

Name: andy
Line: [weak] hi tuna.

Name: jim
Line: so you guys are filming people when they go to the bathroom now?

Name: phyllis
Line: [in the conference room with pam, angela, and meredith] how about cupcakes?

Name: angela
Line: please.

Name: pam
Line: what's wrong with cupcakes?

Name: angela
Line: everything.

Name: michael
Line: [walking in] there they are! party planning committee together again!

Name: pam
Line: well we all wanted to plan your goodbye party. we thought this would be easier.

Name: pam
Line: we thought.

Name: angela
Line: it's an experiment.

Name: phyllis
Line: the three of us have all been chairmen before.

Name: pam
Line: so this is the dream team.

Name: meredith
Line: [walking up behind the glass] hey! what are you saying?!

Name: angela
Line: the dream team... and meredith.

Name: meredith
Line: [to michael] we decided on the ice cream. mint chocolate chip, your favorite.

Name: michael
Line: mmm!

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah that was a surprise...

Name: michael
Line: you know what, i'm thinking maybe we should get ice cream that everybody'll like. how about vanilla? let's get vanilla.

Name: pam
Line: [surprised] okay.

Name: michael
Line: tomorrow i want everyone to have a good time. no drama. and as for today, just a typical day. alright?

Name: pam
Line: should we get toppings?

Name: michael
Line: what do you like pam?

Name: pam
Line: [confused] what?

Name: michael
Line: what kind of toppings would you like?

Name: pam
Line: hot fudge?

Name: michael
Line: sounds good. fudge it up! [all seem surprised at michael's behavior]

Name: michael
Line: [holding up his "world's best boss mug"] i bought this for myself. and yesterday, they gave me this. [holds up a dundie that reads, 'world's best boss 2011, michael g. scott', throws his mug into the garbage can and places his dundie at the front of his desk] i still need something to drink out of though.

Name: michael
Line: [pulls out a list of everyone in the office, then puts it back in his jacket] attention everyone, before i leave tomorrow i would like to reveal a secret i have kept for over twenty years. a secret about phyllis.

Name: phyllis
Line: please michael.

Name: michael
Line: when phyllis was in high school, she was so... cute. [phyllis looks relieved] and she still is.

Name: phyllis
Line: i thought he knew about the baby i gave away.

Name: phyllis
Line: [holds up mittens she's knitting] look michael, it's a going away present so your hands won't get cold.

Name: michael
Line: ahh.

Name: phyllis
Line: it's almost done, but you can't get them wet, and they can't be dry-cleaned either. you have to hand wash without water, wring-dry gently, and use a hairdryer on cool.

Name: michael
Line: [hesitantly] sounds great, i just think it's great. oh, i have gifts as well! [goes into his office and comes out with a bag] and i will start, by giving the first gift to phyllis! phyllis, you are shy and sweet, and you don't often speak your mind, but you should. because you have great ideas. so phyllis, i am giving you this, so you can always remember to speak your mind. [presents to her a mouth wind-up chattering toy]

Name: phyllis
Line: it's cute. [plays with it]

Name: michael
Line: stanley, you love your sudoku and your puzzles, i bestow upon you, my felt. [gives stanley a small felt table] may you never lose the fun loving quality in life.

Name: stanley
Line: where's the rest of it, it's got no balls.

Name: michael
Line: well, okay... and andy, andy who needs confidence  that he is a great salesman. i give you, my clients, our ten most important accounts. [other salesmen look outraged]

Name: andy
Line: wow.

Name: stanley
Line: [angry] yeah wow!

Name: andy
Line: you know i'm the worst salesman here right?

Name: michael
Line: but you're the best salesman, on the inside.

Name: phyllis
Line: what does that even mean?

Name: michael
Line: you sold us all on andy, a product that nobody wanted.

Name: andy
Line: i'm gonna lose 'em.

Name: michael
Line: you're not gonna lose them.

Name: andy
Line: i promise you that i will.

Name: michael
Line: just do your best! i have faith in you.

Name: stanley
Line: [as michael walks away, stanley whispers angrily to andy] gimme those clients!

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: phyllis
Line: [to dwight] do you believe that?!

Name: dwight
Line: i've given up expecting michael to do the right thing. or the decent thing. or even the comprehensible thing.

Name: deangelo
Line: i used to be obese. once you've conquered obesity, everything else is easy. life literally moves in slow motion. i'm not saying i'm superman, but, let me just put it this way. if i were shot in the head, i'm pretty sure everything would be fine. i almost welcome it. [winks]

Name: michael
Line: kevin, i have something for you.

Name: kevin
Line: oh! [michael unrolls it to reveal it is a caricature of kevin as a pig eating pizza]

Name: michael
Line: you know who that is?

Name: kevin
Line: oh...

Name: michael
Line: [rips the poster in half] don't be a caricature kevin, never be a caricature. how did that feel when i tore that up?

Name: kevin
Line: better...

Name: michael
Line: good, stand up. [kevin does so] you will be thin. you won't drool over pizza like an animal anymore.

Name: kevin
Line: but...

Name: michael
Line: you will find love.

Name: kevin
Line: michael, i'm pretty much okay with who i am now.

Name: michael
Line: don't be. you should never settle for who you are. [moving on] oscar, oscar, oscar! oscar, you are-

Name: andy
Line: i just lost porter hardware! i just, i lost 'em!

Name: michael
Line: [quietly groans] okay, you know what? just do your best buddy! okay, oscar, you are very smart, and you have a gigantic education. and, i think of you as my scarecrow, because you gave me a brain. so that's why i made you this. [takes a sack tied in the upper middle making a crude head, with a face drawn on, obviously the product of poor craftsmanship, oscar pretends to like it]

Name: oscar
Line: thank you michael. it's beautiful.

Name: michael
Line: [laughing] it looks like a [more laughing] it looks like it was made by a two year old monkey on a farm! he just accepted, accepted that i put all this work into it! [laughs more] he has the lowest opinion of me, of anybody!

Name: michael
Line: was it just me, or did you think that we were going to have sex at some point?

Name: angela
Line: it was just you...

Name: michael
Line: how would you have wanted to do it? okay, okay. you know what? inappropriate. i am engaged happily, and you have landed yourself a senator.

Name: oscar
Line: state senator.

Name: michael
Line: mmhmm, bravo!

Name: oscar
Line: brava!

Name: angela
Line: you wanna see some pictures? i just got these.

Name: michael
Line: sure!

Name: angela
Line: uhm, these are, okay this is us at the theater. and antiquing! oh, rollerblading.

Name: michael
Line: who's that? who's that guy? [points to second guy in the pictures]

Name: angela
Line: oh, that's thomas, robert's aide.

Name: michael
Line: i guess this could be the one, huh?

Name: angela
Line: yeah. [oscar shakes his head no]

Name: andy
Line: [walking into the kitchen, deangelo is using the coffee machine to cook chicken covered in melted chocolate] hey.

Name: deangelo
Line: [hurriedly, while hiding the chocolate covered chicken] hey!

Name: andy
Line: i'm going to be dropping out on one of our biggest clients this afternoon and i could use some back up.

Name: deangelo
Line: let's rip it up homes. [smacks top of the door frame with his hand, leaving a chocolate hand outline]

Name: gabe
Line: [andy walks by with deangelo, says quietly after he leaves] walk away bitch.

Name: oscar
Line: [michael is leaving the accounting area] oh michael! where do you want your last pay check sent?

Name: michael
Line: my last pay check?

Name: oscar
Line: you have an address yet in colorado?

Name: michael
Line: no.

Name: oscar
Line: what town do holly's parents live in?

Name: michael
Line: i'm not sure, um, mountainton?

Name: kevin
Line: sounds beautiful!

Name: pam
Line: [michael sits alone eating at the back of the kitchen, pam comes in with jim, creed and kevin] you should do more stuff like that.

Name: kevin
Line: i'm going to!

Name: jim
Line: [to michael] hey! it's almost your last day, come sit with us.

Name: michael
Line: nah, i'm almost done.

Name: jim
Line: you sure?

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: pam
Line: so i'm going to carbondale this afternoon to get a new bulk shredder.

Name: kevin
Line: finally! that old shredder sucked.

Name: pam
Line: it's a good shredder, it just keeps breaking.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah, it won't shred magazines.

Name: pam
Line: it's not supposed to shred magazines kevin.

Name: kevin
Line: i know...

Name: jim
Line: did you break the shredder kevin?

Name: kevin
Line: no, it's just... that old shredder sucks. [michael looks tearful] just get one that'll shred magazines.

Name: pam
Line: i don't think any of them are supposed to shred magazines.

Name: michael
Line: [crying] i can't do this. all the channels are gonna be different there. i'm not gonna be able to find my shows. i'm not going to start improv at level one, and i don't think my credits will transfer. ugh, and you know what? i just figured out where i was supposed to go to vote. [picks world's best boss mug out of the trashcan and puts it back on his desk] i gotta call her, and i'm going to tell her, that i cannot come. [dials on his phone]

Name: holly
Line: [on phone] hello there!

Name: michael
Line: hi. what is the name of our town?

Name: holly
Line: boulder. is something wrong? are you okay?

Name: michael
Line: no, no. i just needed to hear your voice.

Name: holly
Line: [yoda voice] oh you mean this?

Name: michael
Line: [laughing] yes. [olive oyl impression] yes my hero!

Name: holly
Line: [deep man voice] i'll pay the rent! [michael laughs] okay, my mom's looking at me and she has no sense of humor. it's a joke mom!

Name: michael
Line: [laughing] ohh, i miss you.

Name: holly
Line: well i'll see you tonight. i'll pick you up outside baggage claim.

Name: michael
Line: okay. i'll see you tonight. i love you.

Name: holly
Line: i love you too.

Name: michael
Line: [hangs up and composes himself] yes, so i know i told everybody that tomorrow is my last day, but i'm, i'm gonna be leaving tonight. i head to the airport at four. [looks at the list of members of the office, with some names crossed out] and i have said goodbye to half of them.

Name: toby
Line: well you know michael, i have a brother in boulder. rory flenderson. you should look him up.

Name: michael
Line: [grimaces and nods, toby nods back at him] okay.

Name: toby
Line: [smiling] okay.

Name: michael
Line: [walks over to kelly] kelly! kelly? kelly.

Name: kelly
Line: [doing make up and irritated] what?!

Name: michael
Line: if i just went away right now, would that be the best gift that i could give you?

Name: kelly
Line: yes! please! please go away! and stop using that weird slow voice.

Name: michael
Line: [in ryan's office, which is illuminated blue] she was once my girl, and she is your girl now.

Name: ryan
Line: wow. [camera pans over to show that the light is from michael's st. pauli girl sign, hanging in ryan's office]

Name: michael
Line: yeah.

Name: ryan
Line: this is... totally unnecessary.

Name: michael
Line: you're not prone to seizures?

Name: ryan
Line: no.

Name: pam
Line: [in conference room with the party planning committee] so michael said we can do whatever we want cake-wise. what do we want?

Name: meredith
Line: [quickly] erotic.

Name: angela
Line: see? this is what happens. you can't let a stray dog into the house.

Name: phyllis
Line: hmm, let's hear here out. i would like to hear more about these cakes. [angela and pam look uncomfortable]

Name: meredith
Line: i know these ethiopians that run a cake shop.

Name: angela
Line: good god...

Name: meredith
Line: they make these cakes, they're wild! i mean, they show everything!

Name: pam
Line: i don't, i don't think we sh-

Name: meredith
Line: i know what you're thinking, but it's not just black, they do it all. and the women on these cakes, they're not just guy's fantasies. they have real, full women. it is refreshing.

Name: pam
Line: [stopping her] okay, don't turn this into some feminist issue.

Name: phyllis
Line: as a person who buys a lot of erotic cakes, it feels good to be represented on one.

Name: pam
Line: you know what, i think we should get some other input.

Name: kelly
Line: i think we should do cupcakes. i am one of the few people who looks hot eating a cupcake.

Name: phyllis
Line: yeah, cupcakes. that's what i said.

Name: angela
Line: no! i'm not cleaning up a bunch of uneaten cupcake bottoms! you know, we don't really care about your opinion. you're just a tie-breaker.

Name: michael
Line: [sees pam walking towards the door of the office] um, pam.

Name: pam
Line: oh, hey michael! i'm just going to go to carbondale to price some shredders. i'll see you later.

Name: michael
Line: [disappointed] okay... [jim is confused]

Name: erin
Line: [walking into the women's bathroom, gabe storms in after her] gabe!

Name: gabe
Line: i need to talk to you!

Name: erin
Line: you can't be in here. this is a lady's room!

Name: abe
Line: erin, i respect your privacy, but i will follow you in here everytime you go if that's what it takes. [creed walks out of one of the stalls]

Name: erin
Line: hey creed.

Name: creed
Line: not cool man. [walks out]

Name: erin
Line: i really think you should leave.

Name: gabe
Line: someday, you are going to tell our grandchildren about how their grandfather won you back in a women's room.

Name: erin
Line: can we talk about this later, i have to go.

Name: gabe
Line: just read the letter under your windshield wiper, it explains everything. quick one. [leans in for a kiss]

Name: erin
Line: gabe!

Name: gabe
Line: okay... [walks out embarrassed]

Name: toby
Line: [on video cam with his brother] here's the thing rory, i knew you guys would hit it off in an odd way.

Name: rory
Line: i can bring him a welcome basket. i'll surprise him.

Name: toby
Line: do- well you should give him a little time to settle in. but-

Name: rory
Line: does he like jams? my shelves are over flowing with preserves.

Name: toby
Line: well, no. he hates jams.

Name: michael
Line: [walking into darryl's office] darryl!

Name: darryl
Line: hey.

Name: michael
Line: i would like to give you, the only copy, of somehow i manage. [hands him a thin black folder] unfinished. if there's anyone here who can finish it, it's you.

Name: darryl
Line: that's sweet mike. let's see here. there's a chapter, called gum. with one sentence. everybody likes the guy who offers him a stick of gum.

Name: michael
Line: mmmhmmm. it's true. darryl, i have one last wish. i would like to use the bailer.

Name: darryl
Line: no. can't let you do that mike.

Name: michael
Line: no problem. worth a try.

Name: michael
Line: [in warehouse] darryl said i could use the bailer because i'm leaving.

Name: warehouse guy
Line: no.

Name: michael
Line: [picks up a basketball and dribbles it away from the basket] alright guys, well... see ya later warehouse. catch you on the flippity flip. [throws the ball behind him and misses the basket, tries and misses several more times]

Name: deangelo
Line: [in car with andy] okay, so what's our approach? you a veteran? do i have a month to live? you gonna get married tomorrow? what? [andy stares blankly] hmm?

Name: andy
Line: i thought we'd just talk about our customer service and exceptional paper quality.

Name: deangelo
Line: that's stupid. [laughing. nervously, andy laughs with him]

Name: andy
Line: [joking] what do i know?

Name: deangelo
Line: [still laughing] what do you know? we gotta get psyched up! okay? guy? let's get psyched! is there an animal shelter on the way?

Name: andy
Line: [confused] yeah.

Name: deangelo
Line: awesome! ani ani shelto! here we come. do you know how to high-five?

Name: andy
Line: yeah!

Name: deangelo
Line: 'cause if you do now's the time.

Name: andy
Line: [going for it] alright.

Name: deangelo
Line: not while i'm driving.

Name: michael
Line: [still trying the backwards basket] catch you guys- [forklift drives in front of the camera] catch you guys on the filippity flip. [misses and picks it up again] flippity flip! [misses again and grabs it back] flippity flip! [makes it in, gets excited] really? [composes himself] okay, see ya guys! [walks away, containing his self-pleasure]

Name: deangelo
Line: [at the animal shelter with andy] you know how i met jo bennett? and got started on my ladder of success?

Name: andy
Line: no. i don't.

Name: deangelo
Line: [hands andy a dog] i'm walking along, out of work. again. thinking to myself, 'i only have enough cash to by a sandwich, or get drunk. and i see this guy trying to steal this lady's dog! so i grab the dog. he runs off. she's so grateful, she hires me.

Name: andy
Line: awwhh, wow.

Name: deangelo
Line: gimme that dog! that's not your dog! [takes the dog from a confused andy] yeah! again.

Name: andy
Line: oh, okay...

Name: deangelo
Line: gimme that damn dog you f***ing thief! don't ever do it again! [andy nods modestly] you hear me?! [andy nods again] you feel that energy?

Name: andy
Line: mmhmmm.

Name: deagnelo
Line: wooo! yeah! [parades in circles with the dog, pretends to whack andy with it] [giving it to andy] okay, again.

Name: erin
Line: i know that gabe is young, and hot and everything. and he's begging me to reconsider, but i... i just think i'm in love with someone else.

Name: michael
Line: kevin?

Name: erin
Line: andy.

Name: michael
Line: ahhhh...

Name: erin
Line: i wish i knew who my birth mother was, so she could just tell me who to choose.

Name: michael
Line: maybe neither.

Name: erin
Line: i'm not attracted to kevin.

Name: michael
Line: erin, listen to me. you shouldn't rush into this. at all. and you know why? because you are beautiful. and you are fun. and you are smart. [erin is smiling] and when the right guy comes along, you'll know it. you will. [kisses her head] and you know what? you don't need a mom. because you have my number, and you can call me anytime.

Name: erin
Line: [nods] extension 147.

Name: michael
Line: n-

Name: erin
Line: i know.

Name: michael
Line: okay. [both chuckling. michael leaves erin, looking thoughtful]

Name: phyllis
Line: [on the phone] you want the 27-26 or the 27-30?

Name: michael
Line: phyllis. phyllis, are my mittens done?

Name: phyllis
Line: no. [trying to finish her sale when michael hangs up the phone] i'm on a sale!

Name: michael
Line: listen to me. it's two p.m. from now until four, your priority is knitting. knit like the wind.

Name: phyllis
Line: okay... [jim gives a knowing look to the camera]

Name: michael
Line: dwight, i will be leaving tomorrow. [pulls out an envelope from his jacket]

Name: dwight
Line: yes.

Name: michael
Line: so i wanted to give you that. [hands him the envelope] it's a letter of recommendation. [dwight looks eager. michael nods to him and walks away]

Name: dwight
Line: this is gonna be good. [eagerly reading the letter] to whom it may concern. [off to the side] good, real personal. thanks michael. [reading again] the dictionary defines superlative as: of the highest kind, quality, or order, surpassing all else, or others. supreme. [to the side again] that's great, if i wanted the dictionary definition i'd buy a dictionary. [reading again, slowly gets sadder] i define it as dwight schrute. as a sales executive, as a leader, as a man, and as a friend, he is of the highest kind, quality, and order. supreme. [holding back tears] lot's more like that, really repetitive. what's this? [pulling out a small card from the envelope. reads it] two forty five, behind the building. paintball. [checks his watch quickly] ohhh, yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: [opening his trunk excitedly and gets out his paintball gear, takes his gun and looks for michael, gives up, michael jumps out of the dumpster shooting, they shoot each other, yell, laugh, and taunt, having a great time]

Name: michael
Line: [in the office, crosses dwight off his list. he has paint in his messed up hair, and is containing his laughter]

Name: deangelo
Line: [giving his and andy's pitch to a client] i would just like to start off saying, i have not worked with mr. andy bernard for very long, i can say, is that he is no michael scott. i can't sit here and tell you he's gonna be a success. i can't sit here and tell you that he's even the best man for the job. [andy looks awkward] but i can say this: he's got potential. sure. you know, i always say: go big, or go home. you go with this guy, you could be making the biggest mistake of your life, or, the biggest, good decision of your life. it's either gonna be the best thing you ever did, or the worst thing you ever did. if you want some boring, white bread clock-watcher who's gonna get you your paper when you ordered it, for the agreed upon price, [andy looks hopeful] andy's not your guy. [andy deflates] you ever play russian roulette? [scoffs] time to spin the chamber horse. by signing up for another year. [hands the client a folder he needs signed for another year's contract]

Name: jim
Line: [michael walks into the office, still a mess] ahh, what happened to you?

Name: michael
Line: you should see the other guy.

Name: dwight
Line: [smiles knowingly]

Name: michael
Line: [looks at the clock to see it is three o'clock] jim where is pam?

Name: jim
Line: uhh, she's still pricing the whatevers. the shredders.

Name: michael
Line: but it is already three o'clock! [michael leaves, jim gives a knowing look to the camera]

Name: pam
Line: [walks into a movie theater showing the king's speech]

Name: michael
Line: [in his office talking to creed, gabe, and meredith in that order] whether you're scared of dying, or dying alone, or dying drunk in a ditch. don't be. it's going to be okay.

Name: michael
Line: yeah i was tripling up. there's not enough time in the day to have a special moment with everybody.

Name: michael
Line: [gabe is still standing in front of michael's desk] and you, why are you still here.

Name: gabe
Line: [sounding hurt] i'm either going to quit today, or stay to make sure that andy's career is destroyed.

Name: michael
Line: no, you are not going to quit today. for goodness sake, this is not going to be your last day in the office. everybody gets dumped gabe. can i give you a piece of advice? [gabe nods] a little cover-up on your adam's apple will make it appear smaller, and make you look less like a transvestite. [gabe looks awkward and michael winks]

Name: deangelo
Line: [walking out the client's room with andy] that is cold sir! absolutely cold. you know what? it was a complete waste of my time.

Name: andy
Line: uh deangelo, i'm, uh. i forgot my bag, so i'll meet you in the car.

Name: deangelo
Line: [grumbles] okay whatever.

Name: andy
Line: [walks into the client's office again] sir, i'd just like to apologize, for that. i could tell you that he has a steel plate in his head, or that he's crazy, but the truth is i think he's just a terrible salesman. and i want you to know, that if you re-up with us, anything you need, day or night, i will be the one to take your call.

Name: client
Line: keep talking.

Name: deangelo
Line: [on his phone waiting for andy, next to their car] yes. okay, alright. no, well thank you! alright, take care. [hangs up] you'll never guess, we did it!

Name: andy
Line: [laughing] hey! [they hug] good job boss!

Name: deangelo
Line: we did it!

Name: michael
Line: [standing in front of his office, sees that it is three forty five] okay, everybody come on. conference room five seconds! let's go! hurry up, let's do this! [dwight runs into the conference room. all others follow]

Name: stanley
Line: yes, what is this about?

Name: michael
Line: what is this meeting about?

Name: stanley
Line: mmhmmm.

Name: michael
Line: okay, here we are in the conference room. once again. and i just wanted to call you all here, together, because i have something important. well there's two things actually. okay first, i would like a whereabouts on pam. [jim looks regretful] and secondly, phyllis how are those mittens coming? because i would actually like to bring them home and pack them. i'm leaving for the day at four.

Name: phyllis
Line: they're almost done but my knuckles are swelling a little and-

Name: michael
Line: [cutting her off] well power through the arthritis phyllis you can do it!

Name: stanley
Line: is that it?

Name: michael
Line: umm, hmm?

Name: stanley
Line: is that it?

Name: michael
Line: [the office looks up expectantly] ummm... hm... no. [changing his mind] no. there's a special guest that i would like to invite to say one last goodbye. so here he comes, he's coming right in. [walks out and then back in, now using a vietnamese accent] oh hi everybody, it's ping! [the office groans] and i'm here to say goodbye to all you wonderful people! thank you everybody! you've been so wonderful! [only kevin is laughing. stanley tries to leave. michael hugs him] i ruv you all! i ruv you very much!

Name: jim
Line: hey, can i talk to you for a second?

Name: michael
Line: sure. [ping accent] be right out!

Name: jim
Line: [brings michael into his office] so i've been meaning to tell ya, i wanna take you out for lunch. for your last day.

Name: michael
Line: [sad] ohh...

Name: jim
Line: what do you think? tomorrow? lunch, you and me?

Name: michael
Line: [holding back tears] okay...

Name: jim
Line: you're not leaving tomorrow. you're leaving today right?

Name: michael
Line: maybe.

Name: jim
Line: wow, so that's it huh? just, four o'clock and you are gone for good.

Name: michael
Line: why am i so sad? am i doing the wrong thing?

Name: jim
Line: absolutely not. it's just that sometimes... goodbyes are a bitch.

Name: michael
Line: [pulls out a recorder and speaks softly into it] t-shirt idea, goodbyes stink. okay, alright. so. james halpert. [starts to cry] you started with this company, as a fine young man...

Name: jim
Line: you know what i think we should do? i think we should just save the goodbyes for tomorrow. at lunch.

Name: michael
Line: oh, okay.

Name: jim
Line: and then tomorrow, i can tell you... what a great boss, you turned out to be. the best boss i ever had. [jim is holding back tears too]

Name: michael
Line: [hears a taxi honking] oh shoot! that's my cab.

Name: jim
Line: alright.

Name: michael
Line: alright.

Name: jim
Line: listen michael, i really... i did text pam, but...

Name: michael
Line: i know, it's okay. just, give her a hug. alright?

Name: jim
Line: [shakes michael's hand] i will see you, tomorrow at lunch.

Name: michael
Line: i am looking forward to lunch. and hearing about what a great boss i am.

Name: jim
Line: [chuckles] you got it.

Name: michael
Line: okay... [crosses jim off his list] phyllis.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh no, they're still not done.

Name: michael
Line: no no no, let me see. [picks up the mostly knitted mittens] oh phyllis, nice try. i love 'em. [waves goodbye to her with the mittens] [michael begins walking out the office, he takes one last look at all his friends to see them working, and jim looking back, teary eyed]

Name: creed
Line: [drinking from michael's world's best boss mug] see ya tomorrow boss!

Name: michael
Line: later guys. [leaves the office]

Name: michael
Line: got almost everybody. so... holly's my family now. [you see video of michael getting into the cab, and driving off. as the cab leaves, pam drives in] she's my family. the babies that i make with her, will be my children. the people that you work with, are just... when you get down to it... your very best friends. they say, on your deathbed, you never wish you spent more time at the office. but i will. gotta be a lot better than a deathbed. [you see michael getting out and entering the airport, and going through security] i actually don't understand deathbeds. i mean, who would buy that?

Name: michael
Line: [putting his shoes back on, talking to the camera crew] well, i guess this is it. hey will you guys let me know if this ever airs? thank you. alright... oh! [pulls out his mic from his shirt] this is gonna feel so good, getting this thing off my chest. [he hands them the body mic, when he speaks it is inaudible now] that's what she said! [waves goodbye and walks off to his gate, halfway there pam comes running up to him and they hug for a while. they say their goodbyes to each other, and michael walks off for good]

Name: pam
Line: [watching michael's plane take off. crying and has smeared make up on] no he wasn't sad. he was full of hope. about colorado, and he was hoping to get an upgrade as an award's member. and he said he was just real excited to get home and see holly.

Name: deangelo
Line: [all are in the conference room for michael's party. michael isn't there. jim gives the camera a knowing look] well if he's not gonna make it at least we should go ahead and eat the cake. [kevin nods] i for one love the corners. [cuts a corner piece, picks it up with his bare hands, and takes a bite] why'd i just do that? it's not even that good. i don't even want it. i had cake for lunch. [throws the piece in the garbage] no, you know what? i've been good. i deserve this. [grabs a piece from another corner. the office groans] what am i doing? [chucks it into the trashcan] come on deangelo! [deangelo tries to lick the cake, everybody yells no]

Name: dwight
Line: [to jim] uh oh... [jim, tearful, nods]

Name: deangelo
Line: so, coasting time is officially over.  big changes are comin', and they're comin' fast.  if you don't like 'em, this is called a door.  you can walk right through it.  alright.  i'm not here to be your friend.  i like my life outside of this place.  i live to leave at 5.  change number one: darryl.  per your request, the company is sending you to business school at night.  full ride.  deal with it.

Name: darryl
Line: seriously?

Name: deangelo
Line: stone cold seriously.

Name: deangelo
Line: they are trying to figure me out.  and i don't like it.  once they figure me out, they start to tell me what i want to hear.  and i need to quickly figure out who's a good worker and who is simply a good mind reader.  because as soon as i'm hearing what i want to hear, i'm not gonna care.

Name: deangelo
Line: change two, toby, you're gettin' a new chair.

Name: toby
Line: thanks.

Name: deangelo
Line: don't thank me!  hey, don't thank me, guy!  okay?  and i don't care if you like it.

Name: oscar
Line: these sound like good ideas, why wouldn't we like them?

Name: deangelo
Line: i don't care what your favorite flavor is.  here's a bowl of ice cream.  you either like it or you don't.  [andy nods] that's my attitude right now in this room, that's my attitude on ice cream thursdays.  alright?  clear?  any questions?

Name: kevin
Line: this all sounds great to me.  [hesitates] but i could see how some people might think that they're bad.  i don't know what to think.

Name: deangelo
Line: that is a s--  astute observation, kevin.

Name: deangelo
Line: kev's got me pegged.  [chuckles]

Name: deangelo
Line: it blows away vermont in the fall.

Name: darryl
Line: snap, for real?

Name: pam
Line: good morning, deangelo.

Name: deangelo
Line: hold on.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: deangelo
Line: [continuing to talk to darryl] and if you're really serious, you should go in the spring.

Name: pam
Line: because of the flowers.

Name: deangelo
Line: no.  because the entire state smells like earth.

Name: pam
Line: dogwoods, or just the earth.

Name: deangelo
Line: yes, pam.

Name: pam
Line: hey, well, good morning.  i think i have good news for you today.  i found your new executive assistant.  my friend carla.  [looking at resume]  she's got great experience.  we even considered making her cece's godmother, but she had this boyfriend at the time-- but here's her resume.

Name: deangelo
Line: put it with the rest.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: deangelo
Line: [entering his office] hey dudes!

Name: jim
Line: hey!

Name: andy
Line: hey!

Name: pam
Line: oh my god, he hates me!

Name: jim
Line: no he doesn't.  you just get so nervous and hyper around him.

Name: pam
Line: i know.

Name: jim
Line: every time there's a silence, your brain's like "heh-heh-huh-huh" [imitating crying].

Name: pam
Line: is that what he tells you at your little inner circle meetings?

Name: jim
Line: careful.  there is no inner circle.

Name: andy
Line: oh, there's an inner circle.  oh yeah.

Name: jim
Line: there is no inner circle.  deangelo just prefers to delegate a few things, to a few guys.

Name: kevin
Line: jim only says that because he's in the inner circle.  i also say that because i am also in the inner circle.  did you get that, ma?  your boy, kevin malone, is in the inner circle!  [thinks] which doesn't exist.

Name: deangelo

Line: not a coffee guy, i take it.

Line: it's just that i own the coffee shop.  so, once you've seen sausage being made, all you want to do is make sausage, because it's so much fun.

Name: deangelo
Line: no matter how many times i reach out to dwight, he doesn't seem to want anything to do with me.  it reminds me of my relationship with my son.  except there, i'm the dwight.

Name: deangelo

Name: kevin
Line: yes.

Name: deangelo
Line: deangelo's open!

Name: deangelo
Line: hey ry.  your department's killing it, baby. [puts arm around ryan]

Name: ryan
Line: hey hey, my pleasure, my treasure.

Name: deangelo
Line: keep it up.

Name: ryan
Line: the problem with having "it" or "the x-factor" or whatever it is you want to call it, is that it's impossible to put into words what you're bringing to the table.  so to make things simpler for deangelo, i just, without lying, strongly implied that i'm kelly's supervisor.  it's not even that much of a stretch.  she pretty much does whatever i say.

Name: kelly
Line: what?

Line: i'm sorry, i'm sorry, i'm sorry...

Line: you know what... straight up, why don't you like me?

Line: i'm just not a suck-up like everyone else around here.  okay?  i do my job well, so why don't you just leave me alone and let me do it.  okay?

Line: ohhhh no.

Line: what?

Line: no you're not.

Line: no.

Line: no.

Line: no.

Line: no.

Line: no.

Line: no.

Line: yes.  yes-yes-yes-yes-yes [starts to run out of the break room] yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes-yes!

Name: deangelo
Line: uh-oh.  right?

[deangelo raises hand, kelly and pam sheepishly raise hands] raise your hand if someone you love has a vagina.  [deangelo raises other hand, along with rest of office] yeah, yeah.  okay.  just about everyone.  what about deangelo's hand?  oh wow.  he's got 'em both up.  [ryan raises both hands]  yeah.  uh huh.  [others raise both hands] yeah, so it bothers me when i hear that there's gossip around here that i treat women lesser than men.  okay?  frankly, we all look a little ridiculous when that happens.

Line: ohh.

Name: jim
Line: so as it turns out, unless you're a young child or a prison inmate, you don't need anyone supervising you. people just come in and do their work on their schedule. imagine that - people like us allowed to sell paper. unsupervised. [darryl, phyllis, stanley, and oscar are working while andy and ryan play on a foosball table] and yet, somehow it works. it must be because the stakes are so high.

Name: jim
Line: [on phone] well, i really appreciate the offer, but i'm just happy the way things are. okay. thank you. [to pam] that was jo, asking me if i wanted to take over as acting manager while they find a replacement. i told her... i don't want to mess this up, right? there's a consensus, people are happy.

Name: dwight

[jim puts a pencil into the time clock and pulls it out broken in half] we were all given new business cards big enough to set us apart from the competition, which is how i learned that our titles are all now junior employee. our lunch breaks are staggered to prevent wasting time. mine's at 10:30, and i find that the first hour of the day goes by a lot quicker than the second seven hours.
