Line: alright guys. you know how we all like the red licorice but it's always buried behind like a ton of black licorice? [points to pile of candy] bought it all. now it's like red city in there. so, enjoy it.

Name: phyllis
Line: mmm-hmm. moneybags. must be nice.

Name: andy
Line: so you effectively spent what...four dollars on the entire office?

Name: jim
Line: uh, i can't get a handle on it. am i cheap or rich? i can't...

Name: andy
Line: you're nothing. when i think about all the gas money i spent on you. washing my car to make sure you-

Name: jim
Line: [interrupting] alright. well, enjoy the red licorice, and good riddance, right? [tosses black licorice into trash]

Name: darryl
Line: whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa! so you're just gonna throw away perfectly good food?

Name: jim
Line: it's not really food, right?

Name: creed
Line: i'm really hating this jim guy!

Name: jim
Line: ok, ok, ok.

Name: stanley
Line: i know what you can do jim. take those black licorice, then go get some of those red licorice, take 'em in your hand, roll 'em up real tight...

Name: jim
Line: oh ho! look who's back reporting for duty.

Name: pam
Line: hey guys!

Name: all
Line: hey.

Name: pam
Line: [laughing] hi.

Name: andy
Line: pam! ahh! look what i can do now that she's no longer pregnant. [pretends to punch pam in the stomach] bam! bam! bam! bam!

Name: phyllis
Line: are you glad to be back?

Name: pam
Line: yeah. yeah, i mean i could have used another week, or three.

Name: stanley
Line: you still had eight weeks more than we did.

Name: pam
Line: [laughing] well, it's not exactly a vacation.

Name: angela
Line: hello everyone! remember little old me. hi!

Name: dwight
Line: what are you doing here? you just had our baby. our collective dunder mifflin...family baby. four days ago.

Name: angela
Line: i wanted to come back to work. not everybody needs some long luxurious parisian maternity leave. [removes coat]

Name: pam
Line: what?!

Name: kelly
Line: damn girl! your body!

Name: oscar
Line: angela, you look amazing.

Name: angela
Line: really? i feel like this big rhinoceros. anyway, i wanted to thank you guys for covering for me so i made some treats. i've got brownies and magic cookie bars.

Name: group
Line: [murmurs of delight as people shuffle toward the treats]

Name: pam
Line: oh angela, those brownies have walnuts in them and i think kevin's allergic to walnuts. you're allergic to walnuts, right kevin?

Name: kevin
Line: extremely, but i'm gonna fight through it.

Name: pam
Line: aw. it's ok angela. i have mommy brain too.

Name: angela
Line: i don't know what that is, pam. i made a batch with no nuts, special for you kevin, right here.

Name: pam
Line: when did you find time to do all this?

Name: angela
Line: babies sleep a lot pam, if you feed them enough. brownie pam?

Name: pam
Line: thank you. [takes bite] oh my gosh. it's really good.

Name: angela
Line: i wouldn't know, i'm watching my weight. ugh.

Name: pam
Line: so you guys, you know what's an even more useful treat...is cash. so-

Name: jim
Line: nope. it's over.

Name: pam
Line: ...we wanted to say thank you-

Name: jim
Line: nope. ok.

Name: andy
Line: dwight, i have exciting news for you.

Name: dwight
Line: what?

Name: andy
Line: i think you're going to like it.

Name: dwight
Line: you can't tantalize me.

Name: andy
Line: oooh, maybe i can. [slowly] i got an email... from corporate....that told me that...

Name: dwight
Line: ok. [looks at watch and leaves]

Name: andy
Line: that...[quickly] you got a promotion! [dwight turns back] right? i mean that's not the kinda thing you wanna read quietly at your desk.

Name: dwight
Line: if you make me head of sales one more time, i swear.

Name: andy
Line: no, this is legit. you will be assembling a team to go to tallahassee for three weeks to develop and launch a chain of sabre stores.

Name: dwight
Line: yes! yes! yes! yes! yes! yes! yes! yes! yes! yes, yes, yes, hi-yes! yeah yeah yeah yeah!

Name: dwight
Line: today is the first day of sabre's new project to develop a chain of retail stores. i am meeting my new boss, nellie bertram, head of special projects. work starts at nine. sabre hq is thirty minutes away, driving the speed limit. giving everyone twenty minutes to shower, plus fifty for jim to style his hair, twenty for breakfast, forty for erin to get lost between her room and the lobby, ninety for ryan to do his morning ecstasy... we're already twenty minutes late.

Name: dwight
Line: wake up! [cathy screams]

Name: dwight
Line: hey, hey, hey, hey! wake up! [erin kicks him] ow! why are you sleeping that way?

Name: erin
Line: oh. i was reading the mattress tag and i fell asleep.

Name: dwight
Line: stanley! wake up! youâ€™ve got to wake up, the hotel's on fire!

Name: erin
Line: stanley, wake up, it's pretzel day! [dwight pinches stanley's nose and covers his mouth]

Name: stanley
Line: mmm! [struggles] ugh!

Name: dwight
Line: [lets go] good morning.

Name: erin
Line: hey, wake up. let's have some fun. we're in florida now.

Name: ryan
Line: hey, you. i'm so glad this is happening. i actually came to your door twice last night. come on in, the water's fine. [sees dwight] oh, not cool!

Name: jim
Line: i am on the two kid sleep schedule so i'm up and at 'em at four fifteen, but no kids, so i honestly didn't know what to do with myself, and then i thought of something. uh- [hears door, hides]

Name: dwight
Line: heeeere's dwi- what the-? [sees trashed room] oh man.

Name: erin
Line: what do you think happened?

Name: dwight
Line: looks like jim got mixed up with some bad apples. [sees "it was dwight" written in lipstick on the door] oh no, no, no, no. it wasn't me. i gotta find luwanda at the alcohol club. oh. [jim falls out of the closet, erin and dwight scream]

Name: jim
Line: puppet.

Name: cathy
Line: cool, for your kids?

Name: jim
Line: yeah. it's weird being away from them. never done this before.

Name: dwight
Line: attention, dunder mifflin group. proceed outside. the vehicle is waiting. seats have been assigned. shotgun goes to ryan. congratulations, ryan.

Name: dwight
Line: i need to make nellie see me as a leader today. first impressions get locked in forever. when i first met pam, she said something that slightly rubbed me the wrong way. since then i've loved working with pam and she's frankly wonderful, but i hate her.

Name: dwight
Line: i'll have a bottle of the antacid. also, i want to get a souvenir for my son, but his mother doesn't acknowledge my paternity. do you have anything for that? also, i want it to have a florida feel.

Name: saleswoman
Line: what does he like?

Name: dwight
Line: power.

Name: ryan
Line: okay, and this one is, "huh. don't see too many museums around here."

Name: dwight
Line: okay, twiggy, that's enough. get in the car.

Name: erin
Line: hey, are you okay?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm fine, okay? it's just stress. you know, 'cause i care about this project. and frankly the fact that none of you are vomiting or diarrheal right now i find very alarming.

Name: erin
Line: who says none of us are diarrheal?

Name: jim
Line: are you sure it's stress? because i did poison you.

Name: dwight
Line: very funny, jim.

Name: jim
Line: oh no, i'm serious. i was thinking, "for this trip i have to do something epic, so what should that be?" and then i thought of it. i'll poison you. what are you gonna do? you gonna steal my newspaper or put a cricket in my cereal or something?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm gonna set your face on fire.

Name: jim
Line: that's a good one. [a red sports car drives up] whoa, stanley! did you just come back from burning down a rival nightclub?

Name: stanley
Line: laugh it up, halpert. i'm in florida for a month without my family. i'm gonna enjoy this. want to get in? you can work the ipod.

Name: jim
Line: yes.

Name: stanley
Line: you're a nice guy, jim, but you have no idea how to vacation. find some kenny loggins.

Name: jim
Line: loggins and messina.

Name: stanley
Line: did i say "messina?" [tires screech]

Name: andy
Line: ahh! [laughs] sorry i couldn't resist. it's so quiet.

Name: creed
Line: i like it. it's so peaceful, i've already written like, twelve plays today.

Name: andy
Line: it's so quiet, one might say, you could hear a pin... [drops pin] i thought that would be cooler.

Name: darryl
Line: i loved it.

Name: meredith
Line: hey, can you pick up the pin? some of us like to work in our bare feet.

Name: andy
Line: of course, i will pick up the pin. it is right here. got it.

Name: oscar
Line: can we see that? did you really find it?

Name: andy
Line: yes, right here. got it. dink, ow. [chuckles, clicks tongue] in the trash.

Name: pam
Line: hey, why is it so quiet? shouldn't the phone be ringing? uh-oh. erin set the phone to voicemail.

Name: everyone
Line: oh great. [overlapping chatter]

Name: kelly
Line: we're screwed.

Name: pam
Line: there. [phone rings]

Name: andy
Line: oh! there we go! pam?

Name: pam
Line: yeah?

Name: andy
Line: can you get the phone?

Name: pam
Line: well i'm not the receptionist.

Name: andy
Line: mm, well, you used to be.

Name: pam
Line: i know, but i can't cover reception. i have a ton of work to do.

Name: andy
Line: phone's ringing.

Name: kelly
Line: will one of you get the phone? i am freaking out! i know it's for me. [andy and pam silently argue] are you guys kidding me? stop flirting and someone get the phone!

Name: everyone
Line: somebody! answer the phone.

Name: kelly
Line: andy, pick up the phone!

Name: stanley
Line: get the damn phone.

Name: meredith
Line: you're the closest one to it.

Name: andy
Line: fine. hello, dunder mifflin. [ringing continues] hello, you've reached dunder mifflin. how may i be of service?

Name: jim
Line: man.

Name: cathy
Line: how was the drive?

Name: jim
Line: fantastic. stanley drives so fast.

Name: stanley
Line: life is short. "drive fast and leave a sexy corpse." that's one of my mottoes.

Name: jim
Line: i would love to hear the other mottos.

Name: packer
Line: quick query, halpert.

Name: jim
Line: no way.

Name: packer
Line: still queer?

Name: dwight
Line: packer.

Name: packer
Line: you can't put me down. too strong!

Name: packer
Line: yeah, dwight and jim tried to get me fired, but i landed on my feet down here in florida. you see, this cat's got nine lives, and a nine-inch-

Name: nellie
Line: psst. say, "so who's leading this thing, anyway?"

Name: ryan
Line: so who's leading this thing, anyway?

Name: nellie
Line: psst. say, "i can't wait to meet him."

Name: ryan
Line: i can't wait to meet him.

Name: nellie
Line: him, you say? don't think a woman can be a leader?

Name: ryan
Line: i-

Name: nellie
Line: you poor, simple boy. expected a man, did you? strong, powerful. huge, whopping penis? well, sorry to disappoint, but my huge, whopping penis is right here, [points to her head] and i'm not afraid to use it. so stop looking at my breasts, and start looking at my penis. [slow clap] i'm nellie bertram, president of special projects. in the next few weeks we're going to throw everything you know about business out of the window and do it our own way. are your minds blown? so, how did this special project come about anyway? well, i interviewed to be the manager of your branch. [points to jim] after you decided i wasn't "a good fit-"

Name: jim
Line: it was-

Name: nellie
Line: ah! it was. i went on a shopping spree. very destructive. i bought thirteen pianos. then i realized, what if sabre had a store? hmm? so i called jo, old friend, founder of sabre, and i told her and she grabbed me by the shoulders and she said, "yes!" so let's talk about the sabre store then. probably gonna look stupid, right? like a big turd with a door on the front, right? what do you think it should look like?

Name: cathy
Line: um, it might be fun if each store had a different theme, like a beach one, a winter one, a jungle one.

Name: nellie
Line: no, not a big fan of the winter aesthetic.

Name: cathy
Line: well that was just one idea. it doesn't have to be winter.

Name: nellie
Line: oh, no, it does. it does. it has to be winter, and i reject it. so i drew up a design concept. probably gonna be rubbish, right? would you like to look at it? just so you could laugh at it.

Name: erin
Line: yeah!

Name: nellie
Line: let me just get the projector working.

Name: dwight
Line: uh. [eats antacids]

Name: jim
Line: you got to stop with the antacids. it's not the antidote.

Name: dwight
Line: you didn't poison me, it's just stress.

Name: jim
Line: okay.

Name: dwight
Line: what is the antidote?

Name: jim
Line: true love's kiss.

Name: nellie
Line: jim, help me lower this screen. you're a big, tall man. [points to ryan] you'd be hilarious trying to do it, like a little boy. just let go of his balloon.

Name: dwight
Line: i'll do it! i always say, "you want something done right? ask dwight." right? dwight. right? dwight. right dwight, right dwight. sorry, now you'll never be able to get that out of your head. [reaches up, whimpers]

Name: packer
Line: i can do it.

Name: dwight
Line: mmm! [screams, pulls down screen] there we go.

Name: dwight
Line: [on phone] yes, a complete inability to pass gas, pervert. ugh, yeah, it's tender. it can't be appendicitis, i eat more than enough bacon. okay, what poison mimics the symptoms of appendicitis? oh, you don't know? hold on. [to jim] what kind of poison did you use?

Name: jim
Line: dwight, i didn't poison you. i was kidding.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah, i'm gonna need an ambulance. hold on, i have the address in my phone. [sees chart on screen] hold on. hold on one second. uh, quick question. vice president, uh, who is that? there's no name listed.

Name: nellie
Line: is there not? maybe i'm just waiting for someone to wow me. [winks]

Name: emergency operator
Line: sir? sir, where should we send the ambulance?

Name: dwight
Line: send it to the frickin' moon, idiot.

Name: packer
Line: i tell you what though, since my move down to florida i've really gotten back into hunting big time.

Name: nellie
Line: hunting's so primal. almost sexual.

Name: packer
Line: totally. i mean, i'd never bang an animal, you can hardly tell the difference between a boy or a girl, you know, but hunting's intense.

Name: dwight
Line: you talking about hunting? i love hunting. i'm a master hunter.

Name: packer
Line: did you say "masturbator?"

Name: dwight
Line: i'm a decent baiter. my cousin mose, that's a master baiter.

Name: nellie
Line: why are you sitting down like that?

Name: dwight
Line: why is everyone else standing up? okay team, let's get back to work! break's over!

Name: jim
Line: wow. are you that bored?

Name: stanley
Line: it's just rum. i'm not bored, i'm a pirate.

Name: jim
Line: is that another motto?

Name: stanley
Line: it's whatever you want. [offers jim the bottle]

Name: jim
Line: mmm.

Name: stanley
Line: or do you only drink with your kids?

Name: jim
Line: ah, let's do it. [laughs] oh, that's healthy.

Name: jim
Line: i've spent so much of my life telling myself "please, don't end up like stanley," and now i'm wondering if i even have what it takes.

Name: nellie
Line: we have the sabre pyramid, right? hmm? we've got a bunch of humans. you guys, humans... pyramid. human pyramid. do you follow? it's a team-building exercise. you'll love it. who's in? hmm?

Name: packer
Line: yup. tallahassee, let's go.

Name: erin
Line: jim, are you in?

Name: jim
Line: oh, i don't know.

Name: stanley
Line: sounds like a hoot. i'm in.

Name: jim
Line: all right, what the heck? let's do it.

Name: packer
Line: this is great. this is gonna be great.

Name: nellie
Line: i feel like i'm in ancient egypt.

Name: dwight
Line: i'll be on top. it's the most important position.

Name: ryan
Line: dude, i think you have appendicitis.

Name: dwight
Line: [tries to climb human pyramid] ahh!

Name: ryan
Line: dwight?

Name: jim
Line: dwight, why don't we just hold off with the human pyramids for a while?

Name: dwight
Line: everyone stop moving! everyone stop wiggling! oh, i feel like i'm gonna vomit!

Name: packer
Line: dude, don't you yak on me. this shirt is van heusen.

Name: dwight
Line: [groans] stop moving!

Name: jim
Line: no one's moving!

Name: dwight
Line: oh! [collapses]

Name: everyone
Line: oh, oh! [general commotion]

Name: dwight
Line: arrest jim. he poisoned me.

Name: jim
Line: wha- no. no, it was not a poisoning.

Name: jim
Line: the one thing pam made sure i knew, florida's pretty loose with the death penalty.

Name: paramedic
Line: you need an operation. you have appendicitis.

Name: ryan
Line: oh! who called it? nothin' but net.

Name: erin
Line: how long will he be gone?

Name: paramedic
Line: two or three days.

Name: dwight
Line: don't remember me like this. remember me as the man who pulled down the screen.

Name: packer
Line: drama queen, am i right?

Name: dwight
Line: [to phone] phillip, if you're hearing this memo, that can only mean one thing, i'm dead. you are the rightful heir to schrute farms. please, you must do one thing. kill mose before he kills you. [presses button] mose, hey, it's dwight. listen, yeah, i just want to give you a heads-up.

Name: packer
Line: that was an interesting diversion. shall we get back to the meeting?

Name: pam
Line: whoa, are those mini pizzas?

Name: andy
Line: yeah, i figured we'd keep things savory while oscar's mouth is in canker country. i also have some bacon-wrapped dates on deck.

Name: kevin
Line: look at these little mini pizzas. does this make me look huge? [giggles] hey guys, look at me, i'm huge.

Name: andy
Line: hey darryl, good news, your fax went through.

Name: darryl
Line: oh [bleep] yeah.

Name: andy
Line: up high.

Name: darryl
Line: yes sir. thanks.

Name: andy
Line: dunder mifflin, this is andy. [whispers to kelly] i put out some new magazines, check it out.

Name: creed
Line: ah, dwell.

Name: andy
Line: i'm acting like i like reception and i'm a really good actor, so people are actually buying that i actually like reception, but, i mean, seriously, reception sucks. [phone rings] oh, there's the phone!

Name: dwight
Line: i just got out of surgery. what's going on? fill me in.

Name: erin
Line: well, we broke into groups and the groups are doing presentations later.

Name: dwight
Line: who's doing the presentations?

Name: erin
Line: packer's giving one. [dwight growls] jim'll probably give ours, i guess.

Name: dwight
Line: damn it!

Name: erin
Line: let's see, what else have you missed? ryan switched his name tag to his pants, so now it's like if you wear yours on your shirt, you're a total dip, but if you switch, you're a copycat. but i think i figured out a solution. what else? my shoes are gonna-

Name: packer
Line: -features a tech support area. bring in your product, a bunch of nerdy virgins fix it on the spot. huge for building loyalty.

Name: nellie
Line: very good point.

Name: dwight
Line: yeah todd, decent idea. obvious, but interesting.

Name: nellie
Line: dwight, are you all right?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm great. how are you?

Name: dwight
Line: what's our presentation about?

Name: jim
Line: dwight, will you go back to the hospital? you were there for like three hours.

Name: dwight
Line: i got the surgery, what else is there to do?

Name: erin
Line: do a hundred jumping jacks.

Name: dwight
Line: no, i don't feel like it. you do a hundred jumping jacks.

Name: erin
Line: i don't feel like it either!

Name: erin
Line: [doing jumping jacks] ninety-seven, ninety-eight, ninety-nine-

Name: dwight
Line: i want that vice-presidency.

Name: jim
Line: you haven't done any of the research.

Name: dwight
Line: "you're too slow, you're too small, seabiscuit is a stupid name." you guys sound just like the enemies of seabiscuit. i'm going to do it.

Name: stanley
Line: aw, let him do it.

Name: jim
Line: stanley, are you listening to music?

Name: stanley
Line: yup.

Name: dwight
Line: all right, who's ready for the next presentation?

Name: nellie
Line: ah, what is your topic?

Name: dwight
Line: what is our topic? oh, what a topic it is.

Name: erin
Line: retail consumer habits.

Name: dwight
Line: really? okay. retail consumer habits is... [sighs] the only thing you need to know about retail consumer habits is that consumers are mindless lemmings. they just want to be told what to do. [erin makes the first slide appear] fast forward to today, and the retail consumer is independent, well-informed, super smart. super smart. okay.

Name: dwight
Line: shopping habits are both seasonal and cyclical. what does this mean?

Name: ryan
Line: i can field this one.

Name: dwight
Line: no, sit down. "seasonal." well, the christmas shopping season is certainly a busy one, back-to-school is, as well, and in early summer it seems to slow down a bit, but shopping is also cyclical. the menstrual cycle determines every choice a woman makes. you see, during ovulation, a woman's only goal is to get pregnant, and during menses, she is sad that she has failed. and how does the woman console herself? shopping. shopping. just- jim, could you fetch me some ice chips? thank you. just gonna... take a... brief pause at this point. [jim gives dwight a bowl of ice chips] thank you. [dwight sticks his head in the bowl] oh, god. next slide.

Name: andy
Line: mail call! [sings] his name is oscar, and he got some mail, and he better open it, or go to jail 'cause it's your taxes. his name is kevin, and no mail for him, but he got a coupon, for some frozen... yogurt.

Name: kevin
Line: are those the lyrics?

Name: dwight
Line: anderson's three pillars of retail. crucial. so important. next. are there any questions?

Name: nellie
Line: what are the three pillars of retail?

Name: erin
Line: [whispers] convenience.

Name: dwight
Line: ingredients.

Name: erin
Line: service.

Name: dwight
Line: burgers.

Name: erin
Line: building loyalty.

Name: dwight
Line: killing royalty. the truth be told, we should really disregard anderson's three pillars. he was later diagnosed with dementia. you know what is important? is dwight's pillars, and there is only one: desire. do we have a desire to dominate the retail space? not just succeed in it, but to dominate, and looking around this room i'm not so sure that we do, but we can get there, and i can lead us there, and that is all that matters.

Name: nellie
Line: very true. where there's a will, there's a way. i once spent a passionate night with hugh grant's brother, john grant. he's older than hugh, just a little bit uglier. how did i pull that off? sheer force of will. that is very good, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: thank you very much. any other questions? jim?

Name: jim
Line: you are bleeding through your shirt.

Name: dwight
Line: oops. that's embarrassing. egg on my face. [ties jacket around wound] ah.

Name: pam
Line: hey, having fun?

Name: andy
Line: yes i am, as a matter of fact.

Name: pam
Line: well i know how it is. i know it's a lot of fun. i don't know how it is. andy, this is a lame job. what are you doing here?

Name: andy
Line: i found my calling.

Name: darryl
Line: andy, when i was twelve years old, we did a field trip, a lock-in at the zoo. i met this girl, i thought she was so perfect. i was in love with her. but when the sun came up, i knew it wasn't real, 'cause she was ugly and i had grown tired of her. i know you want reception today, but tomorrow you won't want to do her. she's a dog.

Name: pam
Line: guys, i don't like this analogy.

Name: andy
Line: [groans] ugh! fine. did you see this? [points to pens in cup]

Name: pam
Line: it's nice.

Name: andy
Line: i mean... [pam giggles]

Name: nellie
Line: how are you feeling?

Name: dwight
Line: amazing. just lost four ounces of appendix, already replaced it with muscle.

Name: nellie
Line: can i see the wound?

Name: dwight
Line: [show her the wound] oh god.

Name: nellie
Line: oh! that's disgusting. that's barely healed.

Name: dwight
Line: you're not paying me to heal, you're paying me to kick ass.

Name: nellie
Line: a few hours ago, your body was open like a cabinet.

Name: dwight
Line: that's right.

Name: nellie
Line: that is amazing. todd, look at that.

Name: packer
Line: oh, yikes. incoming- [tries to touch the wound]

Name: dwight
Line: ah! not so fast.

Name: nellie
Line: would you come in early tomorrow so we can talk about the store over breakfast? i feel you [points to both] have a lot to offer.

Name: packer
Line: it would be an honor, ma'am.

Name: dwight
Line: i'll go ahead and cancel my post-op check-up right now.

Name: dwight
Line: i had two goals today. the first was to make myself the clear candidate for vice president. i achieved that, no thanks to my appendix. the second was to find a memorable souvenir for philip. for that, i do have to thank my appendix.

Name: andy

[grabs coat, runs out, then returns] forgot to turn off my email. it's crazy, right? it's just, when she said she was leaving, i felt so- [looks at computer frustrated] 'you're about to close four tabs, are you sure you want to continue?' yes. i am sure. ah, slow computer!

Line: erin, hr is a joke. i can't do anything about anything.

Name: nellie
Line: the most important thing to remember is not to stress about this. stress just makes it worse, and then you stress more. and that's a vicious spiral.

Name: robert
Line: i almost didn't come in today. [laughs]

Name: andy
Line: [on the phone] dad, don't think of it as a demotion. just think of it as a promotion to a lower level. i don't think you have to tell your friends anything. it hasn't been decided yet.

Name: nellie
Line: erin, on phone memos you're writing the date american style. month, day, year. i prefer it day, month, year. small, bigger, biggest. oh, sexual innuendo. not intentional.

Name: erin
Line: shut up. shut up! i am sick of your dumb opinions. and if you don't like the way that i take phone messages, here! [throws phone] take 'em yourself!

Name: andy
Line: oh, and another thing! our sex life is none of your businesses!

Name: erin
Line: and andy is the manager, not nellie!

Name: andy
Line: stop protecting me! i'm a man- i can protect myself! this is misdirected anger and i'm sorry! i don't mean to lash out at you! there's a lot coming up right now, all at once! [into phone] dad go to hell, i'm taller than you!

Name: nellie
Line: okay, just calm down.

Name: andy
Line: you are not the manager. i earned that job. i was personally chosen after robert was chosen and quit.

Name: robert
Line: andy, why don't you just take a seat?

Name: andy
Line: why don't you take a seat, you idiot? [throws chair]

Name: erin
Line: and why don't you take all your stupid memos and your stupid pens and your dumb caramels?

Name: andy
Line: and your stupid face! [grabs nellie's photo off the wall and smashes it on the ground] and your stupid office! [punches hole in the wall] ah!

Name: darryl
Line: he does not like that wall.

Name: erin
Line: maybe we'll get sent to anger management together.

Name: andy
Line: that would actually be cool. i'd love for you to meet some of the guys.

Name: robert
Line: andy, erin, you can join us now.

Name: ryan
Line: hey, i hear you been bad-mouthing me to kelly.

Name: pam
Line: all i did was remind her that you used to treat her badly.

Name: ryan
Line: well that's your opinion and it's her opinion, but it's not my opinion. if you have something bad to say to me, pam, say it to my face.

Name: pam
Line: fair enough. um... i don't think you're a very good person. and forgive me, but i feel like i've said this to you before: i don't like you very much.

Name: ryan
Line: well a lot of people would say that i'm a better match for kelly than ravi is.

Name: oscar
Line: oh come on, ryan. really? ravi's way better.

Name: ryan
Line: for kelly?

Name: kevin
Line: yeah. man, you're insane right now. ravi's the whole package.

Name: nate
Line: i've never met ravi personally, but i'm gonna go ahead and say, just having knowing you a short while, brian, that i prefer ravi. and again, i've never even met the guy.

Name: ryan
Line: kelly, i wrote you the most amazing love poem. but i can't even read it. my heart couldn't handle it.

Name: pam
Line: oh, no, no, no.

Name: oscar
Line: oh, come on.

Name: pam
Line: read it, please. i love amazing poetry.

Name: ryan
Line: no. it would cause me too much pain.

Name: pam
Line: read through the pain. be strong.

Name: ryan
Line: this poem would crush you!

Name: oscar
Line: ryan, go away! she found herself a beautiful boyfriend!

Name: kevin
Line: yeah, man, he's absolutely gorgeous! please leave her alone.

Name: ryan
Line: you see, kelly? our love scares them. it screws up their cookie-cutter world.

Name: kelly
Line: ravi makes me incredibly happy. and ryan puts me through so much drama. so i guess i just have to decide which of those is more important to me.

Name: robert
Line: andy, we're going to go with nellie as manager and put you back on the sales team. i promise you, in time, we'll all laugh about this incident. i already think it's kind of funny. [chuckles]

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: robert
Line: excuse me?

Name: andy
Line: i'm saying no.

Name: robert
Line: well you can't say no.

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: pam
Line: [sees ryan on the horse] oh, boo! boo! boo to you! boo!

Name: ryan
Line: you are toxic! you are toxic!

Name: pam
Line: boo!

Name: jim
Line: hey, hey. okay.

Name: ryan
Line: kelly, i have a few things to say to you, so please don't interrupt.

Name: kelly
Line: i wasn't going to interrupt.

Name: ryan
Line: well you do a lot, so just don't. thank you. i know that i haven't always treated you the way that you, for whatever reason, feel you deserve to be treated. but i want to marry you, kelly kapoor. maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but someday, and probably.

Name: pam
Line: barf! ugh, you suck!

Name: ryan
Line: what is your problem? [to horse wrangler] hey, hey, hey, can we turn this back around quickly, please? this is very important to me.

Name: wrangler
Line: turn around. turn around. turn around!

Name: ryan
Line: can we turn this [bleep]-ing thing around? thank you.

Name: wrangler
Line: she don't wanna turn around.

Name: ryan
Line: thank you. kelly, i can't promise you that we'll always stay together. i can't promise you that i'll never cheat on you. nor should i. modern marriages aren't built that way. men aren't built that way. there's a very interesting article i can email to you. but i can tell you this. even if the odds are fifty-fifty that we'll break up within the week, i wanna roll those dice. i love you, kelly.

Name: kelly
Line: ryan.

Name: ryan
Line: will you roll those dice with me?

Name: kelly
Line: you mean so much to me. but, i love ravi and i choose him.

Name: ryan
Line: no you don't.

Name: kelly
Line: i do.

Name: ryan
Line: no you don't.

Name: kelly
Line: i hope we can still be friends. can i have a hug?

Name: ryan
Line: what? [they hug]

Name: kelly
Line: that was really cool. [they make out]

Name: angela
Line: ugh. eww!

Name: jim
Line: well, it's good to see kelly's maturing.

Name: angela
Line: oh god!

Name: robert
Line: look, andrew, we can discuss the specifics of the job.

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: nellie
Line: it's the apology. i really have to insist.

Name: andy
Line: [british accent] no.

Name: nellie
Line: stop saying no.

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: robert
Line: andrew, if you say no one more time, you're fired. so... is there anything else you wanna say?

Name: andy
Line: no.

Name: andy
Line: i can't describe it. i just, for the first time in a long time, i actually feel in control. i feel... alive.

Name: erin
Line: here- [grabs the box andy's holding]

Name: andy
Line: ah- da, da, da, da. i got it.

Name: erin
Line: but you hurt your hand.

Name: andy
Line: i... got... it.

Name: erin
Line: right now?

Name: andy
Line: yes.

Name: pam
Line: you're not the least bit curious to hear a poem straight from ryan's soul?

Name: jim
Line: not at all, can we go?

Name: pam
Line: "kapoor and ka-desperate, he watches."

Name: jim
Line: second line.

Name: pam
Line: "he is a drifter out to sea."

Name: jim
Line: "and when the indian ocean calms, one speck of white remains in waters cold and kelly green."

Name: pam
Line: it's just so dumb. [chokes up] but when he describes himself as a child, lost on the life raft...

Name: jim
Line: uh, ryan can never know.

Name: ryan
Line: [pacing back and forth.] no, no, no, no, no, no, no! no, no, no, no, no, no.

Name: pam
Line: okay fine. ryan, something the matter?

Name: ryan
Line: smokey's dead.

Name: pam
Line: smokey, the bear?

Name: ryan
Line: smokey robinson pam. he died like an hour ago, i guess i'm the first to know.

Name: jim
Line: wow that's terrible, i really liked him.

Name: ryan
Line: oh you liked him? that's nice. did you like when he changed the course of american music like two or three times? did you like that tracks of my tears is maybe the last true love song ever written? i'm glad you liked him jim. i am completely devastated right now.

Name: jim
Line: well, i second that emotion.

Name: ryan
Line: huh?

Name: nellie
Line: i know a few of his songs, but what were his big ones?

Name: ryan
Line: oh god, nellie! what wasn't his? i mean, um, "tracks of my tears"?

Name: nellie
Line: yeah

Name: ryan
Line: um... god, so many, nellie!

Name: pam
Line: no, no, no, "tracks of my tears" and what else? what are some more? what's one more?

Name: ryan
Line: okay, i'm not... i'm not playing this game, pam. not today.

Name: pam
Line: i don't think you love smokey robinson. i think you're just doing all of this to prove how deep you are about music

Name: ryan
Line: okay, i'm sorry i'm not a fan of jason mraz or the beatles.

Name: dwight
Line: you don't like the beatles?

Name: ryan
Line: that's... that's not the point!

Name: dwight
Line: eleanor rigby? paperback writer?

Name: ryan
Line: okay, you know, you always think you have time to see these legends before they go. what was i so busy doing?

Name: oscar
Line: it says here this smokey robinson dead thing was a hoax. it's on cnn as of two minutes ago.

Name: ryan
Line: okay well, that's a relief!

Name: jim
Line: wow! look at that! it says he's actually playing state college. that's only three hours away!

Name: pam
Line: oh my god, ryan! that's perfect! you have to go!

Name: jim
Line: tickets are 250 bucks.

Name: pam
Line: 250 dollars is nothing to the world's biggest smokey robinson fan.

Name: ryan
Line: yeah... who's opening?

Name: jim
Line: paul anka.

Name: ryan
Line: paul anka?! how can they make the smoke man play with someone like that? i don't think i can see this.

Name: jim
Line: okay, you could just show up late though.

Name: ryan
Line: how much is parking, like 30 bucks? that's not what smokey would have wanted. does want.

Name: pam
Line: tears of a clown!

Name: ryan
Line: don't call me a clown, pam. you're better than that!

Name: darryl
Line: looking good, rc!

Name: robert
Line: ugh, i hate ties! i feel like i'm being strangled like i'm at some erotic asphyxiation sex club over on i-84. the red room say? or dominick's?

Name: angela
Line: robert! the senator was going to wear dark brown tonight... i'm sure it will be fine.

Name: angela
Line: my husband is sponsoring a fundraiser tonight for local dog shelters! robert california bought two tables for everyone here! these people were lucky to get seats because it is going to be a who's who of the northern 22nd district!

Name: dwight
Line: i don't want to alarm people, but there is a distinct chance that we are all about to be killed

Name: jim
Line: well, as long as you don't want to alarm people...

Name: oscar
Line: what's going on?

Name: dwight
Line: there is a disgruntled ex-employee sitting in his car in the parking lot.

Name: erin
Line: oh that's andy. he's just hanging out

Name: dwight
Line: that's how workplace tragedies always begin. a middle aged white male "hanging out". call the cops!

Name: pam
Line: dwight, i don't think he's going to hurt anybody.

Name: phyllis
Line: how do you? i mean, why do you think he's there?

Name: dwight
Line: i don't even know what kind of weapon he has. could be a knife, could be a gun. could be a series of guns all lined up to shoot parallel. i'm going up to the roof. [grabs bag.] and i'm gonna bring my gym bag just in case.

Name: nellie
Line: i knew this would happen! everybody told me if i moved to america, i'd be murdered.

Name: andy
Line: hey!

Name: erin
Line: hey, just wanted to say hi and hear you say everything is normal. maybe video tape you saying that so that everyone upstairs can see.

Name: angela
Line: we think you might kill robert.

Name: andy
Line: what?

Name: kevin
Line: because he fired you which means apparently you're living in your car now.

Name: andy
Line: guys, everything is fine! i'm just here to pick up erin. we're going to the fundraiser.

Name: pam
Line: oh, great! that sounds good!

Name: kevin
Line: wait, what? you're going to the fundraiser tonight? that's going to be weird.

Name: andy
Line: why would that be weird?

Name: kevin
Line: it's going to be super weird, he just fired you last week.

Name: erin
Line: andy's just coming as my date.

Name: kevin
Line: hey, i hear you! i hope you're right. it just seems like it's going to be really, really weird.

Name: nellie
Line: [hears knocks on door.] come in!

Name: darryl
Line: you really re-did andy's office, huh?

Name: nellie
Line: yes, cut out the clutter. very simple, very minimal.

Name: darryl
Line: i need you to sign these, we got a shipment going out.

Name: nellie
Line: how are things in the warehouse?

Name: darryl
Line: you could go downstairs and ask them?

Name: nellie
Line: the warehouse isn't downstairs? [laughs.] is it? is it?

Name: darryl
Line: who knew, right?

Name: nellie
Line: [speechless.] i...

Name: nellie
Line: tonight could be the night that darryl and i go from casual work friends to actual good friends. the only thing standing in our way is the contempt he seems to feel for me.

Name: angela
Line: robert, the senator and i wanted to stop by and say hello.

Name: andy
Line: hello! did anyone order a blast from the past, with a side order of sexy?

Name: kevin
Line: oh man, this is weird!

Name: robert
Line: andrew. [robert extends his hand.]

Name: andy
Line: oh, wanna shake my hand, huh? cause i want to shake your body! [hugs robert and laughs.] i had you, i had you!

Name: andy
Line: [points back and forth at the multiple cameras] where do i look? it's been so long since i did one of these things? okay, alright! what's the question? how am i doing? umm... great!

Name: kevin
Line: creed, i just bid twenty dollars on six jiu-jitsu lessons. no one's raping this guy!

Name: creed
Line: well, i don't want to get raped [picks up clipboard] twenty-two!

Name: kevin
Line: no! it was my idea to not be raped!

Name: dwight
Line: [dwight enters] wait, you think jiu-jitsu classes cost $22 [grabs clipboard.] if you're going to guess the price, you might as well try to be halfway accurate. $180!

Name: kevin
Line: whoa, dwight, i don't think you understand.

Name: dwight
Line: you guess the price, you win the prize. have you never been to a quaker fair before? god!

Name: kevin
Line: so dwight doesn't understand silent auctions. i guess he's the stupid guy in the office, huh? up till now, we didn't have one!

Name: andy
Line: what haven't i been doing? gosh, just today i was working on this rock opera that i'm writing, though it feels more like i'm receiving it than writing it.

Name: jim
Line: wow, that's exciting! but until you firm up the idea, you might want to keep it between us.

Name: andy
Line: the hero lives in this dystopian future and he flies around in a spaceship that's shaped like a treble clef. and he has to sing his heart out to destroy all evil.

Name: pam
Line: sounds like you're doing alright.

Name: andy
Line: ehh, a little better than alright, actually. really good!

Name: ryan
Line: oh, this guy is having a breakdown.

Name: senator
Line: you know, oscar, i really had no idea you were so passionate about animals.

Name: oscar
Line: my dog gerald is my life.

Name: senator
Line: really? well, if you want to get involved, call me. this is my cell. i'm more likely to pick up night, say after 9... excuse me. [walks away.]

Name: oscar
Line: this confirms three things: i'm right about the senator, i still got it, and poor angela.

Name: robert
Line: [telling story to nellie.] i stepped in right away and start--

Name: andy
Line: bobby! bobbo! you're a rock opera guy, right? you like rock operas?

Name: robert
Line: well...

Name: andy
Line: you gotta check out this thing i'm working on, it's really cool. there's this character thomas oregon, and he wants to destroy all the guitars in the world because he realizes that music is the one thing he can't control.

Name: robert
Line: so, thomas oregon is an evil figure?

Name: andy
Line: evil! [chuckles.] although he's humanized in the end because he weeps uncontrolably and pees in his pants.

Name: robert
Line: and the hero, who's that based on?

Name: andy
Line: me, i guess. [sings.] we're flying so high, we're crackin' the sky! gonna fly out of this dome my girlfriend and i!

Name: meredith
Line: hey jabroni. show some class.

Name: stanley
Line: she's right, andy. you're being a jabroni

Name: andy
Line: you're being a thomas oregon!

Name: robert
Line: andrew, i think this may have been a bad idea. why don't you let me pay for you and erin to go out to a great romantic dinner tonight?

Name: andy
Line: don't need you to pay for me. i'm doing just fine, thank you. why don't you quit harshing our mellow?

Name: robert
Line: andy you should leave. now.

Name: andy
Line: [to waiter.] excuse me. i would like to purchase two seats at another table, please.

Name: waiter
Line: i'm sorry, the tables are sold as complete units.

Name: andy
Line: then i'll take a table!

Name: waiter
Line: okay

Name: andy
Line: and a high five! [raises hand, misses high five with waiter.] oh, let's do this again!

Name: andy
Line: [waiter is cracking pepper into andys salad] oh, yes indeed... when! [waiter begins walking away.] whoa, whoa, whoa! you forgot a few salads! [waiter peppers another salad.] when!

Name: oscar
Line: i stumbled into a very dramatic situation. angelas husband just hit on me!

Name: pam
Line: oh my god!

Name: oscar
Line: i know!

Name: jim
Line: wait, what? come on!

Name: oscar
Line: we were talking about animals, he gives me his cell phone number. he was just dying for me to have it.

Name: jim
Line: okay, oscar, i'm not saying you're not dreamy, because you are, but isn't it possible that he was just schmoosing a voter?

Name: oscar
Line: well, if you would have seen the look he gave me, he wanted to run more than just my vote.

Name: jim
Line: okay, what was this look? [oscar does the look.]

Name: pam
Line: whoa!

Name: jim
Line: what happened, did he do it?

Name: pam
Line: are you-- twice! for real?

Name: jim
Line: okay guys, not every glance means something, alright? life isn't downton abbey.

Name: pam
Line: life is downton abbey.

Name: jim
Line: here's what i'm going to do. i'm going to go over there and i'm going to talk to him and i guarantee you he gives out his cell phone to everybody.

Name: dwight
Line: [on phone.] how much do you guys charge for a one full year gym membership? thank you!

Name: dwight
Line: it's $475! like candy from a baby!

Name: andy
Line: hey... david wallace!

Name: david
Line: andy bernard!

Name: andy
Line: hey, how are you?

Name: david
Line: how you doing, i'm great! how you doing, are you still with dunder mifflin?

Name: andy
Line: no, got canned last week.

Name: david
Line: oh, i'm sorry to hear that.

Name: andy
Line: no, best thing that ever happened to me.

Name: david
Line: that's the attitude to have. you know what, when i got canned, i was lost, right? i poured myself into this ridiculous vacuum for toys called suck-it.

Name: andy
Line: yikes!

Name: david
Line: yeah, exactly right? then suddenly out of nowhere, the us military bought the patent from me for twenty million dollars! the point is, forget those guys, k? move on! good to see you, andy!

Name: nellie
Line: call me a lame man, but i wish there was some real food here. you know, like hamburgers... or oreos... or a pizza pie or, what's another food that we like?

Name: darryl
Line: tacos.

Name: nellie
Line: what i wouldn't give for a big mess of tacos right now!

Name: darryl
Line: i can go get us some tacos.

Name: nellie
Line: brilliant!

Name: darryl
Line: if you loan me some money.

Name: nellie
Line: yes, i can do that. for, um, for two tacos, we'd probably need about what 20... $20? or $25? $20?

Name: nellie
Line: i've never eaten a taco. i'm not entirely sure what they are. as long as they're not slimy, and please god don't let them have eyes!

Name: oscar
Line: [jim shakes senators hand, returns to table.] so?

Name: jim
Line: boom! [hands oscar a business card.]

Name: oscar
Line: this is interesting.

Name: pam
Line: hm-hmm.

Name: jim
Line: what is interesting? i just proved that he gives his cell out to everybody.

Name: pam
Line: or you proved that he thinks you're gay.

Name: oscar
Line: he does not think jim's gay. a gay man would not leave the house wearing those shoes.

Name: pam
Line: well, a gay man would not leave the store wearing those shoes!

Name: jim
Line: oh, hey! you bought me those shoes!

Name: speaker
Line: before we bring out our guest of honor tonight, we are very proud to introduce a great philanthropist and a great guy. robert california!

Name: robert
Line: thank you. why do we love dogs? want me to tell you why? there is no answer. our love for them confounds reason!

Name: andy
Line: can you believe this guy?

Name: robert
Line: the state senator, robert lipton, loves dogs. he asked me if i loved dogs. you know what i said? yes! [laughter.]

Name: andy
Line: not a joke. that was not even a joke.

Name: robert
Line: bella here was a therapy dog for ten years. when her owner passed away she came to this organization for placement. but people don't often adopt older dogs, so bella and eleven heroes like her are being cared for by our generous volunteers because frankly nobody else will

Name: andy
Line: i will! i will take all of those dogs!

Name: robert
Line: andy, that's very kind--

Name: andy
Line: no, no, no. this guy can talk and talk all he wants, but it's not that complicated.

Name: robert
Line: andy why don't we discuss this at a--

Name: andy
Line: no, no, no, it's about being there for someone after it's become inconvenient for them to be around. hello everyone, i am andy bernard and i am going to take that bitch home! that is a female dog reference. [points at himself] this bitch understands loyalty! sassy human reference [grabs dog] thank you, i will take bella and every single one of her friends!

Name: erin
Line: oh god!

Name: senator
Line: mr. bernard, right this way.

Name: andy
Line: okay! hope you all learned something!

Name: vet
Line: huey is going to need this medication once every 90 minutes. you can administer it orally, but he's going to puke it up. so, other end is best. don't split up daisy and mojo because daisy will start to, uh... i was going to say bark, but it's more of a scream.

Name: andy
Line: i'm so ready to love all of these animals. this one's even bonding with me already.

Name: vet
Line: uh, no. kenny's a therapy dog. he apparently thinks you're in some kind of emotional crisis.

Name: andy
Line: stupid dog.

Name: senator
Line: well, if you would like to talk about this some more, my office is always open! so here's my office number, and my cell number.

Name: meredith
Line: thank you!

Name: pam
Line: well, looks like he really did just want to talk about the issues. i'm sorry oscar.

Name: oscar
Line: sorry about what? there's nothing to be sorry about here.

Name: oscar
Line: no. i'm certainly not disappointed that angelas husband was not hitting on me. i'd have to be a monster to root for that. a lonely, aging monster.

Name: darryl
Line: tacos were on sale, eight for $3!

Name: nellie
Line: oh, great! okay, oh... oh, these tacos!

Name: darryl
Line: hmhmm.

Name: nellie
Line: mmm! uhh [eats taco incorrectly.] mmmm... oh! hmmph!

Name: darryl
Line: she's trying.

Name: speaker
Line: the winner of the three day trip to the sky top lodge is dwight schrute!

Name: dwight
Line: [applause] yes! thank you!

Name: speaker
Line: the yearlong membership to scraton-bikram yoga is dwight schrute!

Name: dwight
Line: [applause] oh yes! yeah!

Name: speaker
Line: a one hour appointment with the kissing magician goes to dwight schrute!

Name: dwight
Line: [applause] oh, oh, oh! yeah! ha, ha!

Name: speaker
Line: well, i think i can save us some time, dwight schrute has won every single item here!

Name: dwight
Line: thank you very much! all i had to do was look at the prices, idiots! suck it!

Name: speaker
Line: well, dwight, yes! you certainly are a record breaker! your donation is the largest we've ever received at over 34 thousand dollars! [applause]

Name: jim
Line: speech! speech! speech! speech!

Name: dwight
Line: thank you. wow, i can't tell you what an honor it is to support this thing... and obviously that amount of money is no concern to me whatsoever. but, i want to ask you something: when did it become all about the money. when did it become about the flower arrangements, and the white wine spritser, hmm? and all the dinner rolls. you people should be ashamed of yourselves! how many courses did we have tonight, two? three maybe, if you choose the pudding? i mean what waste! these tables tarted up like victorian whores! lets' remember we are all here for the dog society. he's what's important, whatever his name is. not any of this. so that is going to be my donation to you. thank you and good night! [throws microphone and runs away]

Name: senator
Line: oscar!

Name: oscar
Line: nice to see you again, it was lovely!

Name: senator
Line: it was lovely! and don't forget to call.

Name: oscar
Line: okay

Name: senator
Line: thanks so much for coming

Name: oscar

Line: yeah, you know, like [motions arm in circles] guh, guh, guh, guh, guh, guh, guhâ€¦ guh.

Line: [frustrated] â€˜kay.

Line: [spinning a new â€˜chore wheelâ€™ while everyone claps] okay, thatâ€™s what iâ€™m talking about! big money, big money! [wheel stops on â€˜mug dutyâ€™, disappointed] mug duty?

[introducing a third â€˜chore wheelâ€™, excited] weâ€™ve got prizes! ten bucks, candy bar, manager for an hour but, there are also penalties. like, no internet, stanley gets your lunch. the one thing that is not on the chore wheel is chores. but they were right; itâ€™s more fun this way.

Name: pam
Line: [everyone cheers as meredith spins and lands on â€˜tiny wheelâ€™] the tiny wheel actually does have chores. itâ€™s so cute no one seems to mind.

Line: [at the halpert residence as cece twirls in the front yard, exiting front door] pam, we gotta go. cece, go back inside. grandmaâ€™s got breakfast, ok? [to camera] we are going to royâ€™s wedding. yep, roy. i think the only weird thing about going to your wifeâ€™s ex-fiancã©â€™s wedding on a weekday at eight am is that itâ€™s your wifeâ€™s ex-fiancã©.

Line: today, i launch my big charity initiative â€˜operation give backâ€™. andy has shot down all of my special projects thus far but, this one is about charity. so, iâ€™d like to see him piss on that one.

Name: nellie
Line: with operation give back, you pick the charities dunder-mifflin supports.

Name: kevin
Line: [grinning] oh boy! what's happening?

Name: nellie

Name: kevin

Line: thank you, andy.

Line: no thank you.

Name: jim
Line: that was, that was a surprise.

Name: roy

Line: you're welcome.

Name: roy
Line: thanks...aw.

Name: jim
Line: by the way, man, this place is... beautiful.

Name: roy
Line: started a gravel company. i mean, who knew it'd take off?

Name: jim
Line: gravel company?

Name: roy
Line: yeah. what about you? what are you doing?

Line: not gravel, obviously. [both chuckle] no, things are good. things are good. got some stuff in the works. so-

Line: oh, cool.

Line: yeah, you never know.

Line: hey bro, stop wasting time with this haircut. [referring to jim] he's got a fifty-thousand dollar sports car. cheers.

Line: ok, kenny.

Name: clark
Line: [talking on phone] duncan, listen, i would love to help you out but where am i gonna find somebody that's pretty, smart and well-informed? huh? hold on, hold on. [covers phone's receiver] erin, do you know anybody that might want... [has realization] oh my gosh. you love the news, right?

Line: well, it depends. i mean, sometimes i find out things that are really sad.

Line: well, i got a buddy that's a big time local news producer and i can't tell you his name, but it'd blow your mind.

Line: uh, is it duncan?

Name: clark
Line: he's looking for on-air talent and he'd kill me if i didn't get you on tape.

Name: erin
Line: you mean, put me on the news?

Name: clark
Line: you'll just come over, put on little lipstick, loosen up with a glass of red wine and then we'll just run through a few stories. you know, a couple different ways, with a couple different outfits. it'd be really tasteful and it'd really help me out with duncan... with my friend. [erin considers] what do you say? huh?

Name: erin
Line: maybe, ok? let me think about it.

Name: clark
Line: [pete looks on disappointed] ok.

Name: erin
Line: whoo!

Name: clark
Line: think it over. [punches pete]

Name: pete
Line: no, clark's not my friend. he is the douche that sits next to me at the office. my friends are scott, glenn, and rob. but, you don't know them.

Name: erin
Line: i never really thought much about being more than a receptionist. but, why? because i happened to answer help wanted ad to be a receptionist? i mean, what if the ad had been for a ceo? or for a brain surgeon?

Name: roy
Line: so, ah, it was a year ago today that i met laura. i thought she was my waitress and, uh, took her three weeks to tell me that she actually owned the place. you are full of surprises. you are my beautiful mystery girl. and, today, i have a surprise for you. [approaches piano]

Line: he plays piano?

Line: no. roy? no.

Name: roy
Line: you know how i said i was taking boxing lessons? actually, i was doing this. um, so, i hope that you like it. [sits in front of piano]

Name: darryl
Line: [clapping] you got this, roy. [roy begins playing and singing she's got a way by billy joel, pam and jim looked shocked, phyllis and bob begin making out]

Name: pam
Line: [in the car] we still surprise each other.

Line: definitely.

Name: pam
Line: you know, i never did it, but for your 30th birthday i really wanted to surprise you with-

Name: jim
Line: courtside seats. sixers.

Name: pam
Line: yes. but, what i didn't tell you is that i actually bought the tickets. we only didn't go because it was-

Name: jim
Line: it was an away game.

Name: pam
Line: in phoenix. they should really tell you that more specifically. i mean, every game is an away game for one of the teams. [long pause] do we know everything about each other?

Name: jim
Line: no.

Name: pam
Line: tell me one thing about you i don't know.

Name: jim
Line: [laughs] um, ok. [thinks but says nothing]

Name: jim
Line: [in the kitchen] oh, here's one. did i ever tell you about the time that my brothers videotaped the lottery announcement? and bought the winning numbers the next day? and then, played the tape for me the next week, and i-

Name: pam
Line: and you thought you guys were millionaires.

Name: jim
Line: you heard that one.

Name: pam
Line: yes. but there's, wait, oh, there's a funny ending to that story. i can't remember.

Name: jim
Line: that i thought we were millionaires.

Name: pam
Line: thought you were millionaires, yeah. that's funny. shoot, i knew that one.

Name: jim
Line: that's all right.

Name: angela
Line: the senator and i still have mystery. i'm always waiting to see what he's gonna surprise me with next. [oscar chokes on his coffee]

Name: jim
Line: you all right? [oscar nods]

Line: you support the taliban abroad. so i assume you're willing to live by their rules here.

Line: anything else would be inconsistent.

Line: [takes contract] absolutely, i will.

Line: when you use a ridiculous font, no one thinks you have a plan.

Name: nellie
Line: [holds up pen as dwight searches his desk] looking for this?

Line: what the? [follows nellie into the break room]

Line: oh, this is a lovely pen. ah. but, it's mine now because i stole it.

Name: dwight
Line: [taking pen back] gimme that.

Name: nellie
Line: didn't you sign a contract to live under taliban law? and now, there's been theft. that means, you're not serious or... someone's getting their hand cut off.

Name: dwight
Line: you're insane.

Line: i know. so, it's better that you pick another charity.

Name: dwight
Line: oh, and let your precious operation power grab proceed unchecked? no thank you.

Name: dwight

Name: nellie
Line: i tell you what. i need to make three calls. and then after that, you can become a person who chops off people's hands.

Line: sounds like a plan.

Name: erin
Line: yeah.

Line: [entering annex] clark, you and i need to have a little chat. what clothes does erin need for this news audition?

Name: clark
Line: uh... couple of button-downs, a camisole, a blazer, a pencil skirt, stilettos, maybe, no, no, not maybe, definitely open-toed. uh, something low-cut because the camera makes everything seem higher cut.

Line: yeah, industry secret. you're gonna want some of those panty hose with the seam up the back.

Name: clark
Line: and then, you know, maybe just a robe to wear in between takes but i probably got one she can borrow at my place, so-

Name: clark
Line: i absolutely will do that.

Name: andy
Line: awesome. [to pete] plop!

Name: clark
Line: pff. guess i'll just head over to the mall then. buy erin some sexy, fun outfits.

Line: that clark, huh? errr [punches palm] ca!

Line: ready?

Line: uh-huh.

Line: [as he and pam flip their cards] john stamos.

Line: oh!

Name: pam
Line: yes. but john stamos was temporary. i quickly moved on to-

Name: toby
Line: johnny depp.

Line: johnny depp. [everyone looks confused toward toby]

Name: toby
Line: [after awkward pause] sh, uh, um, i was having this separate conversation with kevin. uh, johnny depp.

Name: kevin
Line: totally. george clooney.

Name: toby
Line: uh-huh.

Name: angela
Line: ok, i have one. i have one. [jim's phone rings and he motions he's taking the call elsewhere]

Name: kevin
Line: [while angela tries asking a question] what is the craziest place you've ever made whoopie?

Name: angela
Line: [as pam wonders about jim] kevin, stop it with that question.

Name: jim
Line: [in the stairwell on his phone] right. and did you show them the market? yeah. and what'd they say? that's awesome! that, oh my god! wow!

Name: jim
Line: it's not even real yet. and i'm not gonna tell her 'til it's real.

Name: pam
Line: i think maybe there actually is something i don't know about jim.

Name: darryl
Line: everyone, we have a voluntary meeting in the conference room to discuss erin's confidence.

Name: andy
Line: her body. we're gonna talk about her body. [to darryl] good. great job.

Name: darryl
Line: andy made me his consigliere. which means assistant regional manager. i guess he thought i'd be into the godfather 'cause i'm black. wrong! i'm into the godfather 'cause i'm a cinephile. i like scarface 'cause i'm black.

Name: andy
Line: [to a full conference room] erin has an audition to be a newscaster. [general acknowledgement]

Name: andy
Line: uh-huh. and i want her to feel very comfortable in her very sexy skin. so, everybody say something that you like about her body. all right? darryl.

Name: darryl
Line: ok, um, i like erin's hair. it's a very pretty color.

Name: andy
Line: yeah, right?

Name: jim
Line: i'm sorry. this is for a news audition?

Name: andy
Line: yeah.

Name: oscar
Line: then why are we talking about her looks? why not her credibility? or her reliability?

Name: andy
Line: news flash everyone. the human race finds attractive people more trustworthy.

Name: oscar
Line: i'm so sorry, andy, but for twenty years, the most trusted man in america - walter cronkite.

Name: meredith
Line: cronkite was hot. if i could go back in time, i'd take that mustache ride.

Name: oscar
Line: does erin have any experience? has she taken any journalism classes, maybe? or...

Name: angela
Line: has she done the pageant circuit?

Name: erin
Line: no, i watch the news.

Name: andy
Line: she's gonna be amazing. look at her. she's gonna light up the screen.

Name: erin
Line: this is a first for me. and, i don't get a lot of chances, so i have to take them really seriously. i will do whatever it takes to get the job.

Name: clark
Line: [whispering to pete] whatever it takes.

Name: pete
Line: [whispering] yeah, i know, i heard. i heard.

Name: dwight
Line: [places nellie's hand on a board and holds up cleaver] this is it. any questions?

Name: nellie
Line: is it gonna be long?

Name: dwight
Line: no. it's gonna be over before you know it.

Name: erin
Line: [pretending to read news] afghan president hamid karzai declared a new policy of dollar days throughout the country. promising low, low prices on all 2012 kia sentras and sonatas. aren't you glad you waited? karzai commented.

Name: darryl
Line: um, where did you get that story?

Name: erin
Line: a little bit here, a little bit there. i bet you didn't think i knew current events.

Name: andy
Line: i love it. it's fantastic. now, tag it with your name.

Name: erin
Line: for channel 11 news, i'm erin hannon.

Name: andy
Line: pause after 'news'.

Name: erin
Line: for channel 11 news... i'm erin hannon.

Name: andy
Line: no, pause longer.

Name: darryl
Line: that was a good one.

Name: andy
Line: pause, pause longer. ok? builds suspense. don't be shy.

Name: erin
Line: got it. for channel 11 news... [very long pause]

Name: andy
Line: wha, it's-

Name: erin
Line: i'm erin hannon.

Name: andy
Line: ok. all right. great. some great stuff in there.

Name: jim
Line: [as pam stares at him] i can feel you looking at me.

Name: pam
Line: ok. well, here's something you don't know. a couple of weeks ago-

Name: jim
Line: uh-huh.

Name: pam
Line: i ran into this guy from my high school who has just gotten divorced and he hit on me. in the mall. and i didn't tell you because, i don't know, i felt embarrassed. and, i didn't know if you would be mad or worried. but, anyway, i thought you'd want to know.

Name: jim
Line: [after a pause] that didn't happen. you would've told me right away.

Name: pam
Line: yeah, i would've. what about you? come on, there's gotta be something. between your birth and the last two days, something you just haven't had the chance to tell me.

Name: jim
Line: uh... [looks at pam]

Name: pam
Line: [looks knowingly back] just tell me.

Name: jim
Line: god, give it up, beesley. you know me too well.

Name: dwight
Line: heh! ha! [making various sounds and movements while preparing to severe nellie's hand] [darryl enters, sees what's happening, and quietly exits]

Name: pete
Line: hey, um, i knew something bothered me and i finally figured it out. what news producers are gonna want to see is how erin relates to the other people on the news team.

Name: erin
Line: oh.

Name: pete
Line: the weird thing is erin is doing the audition alone.

Name: erin
Line: oh god.

Name: pete
Line: now, i'd say clark could be your co-host... he's already doing camera.

Name: erin
Line: tuh.

Name: pete
Line: someone who's already got rapport with erin, maybe. i don't know. [andy smiles at camera]

Name: dwight
Line: ha! [raises cleaver] this is for real this time.

Name: darryl
Line: it's getting late. i thought you guys could use a little [sets up laptop] inspiration.

Name: nellie
Line: [darryl hits play] oh, a movie. what is this?

Name: darryl
Line: 127 hours. it's about this guy who-

Name: dwight
Line: no, no. no spoilers. please.

Name: darryl
Line: my bad.

Name: dwight
Line: no.

Name: darryl
Line: goodnight.

Name: clark
Line: [answers his door to find erin, andy and pete] hey! everybody.

Name: andy
Line: yeah.

Name: clark
Line: come in.

Name: andy
Line: all right!

Name: clark
Line: come on in.

Name: andy
Line: nice.

Name: clark
Line: [to pete] what're you doing here?

Name: pete
Line: sorry, man. andy though erin needed a co-anchor. i'm his makeup guy. my hands are tied.

Name: erin
Line: [news anchor audition] the victim was released from the hospital with second-degree burns.

Name: andy
Line: [also as anchor] wow. you know what they say erin. if you can't take the heat, get out of the kitchen.

Name: erin
Line: well, he tried to but the fire door was blocked.

Name: andy
Line: he sure did.

Name: clark
Line: all right. we got that. that's a rap, everybody.

Name: erin
Line: aw!

Name: andy
Line: just, you sure clark?

Name: clark
Line: yep, she's done.

Name: andy
Line: no, i just, i don't mean erin. i mean for me. i didn't feel good about that.

Name: clark
Line: no, we got it. we got it.

Name: erin
Line: great! let's get some food. i'm starving.

Name: andy
Line: i don't think we did get it. i could do, uh, a couple more takes. we could do it in close-up. that might even be better for editing.

Name: clark
Line: ok, i don't.

Name: andy
Line: all right.

Name: erin
Line: i'm hungry.

Name: andy
Line: uh, pete, you wanna take erin to get a burger or something?

Name: pete
Line: yeah, whatever you say, boss.

Name: andy
Line: ok. [to erin] i'll call you later.

Name: erin
Line: ok.

Name: andy
Line: [to clark] so this is a single.

Name: erin
Line: hey, even if this doesn't work out for me, i'm just glad i had the guts to do it. and, maybe it'll work out for andy.

Name: dwight
Line: [as he and nellie watch the movie] oh god.
