Line: no, impish or admirable.

Name: jim
Line: quick question--do you just decide who gets what in the moment, or did you make a list?

Name: dwight
Line: i decided earlier.

Name: jim
Line: oh, nice. did you check that list?

Name: dwight
Line: of course i checked it.

Name: jim
Line: but more than once? 'cause you could have made a mistake.

Name: dwight
Line: i checked it more than once.

Name: jim
Line: okay, so you made a list, you checked it twice, and now you're gonna find out who's--

Name: dwight
Line: impish or admirable.

Name: jim
Line: damn.

Name: dwight
Line: phyllis vance! cheer or fear? belsnickel is here! i judge your year as...admirable. [jim claps] there you are.

Name: phyllis
Line: [takes here gift out of her bowl] oh. what are these?

Name: dwight
Line: it's a set of rubber gaskets for canning jars.

Name: phyllis
Line: i'd rather have the bowl.

Name: dwight
Line: you can't have the bowl! oscar martinez, cheer or fear? belsnickel is here! i judge your year [looks over at angela, then back to oscar]...as impish! [smacks oscar with a stick]

Name: oscar
Line: ow! you hit people with that thing?

Name: dwight
Line: no, i'm carrying around the stick in order to look cool. for the kinder [puts a mouse trap in pam's bowl]

Name: jim
Line: ooh.

Name: pam
Line: [holds the mouse trap up] mouse trap.

Name: dwight
Line: in a head-to-head contest, people prefer belsnickel over santa every time. there aren't as many songs about him, but i attribute that more to rhyming difficulties. my brother and i wrote one once. it was about a fickle pickle salesman who would tickle you for a nickel.

Name: jim
Line: oh, you know what? i gotta go.

Name: dwight
Line: stop giggling.

Name: pam
Line: oh, really? already?

Name: jim
Line: yeah, it's all right.

Name: dwight
Line: it's a punishment. [turns to jim] hey, where are you going?

Name: jim
Line: i have to go to philly. but this was amazing. okay.

Name: dwight
Line: but you work tomorrow.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, i know, i'd just like to settle in and get a good night's sleep.

Name: dwight
Line: but we were gonna break the pig rib.

Name: jim
Line: ooh.

Name: dwight
Line: remember?

Name: jim
Line: that's right.

Name: dwight
Line: no matter! belsnickel cares not about this--off with you!

Name: jim
Line: perfect. merry christmas, everybody.

Name: dwight
Line: wait, wait, wait, wait! don't you want to know your present?

Name: jim
Line: you know what? yeah. have at it.

Name: dwight
Line: jim halpert. cheer or fear? belsnickel is here! [jim holds his hands like a bowl] i judge your year as impish. [hits jim with stick]

Name: jim
Line: ooh! are you nuts?

Name: dwight
Line: [hits jim three more times] i judge you impish!

Name: jim
Line: ow! ow! okay, that is three, and you didn't hit anybody that hard.

Name: dwight
Line: they're not abandoning the party. [hit's jim again]

Name: jim
Line: just--just--hey!

Name: jim
Line: [as he's walking out] that's enough, i'm done! okay? agh!

Name: dwight
Line: [hits jim some more] impish! [chases jim out]

Name: jim
Line: aah! ow!

Name: meredith
Line: belsnickel, i gotta run out early too. [leans up against the wall as dwight comes back in]

Name: jim
Line: [in the parking lot, holding his side, walking to the taxi, pam follows] oh...what was that? now i'm gonna be all whipped for my first day at work. god. [to taxi driver] one second. oh...

Name: pam
Line: well...this is it.

Name: jim
Line: i'm probably never gonna see you again.

Name: pam
Line: shut up. i'm trying to be serious.

Name: jim
Line: okay, sorry, sorry.

Name: pam
Line: i can't believe this is actually happening.

Name: jim
Line: listen, thank you so much for putting that all together. that was the perfect last christmas party. all right, wish me luck.

Name: pam
Line: okay. [jim and pam hug] good luck. you're gonna be great.

Name: jim
Line: i'll call you when i get in.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: jim
Line: all right.

Name: pam
Line: love you.

Name: jim
Line: love you.

Name: pam
Line: what's going on?

Name: dwight
Line: party's over. you quit on christmas, christmas quits on you. [to camera] and guess what, kids. belsnickel isn't real. it's me, dwight! [takes off hat and beard]

Name: phyllis
Line: we found some old decorations in the warehouse. oscar ran to the store for some food and drink, and i dipped into my stash of eggnog. i guess they needed me after all. it's like in it's a wonderful life when jimmy stewart realizes that all thos people at the building and loan were just jerks, and he was the real hero.

Name: angela
Line: kevin. kevin! aaah. stop it!

Name: nellie
Line: oh, it sounds like the party's starting up out there.

Name: toby
Line: yeah. so anyway, the entire jury wants me to vote guilty. but then i did a little research of my own, and forget everything you thought you knew about fingerprinting.

Name: darryl
Line: meredith's a little cute. i'm just realizing. she got, like, a emma stone thing.

Name: darryl
Line: [at meredtith] boo!

Name: pam
Line: for what it's worth, i liked your party better.

Name: dwight
Line: everyone thought the food was gross, and that belsnickel was some darkly erotic freak.

Name: pam
Line: i don't think anyone thought that.

Name: dwight
Line: jim couldn't even stay till the end of the party.

Name: pam
Line: well, that didn't have anything to do with you.

Name: dwight
Line: i don't care. guess how much i care on a scale of one to ten.

Name: pam
Line: zero.

Name: dwight
Line: damn it!

Name: darryl
Line: i'm gonna tell jim to go [bleep] himself.

Name: erin
Line: do you think andy would ever jump off an exploding building tied to a hose for me?

Name: pete
Line: yeah. definitely. [erin starts to cry] hey, what's--oh, no, come here. [starts to put his arm around erin] hey, hey. come on, huh?

Name: erin
Line: [sliding away from pete] i'm still andy's girlfriend.

Name: pete
Line: oh, yeah, of course. i know.

Name: erin
Line: but you can leave your arm.

Name: pam
Line: dwight, want me to get you some eggnog?

Name: dwight
Line: no, thanks. i'll just have another dumatril. jim taught me this really cool way to take it. you crush it into a powder, and you snort it up your butt.

Name: jim
Line: [walks back into the office] yep, i did say that.

Name: pam
Line: jim!

Name: jim
Line: what's going on? where's the belsnickel?

Name: pam
Line: oh--oh my god!

Name: jim
Line: what are you doing? last time i saw you, you were whipping me out of the building.

Name: dwight
Line: [holds his finger to jim's lips] shh. let's not speak of that. the pig rib! we could totally break the pig rib! i'm gonna dig it out of the trash! [high fives jim]

Name: pam
Line: what happened? did you miss your bus?

Name: jim
Line: no. i just missed my wife.[gives pam a hug and a kiss]

Name: dwight
Line: [comes back in, holding up the pig rib] i found it!

Name: jim
Line: and i found out that there's a bus at 5:00 a.m.

Name: dwight
Line: oh! [pig rib breaks and jim wins, and stuff splatters people. everyone groans] damn it! jim got the bigger half.

Name: darryl
Line: [to himself] back for more, huh? [gets up and walks towards jim]

Name: jim
Line: ooh, nog it. let me get some nog. [everyone talking phyllis pours jim some eggnog, as daryl walks in] thanks, phyllis. where's andy?

Name: darryl
Line: you!

Name: jim
Line: oh, hey, man. [daryl walks over to jim, angrily and stares at jim] oh, you know what? before i forget again, i talked to the guys about hiring you. they're gonna bring you in for an interview.

Name: darryl
Line: [looking at jim confused] that's great.

Name: jim
Line: right?

Name: darryl
Line: thanks, man.

Name: jim
Line: hey, of course.

Name: darryl
Line: i shall come by at your convenience.

Name: jim
Line: thank you, sir. [tips his glass to daryl]

Name: darryl
Line: [claps his hands once, spins around] whoo!

Name: jim
Line: go get 'em.

Name: darryl
Line: [falls backwards onto the food table] oh! whoa!

Name: dwight
Line: very impish.

Name: toby
Line: two dimes, seven nickels--well, okay, no, that doesn't add up. it was one quarter and--

Name: nellie
Line: shh. [puts her finger to toby's lips]

Name: toby
Line: what? i was just explaining--

Name: nellie
Line: shh.

Name: toby
Line: why wouldn't it--

Name: nellie
Line: [put her finger to his lips again] shh.

Name: toby
Line: but why?

Name: nellie
Line: no...more...talking.

Name: toby
Line: are you gonna kiss me?

Name: nellie
Line: yes. [kisses toby]

Name: kevin
Line: to me, the sixers are a five seed tops.

Name: jim
Line: i think they're going to the conference finals.

Name: kevin
Line: no.

Name: jim
Line: bynum, obvious monster and the three point shooting, don't even-... [jim bites his lip]

Name: jim
Line: i bit my lip at lunch today.

Name: darryl
Line: sucks. anyway, i just don't see it. the knicks are tough.the nets are tough.

Name: kevin
Line: oh, the nets are super tough.  [jim in pain from his lip]

Name: jim
Line: now i have this big bump in my lip that hurts. i hate it.

Name: kevin
Line: the hawks are terrible. they're always terrible.

Name: jim
Line: okay, you need to think about it before you come with the... [jim bites his lip again and pounds on table]

Name: jim
Line: whatever. it's not a big deal. you know i always tell my three year old, if this is the worst thing that's gonna happen...[jim bites his lip again] you gotta be kidding me! ok! pam! that's it, i'm going home!

Name: erin
Line: good morning, meredith.

Name: pam
Line: what?

Name: erin
Line: oh, sorry, pam. yikes.

Name: pam
Line: jim's been spending a few days a week in philly and i'm not gonna lie, it's been challenging. yesterday, things took a turn for the worse. i found out cece has lice. so i was up all night disinfecting every sheet, towel, toy, item of clothing in the entire house. i'm exhausted. but don't tell jim. he has a huge meeting today, under a lot of pressure and he's doing it all for the family.

Name: jim
Line: i am meeting dr. j today, otherwise known as julius irving, famed 76er and my own personal hero. but i have to be careful not to rub it in pam's face because let's be honest, how would i feel if i was at home stuck with the kids while she was go carting with john stamos.

Name: jim
Line: [talking on phone] you sound tired. everything ok?

Name: pam
Line: great. everything's great. hey are you nervous about your big meeting?

Name: jim
Line: uhh, a little bit. it's a lot of pressure, you know, but that's what i signed up for right?

Name: worker
Line: jim, limo's here.

Name: jim
Line: uh, you know what, i gotta hop off because my, uh, taxi is here to take me to the meeting.

Name: pam
Line: oh, call me later!

Name: jim
Line: ok

Name: pam
Line: good luck!

Name: jim
Line: thanks!

Name: pam
Line: love you.

Name: jim
Line: love you too. bye.

Name: val
Line: how you doing?

Name: darryl
Line: alright. i mean, it's what you want, so...

Name: val
Line: it's how it has to be.

Name: darryl
Line: i know, i know. it's just hard.

Name: darryl
Line: me and val were going nowhere and if i'm gonna be working in philly, i'm gonna need my freedom. so, i convinced val to breakup with me. here's how you do it. you say, "what are you gonna do, breakup with me?" like it's a joke, and then you gain a lot of weight.

Name: darryl
Line: i'll never be sorry, not for a moment of it.

Name: val
Line: me neither. come here. [she hugs darryl, and darryl smiles behind her back]

Name: pam
Line: hey meredith, i need your supplier requests today.

Name: meredith
Line: jeez h. in the morning. will you stop your nagging already? no wonder jim left you.

Name: pam
Line: he didn't leave me. he just went part time. [meredith scratches her head vigorously] can you just fill out the form please?

Name: meredith
Line: yes.

Name: pam
Line: i'm sure she's just confused. people scratch their heads when they're confused. not always like an ape, the way meredith just did, but it happens.

Name: meredith
Line: hurry up already.

Name: erin
Line: [checking meredith's head]  trust me, i know what i'm doing. between the foster homes and the orphanage, i had lice 22 times.

Name: erin
Line: holy wow, that's a big one. alright, pencils down everyone, we got lice!

Name: angela
Line: oh god, meredith, lice? did you not sign a pledge to shower?

Name: dwight
Line: what? lice? oh my god. lock the doors, we are on full quarantine.

Name: pam
Line: dwight, relax. it's just lice. maybe, possibly.

Name: dwight
Line: just lice pam?

Name: dwight
Line: of all of the vermin in god's great green kingdom, lice are the ones i detest the most. my first day of school, i had lice, and no one would play with me. for 15 years, they called me freak and four eyes and sci-fi nerd and girl puncher. all because i had lice when i was 7.

Name: dwight
Line: make way, nope, inspect me.

Name: erin
Line: oh, this is the cleanest scalp i've ever seen. you are all clear.

Name: dwight
Line: should be. i use lice shampoo every morning. [dwight starts spraying everyone with disinfectant]

Name: pam
Line: stop that!

Name: angela
Line: dwight!

Name: erin
Line: next!

Name: angela
Line: [getting her head checked] geez meredith, you know, this is an office not one of your bean bag orgies.

Name: pam
Line: alright, let's give her a break. we don't know for sure this is meredith's fault.

Name: oscar
Line: pam, really? come on.

Name: meredith
Line: hey, what do you want? i know who i am. nobody's taken meredith palmer to the opera to meet the queen.

Name: erin
Line: lice. more lice. [angela shrieks in disgust] angela has lice.

Name: angela
Line: ew! oh.

Name: erin
Line: [checking stanley's head] ooh yabber, lice!

Name: erin
Line: [checking pam's head] yikers, lice.

Name: pam
Line: no! how? i'm so clean!

Name: erin
Line: [checking oscar's head] oh yeah, big time lice.

Name: oscar
Line: i wash my hands at least six times a day. toilet seat covers? yes, thank you, even when i pee. apparently, none of that is protection enough. not when it comes to meredith.

Name: phyllis
Line: what are you wearing?

Name: dwight
Line: it's a hazmat suit. that stands for hazaderous materials men's suit wearing. if you rent more than four times a year, it just makes sense to buy. is there anyone else here that is lice free? [phyllis, kevin, darryl. and nellie raise their hands] excellent. do you have your own hazmat suits?

Name: nellie
Line: no.

Name: kevin
Line: no.

Name: dwight
Line: renters. ok, i'm gonna need you to gather your belongings, retreat to the warehouse, conduct your business there until the infected have been deloused. let's get going. i'm gonna stay here and fight. if you don't hear from me by lunch, call me. i might want lunch.

Name: darryl
Line: alright, we're going down to my warehouse, that means we're playing by my rules. no messing with the baler and be cool in front of me and val. we just broke up.

Name: phyllis
Line: you got dumped?

Name: darryl
Line: yeah, she ended things.

Name: nellie
Line: breakups are the worst. the only thing that got me through mine are large amounts of shepard's pie and brandy. the singer, not the drink.

Name: kevin
Line: here man. [kevin hands daryll some chocolate] you need that more than me.

Name: darryl
Line: thanks, man.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah [kisses darryl on the cheek]

Name: pam
Line: guys, i think we should all ease up on meredith. this has got to be hard for her.

Name: angela
Line: oh, no no no no no. i have not yet begun to shame.

Name: stanley
Line: that's it. i'm getting my stuff. i'm leaving for the day.

Name: erin
Line: no! stanley! if you leave now then you'll get it in your car and then you'll get it in your house! [erin jumps on stanley's back]

Name: stanley
Line: get off me!

Name: erin
Line: i'm trying to save you from yourself!

Name: stanley
Line: alright, i'll stay! there's a pencil broken in my rolls.

Name: pam
Line: maybe it was meredith. maybe she brought in lice that are totally different than the lice that i got from cece. so let's not jump to the simplest conclusion that she got her lice from me. that is how wars get started. fine, i'll tell her it was me.

Name: jim
Line: oh man, that's fresh squeezed. and, uh are all the snacks complimentary?

Name: limo driver
Line: yeah, take some home if you want.

Name: jim
Line: oh no, no, no. that's ok. [jim shoves some snacks in his pocket as he gets out of limo] um i'm sorry, is this the conference center?

Name: limo driver
Line: no, mr. irving called. said he'd rather meet you at his private court.

Name: jim
Line: you gotta be kidding me.

Name: pam
Line: hey, meredith i need to tell you something.

Name: meredith
Line: [shaving her own head] yes, pam what do you want?

Name: pam
Line: oh my god, meredith what are you doing!?

Name: meredith
Line: baking a cake, what does it look like i'm doing? getting rid of the lice.

Name: pam
Line: oh stop! i am so sorry!

Name: meredith
Line: oh, can you hold that thought? that's my wax. you know, i think these critters migrated from down south. what were you saying?

Name: pam
Line: nothing.

Name: pam
Line: i am going to tell her, but now is clearly not the time.  i will buy her a wig, we'll have a few laughs. there's a right way to do this.

Name: dwight
Line: scalp leeches, skull vampires, follicle gypsies, hair lawyers. one thing is clear, it's kill or be killed!

Name: erin
Line: no, no. it's more of a nuisance really. it's not that big a deal. so, i collected your hats and your coats...

Name: dwight
Line: to be burned!

Name: erin
Line: to be washed.

Name: angela
Line: what do we do about our heads?

Name: dwight
Line: i'm not gonna lie. lye!

Name: erin
Line: no, all we need is mayonnaise.

Name: angela
Line: excuse me?

Name: pam
Line: she's right, it works. i would imagine.

Name: erin
Line: yes, it helps to suffrocate the little buddies and it's a really healthy alternative to the chemicals found in most lice shampoos.

Name: oscar
Line: i can appreciate that. i also only eat local, organic produce.

Name: meredith
Line: [walks in conference room] shaboom! how do you like me now!?

Name: angela
Line: oh.

Name: oscar
Line: wow.

Name: meredith
Line: take a picture. it will last longer.

Name: angela
Line: we don't want it to last longer. it's horrible.

Name: creed
Line: bald people make me sick.

Name: meredith
Line: yeah, yeah, everybody pile on meredith. but i'm the only one with the balls to show them lice who's boss.

Name: erin
Line: ok, nobody panic. if everybody just follows my instructions, then nobody else needs to end up bald. not that it looks bad, meredith. it looks...it looks awesome. you look like a baby who suddenly aged 50 years. a cute baby, but something sucked the life force out of it. i'm so sorry. we need mayonnaise! we need it now.

Name: pam
Line: oh! uh, uh i'll go.

Name: angela
Line: okay. oh, thank you.

Name: oscar
Line: you're a saint, pam.

Name: pam
Line: no, no, it's not a big deal, please. no. um, meredith can i get you something special while i'm at the store, candy, or...or one of those stylish turbans?

Name: meredith
Line: thanks pam! i'll take a pack of nicorette gum and a pack of kools.

Name: pam
Line: okay.

Name: dwight
Line: let's talk pubes, people.

Name: val
Line: hey, darryl.

Name: darryl
Line: oh, hey val.

Name: nellie
Line: oh, that was tragic, oh, that was like a car crash. i couldn't look away. you two clearly still have feelings for each other.

Name: darryl
Line: yeah.

Name: phyllis
Line: what's gonna make you feel better, big guy?

Name: darryl
Line: when i was a kid, my grandmother used to make me chocolate cake when i wasn't feeling good. she's not around to do that anymore. i'm sorry, i just need a moment to myself just to clear my head.

Name: nellie
Line: aw, poor darryl. i can't bear to see him suffer like this.

Name: kevin
Line: i think he needs some hugs, and maybe some chocolate cake.

Name: phyllis
Line: mmm, this won't help him, it's a muffin, not cake.

Name: nellie
Line: listen, let's try and get darryl the one thing in the world he clearly wants and needs the most.

Name: kevin
Line: an escalade.

Name: nellie
Line: or what's her name.

Name: phyllis
Line: val.

Name: nellie
Line: let's get darryl val.

Name: julius irving
Line: i hope you don't mind me bringing you out here. i can't get my knees under a desk.

Name: jim
Line: are you kidding me? i can literally scalp tickets to this.

Name: julius
Line: well, do you think you can sink one from deep?

Name: jim
Line: listen, i don't mean to intimidate you, but i did play a little high school ball.

Name: julius
Line: okay. [jim shoots the basket and it goes in] wow, halpert's got game.

Name: jim
Line: alright. [jim's phone rings] oh, sorry. i'm so sorry. it's my wife, can i take this?

Name: julius
Line: it's your wife? you better take it.

Name: jim
Line: right! [jim laughs as he answers the phone] hey, what's up? everything ok?

Name: pam
Line: oh, no everything's great! um, i was just calling to see how the meeting went.

Name: jim
Line: it's still happening right now actually, so uh...

Name: pam
Line: he's really making you work for it, huh?

Name: jim
Line: yes, it is very stressful. you sure everything's okay?

Name: pam
Line: great. i am killing it over here. [drops mayonnaise on the ground] jim, i gotta go.

Name: jim
Line: okay, bye. [jim turns back to julius] so sorry about that.

Name: julius
Line: no problem. hey jim, what size do you wear, man? i got a pair of japanese nikes with your name on them. what do you think?

Name: jim
Line: i love it.

Name: erin
Line: [handing out mayonnaise jars] once it's all over your head, just leavr it there for four hours. that will be enough time for the lice to fall asleep, suffrocate, and then pass away.

Name: dwight
Line: oh sure, and when you're ready to get serious, come to me to get it done right. [dwight holds up a pair of scissors]

Name: stanley
Line: put those away before you hurt yourself.

Name: dwight
Line: [swings the scissors around and puts them into his pocket, putting a hole in his hazmat suit] oh god, oh no. no. no. no! no! no! no! no!

Name: erin
Line: okay, it's easier with a buddy, so everybody pair up.

Name: angela
Line: oscar, do you want to be my partner?

Name: oscar
Line: yeah, yeah, sure. i'd love to..

Name: creed
Line: hey, uh, mayo buddy, five dollar tip, you unclog my ears. okay?

Name: erin
Line: oh, creed, i'm so sorry. i'm...i'm already partners with pete, right pete?

Name: pete
Line: uh, yeah. we promised each other if we ever got lice, we'd buddy up. sorry, man.

Name: pam
Line: hey, creed, wanna be my buddy?

Name: creed
Line: oh god. stuck with the weirdo.

Name: oscar
Line: [angela is slapping mayo on oscar's head] angela.

Name: angela
Line: you don't want bugs. you know? who knows where those bugs will end up?

Name: meredith
Line: [putting mayo on stanley's head] you're getting a bargain. i ain't got no hair no more.

Name: pam
Line: [putting mayo on creed's head] creed, i'm all done. my turn.

Name: creed
Line: i'm sorry, pam. it looks a little messy.

Name: pam
Line: well, wait.

Name: pete
Line: [putting mayo on erin's head] how's that?

Name: erin
Line: i feel it working. [erin and pete playing around with the mayo] eiffel tower!

Name: val
Line: can i help you?

Name: phyllis
Line: well, we don't want to pry but we heard you broke up with darryl.

Name: val
Line: yeah, that's true.

Name: phyllis
Line: we think you made a big, big mistake.

Name: kevin
Line: big mistake.

Name: nellie
Line: quite enormous.

Name: phyllis
Line: he's a real catch and you should take him back.

Name: val
Line: ok, thank you. is that all?

Name: nellie
Line: no. no, that is not all. let me tell you what real life is like. the men dry up, and the nights get lonely. the only calls on your machine are for collection agencies about that pair of motorcycle boots you never even wore. you stalk your old high school boyfriend online, go to his daughter's soccer games, and make a scene. you buy a diamond ring for yourself, wear it on your right hand, and tell yourself, you're all you need. one day, you're alone, tired. at your feet, a dying bird. but where did it come from? why did you kill it? is it because in some strange way it is you?

Name: val

Line: what's that cooler?

Line: nothing. [pulls out a can of soda] it's mine. [jim shakes his head] [after looking through dvr] what happened to my tavis smileys?

Name: jim
Line: oh, crap. were those yours?

Name: dwight
Line: [pulling clark across the parking lot] i never want to see you working in the upstairs office again. do you hear me?

Name: clark
Line: well, my only crime was loving the local sports teams and trying to be one of the guys.

Name: dwight
Line: silence. you'll now be working in the warehouse with the untouchables. now, go make your hands rough with work.

Name: clark
Line: ok, boss. [quietly] pam, you know this is ridiculous, right? like you're smarter than this.

Name: pam
Line: shh, shh.

Name: clark
Line: this is never gonna work.

Name: pam
Line: shh. remember your lines.

Name: clark
Line: what lines?

Name: dwight
Line: go move some paper!

Name: pam
Line: [to darryl on phone] hey, you know that guy frank who works in the warehouse?

Name: darryl
Line: he's not my hire, but i know who he is.

Name: pam
Line: ok. what does he like? what's important to him? does he have like a favorite pair of boots or a lunch box or...

Name: darryl
Line: what? is he retiring? you getting him a gift or something?

Name: pam
Line: yeah, something like that.

Name: darryl
Line: i know he loves his pick up truck.

Name: pam
Line: oh, great! [to dwight] his truck!

Name: dwight
Line: great. get the plate number.

Name: pam
Line: ok. [to darryl] do you know the plate... never mind. why would you know that? and why would i be asking that?

Name: dwight
Line: so we know which truck to van...

Name: darryl
Line: hey. while i got you on the phone, your husband's like a sloppy, homeless hobo. can you fix that?

Name: pam
Line: yeah. i was kinda hoping you could. i gotta go. bye. [to dwight] come on. [camera pans to clark duct taped to a chair]

Name: party photographer
Line: hold on a second. uh, sandeep? let's get you closer to the senator. just about there. great. and, oscar? i'm gonna need you to step a little closer to the senator, as well. somewhere there.

Name: angela
Line: he's blocking me.

Name: senator
Line: it's only a photo, honey.

Name: party photographer
Line: [to party waiter] excuse me, uh, what's your name?

Name: party waiter
Line: sean.

Name: party photographer
Line: lashawn. great. you wanna be in a photo? right this way. [notices overweight man following] not you. no.

Name: oscar
Line: he put me here.

Name: angela
Line: he put you right in front of me?

Name: party photographer
Line: let's just wheel margaret right in front...

Name: oscar
Line: ow! robert?!

Name: senator
Line: angela.

Name: party photographer
Line: smile. [angela attempts to get in front of oscar as pictures are taken]

Name: pam
Line: i'm done. what are you... is that supposed to be my mural?

Name: dwight
Line: yeah. frank draws a butt on your mural, i'm drawing your mural on frank's truck's butt. eye for an eye, mamacita.

Name: pam
Line: aw, dwight. that's really sweet.

Name: dwight
Line: let's see yours.

Name: pam
Line: oh, no. um, i, i'm embarrassed. it's stupid.

Name: dwight
Line: this is amazing! frank! and he's leaving a trail of poops?

Name: pam
Line: yeah. and he has saggy boobs.

Name: dwight
Line: i saw that. that's great!

Name: pam
Line: yeah. i feel better.

Name: dwight
Line: good. i'm glad you feel better. this has been a wonderful day. i have to say, i like hanging out with a vengeful bitch.

Name: pam
Line: i know. you miss angela, don't you?

Name: dwight
Line: ugh! don't sympathize. you're ruining the mood. back to work. draw his penis.

Name: pam
Line: i got back at frank in the most fitting way possible. with my art. the paints are water-based. it's gonna come off with a hose. but, i think the lesson will last a very...

Name: frank
Line: [exiting building and approaching pam] lady! my truck? you had no right!

Name: pam
Line: no, you had no right!

Name: frank
Line: it's a $40,000 truck!

Name: pam
Line: so? you started it!

Name: frank
Line: so? so someone need to shut you up! [attempts to attack pam]

Name: brian
Line: hey, hey, hey! [knocks frank down with boom microphone]

Name: pam
Line: whoa.

Name: brian
Line: [as frank gets up] easy! [frank grabs him]

Name: frank
Line: you son of a bitch!

Name: brian
Line: you're gonna hit a woman?

Name: senator
Line: thanks so much for coming. thanks so much. [to oscar and angela] well. have we all calmed down yet?

Name: oscar
Line: yes. sorry about that.

Name: angela
Line: it was all my fault.

Name: senator
Line: let's all try to do better next time. kevin, great to see you.

Name: kevin
Line: yeah. thank you for the food. oh, and also, you suck.

Name: senator
Line: i beg your pardon.

Name: kevin
Line: you are like a terrible person. these guys care about you and you're just using them. again, the food was very good. [oscar and angela exit looking pleased]

Name: pam
Line: well, i'm gonna say something to the producers.

Name: brian
Line: no. no, it's...

Name: pam
Line: you shouldn't be fired. i mean, you were just protecting me.

Name: brian
Line: it's all good. i knew what i was doing. it's... i'm sorry about your mural, though. i mean, because you put so much into that.

Name: pam
Line: forget about my mural. it's stupid.

Name: brian
Line: no. you, you worked hard on that. that guy's an animal. i'm glad they're firing him too.

Name: pam
Line: it's crazy. brian, i'm so sorry.

Name: brian
Line: look. i don't, i don't wanna put myself where i don't belong. if you ever need me, you just call me. and i'll be there for you.

Name: pam
Line: thanks, brian.

Name: brian
Line: seeya.

Name: jim
Line: wow. this whole philly thing has been so much fun that i may have lost sight of what really matters. i mean, having fun is not nearly as important as being good to the people who you really care about. i mean, that's just 'roommates 101'.

Name: darryl
Line: [playing video game with jim] oh. come on!

Name: jim
Line: oh. oh!

Name: darryl
Line: damn!

Name: jim
Line: [imitating game announcer] you win. [darryl throws empty can on floor] how good did that feel?

Name: darryl
Line: that felt really good, actually.

Name: pam
Line: [to jim] hey. i feel so lucky we're in the same city for valentine's day.

Name: jim
Line: it's like magic. or, it's like me getting on my hands and knees and begging my partners to switch a tuesday for a thursday.

Name: pam
Line: [makes magic trick hand gesture] alakazam!

Name: jim
Line: by the way, they do need an extra day next week.

Name: pam
Line: and, poof! he disappears. [jim snaps, playing along]

Name: erin
Line: [to pete] hey! wanna play hookey today?

Name: pete
Line: oh, maybe. what do you have in mind?

Name: erin
Line: we can do anything you want.

Name: erin
Line: i really wanna have fun today because tomorrow is going to be a nightmare. andy's coming back from his stupid, dumb boat trip. he's been rude. he's been selfish. i think he's a big jerk. and i'm breaking up with him. bam, andy! how do you like me now?... i hope as a friend.

Name: pete
Line: erin says she's gonna break up with andy, but i'm not sure. he's coming back tomorrow and surprise, today, she wants to do whatever i'd like. you know, when i was a kid, we had a dog who go real sick and we had to 'send him to a farm'. and on his last day, we did everything he loved.

Name: erin
Line: [has an idea and reveals a frisbee from under her desk] wanna play catch in the parking lot?

Name: pete
Line: [slightly surprised] sure.

Name: erin
Line: great.

Name: pete
Line: i'll get my coat.

Name: erin
Line: perfect. [pete walks away eying the camera knowingly]

Name: dwight
Line: [knocks on andy's door, then pretends to answer as andy] come in.

Name: dwight
Line: [talking to andy's empty chair] andy, hi. i just made another huge sale for the company that you manage. i need you to authorize that expense report and sign off on that contract.

Name: dwight
Line: [pretending to be andy] i would be happy to. it would be my pleasure, mr. schrute. rick-a-dick-doo, rick-a-dick-dick-dick, rick-a-dick-doo.

Name: dwight
Line: i really like andy these days. he's pretend and he does exactly as i tell him to. all that will change when real andy comes back tomorrow. [thinks for a moment] unless he comes back as pretend dwight. in which case, we're in for an epic, confusing showdown.

Name: kevin
Line: andy left a carton of milk in the fridge. so, i've been sneaking a little bit every day for the last three months. it's been yummy. but now, andy's coming back. so, i guess it's goodbye chunky, lemon milk.

Name: kevin
Line: [to entire office]ok, i'll say it. i wish andy had stayed on his trip.

Name: nellie
Line: i say we all have one last fun boss-less day.

Name: meredith
Line: yeah, let's get some booze and some cocaine and just blow it out. no consequences.

Name: phyllis
Line: or the mini mall. they have all these valentine day deals. you can get 20% off if you come in with your husband or your [to nellie] boyfriend. but, i mean, if you don't have one of those you can probably just bring whoever it is you use to kill your loneliness.

Name: stanley
Line: phil, i'll pretend to be your husband. i'm already sick of you, so it'll seem realistic.

Name: phyllis
Line: oh...

Name: angela
Line: they have a nail salon there where i get my feet detailed. [to meredith] they use a watch repair kit.

Name: kevin
Line: [to angela] ew! i'll be your foot buddy.

Name: nellie
Line: everyone, it is our last day here with no manager. i say we go to the mini mall. clark, you will be my fake boyfriend so i can get the discount.

Name: clark
Line: it's what i do. [everyone begins to leave]

Name: oscar
Line: darryl, everyone seems to be pairing off. do you want to pretend to be a couple so we get the...

Name: darryl
Line: no... yes, yes. why wouldn't i... wanna pretend to be gay? got no problem with that.

Name: oscar
Line: all right, it'll be easy. don't be nervous, just follow my...

Name: darryl
Line: [interrupting] stop talking 'bout it. i said i'm fine with it.

Name: pam
Line: [eating] these are gross.

Name: jim
Line: they are terrible.

Name: pam
Line: oh, hey, don't fill up on chocolates. i made us a lunch reservation at state street grill.

Name: jim
Line: oh my god. that's so romantic.

Name: pam
Line: it's with brian and alyssa.

Name: jim
Line: oh my god. that's less romantic.

Name: pam
Line: i know. but we should go. we need to thank him for, you know, saving my life.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, yeah. no, totally. that's good. so, should we just get a bottle of wine later and celebrate?

Name: pam
Line: that sounds nice.

Name: jim
Line: i'm very excited to see brian. brian's a great guy. and pam and i have gotten really close to he and his wife, alyssa over the years. and he got fired for protecting my wife from a jerk in the warehouse. i'm sorry, but you know him. he's a good guy.

Name: nail stylist 1
Line: oh, tiny, poor lady is back. oh, get the baby clipper. [other nails stylists gush over angela]

Name: nail stylist 2
Line: [to clark] you take off your glasses.

Name: clark
Line: 'kay. [removes glasses]

Name: nellie
Line: [nail stylist 2 giggles] what?

Name: nail stylist 2
Line: your boyfriend. he look like a pretty girl.

Name: nellie
Line: my boyfriend does look like a pretty girl, doesn't he? yes, a very little pretty girl. and you know what, now that you are developing, we should go and get you a training bra. [both laugh at clark]

Name: clark
Line: oh, you guys think this is funny? you know what? no more discount. [to nail manager] excuse me. [gesturing he and nellie] full price. we're not together.

Name: nellie
Line: oh, come on!

Name: clark
Line: she's living a lie.

Name: nellie
Line: turns out, i can't even be in a pretend relationship.

Name: oscar
Line: [to nail manager] hi. we'd like a couples discount on a pair of foot massages.

Name: nail manager
Line: no. no discount for two men. two men are not a couple.

Name: oscar
Line: we are together. romantically.

Name: nail manager
Line: two men? [other nail stylist speaks korean to manager, both laugh] [gestures index fingers bumping together] doesn't work. no discount.

Name: darryl
Line: oh, it works. him and me, all right, we are crazy in love. more love than your small mind can comprehend. and we have two disposable incomes. and no kids. and we're taking our business elsewhere. [oscar and darryl exit holding hands]

Name: jim
Line: [enters restaurant with pam] hey, brian.

Name: brian
Line: hey.

Name: pam
Line: sorry we're late.

Name: brian
Line: oh, uh, no problem. i finished all the bread.

Name: pam
Line: ha,ha,ha, yeah ok.

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: pam
Line: he's on a no carb thing. supposedly.

Name: jim
Line: oh.

Name: brian
Line: it's, uh, great to see you guys. thanks for coming.

Name: pam
Line: yeah.

Name: jim
Line: are you kidding? thank you, man. i mean, i've wanted the opportunity to say thanks for... everything. and i'm really sorry about the job. that just seems crazy.

Name: brian
Line: it's fine. what are you gonna do, you know? but, if you guys know of any work, i'm fully available.

Name: pam
Line: well, my dad can't hear a thing. you could boom his whole life for him.

Name: brian
Line: that's... ok, great. does he pay well?

Name: pam
Line: where's alyssa?

Name: brian
Line: uh, yeah. um, you know, alyssa's, she's not gonna make it today.

Name: pam
Line: oh.

Name: brian
Line: actually, we're not gonna make it. um... we're splitting up.

Name: dwight
Line: [to andy's empty chair] i have yet another sales order for you to sign.

Name: dwight
Line: [acting as andy] why thank you mr. schrute. i don't know how you do it. you're a god. rick-a-dick-dick-doo.

Name: andy
Line: [in his office doorway, bearded and unkept] hi dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: you're back. [surveys andy] and you're disgusting.

Name: phyllis
Line: [as everyone returns to the office] ah, geez. my nails aren't dry yet. i don't think i can work for at least a couple hours.

Name: andy
Line: well, well, well, look who it is.

Name: phyllis
Line: andy.

Name: andy
Line: i guess i can cancel my order from zappos.com because, oh, the loafers have arrived.

Name: erin
Line: andy!

Name: andy
Line: hey! sweetheart! [approaches erin] i have missed you so much.

Name: erin
Line: [obviously avoiding andy's embrace] yes. [gives andy high fives] welcome back, buddy.

Name: andy
Line: [attempting to hug erin as she resists] i have been dreaming of this moment.

Name: erin
Line: me too. so much. i'm so happy.

Name: erin
Line: i am really, really bad at break ups. technically, i'm still dating my first grade boyfriend. i mean, we just had our 20th anniversary. and, i forgot to get him something.

Name: oscar
Line: what happened? we thought you were coming back tomorrow.

Name: andy
Line: well, valentine's surprise for erin.  hello? super romantic. and i got you something. [removes wooden instruments from bag] oh, it's a couple of pieces of bamboo. big deal, right? no. these are musical instruments. it's so we can play island music together. cause i have this. [removes gã¼iro and begins playing and singing] clop the cloppers. yeah, clop 'em. it's called bembe. [sings while kevin echoes]

Name: dwight
Line: hey, burning man, if it's not selling out too much, you might want to throw on a tie. david wallace is gonna be here in an hour.

Name: andy
Line: obviously, that's why i'm here. i mean, i came back early to surprise erin. happy valentine's day, sweetheart. [tries to embrace erin but she begins playing cloppers] but, i'm just saying, i'm also excited about the wallace meeting.

Name: clark
Line: why? isn't he just coming in to rip you a new one for being gone three months?

Name: dwight
Line: no. please. come on, clark. wallace knows that he's been gone for the last three months. [andy stalls] right? wallace does know that you've been gone for the last three months?

Name: andy
Line: i have no idea. i don't know what he knows or doesn't know. but we've been in touch the whole time. i mean, it's not hard to get high-speed internet in turks de caicos, people. it's in every bembe cafe.

Name: erin
Line: he only emailed me four times.

Name: andy
Line: question. where's jim?

Name: phyllis
Line: he and pam are having their valentine's day lunch.

Name: andy
Line: for two hours? really?

Name: oscar
Line: so, you're concerned about peoples' long absence from their place of work?

Name: andy
Line: if the shoe fits. [plays gã¼iro and sings, kevin echoes]

Name: brian
Line: we were telling two different versions of the same story. and then, everything just went numb.

Name: jim
Line: well, i mean, that's ok. it doesn't mean that it's over. right? i mean, couples fight.

Name: brian
Line: yeah. that's the thing. when we were fighting, it weirdly felt like the relationship was still alive. and, it wasn't until we stopped fighting that, we realized that it was over. you know, it's over. [overcome by emotion] i'm sorry, this is... oh my god, ok. [to pam] we have to stop seeing each other like this. we have to find a different way to communicate other than breaking down in front of each other.

Name: pam
Line: [obviously flustered] yeah.

Name: jim
Line: what?

Name: brian
Line: at least my crying won't get you fired.

Name: jim
Line: crying?

Name: andy
Line: i noticed that you landed the scranton white pages account. that is tremendous.

Name: dwight
Line: thank you.

Name: andy
Line: and you sold it to jan too.

Name: dwight
Line: yes!

Name: andy
Line: i mean... i'm impressed.

Name: dwight
Line: [laughing together] yeah!

Name: andy
Line: well, there's one problem. couldn't help but notice that you offered a price point that was not approved by the head office. so... gotta run that stuff by me, dwight.

Name: dwight
Line: you were on a boat.

Name: andy
Line: i was...

Name: dwight
Line: on a boat.

Name: andy
Line: that...

Name: dwight
Line: in the ocean.

Name: andy
Line: ok. the issue is that you need to run this stuff by me. coolio? are we coolio? [dwight resists] just say the word 'coolio'.

Name: dwight
Line: i'm not gonna say it.

Name: andy
Line: say it.

Name: dwight
Line: not a word.

Name: andy
Line: coolio.

Name: dwight
Line: no! [andy makes a call] what do you think you're doing?

Name: andy
Line: just gonna call the scranton white pages and clear this right up.

Name: dwight
Line: don't you dare! andy!

Name: jan
Line: [on phone] hello?

Name: andy
Line: hey, jan. nard dog here.

Name: jan
Line: oh, andy.

Name: andy
Line: i was just looking over the paperwork. i found a little hiccup.

Name: jan
Line: really?

Name: andy
Line: yeah. it appears my employee offered you a price that he was not authorized to.

Name: jan
Line: hmm.

Name: dwight
Line: [whispers] coolio.

Name: jan
Line: seriously? you're calling me a few weeks after finalizing our contract to gouge me now for more money? is that what you're doing?

Name: dwight
Line: coolio. coolio.

Name: andy
Line: no. no, no, no jan i think you misunderstood.

Name: jan
Line: yeah.

Name: dwight
Line: coolio.

Name: andy
Line: it, it's, it's actually just an issue...

Name: jan
Line: you know what? you know what, uh, nard dog? there is an option in the contract that allows me to back out within 30 days of signing. so, i would like to exercise that option.

Name: dwight
Line: no, jan! please do not listen to this boob! remember clark. he gave you everything. everything.

Name: andy
Line: jan, i don't know what he's talking about but...

Name: jan
Line: tell angela to send me a final invoice.

Name: andy
Line: well, ah, ah...

Name: dwight
Line: please ja, ja... [jan hangs up]

Name: andy
Line: aw! that was not how i had hoped that would go.

Name: andy
Line: [approaching accounting] hey, everybody, great job. [to angela] listen, we're a smidge behind on my paychecks.

Name: angela
Line: yes, well, as you know, we get paid on fridays. and you haven't been here for 12 fridays. [hands andy a folder]

Name: andy
Line: all right. thank you very much. [examines checks] looking good. [after noticing something on angela's desk] who's that little fella?

Name: angela
Line: it's a bonus check. for you. from wallace. because the branch exceeded it's targets over the past quarter.

Name: andy
Line: wow, that's wonderful!

Name: oscar
Line: a quarter's three months. that's how long you've been gone.

Name: andy
Line: uh-huh.

Name: angela
Line: uh-huh.

Name: andy
Line: uh-huh... [after awkward pause] uh-huh. [angela hands him the bonus check] thank you. great. well, we're all up to speed.

Name: dwight
Line: two seconds of the turd dog and he loses the biggest sale this branch has ever seen.

Name: clark
Line: [emotional] do you have any idea what i had to do to get that sale from jan? i mean, i went all out. all out. i mean like everything was out the whole week.

Name: kevin
Line: he just waltzes back in here like he owns the chunky, lemon milk. who needs him, right?

Name: dwight
Line: god! i just don't know what we'd do. i mean, short of telling david wallace that he was gone for three months.

Name: dwight
Line: i'd like to rat out andy. unfortunately, i have a bit of a boy-who-cried-wolf dynamic with david wallace. except, instead of a boy, i'm a man. and instead of a wolf, i cried genetically-engineered monster wolf.

Name: nellie
Line: i'm not going to rat on him. no, andy gave me a second chance. so, the least i could do is let somebody else rat on him. meredith, why don't you?

Name: meredith
Line: meredith palmer ain't never been called no nark. floozy? yes. alkie? check. einstein sarcastically? you bet. but never no nark. vomit mop? sure. floor meat? that's me. flesh hoover?

Name: erin
Line: hey!

Name: pete
Line: meredith, that's plenty. all right? that's more than plenty. why does no one stop her?

Name: erin
Line: guys. i know that a lot of people are mad at andy and, believe me, i am too. but, he has been through a lot and we all used to love him, right? so, if he's gonna get in trouble, just let it be his fault not ours. i don't want that on my hands.

Name: dwight
Line: fine! the state he's in, wallace will take one look at him and probably fire him anyway.

Name: andy
Line: [appears approaching group, shaved and in a suit] what's going on in here, dirty players? let's get back to busting some paper rhymes. come on. [singing] who's that girl? who's that girl? it's andy! [resumes talking] all right. back to work.

Name: pam
Line: ok, i can tell you're mad at me. do you wanna just, um, i don't know, tell me why?

Name: jim
Line: i don't know. i thought that was a little weird. you told me brian got fired for the whole warehouse thing. and you intentionally left out a kind of major, intimate detail. i don't know, pam, i guess i just feel like a chump. who knows less about his marriage than the sound guy.

Name: pam
Line: i didn't tell you about the crying because i didn't want you to know how upset i was. because it would've stressed you out and you're always saying how much you don't want more stress.

Name: jim
Line: yeah, well. yeah, ok. well, then thank you. thanks to both of you.

Name: pam
Line: it's not brian's fault.

Name: jim
Line: no, you're right. and, and i'm not mad at brian. and to be honest, i probably don't have any reason to be mad at all because i wasn't there. so, let's just forget about it.

Name: pam
Line: ok.

Name: andy
Line: i need you guys to tell me all the highlights from the last three months in case david asks. just a few things i could sprinkle into conversation. any big sales or office gossip.

Name: dwight
Line: well, we had the scranton white pages.

Name: andy
Line: not helpful. let's stay positive, people. ok?

Name: david wallace
Line: [enters] hey guys.

Name: andy
Line: hey! david! how are ya? ah, we were just having our weekly round table where we motivate each other. not gonna lie, i get as much out of it as they do.

Name: david wallace
Line: sounds great. don't let me interrupt. what ever you guys have been doing this last quarter, i couldn't be happier with the numbers.

Name: andy
Line: thank you.

Name: david wallace
Line: well, finish up. i'm gonna meet with val about that warehouse guy you had to let go and you and i will talk in 15 minutes?

Name: andy
Line: great!

Name: david wallace
Line: [leaving] great job, everybody!

Name: andy
Line: [whispering] we had to let a warehouse guy go?!

Name: kevin
Line: you know pam's mural? well, frank...

Name: dwight
Line: [interrupting] â€¦ lit the whole thing on fire. it was crazy.

Name: andy
Line: what?!

Name: dwight
Line: yeah.

Name: andy
Line: there was a fire in the warehouse?

Name: dwight
Line: the whole thing is in ashes. fire department was here. it was in all the papers.

Name: kevin
Line: whoa.

Name: andy
Line: this is what i'm talking about! this would be good to know. all right, what else?

Name: phyllis
Line: we started selling balloons.

Name: andy
Line: what?!

Name: clark
Line: yeah. and, uh, kathy ireland signed on as the official spokes-babe of dunder-mifflin.
